thub pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang

sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ \u0f00 ha la ha la/ hi la hi lA ya/ na mo dza ga na mi tsa nA ya/ na mo na maHswA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs
kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na/
de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chu dang me'i sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de dug zos kyang zas

bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /zas dang skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te zos na pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / /nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/ /ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas la sna ma'i mar sbyin no/ /mdze dang skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la sna ma'i mar dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang /
shu ti dang / nye'u shing pa rnams bsres pa'i mar byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can steng gi nam mkha'

la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA

ya/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsA ya pa tsA ya/ sarba b+hu tA nA~M/ tsin+tA ya/ kI lA ya/ ba ra bid+yA nA~M swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / bsgom nyes pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa

thams cad bzlog pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di zung shig nam mkha'i snying po gang la la
zhig nga'i snying po 'di nyin lan gsum yid la byed na/ de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /

gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni nad thams cad la skud pas bcing bar bya'o/ /
'dus pa las gyur pa la sna ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no/ /chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /skud pas bdag bsrung ngo / /byis pa rnams kyi gdon dag la skud pa sngon po gdags so/ /mtshon

btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o/ /gzhan dag la yang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i

don dang nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ \u0f00 ka la ka la/

ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ku lod sA d+ha nA nA~M/ ku ru sarba gra hA NA~M swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /

da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis gsungs shing ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig /gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na
de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ rims nad kyis mi 'debs shing / chu dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi

'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/ /dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen nam / dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang par langs nas mgo bkrus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya

rtsa brgyad brjod na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sems can sdang ba gang dag rgyal po rnams thog mar smra bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang du yid

la bya'o/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad du skud pa dkar po gdags so/ /mig nad la shing 'o ma can las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdags so/ /dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang /

sbrang rtsi la btags pa'i 'bras yos la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rA dzA nA~M rA dzA mA tram+bA ba shI ka ro tu kA me na/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin sreg bya'o/ /

bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa sbyang zhing dpal chen po dang / nor gyi phung po chen po bsgrub par 'dod na 'o ma can gyi shing gi sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til

dag lan stong sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyang bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags thams cad 'grub par 'dod pa dang / bdag bkru bar 'dod pas shu ti dang / na la dang / khre dang / shi ri sha dang / rgya spos dang / gur gum

dang / gla sgang dang / in dra ba ru na dang / byang chub kyi shing dang / a mra'i mgo thogs dang / 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bya zhing bum pa sar pa bzhag ste/ zla ba nya la

sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar snying pos lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la khrus bya'o/ /dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi thur ma ba'i lci bar smyugs pa brgya rtsa brgyad ming

nas smos te sbyin sreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyur ro/ /gdon dang / srung ba dang / 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la yang sbyar bar byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par

dad sel steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo

d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ na maHkra ku ts+tshan+dA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te sa~M myak+sa~M bud d+hA ya/ \u0f00 ka Ta ka Ta/ ka Tha ka Tha/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ki Thi ki Thi/ ki TA pa ya na maHswA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel ces bya ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'i snying po 'di khyod kyis zung shig /blangs shing bzung ste kun chub par

byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dag gis mchod pa

byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod 'byor par 'gyur te/ tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /yang na mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur

ro/ /yang na cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs na de mir skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di la yang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin

par 'gyur ro/ /zas dang skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun sngags te zos 'thung na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste skom zhu bar 'dod na bza' thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o/ /lhog rgal bcad na zangs

khab kyis bya'o/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / bcings pa thams cad las thar bar bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod byed na rtag tu nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste de bzhin
gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na des phyogs gtsang mar 'jig rten gyi 'khor sar dkyil 'khor bskus la a ga rus bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ de'i drung du sngas shar phyogs su

bstan te nyal na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yid la ci snos pa de thams cad ston to/ /tshe'am stobs sam/ pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/

sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ na maHka na ka mu

na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te sa~M myak+sa~M bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ \u0f00 sa ra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ si ri si ri/ si rA ya/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu ma d+hu mA ya na mo na maHka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/

a ra ha te sa~M myak+sa~M bud d+he swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin

cing rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyis 'jigs pa mi 'byung / me dang / chu dang / lce 'bab pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/ dus ma yin
par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs

pas byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste pha rol nad las thar bar byed par 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing pog gam/ a ku

ru'i bdug pas bdugs la bza' thams cad la khrus bya'o/ /mdze dang / skrangs nad dang / mchin skran la shu dag 'jam po btags la sbrang rtsi dang bsres te/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la

bskus na mdze nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te mi'i mgo la bcing na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur ro/ /

mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na/ brjed byed las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug go/ de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de/ las thams cad pa zhes bya'o/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag

bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ \u0f00 ha ra ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ha ha/ na maHkA sh+ya pA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te/ sa~M myak+sa~M bud d+hA ya/ sid d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pA da swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung

gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa

ste/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis kyang snying po 'di zung shig kun chub par gyis shig / gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ nyin mo'am/ mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas brjod byas na mdor na rmi lam

na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so/ /las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /mdze dang / sha gar la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la

phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te/ bklags shing bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro/ /klad pa na ba la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas

kyi spyan sngar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o/ /thams cad du yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag

bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ g+hu me g+hu me/ ma hA g+hu me/ ta le ta le/ ma hA ta le/ tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ d+hu re d+hu re/ ma hA d+hu re/ ti ri ti ri/ ma hA ti ri/ ki li ki li/ ma hA ki li/

tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA tsu ru/ mi li mi li/ ma hA mi li/ ti li ti li/ ma hA ti li/ d+hu me d+hu me/ ma hA d+hu me/ tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ khi ri khi ri/ ma hA khi ri/ tsi li tsi li/ ma hA tsi li swA hA/ de nas bac+do~Ms de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa

bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po klad pa'i nad bsal na mtshon dang lag mthil gyis bya'o/ /sprin bzlog na shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas

bya'o/ /dug sbyong na chus bya'o/ /las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o/ /khrus kyi cho gas sbyar bar bya'o/ /cho ga thams cad kyis thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn
a mi tA bA d+hA ra Ni man tra/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs sngags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ a mi tod+b+ha be/ a mi ta sa~M b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+ta kA re/ a mi ta ga ga na kIR+ti ka re sarba kle sha k+Sha ya~M ka ri swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib

pa yang 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod byas na sgrib pa de rnams zad par 'gyur ro/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang yongs su byang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun

par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ma hI du hi ke swA hA/ lus la nad byung ba dang / nad khong skams su gyur kyang rung ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
bsngags te/ bsil yab kyis de la g.yabs na nad med par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs sngags de gsungs ma thag tu 'khor thams cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /bcom ldan
'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a mi te/

a mi tod+b+ha be/ a mi ta sa~M b+ha be a mi ta bi krAn+ta gA mi nI/ ga ga na kIR+ti ka re/ sarba kle sha k+Sha yang ka ri swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang lan gsum bzlas pa
byas na de rnams zad par rig par bya'o/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa byas na/ rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang sdig pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par yang
'gyur ro/ /snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran pa rdzogs s+ho// // zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/

tsa n+d+re tsa n+d+re/ su tsan+d+ra/ ma ti tsan+d+ra tsan+d+ra ki ra Na/ si ri si ri/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ta/ ki li ki li/ /d+harma a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ki li ki li/ sa~M g+hA a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ rigs kyi bu'am

rigs kyis bu mo gang gis rtag tu nang par langs te/ zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dran par byed pa de ni bskal pa bzhi khrir tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ de ni ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zla ba'i 'od kyi

mtshan rjes su dran pas yon tan de rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs s+ho// // na maH sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ a nu ga te \u0f00 ku ru~M gi ni swA hA/ 'di lan
gcig bzlas pas kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang zad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'i snying po rjes su dran pa rdzogs s+ho// //

sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na shi khi ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a te samyak+sa~M bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ rat+ne rat+na shi khi ne swA hA/ 'chi ba'i tshe dran na ngan song kun las
rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ 'chi 'phos nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi lhar skye'o/ /sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/
Ar+ya bi ma la nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rnam

par dag pa tshul khrims yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa bzod pa yongs su

dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa phan pa'i dngos po yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa byams pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs

pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa snying rje yongs su dag pa dang / dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang / btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa rnam par grol ba yongs su dag

pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa stobs yongs su dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos

yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa

yongs su dag pa la su zhig me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams kyis bsti stang du byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par

mi nus te/ de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa ma gtogs par bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mthar yang zad par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

blo gros rnam par dag pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshad med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba yang tshad med do/ /mtha' yas so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /

mtshungs pa med do/ /grangs med do/ /dpag gis mi lang ngo / /brjod du med do/ /blo gros rnam par dag pa su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la bsti stang du byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor

byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor

byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / yang dag par sems nye bar bzhag ste/ byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa

dang / rjed pa dang / gsol ba dang / bsngags pa dang / skor ba byed pa des phan yon lngar shes par bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing

khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa skyed par 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon lnga po de dag tu shes par bya'o/ /de nas gzhan yang

chos bzhir shes par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i tshig so sor 'dzin pa dang / de dag kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba

dang / myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi

lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs che ba dang / btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang / phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi

bar 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dad pa skyed de/ pus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas phyag 'tshal te/

de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa de ci 'dra bar bdag kyang de 'dra ba'i lus thob par gyur cig ces de ltar mos pa bskyed na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa bsod nams kyi phung po

de'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/ brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid dam/ nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas

nyid dam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang zad par byar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab

pa yongs su bzung ba yin te/ blo gros rnam par dag pa 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa grong khyer du 'jug gam/ gtsug lag khang

ngam/ grong du 'jug kyang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rgyu yang rung / 'chag kyang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / chos ston kyang rung / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can lha'am/ klu'am/

gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ mi'am/ mi ma yin pa'am/ shing ngam/ ri'am/ khung bu'am/ bya skyibs kyang rung ste/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de

logs su 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / kun tu 'dud pa mi byed pa de gang yang med de/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa la byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag grong ngam/

grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba la sems can rnams 'dud/ rab tu 'dud/ kun tu rab tu 'dud par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /a mi tA a mi te pra b+ha be

ma hA pra b+he/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ bcom ldan 'das mthus bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das mthus bstan du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ ma ti ma ti/

ma ti ma ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ ma hA smr-i ti/ ma hA smr-i ti/ chags pa mi mnga' gti mug bsal du gsol/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/

so me/ so me/ so me/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/

sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ shi khi shi khi/ shi khi shi khi/ shi khi shi khi/ shi khi shi khi/ shi khi shi khi/ zhi bar gyur cig /nad med par gyur cig /bgegs med par gyur cig /pra b+ha ba ti/ ma hA ma t+ye/ ra ra/ ra

ra/ ra ra/ ra ra/ ra ra/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi mtshan kyang gzung bar bya zhing phyag bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ bac+do~Ms rin chen 'byung gnas dang / bac+do~Ms rin chen nyi ma dang / bac+do~Ms rin chen bla ma dang /

bcom ldan 'das rin chen mkhregs dang / bac+do~Ms rin chen tog dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phro dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mthu dang / bac+do~Ms mi 'khrugs pa dang / bac+do~Ms 'od dpag med dang / bac+do~Ms

dbyangs dpag med dang / bac+do~Ms thub dka' dang / bac+do~Ms grags pa mtha' yas dang / bac+do~Ms rin chen 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das bde chen brnyes dang / bac+do~Ms skar ma'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das bden dbyangs dang /

bcom ldan 'das nad kyi dri ma bral dang / bac+do~Ms zla ba dkar dang / bac+do~Ms dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / bac+do~Ms nyi ma dkar dang / bac+do~Ms nyi ma'i 'od dang / bac+do~Ms 'od dag pa dang / bac+do~Ms rin chen mtha' yas dang / bac+do~Ms rin chen snying po dang / bac+do~Ms

rin chen 'byung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sde dang / bac+do~Ms pad+ma'i sgra dang / bac+do~Ms pad+ma'i mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das yon tan mchog dang / bac+do~Ms gser 'od dang /

bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das gser lta bur snang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'byung gnas dang / bcom ldan 'das klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bac+do~Ms me tog

dang / bac+do~Ms spos thams cad kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bac+do~Ms phreng ba'i rgyal po dang / bac+do~Ms dpa' brtan pa'i sde dang / bac+do~Ms mtshon cha spong dang / bac+do~Ms dpal gyi snying po nor bu rin chen snang dang / bcom ldan 'das dpag med

rtogs 'od dang / bac+do~Ms seng ge sgra dang / bac+do~Ms seng ge dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das mthu chen brtson 'grus nges 'byung dang / bcom ldan 'das snying pos zil gnon dang / bac+do~Ms rnga sgra'i rgyal po dang /
bcom ldan 'das zla ba mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma zil gnon dang / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das me dang / bcom ldan 'das skrag byed dang / bac+do~Ms rin chen mu

khyud dang / bac+do~Ms rtag tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / bac+do~Ms blo yangs dang / bac+do~Ms rin chen dpag med sprul 'od dang / bac+do~Ms ri rab ltar rnam par gnon pa dang / bac+do~Ms phyag na rin chen mchog dang / bac+do~Ms rin chen

'dus pa'i dpal dang / bac+do~Ms phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i tshig gi dpal dang / bac+do~Ms kun nas rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dag pa brnyes pa dang / bac+do~Ms nyi zla sgron ma dang / bac+do~Ms lhun po dang / bac+do~Ms

lhun po chen po dang / bac+do~Ms ri rab dang / bac+do~Ms shin tu lhun po dang / bac+do~Ms ri rab lta bu'o/ /tad+ya thA/ pa ta pa ta/ da ma da ma/ g+ha ma g+ha ma swA hA/ shar phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bac+do~Ms 'di dag la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa

gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la nad med pa dang / zhi bar mngon du bsrung du gsol/ lho phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bac+do~Ms gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du gsol/ nub phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag

gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du gsol/ byang phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bac+do~Ms gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung

du gsol/ 'og gi phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du gsol/ steng gi phyogs logs na sang+yas

bac+do~Ms gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du gsol/ phyogs mtshams logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren

pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ bi ma le/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma la sa~M b+ha be swA hA/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/

bi ma le/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma la sa mung+ga te/ bi ma la sa mung+ga te/ bi ma la sa mung+ga te/ bi ma la sa mung+ga te/ bi ma la sa mung

ga te/ bi ma la sa mung+ga te/ bi ma la sa mung+ga te/ bi ma la sa mung+ga te/ rig sngags 'di ni rig sngags che/ /lha rnams kyis ni brjod pa yin/ /'di ni dus gsum brjod byas na/ /nad rnams las ni yongs su thar/ /mi ma yin gyis gang byas

dang / /sdig pa gang dag sbyor byas dgrol/ /de dag dran pa brjed mi 'gyur/ /bzung ba rnams kyang chud mi za/ /de dag skye ba rnams su yang / /rtag tu sangs rgyas 'bral mi 'gyur/ /su zhig dri ma med pa'i gzungs/ /'di ni dga'

bas 'dzin byed pa/ /zhing rnams kun tu rgyu ba na/ /dpal ldan pad+ma'i snying por byung / /mtshan rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan/ /yan lag 'od zer dra ba 'byung / /tad+ya thA/ ku Ti ku Ti/ kuts+tsha lo/ e la e la/ muk+ta/ ko ta thA lo/ e ri

ri/ ri mri ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par dag pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bac+do~Ms kyis

gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar

chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi she Sha ba ti nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sbrul gyi lo'i dgun zla ra ba'i tshes nyi shu la yul phug ron can na/ grong khyer siny+tso zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe dge slong tshe brjod

ces bya ba don cig gi phyir grong khyer gnas song zhes bya bar song ste/ dge slong de rgya yul gyi grong khyer nas dpag tshad brgya'i lam du phyin pa dang / dge slong des bar der mi lus chen po khrun du mtho sum cu yod pa/ bzhin

mtho bzhi pa zhig rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dge slong tshe brjod des mi de lta bu de la 'di snyam du bsams te/ kye ma mi 'di ni lus che ste/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin du nges so snyam nas/ des pus

mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ mi lus chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ mi lus chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ji khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ste/ 'di na gda' 'am/ 'jam dpal

gyis smras pa/ dge slong de de bzhin no/ /dge slong des smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci'i slad du 'di na gda'/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rnams la nad rnam pa

sna tshogs 'byung ste/ gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za rnams ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos gcig la gnas so/ /des nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi mngon/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar rnams kyang

nam mkha'i bar skabs na mi snang ngo / /de'i tshe lha dang / lha ma yin kyang g.yul 'gyed de/ g.yul bkye ba dang / lha rnams ni pham/ lha ma yin rnams ni rgyal te/ de'i tshe 'byung po dang / yi dags rnams bud med kyi gzugs kyis

sems can rnams la nad gtong ste/ 'di lta ste/ lkog ma'i lha gor dang / 'brum phran dang / me dbal dang / lto na ba dang / rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang /

mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / klad pa na ba dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / tshad pa dang / mig nad la sogs pa nye bar sgrub bo/ /'di lta ste/ char ches pa dang /
than pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char gyis lo tog phun sum tshogs pa'i 'ongs 'phrog sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog /tshe dang / stobs dang / mdog dang / gzugs 'phrog ste/ de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling

na sems can thams cad nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su nyen to/ /gtum po seng ge dang / spyang ki dang / stag dang / sbrul la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can

rnams la dus ma yin par chud za ba nye bar gnas pas sems can rnams nad las thar bar bya ba yang dka' ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rgan pa dang / bar ma dang / gzhon pa dag las dkrigs phrag sum cu 'chi

bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir nga dge slong khyod kyi gan du 'ongs kyis/ khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrogs shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can

thams cad ni 'di snyam du bdag cag ji ltar sdug bsngal gyis bcings pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur snyam du re ba'i phyir ro/ /de lta bas na dge slong khyod kyis sems can thams cad la mdo 'di sgrogs te/

sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir nan tan gyis shig /dkon mchog gsum la rtag par rgyun du dad par gyis shig /lha rjed cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams sam/ sku gzugs rnams
la spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa rnams kyis mchod par gyis shig /khyad par can gyi gzungs kyang lhogs shig /nyi ma bdun yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la nye bar gnas par gyis shig /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs zab mo 'brug bsgrags rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ bi pu la gardzi te/ bi pu la swA re/ bi pu la yo ni she/ a na la se/ a na la sam b+ha be/ a na la sa ga tiM ga te swA hA/

de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ he ma he ma/ ha ma ha ma swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a mi tod+b+ha be/ a mi ta sa~M b+ha be/ a mi

ta bi krAn+te/ a mi ta bi krAn+ti ka re/ a mi ta ga ga na kIrti ka re swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ga ga na sa A ka ra/ ga ga na sa~M b+ha bi/ ga ga na kIrte ka re swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs

pa kun nas spos mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sa ma sa me swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'brug bsgrags gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a sa ma sa me swA hA/

de bzhin gshegs pa nga rgyal gnon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ma na bi shu/ pad+me shwa re/ pad+ma sa~M b+ha be/ king ka re/ hi ta~M ka rI ye swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ shwe ta ka ra b+he dz+wa li ne swA hA/ dza~M b+ha ne/ sta~M b+ha ne/ mo ha ne swA hA/ pauN+Ta ri kA ya

swA hA/ ho me d+harme/ d+harmA tsan+tA ye swA hA/ d+ha re b+hi d+ha re/ ka la bing ka ru tA yai swA hA/ shAn+te/ kAn+ne/ ni rbA pa N+ye swA hA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bi du ru d+hi ye swA hA/ bi ma la pra tsun+dA yai swA hA/ a ba lo ki ta/ bi lo ki tA ya swA hA/ A dz+nyA na bi d+ha ma n+yai swA

hA/ pad+ma swa re/ pad+ma sa~M b+ha be/ king ka re hi tang ka ri ye swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ tsan+d+ra pra b+he/ tsan+d+ra na gar+b+he/ tsan+d+ra na ts+'ur+Ne/ ke kai la sa ba ti/ sarba bud+ha/ a d+hiSh+Thi ta a nu mo

di te swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza ya la b+he/ dza ya ma hA ma he swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ga ga na a r+ye/ ga ga na sa mud+ga te/ ga ga na bi krAn+ta/ bi krAn+ta/ e dzi me dzi/ pad+mo dzi swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ he b+ha dre/ ma hA b+ha dre/ a ti b+ha dre/ sa man+ta

b+ha dre/ bi ga ta rA dza se/ ma hA bi ga ta rA dza se/ a ti bi ga ta rA dza se/ he ma ba ti/ karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ mai tri mai tri/ mai tri ma na se swA hA/ byang chub

sems dpa' 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ gar+b+he/ gar+b+he/ gar+b+he/ gar+b+ha bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ak+Sha ye nu/ ak+Sha ye phu/ ak+Sha ya

karma bi sho d+ha ne phu swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ kIrti tA/ sarba dzi nai/ a b+hi kIrti tA/ sarba dzi nai/ badzrA ka re/ badzra sa~M b+ha be/ badzra be dA kA re swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel

ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sarbA pa ra Na bi b+hi n+yai swA hA/ d+hA tu bi ka ra N+yai swA hA/ me g+ha bi Ta me swA hA/ a pa rA dzi ta kA yai swA hA/ ba la dad n+yai swA hA/ bo d+h+yang da da n+yai swA hA/ karma nir+b+ha bi ta kA yai swA hA/ e kA rA mA yai swA hA/ yo ga tsA rA yai

swA hA/ sarba bud d+ha b+hi Shik+tA yai swA hA/ bra pa ku tA yai swA hA/ sarba d+harmA b+hi Shik+tA yai swA hA/ sarba bud d+ha b+hi Shik+tA yai swA hA/ e ka shring gA yai swA hA/ a shring gA yai swA hA/ b+hU tA yai swA hA/ a sa~M b+hU tA yai swA hA/ sarba duHkho pra sha ma n+yai swA hA/

zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ tsan+d+ra pra b+he/ su pra b+he/ pra b+hA ka re/ pra b+hod+ga te/ pra b+hod+ga te/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ d+harma bi shu/ karmA bi shud d+hi r+b+ha ba tu me swA hA/ tshe brjod gang la la zhig rig sngags 'dis nyin zhag

bdun du nyin lan bdun mtshan lan bdun du byab pa byas na/ des las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong bdun la zan sbyin no/ /me las me spel bar bya'o/ /mtshan mo mar me thogs te mchod rten la bsti

stang du byas la bskor bar bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos bri ba dang bklag pa la brtson par bya'o/ /gal te yams kyi nad cher byung na khyim nas khyim dang / grong nas grong dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer du gan d+ha ra sa'i bdug pa dang gtor

ma dang / lha bshos kyis mchod par bya'o/ /nad pa gang yin pa des kyang cho ga 'di bzhin byas na de myur du nad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong

rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston na de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas skye bo thams cad kyi rna lam du grag par 'gyur bar yul nas

yul dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer dang / grong nas grong du bskur bar bya'o/ /yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe brjod rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las

chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lan gcig bklags na de bdag nyid thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sus lan gnyis bklags na de bu dang chung ma dang lhan cig thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sus lan gsum bklags na de rtsa lag gi tshogs kyi skye bo

dang bcas te thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sus lan bzhi bklags na/ de yul 'khor thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sus lan lnga bklags na/ de nye 'khor gyi rgyal po dang bcas pa thar bar 'gyur ro/ /yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge

slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du yul gzhan dag tu bskur bar bya ste/ der yang yon tan 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe brjod gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la mi 'dzin tam/ mi klog

gam/ yi ger mi 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir mi 'jug gam/ kun chub par mi byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu mi ston tam/ yul gzhan du mi 'byin tam/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te mi nyan

tam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mi sngo na mtshams med pa lnga byed pa rnams kyi 'gro ba ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar mngon par 'grub ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis smad pa'o/ /

yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe brjod su zhig 'di tshad mar mi byed pa de ni ngas thog ma nyid du dad par byas pa ma yin no/ /'di ltar 'dzam bu gling pa'i sems can

thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ nga ri'i rgyal po ri rab la song ste/ lha dang / dri za rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang mthun par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan bya'o/ /de skad ces smras nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de nyid

du mi snang bar gyur to/ /dge slong tshe brjod kyis kyang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa la mngon par bstod de bzung nas song ngo / /'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //

rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya

aSh+Ta maN+Da la ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag
gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu
bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas chos gos
phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga la sa la btsugs nas/ bac+do~Ms ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bac+do~Ms la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan
pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na bac+do~Ms de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig

dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor brgyad pa bgyid par 'tshal na des ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po

la shin tu phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / dus gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod spobs pa skyes pa ni bzang ste/ legs so legs so/ /

rigs kyi bu de'i phyir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga 'byang zhing dngos grub thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po nyon cig /\u0f00 ma hA hU~M ma hA bI ra swA hA/ snying po 'dis ni dbus

kyi bcom ldan 'das mchod do/ /\u0f00 hrI hU~M pad+ma pri ya swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o/ /\u0f00 mai hA rA Na swA hA/ byams pa'i snying po'o/ /\u0f00 A kA sha gar+d+hA ya swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po'i snying po'o/ /

\u0f00 swA hri rA ya dz+wa swA hA/ kun tu bzang po'i snying po'o/ /\u0f00 ku ru b+han ra ha swA hA/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /\u0f00 shrI a~M ra~M ga swA hA/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po'o/ /\u0f00 ni swA raM b+ha swA hA/ sgrib pa

thams cad rnam par sel ba'i snying po'o/ /\u0f00 k+Shi ti ha rA dzA swA hA/ sa'i snying po'i snying po'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa 'di rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
zhig gis dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du lan cig brjod na de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /
bac+do~Ms kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkyil

'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar

chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya alpa a k+Sha ra pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung
ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bac+do~Ms rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung

po'i ri la dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bac+do~Ms ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
nas/ 'dzum mul te/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba/ gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad
kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur
ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring por sems can

thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa legs so legs so/ /de'i phyir rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba gang thos pa

tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs med par sngags 'grub

par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad

du bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sems can thams cad dgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /mnyam par bzhag pa des smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer

'bum phrag du ma byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab par gyur to/ /sems can gang dag 'od zer des reg pa sems can dmyal ba pa yan chad sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char yang
phab po/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpas mnyam pa'i sems dang byams pa'i sems dang byas pa gzo ba dang /
sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems su bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di yang gdon par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ \u0f00 mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/ ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chen po las khyod kyis 'di nyid thob pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/ /khyod de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas nyid du lung yang bstan to/ /gang dag

khyod kyi ming nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa dang / glegs bam du bris nas mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/

dza ya dza ya/ pad+mA b+he/ a ba me sa ra sa ra Ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ de ba tA nu pA la ne/ bud+d+ha ut+ta ra Ni pU ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ sarbA sha ma sha ma sarba satwA nA~M/ sarba karmA ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ya/ bud+d+ha a
d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA/ don dam par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum 'phral du sdig pa 'phrog pa/ byang chub sbyin par
byed pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phan yon brjod par mi nus so/ /'di bklags pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags
thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

ci'i slad du 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thabs sla ba'i phyir te/ sems can gang dag spro ba chung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa
dang / klog pa dang / yi ge 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag thams cad thabs sla bas byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de skad ces

bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji tsam du sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / sems can

bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/

bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga ba tI pradz+nyA pA

ra mi tA hr-i da ya/ bod skad du/ bac+doMs ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po/ ba~M po gcig go/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/

bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i
chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab

mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing / phung po lnga po de dag la yang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des ji ltar bslab par bya/ de skad ces smras pa
dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang

la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste/ phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par yang dag par rjes su blta'o/ /gzugs stong pa'o/ /
stong pa nyid gzugs so/ /gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa

rnams stong pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de lta bas na chos thams cad stong pa nyid de/ mtshan nyid med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba med pa/ bri ba med pa/ gang ba med pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de lta
bas na stong pa nyid la gzugs med/ tshor ba med/ 'du shes med/ 'du byed rnams med/ rnam par shes pa med/ mig med/ rna ba med/ sna med/ lce med/ lus med/ yid med/ gzugs med/ sgra med/ dri med/

ro med/ reg bya med/ chos med do/ /mig gi khams med pa nas yid kyi khams med/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang med do/ /ma rig pa med/ ma rig pa zad pa med pa nas rga shi med/ rga shi zad
pa'i bar du yang med do/ /sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam med/ ye shes med/ thob pa med/ ma thob pa yang med do/ /shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams

thob pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing gnas te/ sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de/ phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to/ /dus gsum

du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de lta bas na shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/ rig pa chen po'i sngags/ bla na med pa'i sngags/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sngags/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags/ mi brdzun pas na
bden par shes par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ ga te ga te pA ra ga te/ pA ra saM ga te/ bo d+hi swA hA/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /

bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen sdes bsgyur cing / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge
slong nam mkha' la sogs pas zhus te gtan pa'o/ /dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag gi dge rgyas bye ma gling gi rtsig ngos la bris pa dang zhu dag legs par bgyis so/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/

bud+d+ha b+ha ga wAn aSh+Ta sha ta nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bac+do~Ms kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ tha~Md mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bac+do~Ms snying rje'i tsan dan
dri zhim po'i spos kyis byugs pa'i sku/ zhabs pad+ma lha dang lha ma yin gyi nor bu'i cod pan gyis gtugs pa/ rang byung sel mdzad bla ma 'jig rten thams cad la phan par mdzad pa/ ston
pa de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa nyes pa dang bral ba/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ gzugs mdzes pa/ mtshan gsal ba'i gzi brjid can/ sku dpe byad kyis brgyan pa/ yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs

pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma rgyas pa ltar zhal bzhad de/ tshems dkar zhing snyoms la thags bzang bas rab tu rgyas shing snang la nor bu dri ma med pa ltar 'od gsal zhing mdzes te/ spa zhing gsal ba

nyi ma 'od zer stong 'bar ba mang po'i 'od snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zil gyis gnon pa/ thub pa'i mchog stobs bcu dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dud do/ /rab tu 'dud do/ /bstod do/ /\u0f00 b+ho hU~M hU~M hU~M/

A A/ hI hI/ shi ba shi ba/ shAn+ti shAn+ti/ sha ma sha ma/ sha mA pa ya/ ta thA ga tA nu ga ta/ swa b+hA ba/ a b+hA ba/ sa mut+tA ya/ a sa ma ba la/ a bI ra la ba la/ a mi tA ba la/ a ti ba la/ hU~M g+hu~M g+hu~M/ / d+h+ro d+h+ro/

b+h+rau b+h+rau/ b+he du b+he du/ hI hI/ b+ha ga bAn+ta ka /su ra ta b+ho ga ma hA shAn+ti ka ra/ pA pi kalpi Sha nA sha ka swA hA/ de nas dpe byad mtshan gsal bas/ /yan lag thams cad rab brgyan cing / /nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba po/ /'bar ba'i

dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba/ /grags shing dri ma rab spangs la/ /dri med skyon bral chos kyi blo/ /khyab bdag chen po stobs bcur ldan/ /rdul bral dpal dang ldan pa po/ /rin chen sa gzhi chen po la/ pho brang rtse mo

rdo rje'i rtse/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams gnas gyur pa/ /nor bu du ma rab 'phro zhing / /'od zer dri med gsal bkod pa'i/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor pho brang na/ /thub pa'i longs spyod sa gzhi la/ /seng ge'i khri chen yangs la bzhugs/ /

nor bu dbyig gi sa gzhi dang / /khri chen rab spa de nyid la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen gyis/ /phun sum tshogs pa rgyan bkod lta/ /thub pa me zla nor bu'i 'od/ /nyi zer non pa'i 'od ldan pa/ /bde blag shin tu bkra shis

tshul/ /'od gsal skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /sku 'od 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ /'od gsal rgyas pas thub dbang gi/ /dri med 'od zer bkye ba ni/ /mi g.yo rdo rje can zhes bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs

pa yi/ /rdo rje can dag rab 'dul ba/ /gang yin de kun dag byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor dri med skor bar byed/ /ngan song dam tshig dri ma kun/ /legs par shin tu dag byas nas/ /srid gsum dkyil 'khor rgya che la/ /rnam pa du mar

'od gsal ba/ /'gro dang mi 'gro ma lus pa/ /bskor nas bde chen rdo rje can/ /rdo rje ral gri thogs pa de/ /cod pan ma g.yos nang du zhugs/ /de nas 'jigs pa'i sgra skad kyis/ /'gengs shing mig ni glog ltar 'gyu/ /

rig sngags hU~M zhes sgrogs pa po/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs byed pa/ /bzhin mdzes 'dzum gyis rnam par brgyan/ /sdig med mig rtsa rgod gyur cing / /stan las langs te phyag 'tshal nas/ /legs par mchod byas smras

pa ni/ /kye ma skye ba'i phyogs 'joms shing / /bskal pa du ma'i dri ma sel/ /rig sngags yon tan sgrub byed pa/ /thub mchog rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/ /de gzigs dge ba du ma brnyes/ /sangs rgyas blo gros rgyas par gyur/ /

byang chub sems dpa' blo gros che/ /bskal pa gcig tu spyod pas kyang / /rgyud mar sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing / /spyod pa du ma 'byung ba yi/ /yon tan brgya yi spos ldan 'di/ /thos pa spro bar mi nus so/ /longs spyod rgya mtsho chen po can/ /

byang chub sems mchog dkyil 'khor du/ /rgyal mchog rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'i/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can ldan/ /'di thos sangs rgyas spyod pa yis/ /sems can kun gyi sdig pa rnams/ /ma lus rab tu bsal nas ni/ /blo chen dri ma med par 'gyur/ /zhi zhing dag byed
bkra shis la/ /rdul med brgyan te zhi bar byed/ /dge zhing mya ngan thams cad sel/ /sdug bsngal thams cad nges par 'joms/ /dbang byed gsang sngags dam pa ste/ /sa stengs sdig pa thams cad sel/ /

ma smad 'bras bu nges par sbyin/ /bstan pa yin te sdang ba 'dul/ /nyes pa byas pa sel ba yin/ /gzungs 'di gang gis thos gyur des/ /sangs rgyas rnyed par dka' ba yang / /ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/ /sgrib pa

thams cad rab zhi zhing / /khyab bdag nyon mongs kun sel ba/ /gang zhig nyon mongs zhi byed pa'i/ /gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa yis/ /kun tu bzang po nyid dang ni/ /lag na rdo rje nyid kyang 'thob/ /rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po

yang / /'di thos pas ni thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten kun na lham me ba/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyang / /dkyil 'khor dam pa gting med pa/ /'di ni ji srid ma gsan par/ /rab zhi nyon mongs 'dul ba yi/ /

rang byung go 'phang ma brnyes te/ /rnam par dag phyir gsan gyur nas/ /gsan ma thag tu rnam par dag /de phyir phun sum tshogs pa dang / /legs par 'dod pas brjod par bya/ /gzhan gyis mi thub gzungs gsan

nas/ /thub pa kun gyis gang brnyes pa/ /'khor ba 'dir ni nam du yang / /bdud kyi las dang 'khrug med dang / /mya ngan med cing 'thab med pa/ /gzungs la gnas pas thob par 'gyur/ gnas kyi dam pa thob nas kyang / /

thub pa dri ma med pa'i blo/ /gzigs pa bzang rnams gar gshegs pa'i/ /bzang 'gro der ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyis ni/ /tshig gi mdo 'di mnyan par gyis/ /nyon mongs zad par bya ba la/ /rgyal ba'i

gsungs pa'i gzungs 'di mchog /sdig pa byed cing dge la sdang / /sdig pa'i rang bzhin rab 'jungs pa/ /gang gis thos nas de spang ba/ /nga yis mngon sum 'byor bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa gzhan yang mi bya zhing / /snga ma rnams kyang bshags par bya/ /

gzungs mchog 'di yi mthu stobs kyis/ /sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur/ /tshe rabs gzhan ni stong dag dang / /tshe rabs bye ba phrag brgyar yang / /sdig pa mi dge gang byas pa/ /dag 'gyur 'di la the tsom med/ /

yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad dang / /de bzhin tshes ni bcwa lnga la/ /bsnyen gnas legs par lhur blangs la/ /cho ga bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod/ /de nas rmongs pa med par yang / /nyon mongs dgra ni rab 'joms shing / /
shin tu thub dka' dpe med pa/ /nyes pa zlog pa'i gzungs brjod na/ /thub pa'i zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od/ /'bar ba nges par mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas tshogs rnams rdzogs pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i sras po nyid du

'gyur/ /'od dpag med la mnga' ba yi/ /yon tan mtha' yas rab brgyan pa/ /bskal pa bye ba stong du yang / /mtha' mi rtogs pa thob par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshig /dkyil 'khor dag na gnas rnams kyis/ /thos

nas rgyan rnams sna tshogs pa/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'bul bar byed/ /rdo rje ral gri la sogs pa/ /lha bdag gsal ba thams cad dang / /ri bo ti se ri rab la/ /gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang / /de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po na/ /

'khod pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang / /ma la ya yi ri bo la/ /gnas shing rgyan 'bar thogs rnams dang / /khyab 'jug lha chen la sogs pa/ /lha yi bdag po rnams dang ni/ /lag na rdo rje la sogs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'

stobs chen rnams/ /nor bu'i dpung rgyan rna cha dang / /rgyan rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i lus/ /rab tu bskyod de langs nas ni/ /sdig bral mnga' bdag rgyal ba la/ /phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /kun gyis sa yi dbang

phyug po/ /thub mchog dam pa de la ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod/ /mnyam nyid chos de de bzhin nyid/ /shin tu rtogs pa lam me ba/ /dul ba brtan pa dri ma sel/ /dri ma med pa skyon bral ba/ /thub pa sangs rgyas shin tu zhi/ /

'jig rten mgon po skye dgu'i bdag /de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul/ /de bzhin rgyal ba rdul bsal ba/ /ston pa ston mdzad brtan pa ste/ /sdig pa med pa rdul dang bral/ /'jig rten mgon po snang mdzad

pa/ /dag pa zhi ba zas gtsang sras/ /nyon mongs rab bcom phan 'dogs pa/ /ston pa po ste dri ma sel/ /spyod tshul dri med tshul bzang ba/ /zab pa rnam par gnon pa brtan/ /btsan po thugs brtse rnam par rgyal/ /mgon po de

bzhin mgon mdzad pa/ /zhi ba'i bdag nyid zhe sdang bral/ /bcings pa las grol nges par grol/ /'jig rten kun mchog 'khra ba'i sa/ /bdag gir mi 'dzin dri ma med/ /nyon mongs sel ba dpal dang ldan/ /dpa' mdzad de bzhin

phan pa mdzad/ /mnyam pa med pa dpe med pa/ /khyab bdag nyon mongs las rnams spong / /khengs pa med pa dman pa med/ /mnyam pa de bzhin mi mnyam mnyam/ /snang ba brnyes pa snang byed med/ /'jig rten snang mdzad sdig

med pa/ /sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste/ /'jig rten kun la phan par brtson/ /dpa' bo zhi ba zhi mdzad pa/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams zad par mdzad/ /mnga' bdag thabs mkhyen thabs che ba/ /sems can kun gyi 'khra sa

lags/ /don yod rnyed dka' blo dang ldan/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thub par dka'/ /skyob pa 'jigs sel tshangs pa ste/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos 'dzin pa/ /dpa' bo chen po 'jigs pa med/ /gzugs bzang mtshan rnams

gsal ba ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba/ /chos kyi longs spyod rgya mtsho lags/ /dpe byad bzang po bkod pa yis/ /spras pa'i bdag nyid ya mtshan ston/ /dka' ba med pa'i ston pa po/ /de bzhin des pa bde sbyin pa/ /mthu can

yangs pa rgya che ba/ /bdud bzhi'i stobs rnams sel mdzad pa/ /brtson chen spro ba che ba ste/ /dgyes pa chen po stobs po che/ /mthu brnyes brtan pa chen po ste/ /gnas ldan dbang gis dar ba lags/ /gsal ba gsung ldan dpe med pa/ /

dge ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyal/ /rab tu zhi ba mun pa med/ /blo gros chen po chos 'dzin pa/ /phun sum tshogs ldan sa chen brnyes/ /'dod pa rnams ni 'dul mdzad pa/ /dpal mdzad dpal mnga' dpal dang ldan/ /dpal gyi longs

spyod shin tu rgyas/ /bcom ldan legs bsgos bsgo bar mdzad/ /gsung ldan bkra shis rgyal ba'i gnas/ /mnyam nyid mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan dpag med/ /rab tu dgyes la longs spyod gsal/ /gzhi bcas

sems pa mnyam pa lags/ /blo dag blo ldan dri ma spangs/ /gnas chen brtan par ldan pa ste/ /rgyas par longs spyod dri ma med/ /thub pa thugs rje'i rgyan mnga' ba/ /skal ba bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs/ /de bzhin 'jigs med nyon mongs sel/ /

dri med skyon bral longs spyod can/ /sna tshogs 'od ldan dkyil 'khor mdzes/ /sku bzang dge ba'i rim pa mchog /thugs rje'i 'od ldan 'od bzang ba/ /mi gnas longs spyod dam pa lags/ /chos kyi rgyu ste yon tan gnas/ /rjed 'os

mchog gnas longs spyod che/ /nam mkha' mtshan te rnam dag blo/ /rin chen gzugs 'dra bkra shis pa/ /khyu mchog che spyan ba rdzi ma/ /rgyal ba skyon bsal shes rab can/ /shes rab thabs dang ldan pa ste/ /'jig rten mi dge

kun las 'das/ /dag par longs spyod brtan pa can/ /sa dang stobs dang ye shes bzod/ /pha rol phyin pa kun la mnga'/ /ting 'dzin mnyam par longs spyod pa/ /rnam thar sgo la mngon sum pa/ /gtong ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /

chos chen bde bar 'char ba lags/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul las 'das/ /spyod yul sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal/ /dam pa'i don te tshul che ba/ /shes bya'i yul rnams mtha' dag la/ /sgrib pa med par

'char ba brnyes/ /rigs chen mthun par skyes pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas/ /khyad par brnyes pa mnyam nyid brnyes/ /mi mnyam sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /don chen shin tu mthar phyin pa/ /

nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'/ /dge sbyong sdig pa sbyong mdzad pa/ /gnod pa med par bde bar 'byin/ /blo rgya che ba thams cad mkhyen/ /thos pa'i mtshon cha ma lus gsan/ /dkon pa bde ba thob 'gyur ba/ /mnyam

pa khyad par yul dang ldan/ /'jig rten thams cad dar mdzad mgon/ /zhi gnas mtshon cha thub par dka'/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bsam yas yul/ /dpe med pa ste dper bya ba/ /'od bzang rab dgyes dpal dang ldan/ /legs gsung

blo yi stobs kyis 'byung / /mkhas pa zhal bzang bde sbyin pa/ /rab dgyes 'das pa'i spyod yul can/ /gsung ba chen po ye shes che/ /gnas chen bkra shis chen po ste/ /mchod par gyur pa yul las 'das/ /bya ba'i mtshan

nyid med pa po/ /sangs rgyas yul du skyes pa ste/ /shes bya'i spyod yul rgya che ba/ /kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can/ /'jig rten dbang 'das spyod yul ba/ kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste/ /thabs mnga' phun sum tshogs

ldan pa/ /rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i thabs dang ldan/ /chos kyi gar thabs ston pa po/ /rab ston yon tan sgyur mdzad pa/ /spyod pa ma lus 'dul bar mdzad/ /yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag /sangs rgyas spyod yul rnam sangs rgyas/ /

bgegs byed ma legs byed pa bcom/ /bdud kyi dregs pa sel bar mdzad/ /g.yul ngor rnam par rgyal ba brnyes/ /dpa' bo chen po pham med stobs/ /theg pa chen po'i shing rta bcibs/ /blo chen brgal bar dka' ba yi/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i

pha rol gshegs/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /theg pa mchog la longs spyod pa/ /nyan thos 'das pa'i spyod yul can/ /rang rgyal las kyang 'das pa ste/ /sangs rgyas sa yi 'bras bur gnas/ /gong nas gong du khyad par mkhyen/ /

khyod ni nam mkha'i gnas na bzhugs/ /bde 'byung sa dang zhing rnams kyi/ /mtsho chen dag la longs par spyod/ /sangs rgyas dbang po rgyas pa la/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/ /de la lha sogs tshogs rnams kyis/ /phyag byas

mgo smad phyogs gcig 'khod/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po na/ /gnas pa ma lus chem mer 'khod/ /thod du rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba/ /langs nas cod pan rab tu g.yos/ /dkyil 'khor mthon po thams cad du/ /skad ber chen pos

yongs bkang nas/ /nor bu'i rgyan ni rnam g.yo zhing / /ha ha grags pa'i sgra sgrogs te/ /kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum bsags pa/ /byang chub sems sogs mchog rnams kyis/ /mtshan brgya rtsa

brgyad legs par brjod/ /kye ma rnyed dang bde 'byung ba/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos nas kyang / /gang zhig klog cing rgyal la bstod/ /'bras bu chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags bcas pa/ /bcom ldan 'das drung brjod

na ni/ /sgrib dang kun nas nyon mongs dang / /sdig pa thams cad dag pa 'thob/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na/ /sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing / /nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spong / /shes rab chen po nyid du 'gyur/ /

de ni longs spyod chen po dang / /bde ba las kyang nyams mi 'gyur/ /de ni tshe rabs thams cad du/ /blo ldan tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba/ /yon tan mtha' yas sras de la/ /bcom ldan bdud las rgyal
ba yis/ /mngon sum gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ /rgyal ba'i sa 'di zhi ba ste/ /nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs 'joms/ /'jig rten bde ba kun las 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs bde mngon du phyogs/ /gzhan

gyis mi tshugs gzungs dang ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan byed pa/ /de dag rnam dag bdag nyid de/ /sems can kun la bde 'dod pa/ /lan cig thos pa tsam gyis kyang / /de dag sa chen 'bras bur gnas/ /ring por

mi thogs dga' 'gyur na/ /'chang sogs lta la ci zhig smos/ /de phyir rtag tu rab bsgrims la/ /gtan du bde ba 'dod pa yis/ /yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i gzungs/ /mnyan par bya zhing bcang bar bya/ /gang zhig

nang par langs nas brjod/ /bdag nyid kyis kyang bton na ni/ /de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur la/ /gnod pa dang yang phrad mi 'gyur/ /'di ni yon tan kun gyi snod/ /dge ba phun sum tshogs sbyin pa/ /kun mkhyen

bla med 'bras bu'i mchog /bde 'byung thob par byed pa yin/ /'bras bu 'byor pa ci yang rung / /thob par mi 'gyur dogs pa med/ /kun mkhyen go 'phang thob gyur nas/ /dpe med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de ni dge zhing

'bras bur ldan/ /sangs rgyas sa yi 'bras bu sbyin/ /yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan/ /snying rje dri ma med sbyin pa/ 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo/ /'jig rten kun nas dga' ba ste/ /'jig rten kun gyi bde ba 'byung / /'di dang
'dra ba gang yang med/ /ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// //'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud bzhugs/ /
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI m+'u la tan tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'khor gyi tshogs so so

tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/ so sor rab tu gnas pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu
dag khyed cag nyon cig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bye

brag dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/ tshe dang nad med pa dang dbang phyug dang / yid la bsam

pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i sngags kyi gzhi dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste/ de shin du legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad par bya'o/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris

kyi lha'i bu de dag gis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang / sa chen po thob par bya ba dang / rdo rje'i gdan gnon

pa dang / bdud gdul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba dang / lha rnams dang mi rnams su skye bar bya ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / dbul ba dang /

nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ longs spyod kyis phyug pa 'dren par byed pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi spyod pas phongs par mi byed pa/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi gsung 'bras bu med par byed pa ma yin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i thugs dang / phan pa'i thugs dang bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas bcom ldan 'das de bshad du gsol/

de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams dang gnas gtsang ma'i gnas la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas/ dag pa'i yul la 'od rnam par spros te/ yul rnam par 'jigs pa zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdzod spu nas me tog kun tu skyes pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od phyung ste/
'od bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs

su brgya stong gi gang gA'i klung gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rjes su zhugs te/ gang na me tog kun du skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin
gshegs pa bzhugs par ro/ /der yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur
to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas/ bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag la smras pa/ rgyal ba'i sras dag 'od 'di
ni nga la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin gyis/ khyed cag g.yeng ba med par gyis shig ces smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
pa mig mi 'dzums shing kha bye bas/ 'od gang na ba de logs su mngon du bltas nas 'dug go/ de nas bskul ba'i 'od des me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos snang bar
byas te/ me tog kun du skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor nub par gyur to/ /
de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bac+do~Ms me tog kun du yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsu~M bskor ba byas te/ spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/

pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun du skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / sgrub thabs dang / dkyil

'khor dang / cho ga dang / gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / cho ga'i ngo bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang / gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa

thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas mchi bar 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces bcom ldan 'das me tog kun du skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa dang / 'jam

dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ phyogs bzhi mtha' yas mu med pa steng dang 'og dang thad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag

par gang bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dang bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pas/ rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/ /'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang

sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi nus/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu la gnas pa dag gis kyang snyoms par zhugs par mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog kun du yang dag par
skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par bgros te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba/
don thams cad sgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa ni yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba/ sems can thams cad kyi las thams cad byed pa sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par can bzang po yang

sgrub par byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa yud tsam zhig cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi
spyan gyis gzigs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang yang dag par dgongs nas/ byams pa'i thugs kyis sngags gsungs so/ /na maHsarba bud+d+hA nA~M aM maM/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi snying po

mchog yin te las thams cad byed pa'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum

pa'am sel gol gtogs pa tsam mam / mig 'byed 'dzums tsam la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi shugs blo ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs

te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su chas te slar 'khod nas/ steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu rin po che rab tu gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams gnas su 'dug ste/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnas de
thams cad 'od chen po'i snang bas gsal bar byas te/ 'od kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs

ma thag tu rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma rgya che ba'i lha'i gos dang / dar mang po'i tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i

'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /'on kyang nga'i bkas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa nyung ngam/ nyam

nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhu bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa

la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhan yang gzhon nu gang gA'i klung brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa

dang / dkyil 'khor dang cho ga zhib mo dang gsang ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang phyag rgya'i tshogs dang cho ga dang sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa dang brtul zhugs bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa sems can thams
cad dga' bar byed pa/ 'od rin po che'i tshogs kyis rab 'byam 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i shes pa rgyal po'i dbang phyug lung ston par byed pa/ sngags bzla ba yul gyi mthar 'gro

bar byed pa mi snang bar byed pa dang / dus dang dam tshig rab 'byam gyi tshogs thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa ma lus pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags

pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'byung ba'i spyod pa mthar thug pa gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de ltar rjes su yi rang ba nyid de/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur

pa de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar mngon sum du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur te/ khyod kyang ston par 'gyur ro/ /'dir yang gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA~M/

a tsin t+ya a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ \u0f00 sma ra sma ra a pra ti ha ta shA sa na ku mA ra rU pa ha ri Na/ \u0f00 hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi snying po ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs la/ gsung zhing gsung bar 'gyur la/ khyod kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/ dbye ba dang rnam par dbye ba rgya cher ston par 'gyur

te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya bas kyang las thams cad byed pa 'di rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /'dir snying po mchog tu gyur pa ni/ \u0f00 bA kye daM na maH/ 'dir nye ba'i snying po ni bA kye hU~M/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur

gyur pa bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas/ bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang rgyu mthun pa/ byang chub kyi snying po thob pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog rnam par bkod pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang phreng ba'i tshogs dang / rin po che'i dril bu'i dra bas 'brel pa snyan pa'i

sgra sgrogs pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par byed pa/ lha'i dri dang byug pa dang phreng ba dang phye ma'i char 'bab par mngon par sprul to/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis byang

chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas/ ba spu ldang zhing gnas g.yo ba mthong nas snying 'dar zhing dngangs te/ ci bdag cag gi 'byor pa nyams par ma gyur tam zhes phan
