kun la 'dzud byed pa/ /khyab bdag mthong ba tsam gyis grol/ /lha yi lha ni 'khor lo'i bdag /dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /gzhan yang sdig tu yongs bstan pa/ /de yi mod la grol bar 'gyur/ /sngags

pas rtag tu khyab bdag gi/ /de nas shar sgo yang dag sbyar/ /rta babs kun nas yongs bsgreng ste/ /ba dan dag gis nyer mdzes bya/ /mtha' dag gzugs ni mdzes pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su gsal byas nas/ /bshos

dang bdug pa dri dang ni/ /rtag tu phreng ba bzang po yis/ /cho ga snga ma kho na ltar/ /de dag thams cad gus par bya/ /dbus kyi bum pa gang ba ni/ /'khor lo can gyi mdun du dgod/ /de'i bum rnam par rgyal zhes

bya/ /sngags shes pas ni de mi bteg /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /me thab snga ma bzhin du bya/ /sbyin sreg cho ga yang dag brtsam/ /cho ga sngags ni gzhan pas min/ /sbyin sreg kyang ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ /seng

ldeng bud shing me la ni/ /pa la sha dang bil ba'i shing / /bil ba u dum arka dang / /'bad pas las rnams kun la ni/ /a pa margas sbyin sreg bya/ /til la mar gyis btags pa 'am/ /zho la sbrang rtsis bsres pa yis/ /

las rnams kun la sbyin sreg ni/ /stong rtsa brgyad ni rtag tu bya/ /dus gsum dus ni kun bstan pa/ /khrus dang gos ni brje ba dang / /dkar gsum rgyu skar bzang po ni/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /las rnams sngar ni bstan

pa yi/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg de bzhin gzhan/ /sngags dang yang dag ldan pas sam/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyis bya/ /las rnams dag ni kun la yang / /yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyis bya/ /de ni mthu chen don ldan te/ /

dpa' bo gcig pu rtag pa mchog /de la rtag tu zlos byed pa/ /sngags rnams kun gyi cho ga spyod/ /'jig rten pa yi 'jig rten 'dod/ /cho ga thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i brtson 'grus che/ /rig pa'i rgyal

po dka' thub che/ /sngags kun 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ /cho ga 'di las gzhan pas min/ /thub pa rnams kyis sngags gsungs dang / /de bzhin stobs bcu ldan sras dang / /'jig rten skyong ba brgya byin sogs/ /khyab 'jug dbang

ldan tshangs pa dang / /zla ba nyi ma de bzhin gzhan/ /gnod sbyin dbang po srin po dang / /lto 'phye che dang mi 'am ci/ /de bzhin sa steng drang srong mchog /nam mkha' lding dang rlung lha dang / /sems can ming ldan 'jig rten gzhan/ /gang gis

bshad pa'i sngags rnams ni/ /'dir yang 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /sngags rnams kun la 'gugs byed dang / /las rnams kun la ston byed dang / /'byung po kun gyi sngags rgyud ni/ /rgyas dang bcas pa dbang du byed/ /

yi ge gcig pa'i sngags 'di ni/ /sngags pa kun gyi rab byed pa/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis don ldan te/ /lha rnams kun ni 'gugs byed la/ /cho ga rnams ni dbang du byed/ /yi ge gcig chen bdag po yin/ /dam pa rnams kyis rab

bsngags pa'i/ /rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i sngags/ /yang dag sbyar na sgrub par byed/ /ma lus mthong na mdzes pa yi/ /ras ris gsal ba byas nas ni/ /gtsang ba'i phyogs dang 'bab chu'i ngogs/ /

ri bo'i rtser yang gzhag par bya/ /snga ma'i las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /nub kyi phyogs su rtag tu bstan/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /sgrub pa po ni shar du blta/ /dUr ba'i khres la 'dug nas ni/ /'du 'dzi med par bzlas

pa bya/ /sgra ni drag min ngal bas min/ /gzhan la ngan sems med gyur na/ /sangs rgyas ma lus kun gyi yang / /'di la myur du 'grub pa yin/ /rtag tu 'jig rten byams sems dang / /sdug bsngal can la snying brtser ldan/ /mgon

med sems ni dman pa dang / /phongs pas nyam thag stobs chung dang / /mi bzad 'khor bar ltung ba la/ /snying rje'i sems ldan 'grub par 'gyur/ /'bad pas ras ris mdun dag tu/ /mchod pa chen po rtag tu gzhag /dngos su 'byor

dang yid kyis sprul/ /bzang po sems las byung ba dang / /rgyal dbang gzugs kyi ri mo ni/ /bsam pa'am yang na bya ba yin/ /de nyid kyi ni cho ga yis/ /de nyid du ni me thab bya/ /me ni shin tu 'bar ba la/ /sgrub pas sreg blugs sbyin

sreg bya/ /tsan dan dkar dang ga pur dang / /gur gum gyis bsres mang po ni/ /brgya ni rtsa brgyad sreg blugs kyis/ /sngags rig me 'bar sbyin par bya/ /seng ldeng p+lag sha n+ya gro d+ha/ /pa la sha ni gang yin pa/ /de dag las byung shing

dag gis/ /me chen rtag tu sbar bar bya/ /shing de dag ni med gyur na/ /shing gzhan yongs su gzung bar bya/ /pi tsu mar da tsha dang skyur/ /po son cha las byung ba'i shing / /tsher ma can sogs spang bya ste/ /sdig pa'i las la rab tu

bsgrags/ /yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis/ /zhi dang rgyas pa byas gyur na/ /de ni myur bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i las ni spyang mi bya/ /sngags mchog kun kyang 'di la ni/ /las rnams cho ga rgya chen kun/ /rnam rtog med

pas rab sbyar na/ /rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /de tshe sngags ni 'grub 'gyur zhing / /mchog sbyin nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin/ /yam shing p+lag sha u dum bar/ /yang na p+lag sha n+ya gro d+ha/ /mar gyis btags dang sbrang rtsir ldan/ /zho dang

ldan pas mnyam bzhag nas/ /sa steng rgyal thabs 'dod pa yi/ /sngags pas dus kun sbyin sreg bya/ /lha yi rgyal po 'dod pas ni/ /gur gum tsan dan sbyin sreg bya/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i lha dag gi/ /bdag po nyid ni 'dod gyur na/ /

pad ma'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag ni/ /sum cu rtsa drug ge sar bcas/ /sbyin sreg mthar ni mchod yon yang / /bstan bcos las byung bzhin du dbul/ /rgyal bas bsngags pa'i ras ris mchog /der ni kun nas yongs su

'bar/ /de la reg pa tsam gyis ni/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dag dang ni/ /'og min gyi ni bar dag gnas/ /yang na sa 'og rim par 'gro/ /bar skabs 'dir ni grub rnams kyi/ /der ni rgyal por rtag tu 'gyur/ /stobs chen brtan

zhing pha rol gnon/ /'byung po rnams ni 'byer bar byed/ /rtag tu rig 'dzin rgyal por 'gyur/ /las rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed/ /de ni yun ring 'tsho 'gyur te/ /bskal pa tsam du'ang gnas pa yin/ /gang tshe lus ni shi 'phos

nas/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang las ni 'di dag kyang / /mdo dang rgyas pa bstan par bya/ /pad ma dkar po yongs blangs nas/ /tsan dan dkar dang ldan pa yi/ /sbyin sreg 'bum phrag brgya byas na/ /

des ni rin chen tog mthong 'gyur/ /rgyal ba dam pa de mthong na/ /de tshe mngon shes lnga thob 'gyur/ /bskal pa chen por ring 'tsho zhing / /sangs rgyas rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mtha' yas phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /

sangs rgyas de nas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de dag la ni rtag mchod cing / /de dag nyid dang lhan cig gnas/ /rin chen ldan zhes 'jig rten khams/ /gcig na bcom ldan de bzhugs pa/ /thub gtso mchog ni dam pa ste/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog /de la de ni rtag gnas te/ /sngags kyis dag par the tshom med/ /gzhan yang las ni 'dod pa dag /gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa ni/ /nA ga ge sar ga pur dang / /tsan dan
gur gum cha mnyam pa/ /sngags pas de tshe gcig byas nas/ /sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bdun cu brgyad/ /de tshe lha ni sbyin sreg mthar/ /'khor lo can de 'dir byon nas/ /rtag tu dgyes nas mchog stsol te/ /

sgrub byed spyi bor byug par mdzad/ /de tshe reg pa tsam gyis ni/ /sngags pa sa bdun bdag por 'gyur/ /rgyal sras thugs las skyes pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpar de brjod do/ /nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / /

de ni lung bstan 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas brtsams nas cung zad gang / /shes dang shes bya rgyal ba'i sras/ /shes 'gyur sngags rnams ma lus ni/ /rtogs pa'i bdag nyid cher rgyas yin/ /de la reg pa tsam gyis ni/ /
mngon shes lnga ldan sngags rgyal 'gyur/ /rtag tu bdag dang gzhan bdag nyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa yi/ /mchod pa'i las la rtag tu dga'/ /skad cig de nyid kho
na la/ /byang chub las la brtson par 'gyur/ /de tshe skad cig tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas zhing der 'gro/ /'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu/ /thams cad du yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas
byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /de tshe spyod bcas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de las chos ni thos pa dang / /mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba 'khor los sgyur gsungs pa'i/ /'dir ni las rnams gzhan
yod de/ /mar me yon du dbul ba ni/ /mar bcas snying po gtsang ba ni/ /gser dang dngul gyi snod dag dang / /zangs ma sa dag nyid yin na/ /der ni mar me rab sbar te/ /skyes bu grangs ni 'bum dag gis/ /
grangs kyi tshad tsam nges bzhag ste/ /brgya phrag stong las lhag pa min/ /bud med spangs pa'i skyes pa yis/ /kho ra khor yug mar me 'dzin/ /mchod pa'i las kyi don du ni/ /ston pa'i ras ris

sku la dbul/ /sngags rnams re re'ang 'dod bzhin du/ /thams cad mnyam par rab zhugs nas/ /ston pa la ni 'bul byed na/ /de yi mod la grub par ston/ /kun nas sgra ni sgrogs byed cing / /rnga bo che yi sgra
yang sgrogs/ /gang phyir lha tshogs du ma ni/ /legs so zhes pa'i sgra rab 'don/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang / /de tshe nam mkha' la bzhugs nas/ /shes rab can khyod legs so legs/ /
legs byas las ni yongs su byas/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa dang / /sdug bsngal yang ni mthong mi 'gyur/ /bde dang zhi ba mya ngan 'das/ /'jigs med sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob/ /lam ni dge dang
dri ma med/ /yan lag brgyad la legs par spyod/ /yi ge gcig pa mnyes byas nas/ /sngags kyi ngo bo'i mgon po mnyes/ /gzhan yang las ni 'di yod de/ /dam pa'i 'gro ba la gnas nas/ /mthu
chen por ni rnam shes pa'i/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /nim pa'i rang bzhin shing blangs nas/ /rtse gsum rdo rje gnyis mthar bya/ /dbus kyi phyogs su bya ba ni/ /rdo rje rigs te mi
bskyod pa/ /de nas sngags kyis dag byas nas/ /de ni ras ris sngon du bzhag /de nas sngags pas lag reg nas/ /sngags ni mnyam par bzhag nas bzla/ /rtsa brgyad 'bum phrag bcu drug ni/ /yongs
su rdzogs nas grub par 'dod/ /de nas rdo rje gcig 'bar te/ /kun nas de ni rab tu 'bar/ /de nas rdo rje de blangs nas/ /'di ltar de ni steng 'gro'o/ /de nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nam/ /gzhan yang
lha gnas gang 'dod 'gro/ /de nas nam mkhar 'gro 'gyur te/ /grub pa kun gyi sngon du 'dren/ /grub pa'i rig 'dzin la sogs kyi/ /bdag po nyid kyang byed par 'gyur/ /lha yi 'dus pa mang po yi/ /'khor los

sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /bdag nyid kyi ni spyod pa yang / /rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /bar gyi bskal pa bcu yi bar/ /yun ring gnas te bar chad med/ /bde ba la brten rtag tu mchod/ /rtag tu
skyes bu dam par ldan/ /byang chub sems kyi yang dag spyod/ /skye ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par spangs/ /grub pa'i dbang phyug 'gyur ba ste/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /de las shi 'phos mir
skye zhing / /bde ba mang la rab tu gzhol/ /'gro ba ma lus skyo byas nas/ /byang chub yang dag gzhol bar 'gyur/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las mtha' yas/ /mang po 'jig rten don mchod pa/ /sngags kyi

rgyal po 'dir brjod pa/ /cho ga rgya chen cho gar bcas/ /sa bdag brgya byin nyid dang ni/ /'khor los sgyur nyid yang dang yang / /rig 'dzin rnams dang de bzhin du/ /lha nyid dang ni bdag po'ang byed/ /rnam pa du ma'i ngo
bo'am/ /las ni gang dag 'di gsungs pa/ /thams cad grub pa thob 'gyur te/ /sngags pa legs par sbyor byed na'o/ /mtshan mo skyil mo krung bcas te/ /sdom can don yod bzlas byas na/ /tho rangs grub

pa thob 'gyur te/ /zlos pa mngon shes lnga thob 'gyur/ /dur khrod ro la 'dug nas ni/ /sdom can 'gul med zlos pa ni/ /yi ge gcig po don chen te/ /tho rangs grub par 'dod pa yin/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu

'phrul che/ /gal te dur khrod gnas nas bzlas/ /zla ba drug gis grub thob ste/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu byed/ /gang yang rung ba'i gnas dag tu/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po zlos byed na/ /der gnas grub pa thob

'gyur te/ /sngags pa legs par sbyor byed pa'o/ /gdugs dkar de bzhin ral gri dang / /nor bu'i lham dang gdub kor dang / /mu tig phreng ba dpung rgyan dang / /gdu bu dang ni sor gdub dang / /'og pag dang ni de bzhin gos/ /

so shing dang ni spyi blugs dang / /mchod phyir thogs dang zhwa dang ni/ /khrab dang go cha nyid dang ni/ /g.yang gzhi dang ni ril ba dang / /phreng ba dang ni mchil lham dang / /'jig rten gnyis na 'dod pa yi/ /rgyan gyi gtso bo thams cad

de/ /lha dang mi dang de bzhin du/ /gzhan yang rgyan 'gyur 'di la brgyan/ /de dag thams cad thob 'gyur te/ /ras ris mdun du zlos byed la'o/ /rdzas rnams kun dang 'byung khung dang / /rgyan dang nor bu rnams
dang ni/ /mtshon cha thams cad du ma ni/ /ras ris mdun du bzhag nas ni/ /dag byas cig car bzla bya ba/ /'bum phrag brgyad kyis g.yo ba dang / /thams cad bcas te 'bar ba dang / /zlos pa reg pas

gyen du 'gro/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa/ /sems can rang bzhin yin yang rung / /rgyan dang mtshon cha yin yang rung / /ngo bo nyid dam sa rang bzhin/ /rang tshul spyod dam bcos ma dang / /'dab chags sna

tshogs tshogs kyang rung / /gang dag 'byung po kun la grags/ /bcos ma'am bcos ma ma yin pa/ /'du shes can nam 'du shes med/ /sngags pa mchod pas grub par 'gyur/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rdzas bzhag dang / /

rnam pa sna tshogs khams las byung / /rang byas byed du bcug pa dang / /'gro ba'i skye gnas dag na bsngags/ /sngar bstan cho ga bzhin du ni/ /ras ris mdun du rnam par gzhag /lan ni drug gam bdun dag gis/ /

sngags pas reg nas bzla bar bya/ /bzlas mthar de dag rab 'bar te/ /grub pa rgyas pa thob par 'gyur/ /de ni de la reg tsam gyis/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni lha yul thob nas ni/ /ring du 'tsho zhing

bde bar 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po rig rgyal la/ /ji lta ji ltar rab sbyor ba/ /de lta de ltar dga' 'gyur zhing / /rtag tu mchog kyang ster bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang las la rab sbyor ba/ /las rnams dus ni yun

ring ba/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /de nyid kyis ni myur 'grub 'gyur/ /gtsang zhing sems ni gtsang ba dang / /gtsang ba'i las la rtag tu dga'/ /gtsang ba'i phyogs dang sngags shes pa/ /gtsang ba'i grub pa thob par 'gyur/ /

las gang byed pa de 'bras thob/ /mchog gi mchog tu 'gyur ba dang / /'bring gi las kyi 'bring du 'gyur/ /tha mas kyang ni tha mar ro/ /ma bsgrubs las kyis grub pa yang / /cung zad tsam gyis 'bras 'byin te/ /bu mo'am nor ni

mang po dag /yang dag spyod pas byed par 'gyur/ /rtag tu bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/ /longs spyod che zhing stobs kyang che/ /rgyal po dga' zhing blon po nyid/ /rtag tu bzlas pas byed par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi rgyal po lan
cig bzlas/ /de yis sdig pa rab tu 'jig /gnyis su bzlas sam bdun bzlas pas/ /bdag nyid srung ba chen por 'gyur/ /lan brgyad de ni bzlas pa yis/ /grogs po thams cad srung bar byed/ /gos la lan
gnyis mngon bsngags na/ /sngags pa dag ni rtag tu yang / /nad rnams kun las shin tu grol/ /gos ni gnyis ka la bsngags nas/ /gos dag la ni reg byas na/ /lus can nad ni med par 'gyur/ /gdong dang mig

gnyis dag la ni/ /'bad pas mngon par rab bsngags na/ /khros pa rnams kyi khro ba ni/ /sngags pas bltas pa tsam gyis 'jig /gang yang 'byung tshogs ma rungs pa/ /'tshe byed sdig pa'i las can la/ /sngags rgyal sum

cu rab bzlas te/ /de dag gdong la blta ba 'am/ /rang lag nyid la yang dang yang / /mngon par bsngags pa byas nas ni/ /de dag thal mo brdabs na ni/ /lus can kun ni grol bar 'gyur/ /byis pa la ni rtag bya ba/ /khrus dang bza'

dang btung ba la/ /sngags mchog drug cu bzlas nas ni/ /lha yi dam pa mchod byas na/ /sha za ma mo dag gi gdon/ /ma rungs kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /sngags kyi 'jigs pas 'jigs byed cing / /rtag tu byis pa gtong bar byed/ /

de ltar rnam pa du ma'i las/ /sa steng myur du rtag 'jig na/ /mi rnams la ni de bzhin byed/ /gang dag 'byung po sdig sbrul ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gnas 'gro ba/ /dug bcas dug ni med pa nyid/ /sngags kyi mthu yis 'jig par byed/ /

gang dag sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang / /gang dag 'tshe ba thams cad ni/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas pa yis/ /myur du zhi bar rab tu 'gro/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gnod sdug bsngal/ /mang po 'chi ba 'go ba'i nad/ /sngags kyi rgyal po drug brgya

bzlas/ /myur ba nyid du sel bar 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg las ni bya ba la/ /zho dang mar gyis thams cad bsre/ /ut+pal sngon po dri bzang ni/ /rtsa brgyad stong gis bzlas pa bya/ /zhi zhing 'byung po rnam song nas/ /'gro ba rnams ni bde

gnas thob/ /de ltar rnam pa du ma ni/ /mang po'i las ni yang dag 'byung / /sngags pa legs par rab sbyor na/ /myur du thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis byed pa ni/ /dgra rnams kyi ni khro ba sel/ /sngags 'di

don dang ldan gyur pas/ /cho ga mang po rgya che ba/ /de dag cho ga mthong ba yis/ /de dag 'dir ni grub pa yin/ /'dir ni sngags rnams zlo byed pa/ /phran tshegs las kyang don yod 'gyur/ /thams cad la yang bzlas pa yis/ /

myur du don rnams rtag tu byed/ /'byung po rnams ni dbang byed 'dod/ /dus gsum du ni bzlas pa yin/ /rtag tu sna ma'i me tog gis/ /sbyin sreg las kyang bya ba yin/ /tsan dan dkar dang ga pur dang / /gur gum gyis kyang

bya ba yin/ /bzlas nas sngags pa mchog sbyin zhing / /rtag tu 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur/ /rtag tu zlos pas sbyin sreg byas/ /yid la 'dod pa'i don sgrub byed/ /ga bur la sogs ldan pa yis/ /rtag tu sbyin sreg

rab tu brtag /ji ltar 'dod par yongs brtags pa'i/ /rnam pa sna tshogs cho ga bsgrub/ /tha ma las ni tha ma dang / /chen po las ni chen po 'byung / /bar ma bar ma'i las dag las/ /rtag tu grub par bstan pa yin/ /de bas

las rnams kun la ni/ /khyad par du ni sbyin sreg bya/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/ le'u bcu bzhi pa
'khor los sgyur ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs rab 'byam rdzogs s+ho// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi nang der 'dus

shing 'khod par gyur te/ 'dug pa de stan las langs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /

legs par rab tu bstan pa dang / mchog tu legs par gsungs pa'i rig pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi sbyor ba/ chos chen po'i sprin las nges par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/ rig pa chen

po'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba/ cho ga chen po rgya che ba don thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa sgrub par byed pa/ byang chub kyi lam bla na med pa/ bya ba'i bye brag yang dag par sdom pa dang

bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg dang / rig pa dang spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi lam 'bras bu brten pa'i las kyi rkyen skyed pa'i rgyu dang mtshan ma/ rmad du byung ba'i stobs bcu/ nod par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/ byang chub kyi

snying po nod par byed cing / nges par pha rol du 'gro bar byed pa de bcom ldan 'das de ni legs so/ /sngags sgrub par byed pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i rmi lam na mthong bar byed pa'i mtshan ma de ston pas bshad du

gsol/ gang gis rig pa thams cad sgrub pa'i rjes su dpyod pa'i sems can grub pa'i mtshan ma'i las rtsom par byed par 'gyur ba dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rig pa thams cad kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ba'o/ /

de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang

'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba dang rig pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir legs so legs so/ /de legs par rab tu nyon la zung shig

dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /dang por re zhig las thams cad kyi sngar 'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas su song ste/ ri'i rtse'am chu bo'i 'gram mam phug gi nang ngam gtsang ba'i phyogs su lo ma'i spyil po byas la/ de nyid kyi cho ga

snga ma bzhin du ras ris gzhag cing mchod pa chen po byas la/ las thams cad la yar ngo'i zla phyed dam/ cho 'phrul chen po'i zla phyed la nges par nyin zhag bzang po'i mtshan mo'i thun dang po la/ tsan dan dkar po dang gur gum dang

ga pur gcig tu byas la/ tsan dan gyi shing gis me rab tu sbar zhing / ras ris kyi mdun du khru bzhi'i tshad tsam gyi me thab la du ba dang sol ba med pa'i me la sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas

yang sbyin sreg gi mthar pad ma'i me tog tsan dan dkar po'i chus bsang gtor byas pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi mthar yang bzang po'i gdan dang gdong bkab la rang gi lha la rang gi sngags kyis

spyan drang bar bya zhing / sngags 'dis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /na maHsarba bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ ku mA ra rU pi Ne daR+sha ya daR+sha ya/ At+ma no b+hu mi mu ba swa me ni be da ya wA b+hu taM/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA

hA/ sngags 'dis srung ba byas shing sbyin sreg gi las thams cad la las bya'o/ /de nas ku sha'i rtse mo gnyis ka phyi rol du bstan te bting la ku sha'i khres kyi sngas byas te mgo shar phyogs su bstan la

ras ris kyi mdun nas ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye bar nyal bar bya'o/ /thun dang po la mi nyal ba'i sbyor bas rjes su brtson par byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag byas

nas sdig pa rnams so sor bshags te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bdag nyid phul la/ de nas ji ltar bde bar gnyid kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya'o/ /dang po'i thun gyi rmi lam gang / /bad kan las byung shes par

bya/ /gnyis par gang byung mkhris pa ste/ /'jig rten la yod smad pa yin/ /gsum pa rlung byung shes par bya/ /bzhi pa bden par 'byung ba yin/ /bad kan rmi lam dang po ni/ /'di 'drar rtag tu mthong ba yin/ /

nor bu shel gyi khang pa ni/ /kun nas mu tig phreng ba can/ /a mra'i shing tshogs rab mang po/ /bdag nyid chu nang 'bying bar mthong / /kun nas 'bab chus khyab pa dang / /rgya mtsho chen pos khyab pa dang / /gang du bdag gi

lus gnas pa/ /de nyid du ni mthong bar byed/ /gang du phyogs der rdzing dag gis/ /kun nas yongs su khyab pa dang / /gru dang chu ni 'thung ba dang / /btung ba'i khang pa khang pa dang / /kun nas yongs su 'khor bar ni/ /chu chen

gyis ni khyer bar mthong / /kha ba can ni byis pa dang / /chu bo chen por shel gnas pa/ /shing dang ri yi rgyal po dang / /shel gyis yongs su bcings pa dang / /mu tig dra bas legs g.yogs dang / /mu tig phung po mthong ba dang / /

char chen 'bab dang chu yi tshogs/ /mthong na bad kan las gyur yin/ /gdugs ni dkar po dag dang ni/ /rgyan rnams kun kyang dkar ba dang / /ban glang dag ni dkar po'i gzugs/ /bad kan rmi lam dag tu brjod/ /rnga ma dkar

ram skyes bu 'am/ /yang na gos dag mthong ba 'am/ /lan tshwa la sogs reg pa ni/ /kun du gal te mthong ba ni/ /ras bal btso ma'i gos dag gam/ /ra gan dngul dang a ga ru/ /reg dang za bar byed pa nyid/ /bad kan rmi lam

dag tu 'dod/ /mon sran gre'u za ba dang / /til btags bu ram 'bras can dang / /mon sran rnam mang za ba ni/ /bad kan rmi lam dag tu 'dod/ /swa sti ka dang u lo pi/ /kri sa ra dang 'o thug dang / /de dag za byed rmi lam ni/ /

bad kan rmi lam bya ba yin/ /'breng bu sa bcud bza' ba sogs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs snum khur ni/ /reg dang za bar byed pa nyid/ /bad kan 'phel ba'i rmi lam yin/ /snum khur rnam pa du ma ni/ /bza' dang spyad par

rjes 'dod dang / /zos dang reg par byed de dag /bad kan rmi lam shes par bya/ /gnas dang gnas mal theg pa dang / /bzhon pa sems can las byung ba/ /reg dang 'dzeg par byed pa nyid/ /dang po'i thun la mthong

ba nyid/ /gal te rmi lam mthong gyur na/ /thams cad bad kan can du brjod/ /rnam pa de lta'i rmi lam dang / /chu la 'byung dang spyod pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' la spyod/ /mthong na bad kan can du brjod/ /
de dag rmi lam dag tu mthong / /bad kan can gyi spyod pa yin/ /rmi lam ma lus du ma ni/ /'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa yin/ /gnyis pa'i thun la lus can gyi/ /rmi lam mkhris pa can gyi yin/ /'bar

ba'i me yi gzugs mthong dang / /sna tshogs rin chen mthong ba dang / /mes tshig skar mda' ltung ba dang / /ri dang phyogs ni rab 'bar ba/ /skye bo gang gis rab mthong ba/ /de ni mkhris par gyur pa yin/ /rin chen pad ma

rA ga dang / /gzhan yang rin chen gang yin pa/ /gang du rmi lam mthong na ni/ /lus can mkhris pa las gyur yin/ /me dang tsha ba sten pa dang / /reg dang za bar byed pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog ser/ /rmi lam mkhris pas

brgyal ba yin/ /rtag tu tsha ba'i nyi ma dang / /nyi ma rtag tu 'de bar ni/ /gang gis rmi lam mthong gyur na/ /lus can mkhris pa las gyur yin/ /nam mkha' gser gyi mdog gyur dang / /sa yi steng ni kha dog ser/ /rmi lam na ni
gang gis mthong / /mkhris pa las gyur na ba yin/ /me ni kun nas 'bar ba yis/ /nam mkha'i ngos nas rab gsal bar/ /rmi lam dus su mthong ba ni/ /mkhris pas gnod pa'i lus can yin/ /sa dang de

bzhin ri bo dang / /brag ni mthon po'ang gser gyi mdog /shing chen de bzhin theg pa ni/ /rtag tu thams cad gser rang bzhin/ /rtag tu rmi lam gnas mthong na/ /mkhris pa las gyur rmi lam yin/ /theg pa rgyan dang bzhon pa dang / /snod

rnams gser gyi rang bzhin dang / /stan rnams dang ni gnas mal rnams/ /sa le sbram gyi rang bzhin la/ /reg dang 'gro bar byed pa nyid/ /rmi lam mthong na mkhris gyur yin/ /phreng ba ser po thogs pa dang / /ser po'i gos

kyis nyer mdzes dang / /ser po'i 'od dang dri yis byugs/ /ser po'i mchod phyir thogs pa dang / /bdag nyid ser po'i rnam pa dang / /gang gis rmi lam la mthong ba/ /gnyis pa'i thun du mthong na ni/ /mkhris pa las gyur shes par bya/ /

de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /gang gzhan rmi lam dag tu brjod/ /rnam pa sna tshogs ser por snang / /rmi lam mkhris las yang dag byung / /mkhris pas lus can rab gnon pa/ /gnyis pa'i thun la bstan pa yin/ /rnam

pa du ma'i gzugs can ni/ /ser por snang ba yang dag 'byung / /'jig rten gtso bos gsungs pa ni/ /rmi lam mkhris las yang dag byung / /gang yang rlung byung rmi lam ni/ /gsum pa'i thun du bstan pa yin/ /'khor yug tu

ni 'od 'phro ba/ /phyogs rnams kun du rab tu snang / /nam mkha' la ni 'gro ba dang / /nam mkha'i dkyil du thad drang 'gro/ /bar snang nam mkha'i dkyil du ni/ /kun nas 'khor bar rtag tu 'gro/ /rlung byung rmi lam zhes

bstan pa/ /'di lta bu la bya ba yin/ /rgal dang mchong dang de bzhin du/ /shing rnams la ni mngon par 'dzeg /bstan bcos ma lus 'don pa dang / /khyad par du ni sngags rnams dang / /bshad dang brjod par byed pa dag /phal cher

yang ni rlung las gyur/ /shing rnams tsher ma can 'dzeg dang / /kha ba dag kyang za ba dang / /bza' ba ma lus tsha dang skyur/ /zos pa rlung las gyur pa yin/ /gtsor yang rlung ni yang dag 'byung / /shing thog rlung ni rab bskyed pa/ /de dag za

bar rmi lam mthong / /rlung las byung bar yang dag bstan/ /dngos rnams rlung ni skyed pa yi/ /bza' dang bca' ba khyad par ldan/ /de bzhin skye bo sems 'khrugs dang / /reg par byed dang smra bar byed/ /'byung po rnams ni gar byed

dang / /bdag nyid kyang ni gar byed pa/ /gang gis rmi lam mthong na ni/ /de 'dra rlung nad can du shes/ /rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs 'khyud dang smra/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mi bzad gzugs/ /rmi lam rlung nad

can gyis mthong / /de la sogs pa'i rmi lam ni/ /'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /rnam gsum sbyor ba rab ldan pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug yin/ /chags can bad kan can shes bya/ /zhe sdang las byung

mkhris pa can/ /rmongs pa rlung las gyur pa yin/ /'dres pa'ang rnam par 'dres pa'o/ /grong gi chos ni mthong ba las/ /rmi lam chags pas sa bon byung / /der ni bud med la chags pa/ /bad kan las byung rmi lam

yin/ /rtsod bcas dang tshul zhe sdang can/ /mkhris pa las byung rmi lam yin/ /ma rig las byung rmongs rnam pa/ /dran pa nyams par mthong ba yin/ /rnam 'dres rnam par 'dres pa ni/ /rmi lam na ni rtag tu mthong / /de bas

rnam pa thams cad kyis/ /rmi lam zhes bya yod pa spangs/ /bya ba dus kyi rim pa nyid/ /de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa yin/ /sems can bad kan can gsungs pa/ /mdog ldan snyan par smra ba dang / /tshe ring yid ni gzhungs pa dang / /

kha dog snum zhing 'jigs pa med/ /bong tshod ring zhing dkar ba dang / /bud med la phrad rtag tu dga'/ /chos ldan rtag tu dpa' ba dang / /btung ba mang la rtag tu dga'/ /rgyal rigs su ni bstan pa yin/ /ser sna ldan

zhing mtshon pa med/ / de bzhin sa yi bdag po dang / /dmag dpon don du gnas pa ste/ /longs spyod chen po skye 'gyur zhing / /rang gi las kyis nye bar 'tshe/ /rang gi las 'bras bstan pa ni/ /las kyi sngags
ni spang ba min/ /las min sngags ni gtso bo zhes/ /'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa yin/ /de bas sems can bad kan can/ /sa steng grub pa byed pa ni/ /sa bdag 'dod pa byed pa la/ /de la grub pa thob
par 'gyur/ /zlos pas bad kan can gyi zas/ /ma lus bsten par mi bya'o/ /gang phyir shin tu bsten gyur na/ /rmi lam don gyis stong 'gyur bas/ /grub pa'i don du ma brjod pas/ /sngags pas de tshe de
mi bsten/ /mkhas pa rigs pa ldan pa yis/ /de yi dus su gnyid log min/ /mkhris pa can gyi sems can gyi/ /rtag tu spyod pa brjod par bya/ /zhe sdang gis ni rnam 'khrugs na/ /kha dog nag dang

stobs chung dang / /drag pa drag pa'i las dang ni/ /rtag tu yon por byed pa yin/ /dpa' dang bab col rtag tu byed/ /stobs dang blo dang ldan pa dang / /mang du smra zhing grogs po mang / /bstan bcos ting 'dzin mang po

rtogs/ /chos ldan las kyi mtha' brtan zhing / /zhe sdang slong ba rjod par byed/ /yid ldan dgra ni mang ba dang / /zhe sdang mtshon pa skye bar 'gyur/ /nor mang dpa' bo la sdang dang / /'jig rten shes shing mthong na dga'/ /

des grol chags pa med pa dang / /brtan cing sdug bsngal rtag tu bzod/ /nga rgyal phrag dog ma rungs pa/ /bud med rnams la dga' bar byed/ /spro chen brtan dang blon po dang / /longs spyod chen por skye bar 'gyur/ /
shes bzhin las kyis nyer spyod pa'i/ /sems can zil gyis mnan nas spyod/ /sngags ni srog la gnod byed pa/ /de ni de la myur 'grub 'gyur/ /mi bzad thub pas spangs pa'i don/ /myur du sgrub par byed

pa yin/ /sems can gnod phyir byed pa'i las/ /lus can de la grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga sbyar ba'i chos rnams gang / /sngags pas thams cad rab sbyar na/ /spyod pa des ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /gzhan las sems can de la

min/ /sngags pa zhe sdang can dag la/ /sems can gzhan la gnod pa dang / /de bzhin gzhan gyi sngags gcod pa/ /sems can khro ba la grub 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi rdzas ni 'phrog don dang / /gzhan gyi srog ni gcod pa la/ /

khro ba'i sngags kyis grub 'gyur te/ /sngags gzhan dag la sbyar mi bya/ /zhe sdang rigs kyi sems can 'di/ /bdag po nyid kyang byed par 'gyur/ /mdog nag pa'am sngo bsangs sam/ /dkar ba'am yang na 'dres pa yi/ /

mi ni khro ldan gser gyi mdog /rnam par spangs pa skye bar 'gyur/ /mi ni rtsub mdog du ba'i mdog /ser skya'i mdog tu'ang skye ba yin/ /dpa' dang de bzhin drag pa dang / /'dab chags sdig pa'i khyim las skyes/ /gza'

ni mig dmar zhing bdag gnas/ /bad kan can la phur bu'i bdag /skye 'gyur nyung ngu za ba dang / /tsha dang skyur ba'i ro bsten cing / /de yi tshe ni ring 'gyur zhing / /dran dang ldan pa skye bar 'gyur/ /spyod pa dang ni rjes spyod pa/ /

rlung nad can gyi bshad par bya/ /mdog mi sdug dang rtsub mdog dang / /bong tshod med cing shin tu rjud/ /blo nyams shes rab med pa dang / /mi brtan gnas pa med pa dang / /lus ni 'gul dang 'khor ba dang / /skyug cing bshang

gci mang du 'byung / /mang du za zhing rtag par za/ /de dag gang phyir nad mang 'gyur/ /'jig rten rigs dang mi mthun zhing / /dgra ni mang po skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni sa steng 'di dag tu/ /tshul 'chal sdug bsngal skye

'gyur te/ /mi snang ba yi sngags dag ni/ /de la 'grub par bstan pa yin/ /gang zhig rlung nad 'khrug byed pa'i/ /zas la de ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /zlos pa las ni grub 'dod pas/ /de ni yongs su bsten mi bya/ /
sems can rlung nad 'khrug pa la/ /gti mug nye bar zhi ba dang / /rmongs pa'i rigs can la gsungs pa/ /rmongs pa'i sngags ni rab sgrub pa/ /rtag tu de dag rmongs pa la/ /rmongs pa dag ni 'grub par

'dod/ /rgyu skar khyim ni chu skyes dang / /gza' ni bdag po spen par blta/ /rlung nad skyes pa'i sems can ni/ /dge ba'i las la mi spyod de/ /'byung po dbang dang 'gugs par byed/ /de bzhin rmongs dang rengs pa'o/ /rlung
nad can gyi sems can la/ /gti mug can de sdig pa byed/ /rmi lam bden par mthong ba ni/ /mtshan nyid 'di dag gsungs pa ni/ /sems can rnams kyi don sgrub pa/ /thub pa rnams kyi sngon gsungs pa'o/ /lug

glang dang ni sbyor ba dang / /sbal pa seng ge nyid dang ni/ /srang dang bu mo sdig pa dang / /de bzhin gzhu dang chu srin dang / /bum pa nya dang glang po dang / /lha dang spre'u lha ma yin/ /grub dang dri za gnod sbyin sogs/ /mi rnams
gang gis rab bsgrags pa/ /sems can rnams kyi khyim mang po/ /gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /rnam pa mang po sna tshogs don/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las bstan pa/ /de dag las ni thams cad la/ /
yon tan rgya cher sman par 'gyur/ /las las gol ba med par ni/ /lus can yon tan mi smin te/ /yon tan kho na las ldan pas/ /skye bar yang ni byed pa yin/ /yon tan chos don ldan pa ni/ /sngags
la 'grub pa skye bar 'gyur/ /zlos pa sems can yon tan shes/ /yon tan yon tan min las 'ching / /yon tan med la bya min gang / /de yi las ni bya ba min/ /gang phyir bya ba las byed de/ /bya ba yon
tan med ma yin/ /bya ba las dang yon tan nyid/ /yang dag ldan pa sgrub par 'gyur/ /cho ga sngon 'gro bya ba'i las/ /stobs bcu ldan pas sngon bstan to/ /rdzas dang sems can spyod pa gzhan/ /
bya ba las dang yon tan yin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rmi lam tshul/ /las las 'byung bar snang ba yin/ /de bas rmi lam mtshan ma yis/ /rgya che las la rab sbyar bya/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa dang / /

yid 'ong blta na sdug pa dang / /bgegs kyi gzugs dang gzugs med pa/ /rmi lam rgyur ni snang ba yin/ /mthu che spro ba che ba ni/ /mi ni grub pa 'dod pa yin/ /mchog dang tha ma 'bring dag ni/ /de dag la
ni grub par brtag /drag cing ma rungs las rnams ni/ /rmi lam rtag tu 'phral du smin/ /bzang po brtan pa'i las dag ni/ /yun ring dus su grub phyir ro/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das rnams kyis/ /yon
tan skye bar yang dag 'byung / /rmi lam rnam pa sna tshogs snang / /zlos pas sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi 'grub don du sngags rnams ni/ /gnyid dang snyom pa rab tu brtag /bgegs 'joms byed pa'i

sngags rnams ni/ /de yi dus su rab tu brtag /de tshe sngags ni rigs tshul gyis/ /zlos pas de tshe rab tu sbyar/ /khro bo chen po phyag drug dang / /zhal drug nyid du brtag par bya/ /sngags chen yi ge bzhi
pa ni/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs la gnas pa yin/ /drag po'i gzugs ni gzugs chen po/ /phag gi rnam par yang dag 'byung / /bgegs kun rnam par gzhig bya'i phyir/ /dus mtshan de ni lha yi rgyal/ /stag
gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /sbrul gyi gdengs ka rnam par 'phyang / /lag na ral gri sems dpa' che/ /gzi brjid chen po gshin rje'i gzugs/ /bgegs rnams kun la gtse bar byed/ /log 'dren rnams kyi

srog 'phrog byed/ /'byung po kun ni rab nyon cig /mi bzad sngags ni bshad par bya/ /cho 'phrul chen po bgegs rnams kun/ /ma rungs sems can 'jig par byed/ /sngags rnams kun ni sgrub byed pa/ /lha yi tshogs rnams nga la nyon/ /

na maH sa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ he he ma hA kro d+ha Sha Na mu khA Sh+Ta tsa ra Na/ sarba big+ha na big+hA na g+hA ta ka hU~M hU~M/ kiny+tsi ra ya si bi nA ya ka dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra duHswA me nA sha ya/ la hu

la hu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phaT phaT swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'di gsungs ma thag tu bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'jigs shing nyam thag nas/ snying gas te yid shin tu skrag nas/ bcom ldan

'das shAkya thub pa dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed cing dam tshig la gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal

med khang la gzigs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye kye lha'i tshogs chen po dag khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags

rnams 'don par byed pa na gang zhig ma rungs pa'i sems can gyi gzugs can gyis rnam par 'tshe bar byed pa de la/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'dis ni rigs rgyud thams cad 'dul bar byed cing / srog kyang 'dzin par

mi byed de/ yongs su gdung bar byed cing / yongs su skem par byed pa'i rnam par gzhag par bya ba la 'jog par byed cing / zlos pa dag la yang srung ba dang sba ba dang sbed pa la gnas par 'jog par byed cing /

rjes su 'phel bar byed pa dang gang zhig dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed pa dang khro bo'i rgyal pos sgrub pa po srung bar byas pa la rnam par tho 'tsham par byed na/ mgo bo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du rnam pa bdun du

'gas par 'gyur ro/ /thub pa mchog gis de gsungs nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la de tshe gsungs/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags rnams la/ /ma lus don ni rgya chen don/ /sngags rgyud don dang ldan pa dang / /sgrub pa rnams la khyad par du/ /
bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms pa yi/ /rgyud la khro rgyal bstan pa yin/ /'jig rten mgon gyis sngon 'di ni/ /de bzhin du ni yang dag sbyar/ /ma lus bgegs rnams 'jig bya'i phyir/ /dgra rnams

kyi ni khro ba sel/ /zlos pas rtag tu 'don byas na/ /sems can rnams ni srung don dang / /rmi lam ngan pa sel bar byed/ /sngags rnams ma lus sgrub pa la/ /'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /de nas gzhan

yang rab bshad pa/ /skyes bu'i mtshan nyid bzang po yin/ /gang la sngags rnams 'grub 'gyur ba/ /mchog dang tha ma bar ma'o/ /gzi brjid ldan dang shes ldan dang / /gser mdog gsus pa che ba dang / /dkyus

ring mig dang snum pa dang / /chags chung khro ba rnam par spangs/ /mig mtha' dmar zhing snyan par smra/ /de la grub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /pags pa srab cing sngo bsangs mdog /ha cang ring min yan lag phra/ /spro ba

che zhing gzi brjid che/ /chog shes kun nas dge ba byed/ /skye gnas bzang po dag pa dang / /'dod pa chung zhing cung zad dge/ /las rnams kun du snang ba ni/ /de la nges par grub pa mchog /yan lag thams cad

ma tshang med/ /dUr ba sngo sangs gzi brjid che/ /nyon mongs med sems shes pa can/ /rtag tu gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod/ /phra ba'i gos la rtag tu dga'/ /chos kyi ngang tshul 'jig rten shes/ /grogs mang rtag tu

gtong ba dang / /zas tshod rig dag rtag gtsang ldan/ /shes nyen tshul khrims spyod pa dang / /gtsang ba'i spyod la rtag tu dga'/ /bden par smra zhing snying rje can/ /de la grub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /yon tan rgya che yan lag tshang / /

rigs ldan rtag tu chos dang ldan/ /ma dang pha la gus pa dang / /bram ze la ni mchod pa byed/ /shin tu snying rje ldan zhing brtan/ /de la'ang grub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /sngo sangs dkar dang snum pa dang / /rtag tu gtsang zhing nyung ngu smra/ /

bsod pa'i kha zas la dga' zhing / /gtsang ba'i spyod pas mngon par 'gro/ /mang 'dod sems can 'jig rten shis/ /de la'ang grub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /ha cang mi thung ring ba'ang min/ /sku ni mig sman bzhin du gnag /

mig dang mig 'bras rab tu snum/ /gtsang zhing rtag tu khrus la dga'/ /dkon mchog gsum la shin tu dad/ /de yi grub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /mchog gi las ni rab ston cing / /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes/ /bzod

ldan snyan par smra ba dang / /rgyal ba'i sras la rab tu dga'/ /de tshe 'jig rten 'das pa grub/ /de la 'bras bcas grub par 'gyur/ /sems dpa' che zhing brtson 'grus che/ /gzi brjid che zhing brtul zhugs che/ /

longs spyod che zhing sngags rnams shes/ /sngags rnams kun la de nyid rig /rigs kyi mchog ni rgyal rigs sam/ /bram ze shes dang ldan pa dang / /bud med la brten de la chags/ /de bzhin gser gyi mdog dang

ldan/ /bong tshod che zhing dkar ba dang / /sna ni mtho zhing lag pa che/ /dpa' zhing lag pa ring ba dang / /rgyal po che la mngon par 'dod/ /rgyal ba'i sras la dad pa dang / /bud med mig ldan lha la mchod/ /dkon

mchog gsum la gus pa dang / /byang chub sems kyis brgyan pa yin/ /lhag par snying rje brtan pa dang / /cung zad khro zhing cung zad rmongs/ /longs spyod che zhing gtong ba che/ /gzi brjid che zhing thul bar dka'/ /bud

med rnams ni dga' dang dpa'/ /de yi grub pa'ang mchog yin no/ /shin tu btung dang dga' dang dpa'/ /rtag tu bud med la chags dang / /gser gyi mdog dang byin pa phra/ /rked pa che zhing gtsang ba dang / /brtse dang snying rje ldan

mkhas pa/ /yon tan mang 'dod 'jig rten shes/ /rtag tu sngags rnams zlos la gus/ /rgyal ba la ni srog kyang gtong / /de bzhin nyan thos sras rnams dang / /bse ru la yang rtag tu gtong / /stobs ldan 'jig rten

gtso bo dang / /rigs ni gnyis pa bzang po yin/ /yan lag thams cad ma tshang med/ /ma rungs rtag tu bab col byed/ /gtong ldan tshul ldan dgra las rgyal/ /chos dang chos min rnam dpyod byed/ /ha cang sbom min

rjud pa'ang min/ /ha cang ring min thung ba'ang min/ /bar ma'i mi ni mchog yin te/ /de yi grub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /sen mo zangs mdog legs snum dang / /lag mthil dmar dang gtsang ba dang / /rkang pa'i mtha' dmar

snum pa dang / /'khor lo swa sti kas brgyan dang / /rgyal mtshan rta babs nya dang ni/ /ba dan pad ma tho ba dang / /mi gang rkang pa lag pa la/ /mtshan ni 'di dag yod gyur pa/ /de 'dra'i skyes bu dam pa la/ /grub pa

mchog tu brtag par bya/ /mche ba dkar zhing bzang ba dang / /mtho ba'i ri bo dang 'dra dang / /sna bzang mtho zhing mig dkyus ring / /smin ma stug cing kos ko bzang / /ba yi rdzi ma 'jig rten mtshan/ /nag pa'i lta ba'i mig

'bras mtshan/ /dpral ba'i dbyes gang rgya che zhing / /mgo bo gdugs 'dra'i rnam pa bzang / /mgo bo gtsug tor 'dra ba dang / /rna ba bzang ba dam pa yin/ /rtag tu seng ge'i 'gram 'dra dang / /ma mchu bim pa smin 'dra'i

mdog /gang gi lce ni rab snang ba/ /pad ma 'dab ma dmar 'dra'i mdog /mgrin pa bum pa 'dra ba dang / /thal gong rgyas shing yang dag 'phags/ /mchan khung thong ka bzang ba mchog /de bzhin brla ni rgya che dang / /lte ba'i

phyogs kyang chung ba dang / /rked pa rgya che bzang ba dang / /lte ba zab cing g.yas su 'khyil/ /kun nas dkar med ba spu dang / /lag ring lag ni che ba dang / /rked pa seng ge 'dra ba'i mtshan/ /gang gi brla ni zlum pa dang / /

gru mo nyams med zlum pa dang / /byin pa e na ya lta bur/ /zlum pa'i nang ni zlum por grub/ /rkang pa sha dang ldan pa dang / /sor mo rnams kyi ring ba dang / /dmar zhing sen dmar snum pa dang / /sha rgyas pas ni snum pa yin/ /

nang stong ma yin mthil mnyam gnas/ /dge zhing mthong na dga' ba dang / /'jam zhing kha dog dag pa dang / /rab bsngags 'jig rten bkra shis dang / /de dag gi ni steng dag tu/ /rtsa yi dra ba mngon pa med/ /bshang ba

'byung ba'i lam dag tu/ /ri mo zab cing g.yas su 'khyil/ /mchig pa rab bsngags shin tu chud/ /rtag tu zlum zhing dge ba yin/ /ma 'brel dum bu ma yin dang / /gcig min nyid du bstan pa yin/ /gang tshe skyes dbang

gtsang ba dang / /rtse mo dmar la yang dag gnas/ /skye bo nyal khar kha zas ni/ /ro ni rtsa bar byed pa za/ /bshang ba kha dog sngo ba 'am/ /gal te dmar por rab snang zhing / /mang po ma yin snum pa dang / /dge ba'i mtshan gyi

rab mtshan pa/ /de lta'i sems can gang yin pa/ /grub pa mchog tu 'dod pa yin/ /lan gsum bshang zhing sngags drug dran/ /gtsang sbra'i spyod dga' yongs su gtsang / /gang zhig thun ni tha mar nyal/ /tho rangs

ldang ba'i skye bo rnams/ /de yi grub pa rtag tu mchog /las kun byed par snang ba yin/ /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /phun tshogs rnam pa mang po la/ /mi rnams rjes su 'dod pa yang / /mtshan nyid kyis ni

mngon mtshan pa'o/ /rgyu skar dag la'ang skyes pa ni/ /rgyal dang nam gru gre dbo dang / /mchu dang lha mtshams dag dang ni/ /nag pa snar ma smin drug dang / /nus pa'i gza' rnams kyis mtshan pa/ /de dag la ni skyes

mthong dang / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char kha ni/ /tho rangs dus su gang skyes dang / /gang tshe de yi dus su skyes/ /de la grub pa rab tu snang / /nyin phyed dang ni tho rangs dang / /nyi ma'i mthar yang gza' bzang po/ /dkar ba zla ba

pa wa sangs/ /ser ba gza' lhag phur bu yin/ /skye bo rnams kyis mthong na ni/ /'bras bu 'grub phyir nus pa yin/ /mi ni gang zhig dge las kyis/ /'di la skyes par gyur pa yi/ /sngags don ma lus sgrub pa la/ /
de dag 'bad med 'grub par 'gyur/ /nyi ma phyed ni 'das pa dang / /rtag tu nyi ma nub pa na/ /lus can rnams kyi rtag de la/ /ma rungs gza' mthong gang yin pa/ /ma rungs nyi ma mig dmar dang / /mjug

rings sgra gcan spen pa dang / /gang yang gza' ni gtso bo dang / /las ni ngan 'joms skar mda' can/ /skar ma shin tu mi bzad nyid/ /de bzhin nag po 'chi ltas dang / /dus min 'chi ba sa la ni/ /mi bzad de tshe
snang ba yin/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su ni/ /gza' lhag gis ni sa rnams mthong / /gnya' shing gang tsam nyi mas phyin/ /phur bus sa de mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas pha rol gnya' shing tsam/ /pa sangs

nor spyan gyis de mthong / /nyi ma phyed ni yongs rdzogs na/ /zla bas lus can ma lus mthong / /gza' lhag dus su rgyal thabs thob/ /phur bus nor dang longs spyod byed/ /pa sangs nor ni nges sgrub dang / /rgyal srid

tshe dang longs spyod ldan/ /zla ba de bzhin tshe ring zhing / /dbang phyug dang ni 'bras bu bcas/ /de bzhin nyin phyed nyi ma ni/ /nyi ma phyed du mnyam par mthong / /rtag tu nyin phyed rnam 'das na/ /nyi mas phyogs ni

mthong bar byed/ /thung 'gyur nyi ma gnya' shing tsam/ /byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni/ /sgra gcan spen pa nyid dag yin/ /mun pa dus dang dus mthar byed/ /de nas phar ni thung ba na/ /'chi ltas skar mda' sa 'gul byed/ /

li khri tshogs kyis mdog bsgyur ba'i/ /nyi ma nub kar zangs ma'i mdog /gza' yi gtso bo gang yin de/ /byis pa gzhon nu'i tshul 'dzin cing / /lag na mdung thogs ma rungs pa/ /mig dmar nyid kyis mthong ba yin/ /

de nas nyi ma gnya' shing 'das/ /dge ba'i gza' ni 'byung ba yin/ /nyi mas mthong ba las skyes pa/ /ma rungs bab col byed par 'gyur/ /spen pa mig dmar las skyes pa/ /khro ldan skam zhing nga rgyal can/ /mjug rings

'chi ltas dud rnams la/ /skyes pa nad ni yang dag 'byung / /dbul zhing nad btab glen pa dang / /de bzhin du ni rtag tu rmongs/ /dus dang mun pa 'gul byed dang / /skar mda' can dang gza' ngan dang / /'gul byed

sgra drag dmar ba'i mdog /gnam lcags nyid kyang rab rdung byed/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'chi ltas dang / /gzhan yang khyim sogs rab tu mthong / /skye bo kun gyis sgra gcan ni/ /mi bzad rab tu mthong gyur na/ /

dbul zhing mgon med tshul khrims 'chal/ /mi ni rtag tu sdig pa spyod/ /mi ni sdug bsngal skye 'gyur te/ /nad kyi gzhi ni skye bar 'gyur/ /mdze can nad ni mang ba dang / /long ba 'theng bo shu bar bcas/ /

za ma ma ning mo sham dang / /bud med mtshan ni ngan pa dang / /skyes pa bud med de bzhin gzhan/ /gza' ni ngan pa mthong ba yin/ /de ltar skyes gyur skyes pa dang / /'jig rten mang po skye ba yin/ /dkar dang ser
ba'i gza' mchog ni/ /de dag las skyes dge ba yin/ /mdog ni dkar dang ser ba dag /rgyal bas rab tu bsngags par gsungs/ /gza' ni gtso bo bzhir bshad pa/ /pa sangs zla ba bla ma lhag /zlos pa
las rnams kun la ni/ /de dag mthong na 'grub pa'i don/ /sems can byis pa rnams la yang / /rtag tu de dag skye ba bzang / /lo ni kun la 'dod pa'ang zhes/ /'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /skad

cig tsam la'ang de bzhin du/ /mig 'byed mi 'dzum se gol gtogs/ /'di ni mdor bsdus skye ba zhes/ /'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /'di tsam gyi ni tshad dag tu/ /gza' kun 'jig rten dgongs pa yin/ /de dag

de bzhin rtag tu 'char/ /'di dag dus kyi de nyid yin/ /'di dag dge dang sdig pa'i gza'/ /'khor lo bzhin du rtag tu 'khor/ /'jig rten dge dang mi dge byed/ /de nyid 'jig rten gnas pa yin/ /des na de dag gang cung zad/ /

sdig pa'i blo yang skye bar 'gyur/ /sems can dge dang mi dge'i 'bras/ /mang po yang ni skye bar 'gyur/ /gza' rnams las la spyod pa zhes/ /des na 'di ni mthong zhes gsungs/ /myur ldan myur bcas 'od 'gyur zhing / /

myur bar 'ong bas myur ldan yin/ /mig gis mthong dang ma mthong ba'i/ /se gol gtogs pa'i myur 'gros yin/ /'di tsam gyi ni tshad dag tu/ /blo mchog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /

nges par zlos pas rtag tu bya/ /yud tsam dag ni bcu gnyis dang / /dus dang dus min 'gro ba'i rgyu/ /grub pa'i rgyu 'am ma yin pa/ /'gro ba min pa'ang bshad par bya/ /'jig rten la nye bzang ba dang / /char dang char min

yang dang yang / /yul 'khor 'jig dang mu ge dang / /lo legs nyi ma gsal mthong dge/ /dus dang de bzhin dbang po'i gzhu/ /skye bo rnams la rtag zhi byed/ /mjug rings sa 'gul gnam grum dang / /skar mda' dang ni lho 'ur

dang / /rgyu skar gza' dang skar rnams kyi/ /spyod pa dge dang mi dge ba/ /'byung po rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i spyod pa yin/ /sha za dang ni ma mo dang / /drag po ma rungs nyer 'joms byed/ /sha za rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ /

de bzhin ma rungs sems can brjod/ /gang du lha la rab dad dang / /rin chen chos dang blo mchog dang / /dge ba'i las dang rtag tu ldan/ /byams sems brtse bar ldan pa dang / /legs par spyod pa'i don ldan blo/ /gzhan gyi sdug

bsngal dag la sems/ /sngags dang rig pa rnams kyis drangs/ /sman gyi don du kha zas spyod/ /gang du mtshan nyid la brten pas/ /spyod pa rgya cher bstan pa yin/ /gzhan gyi lus la gnas nas ni/ /mi lus brten nas

gnas pa yin/ /lha ni mchod pa zhes bshad de/ /lha min nga rgyal can gyi rgyus/ /gnas der gnas pa'ang rnam pa gnyis/ /rim bzhin lha dang lha ma yin/ /de yang der ni rnam gnyis te/ /drag pa dang ni thun mong yin/ /de yang der

ni rnam gnyis 'gro/ /dge dang mi dge 'gro ba lnga/ /der gnas rnam gsum 'gro ba ste/ /nyi shu sum cu grangs med pa'o/ /lha dbang dang ni 'og min par/ /go rims ji bzhin sa med pa'o/ /'jig rten khams ni mtha' med pa/ /dge

dang mi dge 'jig rten yin/ /'khor spyod sems can ji snyed dang / /'phags pa nyan thos ji snyed dang / /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /de yi thugs las skyes sras dang / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /sa bcu la ni

rab gnas dang / /rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi/ /sems can skye gnas yang dag brten/ /byis pa'i skye bo thams cad kyi/ /'gro ba'i skye gnas rten pa dang / /rtag tu 'phags rnams thams cad kyi/ /mtshan nyid dang ni spyod pa

dang / /tshig dang brda dang de nyid kyang / /rgya cher rab tu bshad par bya/ /sngags dang rgyud ni rig bcas pas/ /'byung po kun ni dgug par bya/ /dbab dang dgug pa'i sngags shes pas/ /gzhan gyi lus la yang dag brten/ /dge dang

mi dge'i las shes zhing / /bag yod rigs ni bzang ba dang / /mi blun spyod pa'i sems can dang / /tshar gcad rjes gzung spyod pa dang / /'jig rten sa steng 'gugs byed pa/ /mi ni sngags zlos byed pa dag /de dag grub pa'i

mtshan ma ni/ /de nyid thams cad bshad par bya/ /mi rnams kyi ni mdor bsdu na/ /de dag gi ni lus bzung nas/ /rtag tu shin tu chos don dang / /thar pa'i don du rnam par brtag /ma rungs rnams ni tshar gcad dang / /rnam

dag rnams ni mchod pa ste/ /tshar gcad rjes gzung nyid la ni/ /sngags dang rgyud ni rab tu brtag /rlung dang bad kan mkhris can ni/ /rnam gsum dag la spyod pa'ang gsum/ /de dag zhi bar rab brtags la/ /

rnam gsum nyid du rim par 'dod/ /mi rnams kyi ni gso ba la/ /sngags dang rgyud kyis rtag tu bya/ /'byung ba chen por rnam brtags pa/ /'byung dang 'byung min la sogs shes/ /'byung ba min dang 'byung ba dang / /

lhag par 'byung ba de la brjod/ /skye bo gang tshe lhag 'byung zin/ /de tshe bde ba med par 'gyur/ /'byung dang 'byung min rnam pa ni/ /rnam pa gnyis su rab tu brtag /rtag tu sems can 'byung ba che/ /sems can

ma yin rab tu brtag /mkhris pa bad kan de bzhin rlung / /gang gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs byas/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ni/ /lnga pa dag ni nam mkhar brjod/ /chu dang me dang ldan pa dang / /sa dang rlung du yang dag ldan/ /
blo dang ldan pas rtag tu yang / /sems can min pa'i grangs su bstan/ /'jig rten mchog gi bdag po dang / /'od chen ldan pas gsungs pa yin/ /sems can ma yin grangs su bstan/ /sems can grangs 'gro

mi ma yin/ /blo mchog smra ba dam pa yis/ /mi rnams sems can nyid du gsungs/ /mi ma yin dang mi dag kyang / /rtag tu sems can grangs nyid do/ /sems can rnams la dge don du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung

yang yin/ /'das dang ma byon sangs rgyas dang / /de bzhin da ltar byung rnams kyis/ /dge ba'i las kyi las byung phyir/ /las 'di dag ni yongs su gsungs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung dag pa/ /las ni don med mi byed de/ /

de yi rgyu mtshan rigs dang spyi/ /grub pa nyid du rab snang ste/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / /bde zhing zhi la rtag tu gtsang / /mthar thug dag dang bdag med dang / /don dam thar pa 'dod pa ste/ /de nyid chos ni btsal bya'i

phyir/ /rgyud 'di yongs su bshad pa yin/ /rgyud dang sngags dang sman bzang po/ /bka' ni yang dag gsungs pa yin/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar gyi/ /bstan bcos thams cad legs bsngags dang / /'jig rten
mchog dang chos bdag med/ /rtag tu zhi dang shis pa'i gnas/ /'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung / /de yi go 'phang mchog gnas pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung / /
ma 'dres rab tu brtags pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthu dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang / /sngags rnams kun gyi cho ga la/ /grub pa kun tu bstan pa yin/ /des na 'di nyid thub
dbang gis/ /cho ga'i rgyal por gsungs pa yin/ /lus can rnams ni sngags tshul gyi/ /'di nyid kyi ni lam gyis 'gro/ /zhi ba nad med phun sum tshogs/ /mya ngan 'das grong phyin par 'gyur/ /mya ngan med

dang rdul med dang / /rtag tu byang chub gzhol zhing shis/ /gang 'di bstan pa dag la ni/ /sngags kun 'don par byed pa na/ /kun mkhyen shes dang shes bya yi/ /las kyi rgyud ni 'brel pa dang / /sngags zlos pa yi ched

du ni/ /rgyud rnams mtha' dag sa steng gsungs/ /sngags rgyud ma lus don dag ni/ /byang chub rnam gsum gzhol ba ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes dag /cho ga 'dir ni rab tu bstan/ /sems can rnams la'ang
phan pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten kun la rab tu bskor/ /gzhan la cho ga rab snang ba/ /cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la'ang yod/ /thub mchog thub pa'i sras dag gis/ /gzhan du cho ga gang bstan pa/ /sngags rnams

thams cad 'di la yod/ /de na cho ga rgya chen yin/ /de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis/ /lus can kun la gsungs pa yin/ /gang du cho ga'i rgyal po 'dis/ /dbang 'gyur min dang bkug min pa/ /sa steng 'jig rten
gsum 'di na/ /rig pa'i sngags rgyal de yod min/ /thub pa'i zla ba rab nub cing / /sa yi dkyil 'khor stongs pa na/ /cho ga 'jig rten 'dir gnas pa/ /bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur/ /'jam pa'i
dbyangs ni rtag tu dge/ /'byung po kun la gzhon nu ni/ /de tshe sangs rgyas mdzad pa ni/ /'jig rten bstan la byed par 'gyur/ /cho ga'i rgyal po mthu la ni/ /yun ring dus su 'dod pa rnams/ /
lan cig thos kyang grol 'gyur te/ /rtag tu de la 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung dag ni/ /rtag tu dge ba don yod 'gyur/ /sngags rnams kun la sngags pa ni/ /bzlas dang sbyin
sreg rtag 'dod pa'o/ /dus gsum dag tu shes bya la/ /mkhyen pa gang du rab 'jug pa/ /de bzhin 'di la 'jug byed pa/ /cho ga'i rgyal po dam pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa ni/ /sngags
su rab gnas de 'dir gsungs/ /sngags de rnam par mi rtog par/ /cho ga de 'dir gsungs pa yin/ /don dang don min sems can gyi/ /dge dang mi dge byed par 'gyur/ /de tshe 'gro ba blo bzhin du/ /'jig
rten kun gyi dge mi dge/ /de nyid cho ga 'dir spros pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa med/ /'jig rten 'das pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'jig rten phyir ni 'dir gsungs so/ /las
rnams kun la shin tu lhag /'jig rten las las rab tu 'das/ /chos rnams rnam pa sna tshogs byed/ /'jig rten kun gyis rab tu bsngags/ /sngags rgyal las la brtson par byed/ /
de bzhin sems can tshogs la phan/ /gzhon nu 'jam pa'i dbyangs de ni/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ /de don yon tan nges grub dang / /'jig rten khams kyi dge mi dge/ /bag med ma
bskul ma yin te/ /bskul nas ngas ni chos bshad do/ /sems can ma lus phan nyid phyir/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni bshad pa yin/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang / /bshad cing ngas kyang bshad pa
yin/ /sangs rgyas gdung ni mi gcod phyir/ /bdag gis kyang ni bshad pa yin/ /sngags pa'i las rnams kun la ni/ /kun mkhyen ye shes 'byung don du'o/ /kun
mkhyen ye shes rab 'jug la/ /las rnams gcig tu bsngags pa yin/ /'jig rten sngon las bdag yin te/ /de ni da ltar yongs su spyod/ /de bas las rnams rab tu bya/ /tshe 'dir dka' ba legs
spyad cing / /las ldan tshe ni 'di la yang / /'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'grub/ /las ni 'di la'ang snang 'gyur na/ /skye ba 'di la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /las ni gcig
pu rab tu bsngags/ /las de cho gar ldan pa na/ /de ni 'di la myur du 'grub/ /sems can byis pa cho ga nyams/ /rab tu rmongs pa 'khor bar 'gyur/ /de bas rnam pa kun gyis ni/ /las ni gcig pu rab
bsngags yin/ /cho ga las ni yang dag ldan/ /sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin cho ga nyams pa'i las/ /shin tu yun ring dag gis 'grub/ /bsam gtan med par thar pa med/ /thar pa med par

bsam gtan med/ /de bas bsam gtan thar pa ni/ /yang dag ldan pa byang chub brjod/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo
las/ las thams cad kyi bya ba'i don gyi le'u rab 'byam bcwa lnga pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs
nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo dang ldan pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes nga la dris nas/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi don thams cad bya ba'i las kyi le'u rab 'byam

'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher sngar bstan pa yin no/ /sngags kun don dang ldan pa yi/ /rmi lam dge dang mi dge yin/ /des na zhar la 'di kun ni/ /sngags kyi zlos pa bstan pa yin/ /gnod sbyin
bdag po yid dga' nas/ /thal sbyar spyi bor byas nas ni/ /ston la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ /de tshe tshig ni 'di skad zhus/ /'jig rten rjes su gzung don du/ /blo mchog rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / /
bdag la'ang rjes su thugs brtse dang / /sems can rnams ni bde don du/ /zlos pa'i sngags ni thams cad la/ /rmi lam dge dang mi dge dang / /sems can mchog dang tha ma yi/ /spyod pa'i yon tan rgya cher

bstan/ /bzang po'i 'gro ba'i skye gnas dang / /rgyu dang shes pa'i rnam pa spyod/ /'das dang ma 'ongs shes pa dang / /dge dang mi dge da ltar gyi/ /thams cad kun 'gro'i shes pa dang / /kun mkhyen ye shes spyod pa dang / /snang

med dmigs pa med pa dang / /spros med rab tu spros pa yin/ /rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa dang / /shis pa zhi ba bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu rnams ni/ /blo mchog gis ni bstan pa yin/ /khyad par du ni zlos pa

la/ /sngags rnams don dang ldan par bshad/ /las dang las 'bras sems can gyi/ /bya ba dus dang de bzhin du/ /de bzhin snod dang gnas dang ni/ /cha byad rmi lam zhar la gsungs/ /gnod sbyin bdag po thub mchog
ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdun pa la/ /gang zhig bskal bzang sangs rgyas pa/ /shAkya'i skyes mchog bdun pa 'di/ /shAkya'i seng ge dgra las rgyal/ /'di ni bdun par rab tu brtags/ /dus kyi tha mar rdzogs

sangs rgyas/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa/ /brtson 'grus che zhing shes rab che/ /thub pa mthu ni chen po thob/ /lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag /byang chub sems dpa' phyag byas te/ /rang gi gnas su 'dug

gyur nas/ /blo ldan de nas cang mi smra/ /de nas 'jam dpal shes rab che/ /de tshe thub pas dris pa ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskul ba ni/ /thub mchog dam pa tha ma la/ /legs so bcom ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /
las dang shes pa rgya cher bcas/ /bcas pa'i gza' ni gtso bo ste/ /dge dang mi dge legs tshul bshad/ /las dang shes pa rgyur bcas pa'i/ /sems can mang po'i spyod pa gsungs/ /mchog dang tha ma'i spyod

pa dang / /dge ba'i don dang ldan pa dang / /zlos pa grub pa'i mtshan ma dang / /bsgrub bya sgrub min rnam par brtags/ /'byor pa 'dod dang de bzhin du/ /'jig rten dbang phyug longs spyod 'dod/ /rgyal po khyad par can 'dod dang / /rig

pa 'dzin pa grub 'dod dang / /thams cad kun 'gro'i ye shes kyis/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad du gsol/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsol btab nas/ /thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa ni/ /blo ldan ka la ping ka'i skad/ /

lha yi rnga sgra'i skad dang ni/ /brtson 'grus chen po tshangs pa'i sgra/ /'brug sgra yi ni sgra skad kyis/ /thub pa bdun pas tshig bshad nas/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni dag pas gsungs/ /gzhon nu 'di ni dngos don khyab rgyur

cing / /ma byung 'jig rten phan pa sgrub byed la/ /'gro ba kun la phan pa dge phyir ston/ /thar pa shes shing dag pa'i gnas su 'dug /bden dang brtse dang bzod pa phan sems dang / /gang zhig rtag tu byams dang sbyin la
dga'/ /de dag rtag tu grub pa thob par byed/ /kye ma gzhan la'ang grub pa yod ma yin/ /rtag tu sngags mchog la ni dga' dad dam/ /bstan dang 'khor lo 'dzin dang 'jam mchog dang / /de ni bdud 'dul
chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /'khor lo 'dzin par 'dir ni rigs pa yin/ /gang gi gsung ni bzang po yid 'ong zhing / /rtag tu byis pa'i skye bo rnam spangs yin/ /yid 'ong bzang po rnar ni snyan pa dang / /

dga' skyed snyan pa dang ni rjes su mthun/ /sems ni tshim byed bde ba rab tu sbyin/ /'jam zhes bya bar sangs rgyas yang dag gsung / /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyad par gyis/ /gang gis mthu ni mkhyen

par mi spyod de/ /de dag gi sras de bzhin sar zhugs pa/ /'jig rten 'das pa de bzhin bcu yi grangs/ /khyod kyang lha yi dbang phyug 'jig rten khyad par gyis/ /thub bzang shes par nus pa ma yin no/ /gzugs

dang gzugs med de bzhin sa gnas dang / /'dod ldan lha dang mi ni yid las skyes/ /rnal 'byor grub pa thob dang 'jig rten na/ /khyad par can kun de bzhin mi yi gtso/ /de yi che ba gang gis shes gyur pa/ /sems

can gang de yod pa ma yin te/ /khyod kyi che ba 'di ni yongs shes pa/ /'jam zhes bya bar rab shes sangs rgyas yin/ /'jam dpal zhes byar yongs su brtags pa ni/ /khyod kyi ming ni sngon gyi rgyal bas mdzad/ /

khyod kyi ming du 'di ltar brtags byas pa/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar sangs rgyas kyi/ /gzhan du ma yengs rtse gcig yid dag pas/ /khyod kyi ming ni 'khor gyi nang du thos/ /des ni 'di la shis dang zhi ba thob/ /
srid mthar byang chub mchog ni khyad par thob/ /sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / /'gro ba'i skye gnas mchog ni rab thob cing / /rtag tu chos mchog la ni yang dag gnas/ /bgegs rnams

rnam par spang shing grub pa thob/ /'dod pa'i sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par byed/ /byang chub shing dbang drung du myur du 'gro/ /song nas byang chub mchog ni thob par byed/ /song nas sems can phan phyir
der 'dug ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'khor lo rab tu skor/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i gtso bos yon tan gsungs/ /'jam dpal zhes ni khyod kyi ming dran pa/ /yon tan bsam mi khyab ces rgyal bas gsungs/ /
rgyal ba'i gtso bo sngar gshegs thams cad kyis/ /rtag tu khyod kyi mthu ni bstan pa yin/ /gzhon nu dag pa khyod kyi sngags rtogs pa/ /bskal pa grangs med rtag tu'ang ston mi nus/ /'jam dpal
khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa ni/ /sangs rgyas ma lus dag gis rab tu bshad/ /gzhon nu 'di ni thams cad kun tu 'gro/ /nga yi bstan la khyod ni mi mchog bstan/ /dag pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i skye bo
rnams/ /'dir ni ma lus mtha' dag zhi bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi sngags ni nam yang 'da' ma gyur/ /khyod kyi sngags ni nam yang nyams ma gyur/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga /
byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u rab 'byam bcu drug pa rdzogs s+ho// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms par

zhugs ma thag tu/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dkar po dang le brgan dang shel gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang snang bar byas
shing / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag kyang snang bar mdzad nas/ gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad kyang yud tsam gyis zil gyis mnan te bkug par gyur to/ /bkug nas kyang rang rang gi gnas la yang
dag par sbyar nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bkug nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gza' dang rgyu skar dang skar ma thams

cad kyi 'od med par byas nas nyam thag pa dang 'jigs pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la skyabs su 'gro zhing thal mo sbyar nas 'dug par gyur te/ de ltar rab tu 'dar zhing yang dang yang sa'i steng du
'gyel bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gza' dang rgyu skar dang skar ma thams cad la mkhas pa rnams dang / byis pa'i skye bo'i blo dang ldan pa'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir
bka' stsal pa ni/ lha'i tshogs mi dang bcas pa'i grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig /'jig rten sna tshogs ni las nyid la sems can rnams rnam par rten par byed de/ gang yang sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i sku yang mngon par grub la/ gang yang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang 'khor zhing / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen por rab tu zhugs la/ 'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs

kyi lus mngon par grub ste/ thams cad kyang las dge ba dang mi dge ba dang 'brel ba las skyes la/ de la byed pa'i byed pa po'am dbang phyug gam gtso bo'am skyes bu'am grangs can gyis rab tu 'byin par byed pa ni

gang yang med do/ /las las skyes pa ni ma gtogs te/ de yang las kyi rkyen gyis skyed pa rgyu la ltos pa yin te/ de yang rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa'o/ /de bzhin du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rkyen phan tshun

du 'byung ba nye bar 'brel ba yin te/ lhag ma 'byung po rnams mngon par 'grub pa ni 'byung ba chen po las skyes pa yin te/ 'byung ba chen po de yang ma 'ongs pa'i phung po gzhan dag tu 'gro bar skye bar 'gyur zhing / skyes nas

kyang 'gro ba dang / yul gzhan rgya che ba'i rnam par dbye ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ dus gzhan na lugs las bzlog ste 'gag pa na ye shes kyi mes bskul te/ las kyis bsags pa'i bag chags mtha' dag mngon par

bsregs nas/ theg pa rnam pa gsum mnyam zhing spros pa med par yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po ni dus ring por nye bar chags pa'i las bdag gir byed pa dang / dus bar ma ni rang rgyal ba bse

ru lta bu rang byung gi shes rab rab tu 'byung ba dang / gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su 'jug pa nyan thos ni dus thung ngus mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'o/ /chos gzhan la blo nyid 'jug par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te/

byis pa rnams kyi rnam par rmongs pa nyid dang ji ste yang 'jig rten sna tshogs gnas pa 'di ni las las skyes pa yin te/ phyogs dang cha byad zhig na nad med pa'i go 'phang mya ngan med pa/ rdul med pa las kyis 'jig rten grub

pa la ltos pa yin te/ dri ma med pa'i lam rnam par grol ba/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ shin tu bsil ba'i las nyid kyis byed de/ las gzhan la ltos pa ma yin zhing las dang las ma yin pa las rnam par grol
te/ spros pa med pa la nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /theg pa rnam gsum rab 'jug las/ /zhi ba gzhan yang yod min te/ /sngags kyang rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /rnam gsum las su yang dag bsgrags/ /de las

rnam zlos rnam gsum las/ /rnam pa gsum du rab tu snang / /rigs kyang rnam gsum gsungs pa ni/ /sngags rnams kun gyi gzhi yang yin/ /rigs gsum rnam pa brgyad du yang / /rgyud dag la ni rab tu snang / /rnam pa

gcig tu'ang rigs snang ste/ /sngags rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dag pa'i thugs/ /rigs ni zhi ba mya ngan 'das/ /yan lag so so de nyid las/ /sngags rnams kun tu rab tu bstan/ /'jig rten skar

mkhan yan lag ni/ /grub pa'i rgyur ni rab tu brtag /de nyid yan lag las yin te/ /rkyen gyi yan lag dag la 'jug /ji ltar sA lu'i 'bru rnams ni/ /myu gus rnam par shes par byed/ /de bzhin grub pa'i rdzas

rnams ni/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam par shes/ /ji ltar kha dog dkar po ni/ /tha snyad kyis ni rnam par brtags/ /de bzhin skar ma ldan pas ni/ /tha snyad don du rab tu brtag /thams cad du ni thams cad ldan/ /

las ni gcig pu rab tu bsngags/ /las rnams med par mtshon pa med/ /gang na'ang lus ni yod ma yin/ /rgyu mtshan dang ni spyod pa dang / /skye ba dang ni rigs dang gnas/ /rtag tu la nye sna tshogs pa/ /las de las ni

nye bar dmigs/ /las ni gang du'ang lus can min/ /nang na gnas shing mtshon pa med/ /kun nas skye bo rgas pa na/ /rnam par 'gyur las nye bar dmigs/ /de bzhin lus la brten nas ni/ /las ni lus can dag la

snang / /'bras bu dge dang mi dge'i rtags/ /skye bar yang ni rab brjod dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs la nye bzang / /las rnams sna tshogs dag las byung / /dus tshod de bzhin 'gro ba dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs srog chags sgra/ /

grub dang ma grub mtshan ma ni/ /rkyen gyi don la ltos pa yin/ /rgyu mtshan spyod dang mtshan ma ni/ /rkyen la mngon par rab tu brtag /de bas rnam kun 'bad nas ni/ /rkyen la rag las bya ba yin/ /zlos pa'i sngags
rnams rtag tu ni/ /grub pa rgyu la ltos pa yin/ /'di dag rkyen gyi yan lag ni/ /las ni bdag gir byed pas mtshon/ /mi mtshon sngags rnams thams cad ni/ /bgegs las shin tu mi bzad 'gyur/ /de
bas 'di dag thams cad kyi/ /yan lag tu ni thub pas gsungs/ /sa dbang rgyal po thams cad mkhyen/ /byang chub snying por ting 'dzin thob/ /sngags ni yongs su gsungs pa na/ /bgegs rnams ma lus
rab tu 'jig /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /bzod par dka' ba'ang rnam par 'joms/ /kun mkhyen bdag nyid chen po yi/ /de thugs byang chub la zhugs pa/ /ma rungs bdud kyi sems kyis ni/ /

bgegs chen 'jigs par ga la 'gyur/ /de nas 'jigs pa chen po ni/ /des ni rgyu mtshan med par snang / /rnam pa sna tshogs 'jigs pa rnams/ /de la rgyu mtshan med par 'byung / /de ni bsod nams stobs bskyed pa/ /
yun ring dus su yongs su bsngags/ /de yi sngags kyi stobs kyis ni/ /de tshe bdud ni bcom par 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing brtson 'grus che/ /de ni 'od chen ldan par gyur/ /de yi sngags kyis
mthu yis ni/ /byang chub dam pa thob par gyur/ /rmi lam ngan pa nyer 'jig pa/ /sngags de 'dir ni bshad par bya/ /gang dag sa la spyod pa yi/ /'byung po'i tshogs kun rab nyon cig /rmi lam ngan pa bzod
dka' dang / /ma rungs sems can zlog byed pa/ /rgyal ba sA la'i dbang po yi/ /sngon ni sngags rgyal yongs gsungs pa/ /lha yi tshogs dang gza' rnams dang / /rgyu skar skar mkhan rnams nyon cig /

gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma rnams/ /ma rungs tshar gcad don dang ni/ /'byung po rnams ni thams cad kyang / /zhi ba'i sems ni rab bskyed phyir/ /gang dag sa la spyod pa dag /rkang med rkang mang dag dang

ni/ /rkang gnyis dang ni rkang bzhi dang / /mdor na sems can thams cad ni/ /'gro ba dang ni gnas pa yi/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun nyon cig /na maH sarba bud+d+ha nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/

kha kha khA hi khA hi hU~M hU~M dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha Sh+Ti phaT phaT swA hA/ gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes bsgrags pa'i/ /sngags 'di sngags rnams kun gyi mchog /gang zhig las rnams stong
phrag ni/ /dgu bcu rtsa bzhi dag dang ni/ /bkra shis thams cad 'dod pa yi/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /lan cig bzlas pas sel bar byed/ /las rnams
gzhan yang byed pa ni/ /sngags rnams kun gyi bdag po yin/ /'byung po kun la dbang byed pa/ /bla ma mnga' bdag sangs rgyas 'di/ /sngags 'di dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /sngags rnams ma
lus rab tu sems/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa lha yi lha/ /thub mchog gis ni de gsungs nas/ /yud tsam mi gsung bzhugs nas ni/ /cung zad dus ni bzhes par mdzad/ /de tshe gnas gtsang gnas
pa yi/ /lha tshogs dag kyang 'dug par 'gyur/ /lha rnams gtso bo thams cad ni/ /rgyu skar gza' dang skar ma rnams/ /gtsug tor sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis/ /'jigs shing dam tshig la gnas phyir/ /
gtsug tor zhes bya mthu bo che/ /mthu mnyam mthu ni chen po ste/ /brgya phrag lnga 'am bzhi 'am ni/ /de bzhin bdun nam brgyad dang dgu/ /gnyis dang drug dang lnga dang bdun/ /gtsug tor dbang por rab
tu bsgrags/ /de ltar grangs dang grangs med ni/ /gtsug tor rgyal po dge ba yin/ /de dag dang ni sngags 'di mtshungs/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho
ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ las bdag gir byas pa'i rkyen gyi le'u rab 'byam las bcu bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom

ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rgyu skar dang gza' dang skar ma dang skar mkhan thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa dang / phyogs thams cad du rnam par gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i
mchog rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig /gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad kyi mthu'i tshig khyed cag thams cad dag la yang ston cig /khyed kyi sngags bya ba'i don thams cad

kyang sgrubs shig /khyed kyis dam tshig la yang gnas par gyis shig /sngags kyi rgyal po 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bstan pa 'di grub na/ de nas gzhan cho ga'i rgyal po grub pa la yang khyed cag yid dad par gyis shig
ces so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ gza' rnams kyi spyod pa sems can thams cad kyi don du gsungs te/ zlos pa thams cad la phan pa'i phyir dang sngags kyi don yang rab tu

bsgrubs pa'i phyir thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs so/ /tha skar dang ni bra nye dang / /smin drug dang po'i rgyu skar te/ /rgyu skar gsum po 'di dag la/ /mig dmar gza' ni bdag po yin/ /lug ni
khyim du bstan pa ste/ /'di la grub pa yod ma yin/ /grub mchog bar ma tha ma nyid/ /grub pa yin par 'dod pa yin/ /las rnams kun tu'ang mi 'gro zhing / /ma rungs gza' ni rnam par zlog /snar ma

mgo dang de bzhin du/ /lag tu rgyu skar brjod pa yin/ /rgyu skar nab so rgyal dang ni/ /skag tu'ang rab tu brjod pa yin/ /mchu dang de bzhin gre dang dbo/ /de bzhin me bzhi nag pa dang / /sa ri sa ga lha mtshams
dang / /na dang de bzhin snrubs dang ni/ /chu ni stod smad dge ba ste/ /zlos pa la phan rab tu bsngags/ /rgyu skar gro bzhin mon gru ni/ /drag po'i las la rab tu bsngags/ /mon gre khrums ni stod smad
gnyis/ /rgyu skar grub pa'i rgyu yin no/ /nam gru las skye dpal dang ldan/ /'thab la dga' zhing 'jigs pa med/ /rgyu skar lhag ma gtso bo ni/ /dus kyi tha mar 'byung ba min/ /byi bzhin legs par spyod

pa dang / /grub dang bsod nams rab tu bsgrags/ /nye rgyal dang ni tha chungs dang / /'dod pa dag ni nyid yin no/ /yang dag bden dang 'jig rten dang / /snang bar yang ni brjod pa yin/ /longs spyod sbyin dang dge sbyin

dang / /ma 'gags pa dang 'gags pa nyid/ /grags sbyin gzi brjid rgyal po dang / /de bzhin rgyal po 'jig rten dang / /rgyu skar mang po gsungs pa ste/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /dus kyi tha ma 'di la ni/ /'di dag

gi ni nus pa yod/ /cho ga rgyal 'di bde don du/ /de tsam shes par gsungs pa yin/ /rang nyid 'od ldan sems can ni/ /de yi dus su rdzogs ldan yin/ /thams cad nam mkha' la 'gro zhing / /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/ /

de yi dus su rgyu skar med/ /nyi ma zla ba skar ma med/ /lha dang lha min 'jig rten med/ /dang po'i dus ni dus mchog yin/ /ming med rigs kyang yod ma yin/ /tshes dang skye ba'i skar ma med/ /smyung ba med cing sngags

kyang med/ /dge dang mi dge'i las kyang med/ /'di dag rang dgar spyod pa ste/ /bza' dang bza' bar bya ba'ang med/ /'di dag nad med dag pa ste/ /rtag tu sems can rnam mang po/ /de nas dus ni bri ba na/ /'jig

rten snod min rab tu 'jug /sngon gyi las kyis drangs nas ni/ /de nas sa yi steng du 'gro/ /sa steng lha gnas gzhal med khang / /lha dang lha min yang dag byung / /bar ma'i dus su phyin gyur nas/ /mi yi lus la

yang dag brten/ /bza' dang btung la brkam chags pas/ /'od de dag ni rab tu nyams/ /lus ni sra ba nyid gyur cing / /dge dang mi dge rnam par spyod/ /de nas nyin zhag zla ba dang / /gza' yi 'od ni byung bar gyur/ /

de nas bzung nas gang cung zad/ /skar ma'i dpyad shes pa nyid dang / /sems can rjes su gzung bar brjod/ /ngas ni de dag bstan pa yin/ /sngon ni drang srong cha byad gyur/ /blo ldan tshangs pa'i cha byad dang / /dbang phyug

chen po'i lus bstan cing / /yang na khyab 'jug cha byad kyis/ /nam mkha' lding gi lus spyad dang / /gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang / /sha za dag gis lus nyid gyur/ /skye dang skye bar bdag nyid skyes/ /byang chub sems

dpa' mkhas par ni/ /de dang der ni skye ba la/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod don phyir/ /rtag tu skye ba'i dbang gis so/ /bdag nyid de tshe dus dag tu/ /sngon ni byang chub sems dpar gyur/ /mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa yi/ /

bdag ni de tshe byis par gyur/ /'jig rten ji snyed yod pa yi/ /khyab 'jug gis byas gzo spyad dang / /lugs kyi bstan bcos sngon gyi rabs/ /de bzhin rig byed brda sprod pa/ /sdeb sbyor skar ma'i dpyad nyid dang / /rtsis

dang sgyu rtsal 'dod pa dang / /log shes de bzhin shes pa dang / /de bzhin log par spyod nyid dang / /'jig rten bstan bcos thams cad ni/ /yun ring bdag gis sngon bstan to/ /zhi ba thub bdag ji lta bar/ /ye shes bdag

gis thob ma yin/ /byang chub rgyu ni grol don dang / /de bzhin du ni thar pa'i phyir/ /'khor ba'i btson rar rab bcings pas/ /las rnams las kyang bdag ma grol/ /zhi ba rnam rgyal sangs rgyas nyid/ /ma nyams go 'phang mya

ngan 'das/ /yun ring don du mngon 'dod cing / /legs par yongs su btsal bas thob/ /de ltar bdag gis rig ldan pas/ /tshegs chung bya bas thob pa yin/ /rgyal bas sngon ni bstan pas na/ /rang byung ye shes
thob pa yin/ /de 'dra'i gnas ni rab mthong ba/ /phyi rol lam gyis thob ma yin/ /byang chub rgyu ni rnyed dka' bas/ /'khor ba'i dgon par 'khyams pa yin/ /bdag gi rang byung 'di 'dra ba/ /ye shes bdag
gis thob pa min/ /rig pa bzang po'i las dga' bas/ /da ni mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /bdag gis bstan bcos 'di dag ni/ /bsdus pa 'ba' zhig byas pa yin/ /las las grol ba med par ni/ /

grub pa'i rgyu ni rnyed ma yin/ /'khor ba'i yun ring zhags pa 'dis/ /las kyi 'ching bas nges par bcings/ /de yi 'gro 'di bdag nyid che/ /dge dang mi dge'ang smin par 'gyur/ /rgyu skar gza' dang skar ma'i dpyad/ /

mtshon par byed pa kho nar zad/ /chos dang mi ldan mi rnams dang / /gzhan la rtags ni snang mi 'gyur/ /de nyid kyis na gza' gsungs pa/ /dge dang mi dge'i rjes gzung phyir/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag

dang / /khams ni bzhi po dag dang ni/ /chu dang sa dang rlung dang me/ /nam mkhar yongs su bstan pa yin/ /'byung ba yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/ /'di dag 'byung ba chen po yin/ /sems can yang dag bsdu ba'i

phyir/ /bag med las kyis byas pa yin/ /de dag dus ni nges pa yis/ /sngags rnams grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi skye ba 'bad pa yis/ /dge dang mi dge bsrung bar bya/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'jig rten gtso/ /

lha yi dbang phyug brgya byin sogs/ /de yang de tshe de dus su/ /dus kyi mthar ni yongs su brtags/ /dus kyi tha ma dag la ni/ /sngags rnams grub pa nges pa yin/ /de nyid kyis na thub dbang gis/ /gzhon nu yongs su brtags pa ni/ /shes rab chen po
'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs dang ldan/ /'jig rten 'dir ni kun tu rgyu/ /sems can rjes su gzung bar bzod/ /de yi dus su grub pa ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu mthong / /rgyu skar

skar ma'i dpyad shes pa/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu skar dang / /yud tsam dag tu rab tu bsgrags/ /dus kyi tha ma de la ni/ /bcu gnyis khyim yang yod pa yin/ /rgyu skar tshogs la brten nas ni/ /
de dag gza' ni rnam par dbye/ /thams cad so sor gyur pa ni/ /'jam dpal gyis ni so sor mdzad/ /skye ba dang ni spyod pa nyid/ /khyim rnams kun la rab tu gnas/ /skye bo rmongs pas khyab 'gyur la/ /
dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'byung / /de nyid las kyi 'ching ba yis/ /de dag khyim ni yang dang yang / /sems can rnams kyis grub pa tsam/ /dge dang mi dge rtog par byed/ /rgyu skar snar mar ldan par
ni/ /skye bar yongs su rab brtags pa/ /dpal ldan bzod pa phun sum tshogs/ /tshe ring bu ni mang ba dang / /rtag tu de tshe nor skal ldan/ /de ni dmag gi bdag po byed/ /'di ni khyu mchog
khyim skyes na/ /khyu mchog nyid la yongs su 'chi/ /mgo nyid la ni 'jig rten shes/ /chos ldan mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ /smin drug char skyes rtag tu ni/ /sa bdag rgyal por snang ba ste/ /
yang dag skye ba de la brten/ /rtag tu rgya mtsho gsum bdag 'gyur/ /phyogs gcig skyes pa bgrod dka' ba'i/ /phyogs gcig rgyal por 'gyur ba yin/ /gza' ni bla mas mtshan pa yi/ /gal te skye bar 'byung
'gyur na/ /sa ni khor yug ma lus par/ /rjes su spyod par 'gyur ba yin/ /lo ni bcu dang lnga po nyid/ /de yi rgyal thabs byed par 'gyur/ /tha skar bra nye nyid dang ni/ /smin drug cha las skyes gyur
pa/ /khyim 'di dag gi nus pa ni/ /tshong gi don gyis nor sgrub 'gyur/ /gal te skyes pa des byung na/ /dbang phyug longs spyod phun sum tshogs/ /rgyu skar 'di la skyes pa na/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
dmar bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyi ma nub pa na/ /de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /ma rungs tsham tshom med pa dang / /bden par smra ba ma yin dang / /lus kyi lpags srab dmar ba'i mdog /sa yi steng na de
snang ngo / /'di yi 'gro ba skad cig ni/ /mig 'byed 'dzums su rab tu bstan/ /'di yi bar du gang skyes pa/ /rgya che yon tan de 'di yin/ /se gol gtogs gnas tsam du ni/ /'di yi 'gro ba rab tu bstan/ /
des na de dag 'gro ba nyams/ /gza' rnams kyis ni mthong ma yin/ /skye ba rnam par 'dris gyur pa'i/ /sems can rnam pa sna tshogs skye/ /'dres pa'i 'gro ba phun sum tshogs/ /'dren pa'i longs spyod ldan

pa yin/ /de nyid kyis na mi skye ste/ /skye ba nyid na brjod pa yin/ /skye ba'i skar ma sum cu ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'byung / /gza' ni mig dmar gyis mtshan pa/ /'di ni ma rungs skye bar 'gyur/ /

gsus che lus ni snum pa dang / /mig dkyus ring zhing snyan par smra/ /gza' ni phur bus bltas pa ni/ /rtag tu brtan ldan skye bar 'gyur/ /chu tshod zung tsam nyi ma dang / /zla ba'i lha ni rab bshad pa/ /de bzhin rtag tu

nyin mtshan la/ /yang dag skye bar 'dod pa yin/ /phyin ci log pa'i skye ba gzhan/ /phyin ci log tu'ang brtags pa yin/ /gza' ni mi dge mthong ba dang / /mi dge'i skye ba dge mi dge/ /mi dge'i 'bras bu grub pa dang / /

yang dag skye ba bzang po 'byung / /'gro ba'i skye gnas la brten nas/ /khyim la skye bar rab tu gnas/ /gza' ni ngan spong bus mtshan pa/ /sbyin byed sems dpa' che ba ste/ /lag dang nab so dag dang ni/ /

skag gi cha la rab tu brjod/ /'di dag la skyes gtong ba che/ /g.yo sgyu can ni bab col byed/ /don dang don med 'byor ba la/ /rtag tu brkam chag bud med chags/ /gzhan gyi bud med mngon 'gro zhing / /de nyid

nag po la spyod dang / /dud pa'i mdog 'drar skye 'gyur te/ /drag cing 'khrig pa la yang dga'/ /sbyor ba'i khyim la rab brten nas/ /de ni spen pa dag la skye/ /nyin dang mtshan du yang dang yang / /der gnas

spen pa rgyu bar byed/ /de las skyes pa nyi ma phyed/ /sems ni stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de yi dus la gang skyes pa/ /de yi mtshan nyid brjod par bya/ /nor ni grub par 'gyur ba dang / /dbang phyug gis ni

legs mtshan pa'o/ /rgyu skar de bzhin rgyal dang ni/ /skag la yang ni gang skyes pa/ /'di ni sbal pa'i khyim yin te/ /dge dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che/ /mdog ni ser po dang ldan zhing / /de ni skye ba mchog tu bstan/ /

rtag tu de bzhin mtshan phyed du/ /'di ni skye bar bstan pa yin/ /de yi dus kyi tshad la ni/ /gal te sems can skye bar 'dod/ /cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis na/ /'di ni don rnams thams cad sgrub/ /de ni shin tu gzhon pa nas/ /

rgyal thabs byed cing nor rnams thob/ /mdog ni ser dang sngo bsangs ni/ /kha dog rgyas pa snang bar 'gyur/ /gtsang sbra'i spyod la dga' ba dang / /de ni dpal ldan 'jigs med skye/ /mchu dang de bzhin gre dang
