ni/ /de bzhin dbo yi cha dag ni/ /snang byed kyi ni zhing du 'gyur/ /seng ge'i khyim du bya ba yin/ /de la skyes pa dpa' bo che/ /sha yi kha zas de la dga'/ /ri yi rdzong la brten nas ni/ /rgyal thabs dbang phyug

byed par 'gyur/ /gal te der skyes thob gyur na/ /zhing la gnas shing des sdom rten/ /de bzhin nyi ma 'char ba na/ /skyes pa 'di la brjod pa yin/ /rgyu skar dbo yi cha dang ni/ /de bzhin me bzhi nag pa nyid/ /rgyu

skar de la skye gnas pa/ /mi ni yongs su dpa' bar 'gyur/ /sdom min gzhan gyi bud med 'gro/ /de ni dmag dpon byed par 'gyur/ /gal te skye ba thob 'gyur na/ /nges par rgyal thabs byed par 'gyur/ /gang du

skar ma de dag gnas/ /'di ni bu mo'i khyim du 'gyur/ /'di yi bdag po gza' lhag ste/ /kha cig tu ni gzhan yang yin/ /'di dag skar ma mchog la ni/ /gza' ni mi bzad bsrung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba yang ni bzang ba

ste/ /yang na zla ba'i bu bdag yin/ /nyin phyed rdzogs na skye ba ni/ /'di yi skye bar snang ba yin/ /nag pa'i cha dang sa ri dang / /sa ga'i phyed kyis lhag pa la/ /srang gi khyim ste bzang po'i don/ /zla ba la spyod
sems can gyi/ /'di ni mi bzad zhing yin te/ /skal med ma yin nor gyi gnas/ /'di yi skye ba skye gyur gnas/ /mtshan mo'i thun gyi tha ma'o/ /mi ni 'di la skyes gyur pa/ /rtag tu btung ba dag la dad/ /

spyi mtshan ma yin ngo tsha med/ /mang pos bkur cing mchod pa dang / /la lar rgyal srid longs spyod dang / /nor chen thob par 'gyur ba yin/ /nges med skye ba yongs snang zhing / /byis par mas ni spangs pa yin/ /gal te

skye ba thob 'gyur na/ /bu mang bde ba skye bar 'gyur/ /rgyu skar lha mtshams las skyes pa/ /bzo yi las ni sgrub pa dang / /byams pa'i bdag nyid grogs po mang / /rtag tu dpa' zhing rtul phod che/ /'jig rten snron la

skyes pa ni/ /mi ni rab gtum brtan pa yin/ /sdug bsngal mang po bzod pa dang / /mi ni ma rungs skye bar 'gyur/ /khyim ni sdig par bshad pa ste/ /rtag tu rno zhing bab col byed/ /'di dag nyid la rtag skyes pa/ /skye
bar yang dag brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin nyin phyed nyi ma la/ /gal te mi ni skye gyur na/ /drag cing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba'i/ /rgyal por de ni nges par 'gyur/ /byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs yod pa'i/ /
de yi skad cig gzas mthong 'gyur/ /sa yi lha mo'i bur gyur pa/ /gang yin de ni mig dmar gsungs/ /de nyid phyir na sa la spyod/ /rang bu nyid kyis gsod par byed/ /de las gzhan pa bzlog pas

ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i skye ba nyid/ /tshe ring gzi brjid ldan pa dang / /shes ldan nyid du'ang skye bar 'gyur/ /lha mtshams la ni rab skyes pa/ /shes rab che zhing grogs la byams/ /mig dmar gyi ni zhing 'di yin/ /
yang na rtag tu gza' 'dres yin/ /rgyu skar snrubs las skyes pa dang / /de bzhin du ni chu stod dang / /chu smad kyi ni cha dag la/ /gzhu yi khyim du rab tu bstan/ /de yi skye ba'i skye ba ni/ /phur

bu'i zhing der brtan pa yin/ /nyi ma phyi dror gyur pa dang / /zla ba nam smad gyur pa la/ /de yi skye ba zhes bstan pa/ /gang zhig skyes pa skye ba'i rgyu/ /snrubs las skyes pa rang rigs 'jig /tha mar bzang por 'gyur ba yin/ /

skye gnas bar mar longs spyod ni/ /thob par de ni the tsom med/ /gzhon pa yongs su 'das pa na/ /snang byed dkyil 'khor ji lta bar/ /rgas par gyur na rgyal por 'gyur/ /longs spyod che zhing nor cher 'gyur/ /

dma' ba'i phyogs su lus 'gyur gyi/ /gzhan gyi phyogs su ma yin no/ /de las gzhan du bzlog par ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skye bo snang / /chu smad kyi ni cha dag dang / /gro bzhin nyid du brtan pa dang / /

mon gru rgyu skar mchog nyid ni/ /khyim 'di chu srin kho na yin/ /'di ni spen pa'i zhing yin te/ /yang na gza' gzhan gyis mtshan pa'o/ /rtag tu 'di la skye gnas pa/ /de yang sa steng 'di la snang / /dang

po'i mtha' dang bar ma'i mtha'/ /mtshan mo'i cha ni 'das pa la/ /de dag las skyes longs spyod cher/ /kun nas snang bar gyur pa yin/ /mtho dang dma' ba'i rigs gnas shing / /de dag sa yi bdag por 'gyur/ /

rab gtum kha dog nag po'am/ /sngo bsangs mdog tu de dag 'gyur/ /mig mtha' dmar zhing 'jam pa dang / /rtag tu dpa' zhing rtul yang phod/ /de bzhin chu yis khyab pa yi/ /phyogs su rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ /

tshe ring bu ni med pa dang / /sdug bsngal mang po bzod par 'gyur/ /de las gzhan pa bzlog pa la/ /skye bo rnam par bzlog pa snang / /mon gru'i phyed dang mon gre dang / /de bzhin khrums stod phyed dag ni/ /de yi

khyim du 'gyur ba ni/ /bum pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /'di la gza' yi gtso bo ni/ /zhing du rtag tu brten pa yin/ /de bzhin 'dres pa'ang zla ba dang / /blo ldan pa wa sangs nyid yin/ /'di dag skye bar 'gyur ba ni/ /

mtshan mo'am nam ni langs par snang / /rtag tu skye 'di bzang po ste/ /'jig rten spyod pa dag pa yin/ /mi ni ma rungs las byed cing / /blo dang ldan par brjod pa yin/ /longs spyod sna tshogs phun sum tshogs/ /sa steng rjes

su spyod par 'gyur/ /de las gzhan du bzlog na ni/ /dbul zhing nad rnams snod du 'gyur/ /rgyu skar khrums smad nyid dang ni/ /nam gru zhes ni brjod pa dang / /khrums stod kyi ni bzhi cha la/ /khyim ni nya ru rab tu brtags/ /skye ba de dag rtag gnas

pa/ /kun tu ji ltar snang zhe na/ /mtshan mo'i thun gyi bar ma dang / /nyin par nyi ma shar ba dang / /nyi ma thun phyed 'das pa dang / /nyin phyed cung zad 'das pa dang / /lhag ma khru gang tsam 'das par/ /'di yi dus su'ang skyes

pa ni/ /dag pa dang ni rab dag nyid/ /pa sangs nyid kyis rab tu mchod/ /pa wa sangs kyi zhing zhes pa/ /lha yi rigs zhes tshangs par spyod/ /ser dang dkar ba'i mdog dag gi/ /gza' yis kyang ni rab tu bsten/ /des shing

rtag tu dge ba dang / /chos ldan mchog tu bzang ba yin/ /mi ni de la skyes gyur pa/ /yan lag kun kyang shin tu mdzes/ /brtson 'grus che zhing rgyal po 'dod/ /gnyen dang bshes ni brtan pa dang / /tshe ring longs spyod che ba dang / /

dma' ba'i yul la yang dag brten/ /shar gyi phyogs la brten nas ni/ /de dag rtag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /de dag mya ngam phyogs su ni/ /rtag tu skye bar mi 'gyur te/ /nya ni thang la yongs spyod par/ /nam yang snang ba ma

yin no/ /drang srong rnams kyi chu gnas dang / /chu bo dag tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de la skye bar rab brtan pa/ /khyim nyid du ni rab tu bstan/ /mi ni de dag las skyes pa/ /dma' ba'i yul du rnam par 'phel/ /rtag
tu shar gyi phyogs gnas pa'i/ /sa bdag skal ba chen por 'gyur/ /phur bu dang ni spen pa dag /gza' mchog gi ni mngon par bltas/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi bdag po byed/ /de dag las skyes the tshom med/ /

khyim ni rnam pa mang po dang / /rgyu skar du ma gsungs pa yang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gza' mchog kyang / /sngon gyi dus yin da ltar min/ /mi rnams de las skyes pa yang / /de bzhin tshes grangs bco lnga dang / /nyin zhag
sum cu dag nyid de/ /des na zla bar rab tu bstan/ /zla phyed nyin mtshan bco lnga ste/ /zla phyed gnyis la zla bar brjod/ /des na zla ba bcu gnyis la/ /lo gcig tu ni rab tu bsgrags/ /'di tsam

dus kyi tshod la ni/ /dus kyi tha mar yongs su brtags/ /rtsod pa'i dus su phyin pa na/ /'di yi grangs su rab tu bstan/ /mi rnams tshe ni de bzhin du/ /lo brgya dag tu bsgrags pa yin/ /de dag lo tshigs phyin pa na/ /

dus ni drug tu rab tu brjod/ /dang po bar dang tha mar ni/ /de dag gsum du rab tu bstan/ /lha mtshams la ni sa 'gul na/ /mi rnams 'dir ni tshe ring 'gyur/ /de dag mi yi 'jig rten 'dir/ /skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur

ba yin/ /mi ma yin pa 'jig rten 'dir/ /phan tshun du ni 'byer bar 'gyur/ /de dag rnam skrag 'jigs pa dang / /phan tshun du ni rnam par rgyu/ /lha dang lha min gtso bo ni/ /gang tshe 'thab par rab 'jug pa/ /de tshe mi yi 'jig

rten 'dir/ /nad ni 'byung bar byed pa yin/ /mjug rings las dang skar mda' dang / /gnam lcags dang ni rdo rje dang / /dud pa phyogs ni mtha' dag tu/ /du ba mjug rings rab tu snang / /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /mun nag gis ni khebs

par gnas/ /nyi zla rdzu 'phrul chen po dag /bug pa yod par snang ba dang / /de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /rnam mang yang ni snang gyur na/ /mu ge tshe ni nyams pa dang / /de bzhin yul 'khor 'jig pa dang / /mi yi bdag po
'chi ba dang / /sdom brtson 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / /sdom brtson 'jig pa chen po 'byung /

'jig rten dag ni thams cad la/ /der ni 'jigs su rung ba 'byung / /mchu dang tha skar dag dang ni/ /nab so la ni sa 'gul na/ /de tshe dbus kyi yul dag tu/ /rkun ma bab col byed la gnod/ /lho yi phyogs la gnas pa yi/ /rgyal po chen po

rnam par 'jig /bra nye smin drug nyid dang ni/ /gang tshe snar ma dang ni mgo/ 'gul na 'jig rten 'jigs pa che/ /de la dogs pa rab tu 'byung / /nub phyogs na ni gnas pa yi/ /de tshe rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang yang mtha' 'khob gnas pa yi/ /

kla klo rku bas 'tsho byed dang / /de bzhin 'bigs byed steng gnas dang / /nang du mi yi dbang phyug gnas/ /de yang de yi dus dag tu/ /nad kyis brgyal zhing gnod par 'gyur/ /de dag la ni dgra rnams 'byung / /gcig la gcig

ni yul 'phrog 'gyur/ /rgyu skar lag dang rgyal dang ni/ /skag dang de bzhin gre dang dbo/ /'di dag la ni sa 'gul na/ /mi bdag kun ni mi mthun nas/ /phan tshun gnod pa byed 'gyur ba/ /gsod dang 'ching dang gnod pa dang / /

mu ge dag kyang rab tu 'byung / /me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang / /de bzhin lha mtshams na nyid la/ /snod kyi 'jig rten sar gyur pa/ /'di la gang tshe 'gul gyur na/ /kha ba can gnas kla klo dang / /rkun ma kun nas gnas

pa dang / /bal yul gyi ni bdag po dang / /kha sha'i lung par gnas pa yi/ /der ni mi bdag ma lus pa/ /phan tshun du ni mi mthun nas/ /thams cad g.yul la spyod 'gyur bar/ /'dir ni the tshom med pa yin/ /

rgyu skar gang yin snrubs dang ni/ /chu ni stod smad gnyi ga la/ /sa yi steng du 'gul bar ni/ /'di dag la ni rab mthong na/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi mi rnams dang / /pon dra o Ta kA ma ru/ /b+hang+ga la bdag rgyal po ni/ /

'chi bar 'di la the tshom med/ /gau TA'i bdag po dpal dang ldan/ /yul 'khor gzhan gyis yongs bskor ba'am/ /'phral la na bar gyur pa dang / /la lar yang na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten rgya mtsho'i ngogs

gnas dang / /gang+gA'i 'gram du yang dag gnas/ /chu yis thams cad khyer ba'am/ /nad rnams mang po kun gnod byed/ /gro bzhin dang ni mon gru dang / /mon gre dang ni chu stod dang / /de bzhin du ni chu smad dang / /
gal te nam gru las skyes pa/ /rab tu 'gul ba nyin phyed la/ /snod kyi 'jig rten yang dag 'gul/ /sa rnams thams cad rab 'gul ba/ /ri bo dang ni nags su bcas/ /rtag tu nam mkha' la snang ba/ /
'phar zhing 'og tu 'byung byed na/ /byang phyogs kyi ni yul dag dang / /nub phyogs la ni yang dag gnas/ /lho yi phyogs ni thams cad dang / /phyogs rnams kun la gnas byed pa'i/ /mi mchog

sa ni mang spyod pa/ /phan tshun du ni gnod pa byed/ /sems can rnams ni gnod chen ldan/ /mu ges yul 'khor 'byer bar 'gyur/ /tho rangs sa ni 'gul gyur na/ /lus can shis dang zhi bar 'gyur/ /de las cung zad phyi dus

na/ /drag po'i 'gul ba rab tu skye/ /de nas cung zad phyis 'gul na/ /yul ni ma ga d+hAr gnod dang / /ang+ga'i yul du gnod 'gyur te/ /ma ga d+hA rgyal de bzhin no/ /de nas cung zad nyin phyed dam/ /phyi dro'i dus su

gyur pa na/ /gal te sa ni 'gul bar gyur/ /sa steng ma lus nyid dag gi/ /rab tu byung ba thams cad la/ /rtag tu nad ni 'byung ba 'thob/ /rims dang yi ga 'chus dang gzer/ /de bzhin nad ni 'brum bu yis/ /
zhag bdun btab par gyur nas ni/ /de nas de dag sos par 'gyur/ /de nas nyi ma yang 'das nas/ /sa ni gal te 'gul gyur na/ /rigs bzhi dag gi mchog gyur pa/ /bram ze rtswa ni so ma 'thung / /nyon mongs

rgyal po'i blon po ni/ /'chi bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /mdun na 'don ni chos dang ldan/ /blon po'am zham 'bring byed pa na/ /gzhan yang sdom can gtso bo ni/ /sngags rgyud don la mkhas pa dang / /bram ze dang

ni rgyal rigs dang / /de bzhin dmangs rigs rje'u rigs dang / /brtan pa mkhas pa dag dang ni/ /bstan bcos de nyid don lugs ldan/ /gsod dang rab tu nyams pa'am/ /dran ldan thos dang de nyid shes/ /sngon byung
ba ni sems pa dag /myur du nad kyis 'jigs 'gyur te/ /gnam lcags rdo rjes shing la bzhin/ /de nas nyi ma nub pa na/ /de nas yang ni song ba na/ /phyi dro dus kyi mtha' la ni/ /gal te sa ni rab tu
'gul/ /de bzhin sems can 'dres pa dang / /dud 'gro dag gi 'gro ba dang / /mi yi 'jig rten gtso bo dag /de tshe 'gum dang rnam par 'jig /mtshan mo'i thun ni dang po la/ /gal te sa ni 'gul gyur na/ /

sems can 'dres pa sna tshogs dang / /dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang ni/ /mi ni 'jig rten gtso rnams su/ /char chen rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /cung zad thun de bri gyur la/ /sa ni 'gul bar gyur pa yi/ /
de tshe rtags de snang gyur na/ /rlung dang char pa'i 'jigs chen 'byung / /de nas thun de zad pa'i mthar/ /'gul snang las ni mi bzad pa/ /nub phyogs mi yi bdag po yi/

/pha rol dmag tshogs 'byung bar shes/ /thun ni gnyis pa dang po la/ /gal te sa ni 'gul ba byung / /gzhan gyi dmag tshogs nad dang 'chi/ /khong pa'i nad ni mi bzad 'byung / /mkhris pa bad kan las gyur nad/ /

skye bo rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'byung po rnams ni skyo 'gyur zhing / /de tshe phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro/ /de nas gnyis pa'i thun dkyil du/ /sa ni rab tu 'gul byung na/ /rlung chen 'byung bar shes bya ste/ /

shing dang lha khang 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /yang thog ra ba ri rnams kyi/ /rtse mo 'jig par the tshom med/ /gnas dang 'dug gnas bzang po dang / /khang pa dang ni rta babs dang / /dud 'gro rnams kyi 'dug gnas
kyang / /sa la myur du ltung bar 'gyur/ /de nas mtshan phyed dus dag tu/ /gal te sa ni 'gul ba byung / /de tshe shar phyogs yul gyi bdag /mi mchog gtso bo 'chi ba'am/ /de bu 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/ /

mu ge 'byung bar rab tu ston/ /bar ma'i thun ni bri gyur nas/ /tha mar nye la 'gul ba byung / /sa rnams dag ni ma lus la/ /zhi zhing nad med nges par ston/ /de nas mtshan phyed mthar gyur la/ /gal te sa
ni 'gul bar snang / / gsher chen yul gyi dbus dag tu/ /mi yi bdag po nad kyis gnon/ /phan tshun mi mthun gyur nas ni/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad 'chi bar 'gyur/ /thun ni gsum par phyin nas 'gul/ /

byis pa rnams la bde ba 'byung / /sbrang bu sha sbrang phye leb dang / /rkun po rnams ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /tho rangs 'gul bar gyur na ni/ /tshe ring nad med lo legs byed/ /grong khyer gyi ni khor yug dag /me yis tshig
par shes par bya/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i dus dag tu/ /sa ni rab tu 'gul ba byung / /dbus kyi yul ni thams cad du/ /rkun mas rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur/ /de tshe zhag ni bdun dag las/ /rgyal po 'chi bar
snang ba yin/ /gang du stobs ni rab che ba/ /sa ni 'gul bar gyur pa yin/ /de tshe gnas ni de dag tu/ /dge dang mi dge'i spyod pa snang / /skar mda' gnam grum sa 'gul ni/ /skar mda' dkar po
'bar gyur na/ /des ni sngar bstan sel bar byed/ /de bzhin dkar mdog rtag tu ni/ /dge zhing rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /mi bzad chen po kha dog dmar/ /me yis tshig par nye bar ston/ /dud ka'i
mdog nag nag po ni/ /rgyal po 'chi bar ston pa yin/ /ser ba'am yang na ser skya'am/ /'dres pa'i mdog ni snang gyur na/ /de tshe 'dres pa'i las 'gyur ba/ /skar mda' ltung bas rnam par ston/ /

gnam grum nyid du bstan pa ni/ /gar byung der ni ston pa ste/ /gal te dbus na de tshe dbus/ /yul nyid du ni rab tu bstan/ /sgra brnyan snyan pa byung na ni/ /bde zhing nad med ston par byed/ /ma rungs mi
bzad 'jig rten du/ /rnga sgra yis ni dge ba sbyin/ /'jigs dang shin tu 'jigs rung sgra/ /der ni mu ge ston pa yin/ /de la sogs par sbyor ba ni/ /rtag tu gza' rnams 'dod pa yin/ /rgyu skar 'di

dag mthong ba la/ /grub pa'i las ni de tshe bya/ /tha skar snar ma nyid dang ni/ /rgyal dang khrums ni stod smad gnyis/ /nam gru dang ni lha mtshams dag /bzlas pa'i dus su rab tu bsngags/ /'di dag la ni
sngags rnams 'grub/ /grub pa'i don yang ster bar byed/ /skar ma dag ni 'di dag la/ /dkyil 'khor nyid kyang bri bar bya/ /gza' yi res kyi gtso bo ni/ /ser dang dkar bar snang ba yin/ /tshes ni 'di dag

la dge ste/ /rtag tu zla ba nya ba yin/ /yul gzhan dag tu 'gro byed dang / /dkyil 'khor dag kyang bri bar bya/ /dang po gsum pa lnga pa dang / /bcu pa dang ni bdun pa dang / /bcu gsum pa la ci bde bar/ /

mi yi bdag po 'gro bar brtag /skye bo kun la dge ba sbyin/ /chas shing 'gro bar rab tu bsngags/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngags rgyud dag /sngags rnams thams cad mi bri'o/ /'di dag la ni sngags mi 'grub/ /
bgegs kyi rgyur ni bstan pa yin/ /'gro dang sbyin sreg grub pa la/ /tshes grangs gza' ni dam par ldan/ /phur bu pa sangs zla ba dang / /gza' lhag mchog ni las kun la/ /gza' mchog 'di
dag rtag tu ni/ /bzhi po tshes dang ldan pa ni/ /sa steng 'jig rten kun tu ni/ /'gro ba'i las ni grub par byed/ /ma rungs 'chi ltas bral ba yi/ /nyi ma la ni brtag par bya/ /yud tsam bcu gnyis kho
na ni/ /de yi dus su rab tu sbyar/ /dkar dang byams ldan nyid dang ni/ /mig dmar du yang rab tu bstan/ /drag bu dbang chen dag pa dang / /byi bzhin nyid dang legs mdzes dang / /'khor dang 'khor bar
byed pa nyid/ /dge ba sbyin zhes bstan pa yin/ /zla ba mchog ni sbyin pa nyid/ /'di dag bcu gnyis mtshan nyid yin/ /yud tsam dag tu bstan pa ni/ /nyin zhag sum cu nyid la'o/ /bcu pa char ni 'bab
'gyur te/ /bcu bzhi pa ni yul 'khor 'jig /brgyad pa bcu gnyis pa nyid dang / /bzhi pa nyid ni spang bar bya/ /myur la sogs pa'i grangs dang ldan/ /mar ngo la ni mtshan mo yin/ /lhag ma bgegs

ni byed pa yang / /log 'dren yin te bzhi pa'o/ /'di dag grangs ni ldan pa la/ /dus 'di dag tu rab tu bstan/ /mig ni 'byed dang 'dzums pa dang / /se gol myur ba'i 'gros 'di ni/ /'di dag dus kyi tshad dag ni/ /

rgya cher yang ni bstan par bya/ /se gol brgya yi tshogs dag la/ /rtsa rgyun gcig tu bstan pa yin/ /rtsa rgyun bzhi la chu tshod bstan/ /chu tshod bzhi la thun zhes bya/ /thun bzhi la ni nyin par te/ /mtshan mo dag

kyang de bzhin bstan/ /de ltar brgyad dang ldan pa la/ /nyin mtshan du ni rab tu brtags/ /mig gi 'byed 'dzums bcu la ni/ /skad cig tsam du rab tu brtags/ /skad cig bcu zhes bshad pa ni/ /yud tsam du ni yongs
su brtags/ /yud tsam bzhi la thun gcig ces/ /sngags rig pas ni yongs su brtags/ /'di tsam dus kyi tshad la ni/ /gsum gyi grangs su yongs su brtags/ /sbyin sreg dus dang bzlas pa yi/ /

grub pa'i dus dang sbyar bar bya/ /nyal ba'i dus dang mi nyal dang / /rtag tu nyin zhag phrugs btungs la/ /nyin dang mtshan ni nyi ma zhes/ /de ltar ming ni 'jug pa yin/ /nyi ma bcwa lnga nyid la ni/ /zla ba phyed du
rab tu bstan/ /zla phyed gnyis la zla ba zhes/ /rtsis shes 'jigs pa med pas bstan/ /de bzhin zla ba zla drug gis/ /sgra gcan gyis kyang 'dzin pa yin/ /de nas zla ba bcu gnyis la/ /lo yi sgrar

ni rab tu bsgrags/ /de nas lo ni bcu gnyis la/ /lo chen zhes ni de la bya/ /gza' dang rgyu skar phyin ci log /lha min dbang po thams cad kyang / /de nas lo ni bcu gnyis la/ /'dir ni dge dang mi dge byed/ /

gang tshe yar ngor lha min dbang / /sgra gcan rab tu snang 'gyur zhing / /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /ma lus rab tu zin gyur na/ /mtshon gyi tshogs ni chen po yang / /sa yi steng du snang bar 'gyur/ /

de la sogs pa chen po ni/ /dus dang dus su rab sbyor 'gyur/ /rnam pa du ma mang po yi/ /bgegs ni mi bzad snang bar 'gyur/ /dus kyi tha mar phyin pa na/ /'jig rten snod ni chos min la/ /rgyu skar snrubs

la gnas pa la/ /zla ba ma lus 'dzin 'gyur zhing / /mtshan mo ma lus 'dzin pa nyid/ /zla ba 'dzin pa nub bzhin dang / /gal te nyi ma nyin par ni/ /nub bzhin du ni 'dzin 'gyur dang / /nyi ma dang ni zla ba nyid/ /

mtshan phyed dag tu gzung gyur nas/ /lha min dbang po'i grib ma yis/ /gal te 'jigs shing nub gyur na/ /shar phyogs gnas pa'i rgyal po ni/ /sdang bas gsod par the tshom med/ /rang nyid 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas
sam/ /gzhan gyis de ni gsod par 'gyur/ /kla klo yi ni bdag po nyid/ /shar phyogs su ni gsod par byed/ /o Da'i yul gyi mi rnams dang / /de tshe rdo rje zhes bdag kyang / /gal te tha skar snar

ma dang / /de bzhin du ni bra nye dang / /smin drug dag la nyi zla ni/ /gang tshe 'dzin par snang 'gyur na/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bad kan dang / /mkhris pa dang ni rlung gyur dang / /de bzhin 'dres par gyur pa ni/ /gzhan yang

lus can kun la 'byung / /byis pa dag ni thams cad la/ /rnam pa du ma'i nad rnams 'byung / /gal te rgyu skar mchu dang ni/ /gre dang de bzhin dbo nyid dang / /me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang / /sa ga dag gi rgyu skar ni/ /

de la nyi zla shar ba na/ /'dzin par the tshom med 'gyur zhing / /nyi zla gnyis ni shar phyogs su/ /sgra gcan gyis ni zin gyur na/ /shar phyogs mi yi bdag po dang / /lA Da yul gyi bdag po dang / /ang+ga ma ga d+hA
rgyal po/ /mig gi nad kyis 'debs pa'am/ /bu rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/ /de rnams 'chi bas nyer 'jigs 'gyur/ /dgra rnams sdang ba'i sems ldan pa'i/ /tshogs kyang de tshe 'byung bar

'gyur/ /mgo dang lag dang nab so dang / /de bzhin rgyal dang skag nyid dang / /nyi ma zla ba 'di dag la/ /sgra gcan gyis zin snang gyur na/ /ma ga d+hA rgyal gnod 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin yul mi dag la'ang gnod/ /

blon po nad 'jigs shes par bya/ /'ching dang nyon mongs grong khyer 'gyur/ /lha mtshams dang ni na dag la/ /sgra gcan gyis zin kun la snang / /de tshe nad rnams kun tu 'gro/ /yul mi kun la'ang nad rnams 'byung / /

gsod dang 'ching dang nyon mongs dang / /gnod pa rnam pa du ma 'byung / /'ching dang gzhan gyi dmag tshogs ni/ /skye bo'i gtso la de dag skye/ /chu stod dang ni gro bzhin dang / /de bzhin chu smad kho na la/ /nyi ma'i dkyil

'khor dbus gnas dang / /zla ba la ni dmar bar snang / /gza' ni 'dzin par snang gyur pa/ /rtag tu mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gro bzhin mon gre'i rgyu skar dang / /de bzhin du ni khrums stod dang / /gang tshe mon grub

dag la ni/ /gal te nyi zla gzas zin te/ /gza' ni byung bar shes gyur na/ /kha dog nag pa la brten nas/ /mya ngan chen po nyon mongs dang / /mu ge kun tu 'byung bar ni/ /yul mi kun la 'byung ba dang / /rgyal

po rkun ma'i 'jigs chen 'byung / /nam gru rgyu skar nyid dang ni/ /gang tshe khrums smad dag la ni/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /shar nas sgra gcan 'dzin pa na/ /nub phyogs nas ni nyi ma 'dzin/ /ma ga
d+hAr ni mi yi bdag /sems can rgyal po'i thabs nyams par/ /zla phyed gcig gis snang bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu sgra gcan 'gro ba yi/ /mtshan ma 'di dag bstan pa yin/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
gyis/ /phyogs ni gang nas zin gyur pa/ /de dang de yi phyogs dag tu/ /dge dang mi dge 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gang nyid sa steng 'gul ba ni/ /'jig rten mtshan mas bstan pa dag /dge dang mi dge
de dang der/ /de bzhin gzas zin shes par bya/ /khug rna ser ba mjug rings ni/ /nyi ma lnga yi bar du yod/ /de 'og 'jig rten sems las 'byung / /ngogs la spyod cing gnas pa yi/ /yul mi

thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing / /nad kyi gzhi ni 'byung ba yin/ /byang phyogs gang gA'i 'gram gyi ni/ /rgyal po dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ /de bzhin kha ba can gyi dbus/ /bgrod dka' khrad khrod la gnas dang / /

sa yi bdag po la gnas dang / /kho ra yug na rtse rje dang / /byang phyogs gang gA'i 'gram dag na/ /de tshe 'gram spyod bdag po dag /mya ngan gdung ba du ma yis/ /skye bo'i bdag po de 'ching 'gyur/ /rgyu skar
gang la sa 'gul ba/ /de la khug rna yang dag bstan/ /phyogs rnams ma lus khug rna ni/ /mi bzad 'od ni spangs pa dang / /nyin zhag lnga yi bar du yang / /rtag tu nyin zhag mang por ni/ /phan tshun
chos ni mi mthong dang / /mi yi spyod yul mthong ba min/ /mi rnams dag ni phan tshun du/ /der ni mthong bar 'gyur ma yin/ /der ni 'jig chen 'byung bar shes/ /rgyal po yul 'khor bcas te
'jig /skar mda' 'khor yug dag tu ni/ /gang dag las kyis byung gyur pa/ /phyogs kyi mthar ni rab snang ba/ /gnyis dang gsum ni mi bzad yin/ /mtshan mo dbang po'i gzhu nyid dang / /

bya rog gal te 'dab ma dkar/ /dkar ba'am yang na kha dog nag /yang na dkar dang nag par mthong / /phyin log 'dab chags kha dog dang / /phyin ci log gi dus sgra dang / /phyin ci log gi bya rnams yod/ /
gang du der ni 'jigs chen 'byung / /rkang gnyis rkang pa bzhi nyid dang / /rkang med dang ni rkang mang dang / /'dab chags dud 'gro srog chags rnams/ /phyin ci log 'gyur 'jigs chen byung / /

khyi ni gyen du gdong bltas te/ /yang dang yang du zugs gyur pa/ /nyin par ram ni mtshan mo ru/ /gang du der ni 'jigs chen 'byung / /de ltar rnam pa du ma dang / /rnam mang gang du rab brtags pa/ /der
ni char mi 'bab par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i tshogs kyang rnam par 'jig /ji ltar skye ba'i skar ma ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i srog chags yin/ /de bzhin mtshan ma gang skyes pa/ /dge dang mi dge byed
pa yin/ /sngon gyi rgyu ni ma yin pa/ /rgyu mtshan cung zad mi mthong ste/ /rgyu med rab tu 'jug byed pa'i/ /bgegs 'byung ba ni yod ma yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub
sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ skar ma'i dpyad kyi rgyu mtshan shes pa'i le'u rab 'byam las bcwa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas
bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gza' dang rgyu skar dang skar ma dang skar mkhan gyi tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye kye gza' dang rgyu skar kyi tshogs rnams khyed cag thams cad

nyon cig /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig /sngags dang / rgyud dang / dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga rnams dang / bzlas pa dang / nges par

sdom pa dang / rig pa sgrub pa la 'jug pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi cho ga dang / rgyu skar kyi spyod pa dang / rtsis mngon par shes pa rnams kyi cho ga'i rgyal po de la khyed cag rnams kyis der bgegs ma byed
cig /bstan pa la rab tu zhugs pa rnams la lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de la srung bgyis shig /sems can ma rungs pa thams cad kyang dgag par gyis shig /bstan par gyis shig /thams
cad kyi thams cad du gsod par ma byed cig /stobs bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi bstan pa la rnam par gzhag par gyis shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rungs
pa thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms
par zhugs ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na bzhugs
pa la rnam par blta ba'i phyir nye bar lhags par gyur to/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas nye bar lhags pa rang rang gi byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bos te/ gsungs
shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che/ /'jig rten rnams la'ang phan pa'i phyir/ /sngags rgyud cho ga ji lta bar/ /sngags rnams kun la rab 'jug phyir/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /sangs

rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi/ /gtso mchog yi ge gcig pa ni/ /dus nyams rtsod pa'i dus dag tu/ /sngags rnams kun gyi rab mchog ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin/ /gtsug tor rgyal po stobs po che/ /

'byung po kun ni zlog par byed/ /gza' dang rgyu skar ma mo rnams/ /ma rungs sems ldan 'gog par byed/ /'jig rten bgegs rnams ji snyed dang / /de bzhin gzhan yang gdug sems ldan/ /sems can rnams ni rjes gzung dang / /zlos pa

rnams ni bde bya'i phyir/ /bstan pa 'di la cho ga mchog /stobs chen 'khor los sgyur ba yin/ /gtsug tor rgyal po mthu bo che/ /kun la dbang phyug dam pa ni/ /gang gi dus ni 'di yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa khyod kyis gsungs/ /de skad gsungs nas sangs rgyas rnams/ /mi gsung bar ni bzhugs par gyur/ /de nas sangs rgyas 'dus pa de rnams kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems

can thams cad snod kyi 'jig rten rnams gcig tu 'bar bar gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can gcig la yang gnod par ma gyur te/ snang ba chen po yang dag par snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang de na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang nyan thos dang rang sangs

rgyas thams cad dang bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor chen po 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgongs su gsol/
yi ge gcig pa 'di ni rig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gong nas gong du gnas pa bstan pa thogs pa med pa/ dpag tu med pa'i stobs dang pha rol gnon pa/

bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i cho ga yang ngas bshad par bya'o/ /bstan pa nub pa'i dus su rtsod pa'i dus 'di la bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba de bstan pa 'di la

srung ba gcig pur 'gyur zhing dus thams cad du grub par yang 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod la 'di nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin te/ bstan pa'i don byed par 'gyur ro/ /
yi ge gcig po 'di la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dus par 'gyur ro/ /kye lha'i tshogs dang sems can thams cad nyon cig /b+h+rUM/ bcom ldan 'di ni thams cad
mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas sngags gzugs rnam par gnas/ /ston pa thugs rje che dang ldan/ /sems can kun la rnam par spyod/ /sngags rnams bdag po dpal dang ldan/ /gtsug tor las byung bstan pa
yin/ /snying rje dbang la brten nas ni/ /'di ni yi ge gcig tu gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings la brten nas ni/ /'di ni sna tshogs gzugs la gnas/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas sku rnams ni/ /skye bo rnams la sku gdung

gyur/ /'jig rten gyis mchod zang zing bcas/ /zang zing med pa'ang khyad par du/ /dam chos sku gdung dag tu bstan/ /'jig rten zang zing med pa'i rgyu/ /sku ni zang zing bcas par gsungs/ /thub pa'i zla ba
zag pa med/ /zang zing bcas dang zang zing med/ /'jig rten rgyur ni gsungs pa yin/ /chos kyi dbyings la brten nas ni/ /thugs rje'i dbang gis sems can la/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa/ /
sngags kyi tshul gyis bzhugs pa yin/ /sna tshogs gzugs can thams cad mkhyen/ /sa steng 'di la snang ba yin/ /sems can rnams kyis sngags sgrub pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs
pa yin/ /sngags 'di yongs su mdor bsdu na/ /rang gis cho gas 'dir bzlas na/ /sngags rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /rtag tu 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur/ /'di yi cho ga mdor bsdus nas/ /
dus su yang ni bshad par bya/ /dus mthar thub mchog 'jig rten du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nub pa na/ /de yi dus su cho ga 'grub/ /sngags 'grub par ni gsungs pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor
los sgyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi las kyis sbyor ba rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba/ sngags thams cad kyi bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis

don du gnyer ba gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i cho ga yi ge gcig pa sngar rgya cher bstan nas/ yang mdor na re zhig dang po bzlas pas gang du gnas pa las/ dpag tshad lnga'i nang nas ma rungs pa'i gdon
thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /grub pa thams cad kyang nus pa med par 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyi nus pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa po'i 'dod pa ma gtogs par lha thams cad kyang gnas
par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa po gzhan rnams kyis grub pa 'phrog par byed cing / gzhan gyi sbyor bas gsang sngags bcad pa dang bcom pa dang phur bus btab pa'ang
thar bar byed do/ /bdag gis gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par 'dod na/ rtswa ku sha sngon po chang pa gang blangs la/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas mtshon gyis bcad na/ rig pa

gang gi phyir dmigs te bcad pa de gcod par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs brnyan byas te 'dis seng ldeng gi phur pas snying la btab na gnad la bab par 'gyur ro/ /le brgan du btsos pa'i skud pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas

te/ mdud pa bor na bcing bar 'gyur ro/ /kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te kha bkab pa byas na rengs par 'gyur ro/ /mtshon chas snying dum bu gnyis su byas na gnyis su gas par 'gyur ro/ /ske tshe

la dug dang khrag gis btags pas bsku ba byas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas kun tu brdeg na gnod par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi rig pa thams cad la mngon spyod bya ba ni ci dgar byar rung ngo / /sngar gsungs pa'i las

thams cad la 'o mas khrus byas nas sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing nyams rtas pa byas par yang 'gyur ro/ /khu tshur bcings pas sngags thams cad rengs

par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis ni dgrol bar bsams pas bkrol bar 'gyur ro/ /sngags sgrub par 'dod pas kyang 'di nyid kyis bcing ba byas te bsgrub par bya'o/ /cho ga gang sgrub par 'dod pas kyang de nyid 'dis bsgrub par bya'o/ /

sngags sgrub pa dang 'di nyid kyi sngags kyis spyan drang ba bya ba dang yang slar gshegs su gsol ba bya ba yin no/ /gang 'di nyid kyis srung bar byed pa thub par dka' bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis sngags 'di ma grub bam lan ma thob na 'di nyid dang

lhan cig tu bzlas brjod byas na/ myur du 'grub bam lan thob cing / gal te ma grub bam lan ma byin na de ring por mi thogs pa nyid du 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /sngags gang la dmigs te zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis til la

btags te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg dus gsum du zhag bdun byas pa de 'di'i dbang du 'gyur zhing / gang brjod pa de'i las byed par 'gyur ba'am lan thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha dbang du bya bar 'dod na thang shing gi yam

shing gi brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ /klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na mngar gsum gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dri za dang dri za mo thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na shing mya ngan med pa dang pri yang

ku'i yam shing ngam me tog gi sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin mo dang klu mo'i gdon rnams la ni ske tshes bya'o/ /rgyal po rnams la ni yungs dkar gyi bya'o/ /bram ze rnams la ni me tog gi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /

rje'u rigs la ni zho dang 'o ma dang mar gyi bya'o/ /dmangs rigs la ni phub ma'i rdul gyi bya'o/ /bud med la ni lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /gdol pa la ni mon sran gre'u dang dzam bu li ka'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /bu mo gzhon nu ma la ni 'bras
yos kyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la ni mar dang til gyi sbyin sreg byas na dbang du byed do/ /thams cad du yang dus gsum du zhag bdun du bya'o zhes gsungs nas/ rgyal ba'i mchog cang mi
gsung bar gyur to/ /thub mchog bdun pas sngags 'di ni/ /de tshe lha yi tshogs la gsungs/ /'jig rten chos shes grol ba dang / /de tshe de ni chags bral zlos/ /de tshe thub pa mchog gis ni/ /sangs
rgyas sras po thu bo lha/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /'jam dpal la ni de tshe gsung / /lha yi lha ni blo ldan pa/ /mgon po 'khor lo'i bdag po yi/ /cho ga 'di ni rgya che bas/ /gang
gi bskal pa'i tshad du yang / /rgyal bas kyang ni bshad mi nus/ /mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir/ /cho ga yi ni phyogs gcig tsam/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin/ /de tshe de skad gsungs nas ni/ /
dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs rdzu 'phrul che/ /gtsang ma'i gnas kyi steng bzhugs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas de la skul bar byed/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /

dus mtha' 'jigs pa'i dus su ni/ /mi rnams bde ba skyed pa'i phyir/ /mthu chen sngags kyi rgyal po ste/ /gzi brjid chen po 'di yis ni/ /ras ris ji ltar grub par 'gyur/ /myur du ras ris 'grub par gsungs/ /

'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ yi ge gcig pa 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung ba'i le'u rab 'byam las ba cu dgu pa
rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon cig /mdor na yi ge gcig pa 'khor

los sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur ba rgya che ba ni sngar bstan to/ /de ni dus kyi tha ma'i dus su sems can rnams brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur zhing / shes rab chung ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dman pa

'i phyir ras ris kyi tshad rgya che ba'i sbyor ba sgrub pa nyams par 'gyur bas/ sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pas zlos pa pos ji ltar dngos grub mchog thob par 'gyur ba de ltar ngas mdor bshad par bya ste/

sgrub pa mchog byed par 'dod pas ras ma nyams pa kha tshar ma bcad pa skra dang bral ba dag la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor
ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi bdag po skyes bu dam pa rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i mchog chos 'chad pa kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang

ldan pa'o/ /'og tu ni tshangs pa dang 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje/ steng du ni phreng ba 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu gnyis 'og tu sgrub pa po de'i mdun du dus gsum du a ga ru sreg cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas las

su bya ba ni dang po 'khor lo'i sgrub pa byed par 'dod na/ lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin las rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo byas te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du a ga ru'i dud

pas bdug cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o/ /tha mar zla ba nya ba la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lag pas bzung ste/ ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de bzung na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los

sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis mthong ba de dang lhan cig nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gdugs bsgrub par 'dod na/ gdugs kha dog sna tshogs pa sar pa byas la gser gyi 'khor los mtshan pa ka shi ka'i gos 'phyang

ba/ de nyid kyi cho gas mgo la gdugs bzung bar byas te/ bzlas pa byas na rig pa rang nyid nye bar bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /'di nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du a ga ru'i dud pas bdugs te/ 'bum phrag

bcu bzlas pa byas la/ tha mar zla ba nya ba la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lag pas bzung ste/ ji srid du rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de thogs na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba re re zhing zla ba

nya ba dang cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed lnga'i bar gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'di grub pa tsam gyis chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad mngon par dgyes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rjes su bsngags pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi 'khor los sgyur ba stong gi g.yog 'khor

dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba bsgrub par 'dod na/ gser dang / dngul dang / zangs ma dang / nor bu'i rang bzhin gyi dbyug pa khru gang tsam byas la ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa byas

nas de blang na nam mkha' la 'gro ste/ thams cad la chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bum pa bzang po bsgrub par 'dod na/ gser gyi bum pa bzang po byas la 'bru thams cad dang rin po

che dang sman gyis yongs su bkang la/ ras dkar pos bcings te de la sngags 'dis bsgrub par bya ste/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed gcig la brtsams na gnyis pa la 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de la lag pa rab tu bcug na ni

'dod pa de thob cing mi zad par yang 'gyur ro/ /ji ste nor bu rin po che bsgrub par 'dod na gser gyi dbyug pa'am/ nor bu bzang po dang shel gyi nor bu byas te/ gos 'phyang bar byas la cho ga 'di nyid kyis bsgrubs na

gang bsams pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i nang du thogs pa med cing stobs dang pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bcom ldan 'das la bzlas pa bye ba byas na rang gi lus kyis nam mkha' la
'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i lus thob cing bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gang yang gtsug tor gyi rgyal po gdugs dkar po la sogs pa de yang 'dis bcom ldan 'das la 'bum phrag bcu bzlas

pa byas na las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar thogs pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi rtog pa'i cho gas ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /

bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bum phrag bcu bzlas na/ thams cad la 'grub par 'gyur ba rig pa dang sngags thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod

na tsan+dan dmar po la rdo rje rtse gcig pa'am yang na lcags bzang po las byas te/ ba'i rnam lngas bkrus la yar gyi ngo'i bcwa lnga la ras ris kyi mdun du mchod pa chen po bya zhing mar gyi mar me brgya sbar
la dri'i chus rdo rje bkrus te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid phul nas/ gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i 'khor ram gzi brjid phung po'am/ gtsug tor gdugs dkar po'i

sngags 'dis bsrung ba byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du grogs la yang bsrung ba byas nas rdo rje lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ thun dang po 'das shing thun gnyis pa la nye bar 'dug ste/ sems rtse gcig pas ji srid

rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /skabs 'dir rig pa 'dzin pa lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin thams cad 'dus te/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag rig pa 'dzin pa'i bstod pa byed cing khyim du 'gro bar

'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /lus phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra zhing phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar mgyogs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro/ /skad cig gis 'og min gyi lha'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /

bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa byams pa mthong zhing chos nyan par 'gyur ro/ /shi nas gang du 'dod pa der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du yang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /

ci ste ral gri bsgrub par 'dod na skyon med pa'i ral gri blangs nas nyin zhag gcig smyung bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas ji srid du rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de grub na

g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /skra rna cha gdub kor dang 'dra bar 'khyil ba dang / lo bcu drug pa'i cha byad can dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs med cing / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis

mi tshugs pa dang bar gyi bskal par 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste ldong ros bsgrub par 'dod na dpa' bo'i tshong gis nyos te/ rgyal dang ldan pa'i dus su zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/ dge slong bzang po'i dge
'dun la bshos drangs nas bka' lung stsal par bskul lo/ /sgrub pa po la der rjes su gnang nas rang gi gnas su rab tu zhugs te/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas mar gyi mar me stong rab tu sbar nas zhag

gsum smyung ba byas la/ sems can thams cad la byams pa bskyed nas bdag nyid phul te ldong ros blangs nas/ ji srid grub pa rnam gsum thob pa de srid du bzlas pa byas te/ dro ba dang du ba 'thul ba dang 'bar

bas sngar gang bsams pa nyid du grub par 'gyur te/ dro bar gyur pas dpral bar thig le byas na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / sha za la sogs pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can bran du 'gyur zhing gang cung

zad thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/ /lo stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /du ba 'thul ba la ni dpral bar thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'dod na lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /skad cig thang cig yud tsam la

snang zhing yang mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mi snang ba thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhing lo sum stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'bar bas ni rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa

'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ lha gzhon nu'i lus su 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyis kyang mi thul bar 'gyur na/ rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bskal par yang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /dus byas nas dga'

ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste mdung rtse gsum bsgrub par 'dod na lcags bzang po las byas pa'i mdung rtse gsum pa byas te/ lo'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas bye ma'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten khru gang

tsam gyi tshad byas te/ /de la mchod pa chen po bya zhing gtor ma rgya chen po btang la lag pa g.yas pas mdung rtse gsum pa blangs la skyil mo krung bcas nas ji srid du spros pa na/ 'od zer stong byung ba de'i bar du bzlas pa

byas na skabs 'dir dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang lha thams cad kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas

de thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas/ gang dag gis mthong ba dang gang mthong ba de dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mig gsum par 'gyur te/ dbang phyug chen po gnyis pa
dang 'dra ba'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis phyag byas shing / bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur la/ bltas pa tsam gyis gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang bcas pa'i

'jig rten gang gis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur na/ rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shi 'phos nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste ro langs bsgrub par 'dod na/ yan lag rma med pa'i skyes

bu'i ro blangs te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhis btab la brang gi steng du rin po che'i phye mas gtor cing mchod na/ de'i lce'i rtse mo la nor bu rin po che snang bar 'gyur te/ de blangs na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar

'gyur ro/ /mtshon gang dag yid la bsams pa tsam gyis de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'od dpag tshad brgya tsam du snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod na dus byed par yang 'gyur ro/ /gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig

rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu yang rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar yang 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas kyang dri ma med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ro langs gnyis pa sgrub pa ni rma med pa'i lus

kyi ro blangs la/ rgya shug gi shing gi phur bus btab la de'i khar lcags kyi phye mas gtor zhing byin na/ de'i lce 'byin par 'gyur te/ de bcad na g.yog 'khor brgya dang bcas te nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ bar gyi

bskal par gnas par 'gyur/ ri rab kyi rtse mor rtse zhing dga' bar 'gyur/ gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe phyogs gcig gi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /ji ste lcags kyu bsgrub par 'dod na/ rtswa ku sha'i rang bzhin gyi lcags kyu

bya ste/ thab mo ba mdog nag po'i lag pa'i mthil gyis ba'i rnam lngas bkrus te/ mtshan mo gcig smyung ba byas nas lcags kyu khru gang gi tshad du byas la/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas phyag na rdo rje la mar gyi mar

me brgya sbar bar bya'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dang bdag nyid la gdugs dkar pos bsrung bar bya'o/ /gzi brjid phung pos ni dkyil 'khor bcing bar bya'o/ /phur bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te/ phyogs

bzhir gtor la phur bus btab na 'og tu bcing ba byas shing gnas yongs su gzung ba byas par yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas thun gnyis pa la rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis skyil mo krung bcas la/ lcags kyu la me tog dang
dri dang bdug pas mchod na de bsrung ba byas pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas/ skabs 'dir lcags kyu lag pas bzung nas ji srid du dmyal ba'i
sems can rnams 'tshe ba nye bar zhi ba'i bar du bzlas la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po
'gro ba la thogs pa med pa lcags kyu lag na thogs pa lha thams cad dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa yang thag ring po nyid nas mthong na phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /

gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe phyag na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro zhing phyag na rdo rje mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te ras ris sgrub par gyur na/ de 'bar ba na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ cho ga gang bsgrub par

'dod kyang de'i sngags kyi ming bzung la 'bum bzla zhing / de nas nub gcig smyung ba byas te/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ shing arka'i me rab tu sbar te til dag la zho dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong

rtsa brgyad byas na/ sbyin sreg gi mthar 'ongs nas nor gang 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur zhing mngag gzhug pa dbang du byed pa bzhin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste dbang phyug chen po dbang du byed par 'dod na/ dbang phyug chen po la

mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ lho phyogs su yud tsam gyis shing arka'i me rab tu sbar la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas pa na/ ha ha zhes pa'i sgra byung bar gyur na 'jigs par mi bya/ de nas de 'ong bar 'gyur te/ bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smra
bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po'i rig pa thams cad bdag la grub par gyur cig ces smras pa dang / mchog gang 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du gyur cig ces byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /

de bzhin du khyab 'jug dang tshangs pa la sogs pa gang yang 'gugs par 'gyur te/ mchog gang 'dod pa de'ang 'di bzhin te/ cho ga 'di bzhin du byas la legs par bsrung ba yang bya'o/ /ci ste gnod sbyin mo dgug par 'dod na/

de'i ming bzung la zhag bdun du shing mya ngan med kyi me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na 'ong zhing mchog ster bar byed do/ /zhag bdun gyis ma dang sring mo dang chung ma gang 'dod pa de'i cha byad du nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /

ji ste mi 'ong na mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /klu mo dbang du byed par 'dod na klu shing gi me tog gis cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o/ /srin mo dgug par 'dod na/ zla ba gsum du zho dang 'bras chan gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /

sbyin sreg gi mthar zhag gcig smyung ba byas la/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing gnod sbyin la gtor ma chan rnams sbyin par byas shing gnod sbyin dgug par bya'o zhes yid la byed cing / /a mra'i shing gi yam shing

zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ skabs 'dir lus ngan po la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin 'ong bar 'gyur la/ de dag la shing arka'i me tog gi mchod yon byin na de dag ci zhig

bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ /des brjod par bya ba ni nyin re zhing gnod sbyin lung bzhin du byed pa dgos so zhes brjod par bya ste/ des gnod sbyin re re ster bar 'gyur ro/ /des lung bsgo bar bya ba ni dpag tshad brgya nas bud med rnams 'dir

'ong bar gyis la tho rangs de nyid du khyer cig ces pa dang 'khor brgya la yang 'bras chan byin cig ces brjod na/ rgyab tu khur nas gang du 'dod pa der 'gro zhing khyer bar 'gyur ro/ /lung stsal ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste phyag na rdo rje

bsgrub par 'dod na bzhi 'gyur dang bdun 'gyur gyi sngon du bsnyen pa byas la/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed po ma lus pa la rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas la ji srid zla ba nya ba'i bar du ste/ zla ba nya ba'i bar du mchod pa byas la

dge slong gi dge 'dun khyad par can dag la bshos gsol nas/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin kho na la rjes su yi rang bar byed du gzhug go/ de nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas dang po'i thun 'das te gnyis pa'i thun la skyil mo krung

bcas te 'dug la/ sems rtse gcig pas rdo rje 'dzin blta bar bya'o/ /zhes sems la kun tu brtags te/ gu gul gyi ril bu rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam gyi mtshan mo thun gcig tu sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das kyi yul bskyod par 'gyur zhing / sa 'gul ba dang sprin gyi sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rig pa thams cad

kyis yongs su bskor ba dang rig pa mchog la sogs pa'i rig pa'i rgyal pos yongs su bskor ba byon par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad dang / klu thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang / dri za dang mi'am cis byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bskor ba byon

par 'gyur ro/ /de'i mod la dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi shin tu drag pa'i tshor ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dri'i chus mchod yon dbul zhing phyag 'tshal te 'dug par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs

pa ni mchog ci zhig sbyin par bya/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dam sa 'og tu 'gro ba'am rgyal srid dam mi snang bar 'gro ba'am gang 'dod pa de nyid bcom ldan 'das las thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin

pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rdo rje'i sku dang / phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba dang bsams pa tsam gyis mtshan ma thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe 'dzin pa de'i tshe rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /

rig pa 'dzin pa gzhan dag gi yang cho ga 'di bzhin te/ mdor na phyag na rdo rje'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi cho ga gang yin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i cho ga gang yin pa

dang / tshangs pa'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag kyang 'di nyid kyis sgrub pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sngags gang

gis sgrub pa byas kyang ma grub pa ni 'dis lus la bzlas pa byas na/ nub bdun gyis nges par mthong ba sbyin par byed do/ /ji ste mi sbyin na ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i mdun du

gal te zlos pa byed na nub bdun gyi nang du mthong ba sbyin par byed do/ /gal te sbyin par mi byed na mgo tshal pa bdun phrag gsum du 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa na mar dang shu dag dang mig sman dang dag

byed dang so shing dang mchod phyir thogs dang ba bla dang ldong ros la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /ji ste rdzas rnams bsgrub par 'dod na/ ldong ros blangs te mi'i 'o ma dang sbyar ba byas la ril bu lngar bya zhing / a ga ru'i snod kha

sbyar gyi nang du bcug cing yungs kar dang lhan cig bsgrub par bya'o/ /zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su gtor ma'i cho ga byas te/ gang gi tshe yungs kar tsi ti tsi ti zhes sgra 'don pa de'i tshe grub pa dang po yin te/

skye bo thams cad dbang du 'gyur la de'i tshe 'di thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur te/ gang smras pa de thams cad byed do/ /ji ste du ba 'thul bar byed na mi snang bar byed pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /bar gyi

bskal par 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe 'bar bar gyur pa de'i tshe ni lha gzhon nu'i gzugs su 'gyur zhing / nyi ma 'char ka'i gzi brjid dang ldan la rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ bskal pa chen por

'tsho bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du gi wang dang ba bla la sogs pa la'ang bsgrub par bya'o/ /ci ste mig sman bsgrub par 'dod na/ lig bu mig dang ut+pa la sngon po dang ru rta dang tsan+dan dag gcig tu byas te/ zangs ma'i snod du

gzhag la zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su ci srid du ba 'thul ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ ci ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs dang mi snang bar byed pa thams cad kyi rgyal

por 'gyur ro/ /ji ste ral gri bsgrub par 'dod na ral gri ma nyams pa blangs la/ mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po dang gtor ma btang zhing bsrung ba byas na/ ral gri lag pa g.yas pas

bzung ste/ ji srid 'od 'phro ba dang 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ gal te 'od 'phro na ni rig pa 'dzin pa gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /'bar bas ni de rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / stobs dang

pha rol gnon pa thogs pa med pa dang gang gis mthong ba dang gang mthong ba de dang lhan cig nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod na lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin las rdo rje byas te/ sor bcu

drug pa rtse mo gnyi ga yang rtse gsum pa tsan+dan dmar pos byugs la/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed kyi tshes nas brtsams nas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te bzlas pa bya zhing / tshes nas nyi ma re re zhing re res

bskyed pa'i dge slong dag la bshos drang bar bya'o/ /tha mar nub gsum smyung ba byas la sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du ras ris rab tu bzhag cing / mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ mar gyi mar

me brgya rab tu sbar zhing ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug par bya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje bzung la ji srid 'bar ba de'i bar du bzlas pa bya zhing / de bzung na de 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/

rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar pha rol gnon par 'gyur/ bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur/ lus zhig nas phyag na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mdung

rtse dang 'khor lo dang mda' dang mdung la sogs pa mtshon thams cad dang mchil lham dang so shing dang mchod phyir thogs la sogs pa gzhan gyi cho ga'i bya bas bsgrub par bya zhing / thams cad kyang grub pa rnam pa gsum

yin no/ /zhi ba byed par 'dod pa la pad ma'i rnam pa 'dra ba'i thab khung byas la/ mchod sbyin la 'os pa'i yan lag gis me rab tu sbar la blugs gzar gyis zas mchog dang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin

sreg stong rtsa brgyad zhag gsum byas na/ bdag dang gzhan zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun gyis ni grong ngam grong khyer gyi 'chi ba mang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /shing sha ma'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi

dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyang bya'o/ /yang na shing u dum bA ra'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyang bya'o/ /char mi 'bab pa la ni mngar

gsum gyi sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du mchog tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /slong mo'i zas za zhing cho 'phrul chen po'i zla phyed kyi zla ba nya'i bar du nub gsum smyung ba byas la/ zla ba gzas zin pa na ba nag mo'i 'o ma

la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te 'thungs na bcud kyis len gyi yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rtswa dUr ba'i 'jag ma la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pas stong rtsa brgyad nub bcu'i bar du sbyin sreg byas na dus

ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu zhi zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal mtshan dang dung la sogs pa la mngon par bsngags na/ mthong ba dang thos pas pha rol gyi sde dpung gis mi g.yo bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /bum pa sar pa 'bru thams

cad dang spos chus bkang ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pas log 'dren gyis gtses shing zin pa bkrus te dbang bskur na dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'dis dbang bskur na sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur

te/ dkyil 'khor gyi las dang gdon gyi las rnams kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /rma bya'i mjug ma la lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na dug thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyis rims dang mig gi nad dang gzer thabs

la sogs pa sel bar byed do/ /srung ba'i skud pas ni nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags kyis seng ldeng gi yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg

stong rtsa brgyad byas na lha ma yin gyi sngags 'joms par byed do/ /dus gsum du nyin mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig la 'bras thug po che la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na longs spyod thob par

'gyur ro/ /lha dbang du bya bar 'dod na a ga ru'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg dus gsum du nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /'bras thug po che la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis

btags pa gcig tu byas pas sbyin sreg byas na zas mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dbang du byed na gu gul gyi ril bu la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /shing mya ngan

med kyi yam shing gi ni gnod sbyin mo rnams la bya'o/ /klu rnams la ni klu shing gi me tog gis bya'o/ /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje la ni a ka ru'i yam shing gis bya'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa la ni po son cha'i shing gi yam shing gis

so/ /a ga ru'i yam shing la tu ru ska'i 'bru mar gyis btags pas ni dri za la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yi dags rnams la ni bil ba'i shing gi yam shing gis so/ /mi'am ci rnams la ni sra rtsi pog gi sbyin sreg gis so/ /

log 'dren thams cad la ni zhag bdun du sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /rgyal po'i bu la ni yungs kar til mar gyis btags pa dus gsum du zhag bdun la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing / nyi ma la

mngon du phyogs nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas na sdig pa thams cad las rab tu grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa thams cad tshim par byed par 'dod na ba gcin dang nas kyi kha zas za zhing rtswa u shi ra las gzugs brnyan

byas te/ me tog dkar pos mchod cing 'o ma brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas nas 'o mas khrus byas te/ bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing a ga ru'i dud pas bdugs na tshim zhing rgyas par byas par 'gyur ro/ /
lan gcig bzlas pas bdag bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /lan gnyis bzlas pas gzhan bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum bzlas pa byas pas rdzas bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /lus chad pa dang zhom

pa dang dug gis reg pa dang phur bus btab pa rnams la rtas par byed par 'dod na sman u shi ra las gzugs brnyan du byas te/ me tog dkar pos mchod la 'dis gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i ras ris kyi mdun du yungs kar

gyi rgyal po la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na rig pa nye bar dmigs nas phur bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du bzlas kyang rig pa 'bras bu med par shes na gi wang gis gro

ga la bris te/ gro ga de la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dang lhan cig stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ ku sha'i stan de nyid du

gnyid log na rmi lam du 'ongs te 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu ston par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste me tog pad ma bsgrub par 'dod na/ tsan+dan dmar po las pad ma byas te/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas zhag gsum smyung

ba byas te/ pad ma lag pa g.yas pas bzung la ji srid 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ g.yog 'khor nyi shu dang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ thogs

pa med par 'gro bar 'gyur/ gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod na/ grog mkhar gyi sa dang bye ma bsres nas rdo rje byas la/ bslangs pa'i kha zas kyis 'tsho zhing mi smra ba'i

dka' thub dang lam 'gog par byed cing rdo rje bzung ste/ myur du bzlas pa 'bum bya'o/ /rdo rje ni rtse gcig par byas te/ rdo rje de yungs kar gyi nang du gzhag la/ yungs kar de ji srid du tsi ti tsi ti'i sgra sgrogs pa de srid du bzlas pa

byas na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje de blangs nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur te/ ri'i rtse mo yang phye mar byed la klu'i shing yang skem par byed cing chu bo yang rgyun phyogs las zlog par byed do/ /klu rnams 'byer bar

byed do/ /dug rnams dug med par byed do/ /srog chags thams cad rengs par byed do/ /rmongs par byed do/ /ltung bar byed do/ /sngags phye mar byed do/ /shing rta la sogs pa yang rengs par byed do/ /de la sogs pa'i las

thams cad byed par 'di nyid kyi rtse gsum pa'i rdo rjes sgrub par byed de/ gtsug spyod kyis kyang mngon sum du bgegs byed par mi nus so/ /'di'i cho gas rtag tu bzlas pa byed pa'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi sngags kyis

thog ma dang tha mar lan re re bzlas pa byed na/ de dag zhi ba nyid du 'gyur zhing grub pa yang mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pa'i chu bo la yi ge gcig pas pad ma 'bum dor na/ dpal

rang 'ongs nas mchog dang rgyal srid kyang sbyin par byed de/ ci ste 'bru gcig pa dang bcas pa'i pad ma 'bum phrag gsum dor na sa kun la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /lnga 'bum bzlas na 'dzam bu'i gling gi bdag por

'gyur ro/ /sa 'og tu 'jug pa'i sgor rkang pa bzhag ste/ 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom nas dogs pa med par 'gyur zhing / zhugs nas kyang bcud kyis len thams cad 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /

ji ste de nyid du 'dug na'ang khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'i 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste 'khor lo nang du byung na yang sngags dran pa tsam gyis thal bar 'gyur ro/ /bsams pa tsam gyis phyir gso bar yang nus so/ /nam yang phyis
rab tu 'jug par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /yar ngo de dang de'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog la lan gcig bzlas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo'i drung du gzhag pa byas

nas/ ci tsam na zhabs kyi mtho bo nas 'od zer byung nas/ sgrub pa po de'i lus la zhugs par 'gyur gyi bar du byas na/ de'i mod kho na la skra 'khyil zhing 'khor dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/ /'khor dang bcas pa nam

mkha' la 'gro zhing rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ro/ /bskal par yang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su ras ris nub phyogs su bstan te bzhag la klu shing gis me rab tu sbar nas/

rgya mtsho la dmigs nas klu shing gi me tog gis sbyin sreg 'bum byas na/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni grub pa'i mtshan ma yin pas 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /ji srid rgya mtsho las bram ze'i

gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smra ba na khyod nga'i dbang du gyis shig ces smra bar bya'o/ /de nas gang ci bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /sa la pad ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa bris te/ de'i
steng du 'dug nas brgya phrag stong bzlas pa byas na pad ma de sa las 'phags nas g.yog 'khor stong dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen por gnas pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal

por yang 'gyur ro/ /lam gcod par byed par yang mi nus so/ /'od dpag tshad lngar snang bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /cho 'phrul chen po'i zla ba phyed la sna ma'i me tog dang ldan pas re re zhing bzlas shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi

gtsug tor gyi steng du 'bum phrag gcig phul na/ ji srid gtsug tor nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sgrub pa po'i lus la zhugs kyi bar du byas na de'i mod kho na la mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ /'bum phrag

bcu bzlas pa byas na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba ste de lta de ltar las byed par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid dang lhan cig gal te rig pa zlo bar byed na de nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /mngon sum du bzlas na

yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'ong bar mi byed na de'i mgo 'gas pa'am skem par 'gyur ro/ /yi ge gcig pa 'di ni gzhan ci zhig yin te/ gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'di nyid mngon sum
yin te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na sngags dang rig pa thams cad kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do/ /gdugs dkar po dang gzi brjid phung po la sogs pa ni 'di'i g.yog 'khor yin te/ gtsug

tor gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang bsgrub par bya ba yin te/ cho ga thams cad 'di nyid la sbyar bar bya zhing / gtsug tor gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang 'di bsgrub par bya'o/ /cho ga thams cad kyis kyang 'di bsgrub

par bya'o/ /dngos grub dam pa 'dod pas kyang gnas ma yin par sbyar bar mi bya'o/ /gal te sbyor bar byed na grub pa dam par 'gyur ba ma yin zhing / mdor na lha thams cad kyang 'dis 'gugs par byed do/ /de nas gter

'byin par 'dod na gang du gter yod pa der song la/ rtsa ba mi gnag pa'i bum pa blangs nas dri zhim po thams cad kyi lde gus byugs te/ tsan+dan dkar po dang chu'i nang du bcug ste/ stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas

nas gal te gter yod na sa de rang bye bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te gter de mi gang tsam na yod na chus gtor la khru gang tsam brkos la blang bar bya'o/ /ci ste seng ge bsgrub par 'dod na grog mkhar gyi sa dang gi wang gi lde

gus bsres pa'i gong bu las byas nas bzhag ste/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas la ji srid 'gul ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur te 'gul ba na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rgyab tu zhon na rna cha gdub kor dang 'dra zhing

'khyil ba'i skra dang bdag dang bcas pa'i 'khor lnga bcu dang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa ji lta bar lo stong phrag dgur 'tsho bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du glang

po che dang ma he bsgrub par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe seng ge seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa de'i tshe lha rnams stan las sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /pad ma'i mtshor phyin nas pad ma 'bum gyis mchod na sa kun gyi rgyal thabs thob par

'gyur ro/ /shing ka ra bI ra'i me tog kha ma 'bus pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgyal po'i bu mo thob par 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog 'bum gyis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bo la sngags dang bcas pas gtor na/ gang

'dod pa'i bu mo thob par 'gyur zhing grub pa mchog thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba 'di'i sngags kyis ni de gang du 'ongs pa der dbang po yang de la stan stobs par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i

rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang ring po nas mthong na 'jigs pas dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi rgyal po thams cad du yang 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rgya cher bcom ldan 'das shAkya seng ge mi mchog gis gsungs pa yin no/ /

'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ yi ge gcig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i las kyi cho ga dang ras ris bstan pa'i le'u rab 'byam

las nyi shu pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ de na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas

dang / nyan thos dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal bstan pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor du gyur pa/ chos kyi mdzod 'jig rten pa rnams kyi bsam pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa byed pa

'i phyir nor bu rin po che lta bur gyur pa'o/ /dus kyi tha ma'i dus de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag stongs pa na dam pa'i chos kyi tshul nub pa'i dus tshod na/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi mdzod yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags dang rgyud rnams kyi cho ga'i rgyal po ni thun mong du gyur cing gter du gyur par 'gyur ba yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi bsams pa yongs su

rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa byas na thob pa yin no/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags dang rgyud rnams kyi 'di ni snying por gyur pa yin te/ gzhon nu khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po 'di ni

mchog tu gyur pa yin no/ /yi ge gcig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba 'di bzlas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gzhan yang khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po gter

du gyur pa/ snying por gyur pa/ mchog tu gyur pa/ gtso bor gyur pa/ yi ge gcig pa sngon byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'das pa'i dus dang 'das pa'i dus tshod du gang gA'i klung gi bye ma drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs

pa dang tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/

'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gis dran pa tsam mam mtshan 'dzin pas kyang mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyang

zad par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi mtshan thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can mang po nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur na sngags 'grub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sngags zlos pa thams cad kyis kyang nges par tshe dang ye shes

dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la dang por ngag gis kyang phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin du de nas 'od dpag med dang rin chen tog la phyag bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas

nas ci 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas pa byas na myur du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa dang phyag 'tshal bas ni bsod nams chen po 'phel ba'i

phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang phyag 'tshal bas ni nges par byang chub la gzhol ba dang dge ba'i tshogs 'di yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i grangs su 'gro zhing de'i sngags kyang myur du 'grub

pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yi ge gcig pa'i sngags 'di gsungs te/ de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sngags dang rgyud thams cad kyi mngon par 'dod pa/ sngags thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po mchog tu gtsang ba dang gtsang ba dam pa dang 'jig

rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /slob ma ma yin pa dang chos dang mi ldan pa dang de bzhin du ston pa dang bstan pa la ma dad pa dang gzhan gyis pham pa dang ma rungs pa dang nga rgyal can dang ston pa dang bstan pa la

nyes pa tshol ba la ni nam yang rab tu sbyar bar mi bya'o/ /rgyal ba'i sras la rab tu mi dang ba dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang mchod pa dang rjes su gzung ba mi bzod pa de la ni ngas sbyin par mi bya'o/ /de la

ni sngags grub pa mi snang ste/ dad cing zhi ba'i sems ldan dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dang / /byang chub sems la rtag tu ni/ /mchod dang rjes bzung de gtsor byed/ /de la sngags 'di 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /cho ga 'dir

ni yang dag bstan/ /sngags chen yi ge gcig pa ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis nges par sbyar/ /'jig rten mgon 'dis sngags 'di ni/ /re ba skyed byed stsol ba yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yin/ /sngags rnams ma lus 'byung
ba'i gnas/ /bdun cu rtsa drug bye ba ni/ /rang byung nyid kyis sngon gsungs pa/ /lus can sdig pas rmongs rnams la/ /sngags rnams dge ba'i don du yin/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams kun gyi sngags/ /ston pa'i
gzugs su yang dag gnas/ /de dag la 'di snying por 'gyur/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /yi ge gcig por rtag par gnas/ /ther zug tu yang 'di rab 'jug /'dir ni chos kyi mthar gnas te/ /'gro la

phan phyir sangs rgyas yin/ /chos kyi tshul la yang dag gnas/ /'di ni yi ge gcig pa yin/ /sngags ni don rnams ma lus sgrub/ /rgyal po ma rungs zlog byed yin/ /las ni sna tshogs byed pa yin/ /las kun ma lus sgrub pa'o/ /

las ni rtsa brgyad stong po rnams/ /nges par yang ni byed par 'gyur/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs ster/ /'jam dpal gyi ni snying po ni/ /yi ge ma dang yang dag ldan/ /yi ge u dang rtag 'gro zhes/ /
'jig rten na ni rtag 'jug 'gyur/ /tshe dang ye shes dpag med rgyal/ /dbang pos nges pa'i don du gsungs/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la sangs rgyas kyis/ /dbang gi don du 'di rab sbyin/ /des na dus mtha'i 'jig

rten 'dir/ /ston pa mya ngan 'das pa na/ /cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni/ /myur du grub par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /tshe ni dpag med ces bya bas/ /rnam par brtags par gyur pa yin/ /der ni bcom ldan sangs rgyas te/ /chos

kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa/ /dpag med bskal par gnas pa dang / /tshe la dbang bar byin gyis brlabs/ /de nyid phyir na de mtshan gyur/ /dpag med tshe dang ye shes nges/ /'jig rten kun gyi rgyal po'i dbang / /rdzu 'phrul

che 'di de bzhin gshegs/ /de ni sngags mchog gtso 'di byin/ /sangs rgyas sras po blo dang ldan/ /sras kyi gtso bo dam pa ni/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che/ /de nas sras po de nyid kyis/ /'di ni kun tu bzang

la sbyor/ /de nas sangs rgyas sras rnams la/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs dag gis/ /sngags rnams kyi ni mchog gyur pa/ /chos kyi rgyal pos gsungs pa ni/ /'byung po rnams la phan don du/ /sngags rnams ma lus

gsungs pa yin/ /tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshe

dpag tu med pa dang 'od dpag tu med pa dang rin chen tog la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum sngags bzla bar bya'o/ /yi ge gcig po de gang zhe na/ mu/ grogs

po dag 'di ni tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig

rten gyi khams su bzhugs te gsungs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo dag la gzigs nas bstan pa nub pa'i

dus tshod du mkhyen nas dus kyi tha ma la dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa'i ma rungs pa'i rgyal po bzlog pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sras kyi gtso bo mthu chen po thob pa'i byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sbyin pa'i phyir dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kun tu bzang po la byin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po des kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur

pa la byin no/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des kyang sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i dbang gis snying gi gnas su rang gi lus la bzhag go/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la bltos nas dus

kyi tha ma bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tha ma bdag gis kyang bstan te/ rtsod pa'i dus dang bstan pa 'jig pa'i dus su nga'i bstan pa yang dag par bsrung ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i cho

ga gzhan yang mdor bsdus nas brjod par bya ba ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs gzhon nu nyon cig /bdag nyid chen po'i cho ga rgya che ba 'di'i cho ga'i rgyal po'i dbang po brjod par bya ste/ dang por re zhig ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te/ 'bum

phrag sum cu bzlas pa byas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /'o mas 'tsho zhing mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs dang sngags gzhan la mi rten pa dang / gzhan la mi sems pa dang / skyabs gsum yongs su blangs pa dang / byang chub tu sems

bskyed pa dang / khrims lnga'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pas bzlas pa byas la des las rnams bya ba ste/ dang por re zhig ras la ri mo bya ba ni ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis

bri'o/ /gtsang ma'i ras kyi dum bu gang yang rung ba'am dar la tsan+dan dang ga pur dang gur gum gyi chus gtor la/ gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su gtsang ba'i ri mo byed pa dkar gsum za zhing gos dkar po gyon pas zla ba nya ba'i bcwa lnga

la nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su rnam par dag pa'i rgyu skar la nyi ma phyed pa'i bar du bri bar bya ste de nas bri ba spang bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du nyin re zhing yang yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du bya'o/ /dang por re zhig ras la tshe dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams

bri bar bya'o/ /ras khru gang tsam mam bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad dam/ ras khru bzhi pa la kho ra yug tu tshe dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bri'o/ /pad ma rA ga dang in+d+ra nI la dang shel dang rin po che margad kyi ras

ris kyi 'og gi phyogs su mdzes par bya'o/ /de dag gi steng gi phyogs su rin po che'i gzhal med khang mdzes pa'i rnam pa dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan mdzes pa'i rnam par bsgreng ba dang de'i dbus su tshe dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za

ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od kyi phreng ba rab tu 'bar ba/ kha dog cung zad dmar zhing dkar ba/ g.yon phyogs su mthing shing gi rdo la bzhugs pa byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob phyag g.yas na rnga yab thogs shing de bzhin gshegs pa la gtod pa'i lta ba dang lag pa g.yon na skyur rtsi chen po'i shing thog thogs pa/ me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo
sangs gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis lus brgyan pa/ kun nas khor yug tu 'od 'phro ba/ g.yas ngos su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na

rnga yab thogs shing g.yob pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na rin po che thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ me tog pri yang ku ltar cung zad dkar ba/ ras sngon po g.yo ba dang ldan pas

g.yogs pa/ mu tig gi phreng ba dang rin po ches mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ khor yug rab tu 'bar bas 'brel ba de'i g.yas ngos su 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i ri la gnas pa/ gzhon nur gyur pa zur phud lngas mgo legs par

mdzes par byas pa/ byis pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba/ dar sngon po g.yo ba can mnabs pa/ mu tig gi phreng ba dang rin po che 'dzin cing 'dres pa'i mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs par song

ba'i lta ba cung zad bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa gzugs mdzes pa/ thal mo sbyar ba rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rtags dang cha byad dang dbyibs 'dzin pa'i sgrub pa po me tog gi phreng

ba 'dzin cing / pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas yang dag par 'dug pa dang mgo mngon par btud pa ras ris kyi zur gyi mtha' ma'i phyogs su bri bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

bzhi bri bar bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis bri bar bya ba la/ sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang rin chen tog khor yug tu kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa/ g.yon phyogs su gser thub dang 'od srung

rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ me tog thams cad kyis gcal bkram pa/ pad ma'i gdan gnyis la bzhugs pa/ ha cang mi ring ba na chos 'chad cing skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/ bcom

ldan 'das kyi steng nas me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ sprin gyi nang nas ro stod byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nam mkha' la lding ba spyan mdzes zhes bya ba mngon par bri bar bya ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad kyi

mchog dang ldan pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ phyag g.yon pas chos gos kyi tha ma la 'dzin pa/ 'di ni tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon

mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ras ris cho ga bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyi mchog 'di yin te/ 'di ni gtsug tor gyi rgyal po

gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang rab tu 'gran pa/ brtson 'grus mtshungs pa/ stobs mtshungs pa 'di'i yon tan rgya che ba'i mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs che ba/ mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba yin no/ /yi ge gcig pa la cho ga rgya cher bstan pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang byed do/ /ma bsgrubs kyang bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang las rnams byed na bsgrubs pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/

ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang 'dod pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis gang mngon par 'dod pa de ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid

bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dbang pos byin gyis brlabs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po zhes brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug

tor gyi rgyal po zhes brjod do/ /'khor los sgyur ba zhes brjod do/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po zhes brjod do/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po zhes brjod do/ /yi ge gcig pa zhes brjod do/ /

mdor na 'di'i mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ gang gi phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sgrub pa med pa dang

sngon du spyod pa ma byas pa dang khyim gyi rtsom pa thams cad la rab tu gnas pa dang bza' ba thams cad sha dang chang dang grong gi chos la rab tu zhugs pa dag la yang 'grub ste/ dad pa med pa dang byang chub tu
