zhing ni gang gA'i klung / /bye ma snyed du brjod pa ni/ /bsdus nas rdul gyi tshogs dag ni/ /'dren pas bstan pa mdzad pa yin/ /'di dag dper ni byas pa ste/ /tshad ma shes pa'i spyod yul min/ /rgyu yis dngos po bsgrub

bya ste/ /rtsis kyi pha rol phyin mi nus/ /'di tsam rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /sngon ni nga yis bsnyen bkur byas/ /dpag med bskal pa dag tu ni/ /de dag la ni mnyes byas nas/ /de tsam dus kyi mthar thug par/ /nga ni byang

chub sems dpar gyur/ /sems can don ni bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas nyid du'ang yang dag bstan/ /de dang der ni bdag gi sngags/ /cho ga rgya chen bstan pa yin/ /cho ga yi ni rab mchog 'di/ /sangs rgyas 'di dag

kun gyis gsungs/ /'di tsam tshad kyi sangs rgyas kyis/ /sngon chad 'di ni gsungs pa yin/ /dus kyi tha ma'i skye bo la/ /gzhon nu nga yang nga yis bstan/ /ji snyed 'jig rten sngags rnams dang / /cho ga'i rgyal po'i snod dang

ni/ /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang / /mi dang lha dang lha min dang / /thams cad kun gyi sngags rnams ni/ /rgyud dang rigs par rab tu bstan/ /cho ga'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /gang du kun gyis yongs su bkur/ /de dag cho ga zhib mo

yis/ /'jam pa'i ngag ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi cho ga ni/ /'di nyid kyi ni zhib mo zhes/ /de dag 'grub par gsungs pa ste/ /thams cad kun pas mthu ldan 'gyur/ /gang yang mi yi 'jig rten dang / /

gang gzhan sngags kyi lha mo dang / /'jig rten 'das pa'i sngags kun dang / /'jig rten rdzu 'phrul che dang bcas/ /'di nyid tshul gyi cho ga yis/ /cho ga'i rgyal pos 'grub pa nyid/ /sngags rnams kun dang cho ga kun/ /'di yi

dbang du 'gyur bar bstan/ /cho ga'i rgyal po bla med 'di/ /gang du 'jam dpal gyis rab bzhed/ /gang yang bzo ni rnam par shes/ /'jig rten pa yi 'jig rten 'dod/ /rgyu mtshan shes dang la nye bzang / /skar ma'i dpyad kyi rtags dang ni/ /

rgyu mtshan shes dang spyod pa dang / /sgra skad dge dang mi dge dang / /'byung po kun gyi skad shes dang / /spyod dang sems kyi spyod pa dang / /zur gyis shes pa dag kyang bshad/ /de bzhin gter lta nor sgyur byed/ /rtsis dang brda sprod

bstan bcos dang / /gos kyi rim pa'i cho ga dang / /nang rig gso ba rig pa dang / /de nyid thams cad phan dang bde/ /gtan tshigs lugs kyi bstan bcos dang / /gzhan yang sgra yi bstan bcos bstan/ /sdeb sbyor rig

byed dri za'i glu/ /spos sbyor dag kyang bstan pa yin/ /bdag gis byang chub sems kyis ni/ /sems can don phyir bshad pa yin/ /bdag ni byang chub sems sngon gyur/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor sngar gnas tshe/ /sems

can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis su ni bshad pa yin/ /'khor ba'i dgon pa'i tshang tshing du/ /bdag ni yun ring dus su gnas/ /ji ltar gdul bya'i sems can la/ /de ltar bdag gis de bzhin byas/ /ji lta

ji ltar sems can rnams/ /phan pa'i las ni len pa dag /phan don las kyis dge ba'i gzhi/ /de lta de ltar 'di dag byas/ /sna tshogs las kyis bsgyur ba yi/ /sems can 'gro ba'i skye gnas dag /'di dag bya ba sna

tshogs byas/ /sna tshogs skye gnas rab tu bstan/ /las rnams sna tshogs ldan pa yis/ /sna tshogs don gyi bstan bcos bstan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs ldan pas/ /'di la de bzhin byas pa yin/ /sna tshogs 'gro ba'i skye gnas

su/ /bdag gis de bzhin cha byad byas/ /phan pa'i bsam pas sems can la/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni bdag gis sprul/ /dbang phyug brgya byin tshangs pa sogs/ /khyab 'jug nor sbyin bden bral dang / /sna tshogs gza' yi gzugs sogs kyang / /

de tshe sngon ni nga yis sprul/ /thugs rje chen po'i dbang gyur thugs/ /sems can bsam pa'i spyod yul can/ /de dag la ni rim gyis su/ /zhi ba'i gnas la bzhag pa yin/ /'khor bar phan tshun 'gro ba na/ /yun ring dus su thogs pa ni/ /

sems can rnams kyi don bsgrub phyir/ /sngags kyi tshul gyis bstan pa yin/ /yun ring 'khor ba'i skye bar ngas/ /sangs rgyas rigs la brten nas ni/ /ye shes sngags dang cho ga ni/ /mthar gyis bstan par byas

pa yin/ /byed pa dang ni bdag po'ang rung / /nga la gang yang yod min te/ /nges pa'i rigs la brten nas ni/ /nga ni sangs rgyas byang chub mchog /bde ba nad med yang dag zhi/ /dri med mya ngan med zhi ba/ /ngas thob mya ngan

'das zhi ba/ /skye ba'i 'ching las nga rab grol/ /yang na 'khor lo rab bskor zhing / /yang dag mtha' la brten nas ni/ /sngags kyi tshig ni rgya chen dang / /cho ga 'di ni nga yis bstan/ /las dang cho ga rgya che ba/ /zlos pas don med

mi bya'o/ /'jig rten ji snyed sngags rnams dang / /cho ga dag kyang rab bstan pa/ /de kun mchod cing ri mor bya/ /de dag la ni brnyas pa spang / /cho ga rgya chen de dag kyang / /des na sngags pas brnyas mi bya/ /rgyu mtshan

shes dang rig pa dang / /skar ma'i dpyad shes skad shes pa/ /'di dag don med mi bya ste/ /bkra shis don du bstan pa yin/ /mthong ba'i chos kyi don du yang / /grub pa'i rdzas sogs sman dang ni/ /zang zing bcas par mig

sman 'grub/ /de las bkra shis 'grub pa yin/ /rab bsngags rgyal ba'i tshigs bcad dang / /bde legs tshigs bcad kyis brgyan pa/ /rab bsngags zhag ni bzang po dag /yar ngo dag gis legs mtshan pa/ /gza' mchog

dkar ba dag ldan la/ /sngags sgrub pa ni brtsam par bya/ /de la sogs pa'i dge dang ldan/ /mi dge dag kyang spang bya ba/ /nga nyid kyis ni sngon bstan te/ /de bas zlos pas gzung bar bya/ /'jig rten ji snyed gang su dag /skar

ma'i dpyad la mkhas pa dang / /gzhan gyi rgyud la mkhas pa dang / /lugs kyi bstan bcos gtan tshigs bcas/ /rig pa'i bstan bcos legs 'brel ba/ /sems can rnams la phan byed gang / /de kun nga yis sngon gsungs te/ /sngags

zlos pas ni gzung bar bya/ /lam 'di grub pa'i rgyu yin par/ /de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa yin/ /grub pa'i mtha' ni mtha' dag kun/ /gang yin thar pa'i rgyur gsungs pa/ /sngags kyi lam gyi grub pa'i rgyur/ /nga nyid

kyis ni byas pa yin/ /sngags kyi rig pa mtha' dag ni/ /zlos pas don med mi bya'o/ /'jig rten pa yi sngags kun dang / /dam par yang ni rab bstan dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das bzang po/ /thams cad kun la rab

sbyar bya/ /sems ni log par mi bya ste/ /yid kyis nam yang sun mi dbyung / /sngags rnams kun la mchod byed pa/ /dam tshig shes pas rab tu bstan/ /sangs rgyas dgongs shing phan pa yin/ /de bzhin ston pa'i

bstan pa la/ /rab zhugs rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyang / /zhugs par rab tu shes pa yi/ /thub zla'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni/ /'di ni dam tshig shes par gsungs/ /rtag tu sngags rnams don yod de/ /yang dag bsams pa thob pa

yin/ /gzhan dbang ngas ni ma byas te/ /brnyas pa dag kyang spyad ma yin/ /sngags rnams 'phags pa ma yin pa'ang / /de dag don med byas min brjod/ /'jig rten ji srid sngags rnams sam/ /yang na gzugs su byung ba'ang rung / /

kun nas nyon mongs mthong lam mtha'/ /de dag 'bras bu yod par bstan/ /khros dang zhe sdang ldan pa yis/ /don med par ni mi bya'o/ /mi 'dod gus pa med pa yi/ /las ni mi bya 'bras bu med/ /de dang 'brel ba'i sems

la ni/ /nam yang de la sbyin mi bya/ /rtag tu mnyam par bzhag nas ni/ /sngags tshig ldan par bzlas byas shing / /cho ga ji bzhin gzung byas na/ /'bras bu mtha' dag thob par 'gyur/ /yid ni g.yo med byas nas kyang / /sngags gcig

de ni bzla bar bya/ /sngags ni don kun sgrub pa ste/ /rtse gcig sems kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /rmongs pa'i bdag nyid g.yeng ba'i sems/ /de la grub pa 'grub mi 'gyur/ /gang la yid ni dag pa dang / /bstan pa la ni rab dad pa/ /'bras bu

mtha' dag 'grub pa ste/ /'gro ba dam pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ni/ /'dod pa'i grub par nye bar bstan/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po

che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ las dang bya ba dang cho ga dang rgyu mtshan shes pa'i le'u rab 'byam las/ nyi shu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal

med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi phyag rgya dang sngags rab 'byam mchog tu shin tu gsang ba nyon cig /ma dad pa'i sems can dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan

pa la mngon par dad pa med pa dang / dam tshig med pa dang / gnang ba med pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun gcod par byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / bsod nams mi 'dod pa dang / skye bo sdang ba dang /

'grogs shing 'dres pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang / sangs rgyas dang chos las thag ring du gyur pa dang / cho ga 'di la 'bras bu med par gyur pa dang / slob dpon gyi man ngag med pa dang / gzhon nu khyod kyi gsang ba'i

dkyil 'khor la dbang ma bskur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dam tshig ma mthong ba dang / skye bo mngon par mi 'dod pa dang / snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la bstan par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas chos la ma dad dang / /

byang chub lam ni ring gyur la/ /de la phyag rgya mi sbyin zhing / /rgyud nyid kyang ni bstan mi bya/ /bag med rmongs par gyur pa'am/ /yang na gal te chags pas byin/ /zlos pa phyin ci log byed la/ /de la sngags ni mi 'grub bo/ /phyag

rgya nye bar mi 'gyur zhing / /sngags nyid kyang ni gzhan du 'gyur/ /myur du grub pa mi 'thob cing / /de yi lus kyang nyams par 'gyur/ /zhi zhing dad pa'i sems ldan dang / /der ni dam tshig mthong ba dang / /rgyud dang sngags la rab zhugs la/ /

phyag rgya rgyud ni bstan par bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod byed dang / /rgyal ba'i bstan la rab dad dang / /cho ga'i sbyor ba mthong ba dag /de dag la ni phyag rgya bstan/ /byang chub sems kyi cho ga shes/ /byang chub sems kyis rnam par

brgyan/ /rtag tu byang chub lam la gnas/ /de dag la ni phyag rgya bstan/ /sngags dang rgyud la rab brtson zhing / /phan tshun brgyud pas dam tshig mthong / /byang chub chen por dam bcas pa/ /de la phyag rgya rab tu bstan/ /rgyal ba'i sras po dag dang

ni/ /de bzhin nyan thos rang rgyal dang / /mthong ba'i chos kyi 'bras thob gang / /de la phyag rgya rab tu bstan/ /chos rnams la ni rnam rtog med/ /dad cing ser sna bral ba dang / /ston pa'i bka' la rigs par shes/ /de la phyag rgya rab tu

bstan/ /rtsa brgyad brgya yi tshad du ni/ /'di dag phyag rgya phyag rgyas btab/ /lhag dang nyung ba ma yin par/ /mngon sum sangs rgyas kyis rab bshad/ /'jam dpal gang gi cho ga la/ /sngags kyang de dang mnyam pa yin/ /brgyad bcas

brgya zhes gsungs pa dang / /sngags rnams de dang mnyam par bstan/ /phyag rgya'ang brgya ni rtsa brgyad du/ /thub pa mchog gis sngon gsungs so/ /'di tsam tshad du cho ga la/ /phyag rgya sngags ni yang dag 'byung / /sangs rgyas kun gyi

mdzod nyid ni/ /sngags kyi mdzod du nye bar bstan/ /phyag rgya sngags ni mnyam ldan na/ /yang dag ldan pas las myur byed/ /'khor lo med pa'i shing rta ni/ /rigs par 'gro bar mi 'byung ste/ /de bzhin sngags rnams ma lus pa/ /phyag rgya

med par las mi byed/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mnyam ldan zhing / /yang dag ldan pas myur las byed/ /lha dang lha min bcas pa yi/ /'jig rten gsum kun 'gugs byed na/ /las gzhan dag gis legs sbyar ba'i/ /mi yi 'jig

rten smos ci dgos/ /mthong chos 'bras bu 'di dag gi/ /phyag rgya sngags la snang ba yis/ /gnyi ga ldan zhing dag pa dang / /cho ga ldan pa'i don bstan na/ /rgyal ba mchog dang sras rnams dang / /'byung po rnams ni 'gugs par byed/ /

sngags dang phyag rgya dka' thub nyid/ /rnam gsum las ni legs gnas dang / /ci 'dod phun sum tshogs pa kun/ /de bzhin zlos pas thob par 'gyur/ /sngags rnams phyag rgyas phyag rgya btab/ /sngags kyis kyang ni de rgya

btab/ /sngags ni phyag rgya med pas min/ /sngags kyang phyag rgya spangs pas min/ /phyag rgya sngags ni mnyam ldan na/ /yang dag ldan pas las kun byed/ /'di dag phan tshun 'bras bu ste/ /phan tshun 'bras bu 'byung ba

yin/ /sgrub pas rigs ldan sbyar byas na/ /bsgrub bya min pa'i las rnams med/ /phyag rgya ldan pa'i zlos pa pos/ /sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga mthong bas rab brtson zhing / /sngags dang phyag rgya kun byas na/ /gang
du 'gugs 'gyur mi 'grub pa/ /de gnas de ni yod ma yin/ /srid rtse mnar med bar dang ni/ /'jig rten khams kyi 'gro ba gzhan/ /gang du mi 'bebs mi 'gugs dang / /bsgrub bya ma yin gang yang med/ /sems

can skye gnas las skyes dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mi snang ba'ang / /cho gas bskul nas mi 'gugs pa/ /de ni gang yang yod ma yin/ /srung ba'i cho ga'i rgyud dag gam/ /las 'grub bzlog par bya ba la/ /sa bcu

la ni gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang mi nus/ /sngags dang phyag rgya la gnas la/ /'byung po kun gyis mi tshugs so/ /dka' thub bzlas pa cho ga'i lam/ /sbyin sreg las la rab sbyar na/ /'di las skye zhing

de las grub/ /phyag rgya sngags la snang ba yin/ /zlos pa rtag tu 'bad brtson zhing / /rtag tu de dag la gnas na/ /sngags rnams grub par 'gyur ba ste/ /don yod 'gyur bar thub pa'i bka'/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi

gsung dag ni/ /de dag gis ni gzhan du byed/ /sngags dang rgyud ni rigs pa la/ /gang zhig rtag tu mi 'jug pa'o/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mtha' dag ni/ /gang zhig cho ga ldan byed pa'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu 'di dag ni/ /yang dang yang du

bstan pa yin/ /sngags kyi rig pa mtha' dag ni/ /phyag rgyas sngags ni phan pa 'byung / /de srid las la cho ga'i rgyal/ /'dis ni 'bras bu rgya chen 'byung / /'jig rten gsang mchog phan pa dang / /sngags dang phyag rgyas dam bcas pa/ /

de nas rigs ldan 'jam dpal te/ /khyab par byed pa byis pa'i gzugs/ /cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyur gnas/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag 'byung / /byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus che/ /sa bcu la ni gnas pa yis/ /sangs

rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen gyur pa/ /thub pa mchog la rab tu zhus/ /bcom ldan sngags kyi rgyud dag ni/ /gang yin 'di ni 'jig rten bstan/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis kyang / /de yang bdag la gsungs pa yin/ /de ltar shAkya seng ge

yis/ /ci yi phyir na rab tu gsungs/ /bdag ni de ltar the tshom 'tshal/ /thub pa mchog gis bdag la gsungs/ /blo ldan ka la ping ka'i skad/ /tshangs pa yi ni gsung dbyangs kyis/ /sa bcu la ni rab gnas pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa'

la gsungs pa/ /sngon ni bskal pa mang po ru/ /nga ni 'khor bar 'khor ba na/ /thub dbang me tog kun skyes las/ /cho ga'i rgyal po'ang nga yis thob/ /de dang der ni sems can la/ /phan pa mang po byas pa yin/ /thugs rje'i dbang du song

nas ni/ /de tshe bdag gi smon lam byas/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu de tshe bdag /dus kyi mthar ni yang dag byung / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas ni/ /bstan pa'i don ni byas pa yin/ /phyi ma yi ni dus dag tu/ /de tshe nga ni

mya ngan 'da'/ /de na cho ga'i rgyal dbang po/ /khyod kyi drung du nga yis bstan/ /nga yang 'jig rten mya ngan 'das/ /'dzam bu'i gling ni rab stongs shing / /de bzhin ston pa'i chos kyi mdzod/ /rtsod dus thag ring gyur pa na/ /sems can rnams

la bstan pa'i don/ /cho ga'i rgyal po gcig byed 'gyur/ /cho ga'i rgyal po rgya chen la/ /de bzhin 'di ni yang dag 'jug /sems can rnams ni don la brtson/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dus 'jigs su rung ba yi/ /de tshe sems can chos

ldan min/ /rtag tu lus la mi gnas shing / /rgyal po rnams ni ma rungs yid/ /mi dang mi ma yin rnams ni/ /kun kyang bstan la rnam par sdang / /ngas bshad chos kyi mdzod rnams ni/ /nga yi thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /de dag

gdul ba'i don gyi phyir/ /sngags kyi mdzod ni nye bar bstan/ /bskal pa bsam mi khyab par sngon/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi smon lam 'di/ /sangs rgyas ji snyed gang su dag /'jig rten gnyen gyur mya ngan 'das/ /de dag bstan pa'i don du

ni/ /dus dang dus su bya'o zhes/ /bdag ni byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs/ /dus kun tu ni rnam par spyod/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyis sems can la/ /de dang der ni rnam par 'dul/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi smon lam 'di/ /sngon chad du ni byas

pa yin/ /nga ni byis pa'i gzugs thob gyur/ /des na khyod la bshad par bya/ /skye bo skyabs ni med pa dang / /sangs rgyas zhing ni stongs pa na/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyis sems can la/ /byis pa'i tshul gyis yang dag shod/ /sems can mang po

'dul byed cing / /phun sum tshogs pa sbyin byed pa/ /dus kyi tha ma de la ni/ /sems can kun la mchog sbyin byed/ /'jig rten nga ni mya ngan 'das/ /sa yi steng ni stongs gyur na/ /khyod nyid byis pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas mdzad

pa byed par 'gyur/ /de tshe dgon chen rab dga' ba/ /kha ba can nang yod pa yi/ /chu bo gser dang ldan 'gram du/ /da ni mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal

po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phyag rgya bskul ba'i cho ga 'jam dpal gyis yongs su zhus shing bstan pa'i le'u rab 'byam las/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya

thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i mdzod yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag

tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spu nas 'od zer du ma bye ba khri phrag brgya stong grangs med pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa byung ste/ /'od zer gyi dra ba du ma des sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma gsal bar byas nas/ sangs

rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskul nas/ phyir yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spur zhugs par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par bskul ma thag tu nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil du bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la

bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal phyag rgya'i le'u'i cho ga'i mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa bshad kyis nyon cig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs la btud de phyag
'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod kyi phyag rgya mchog tu shin tu gsang ba gang yin pa de dus la bab par mkhyen na/ bcom

ldan 'das de ni legs te bshad du gsol/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir dang lha dang mi rnams dang sems
can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang bde ba'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab nas/ phyag rgya thams cad

la gzigs shing sangs rgyas thams cad la mkhyen par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pa/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa/ 'phags pa'i

sngags rnams la yid brtson par byed pa la yang dag par gzengs stod pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa/ 'khor bar gnas pa dag la bde ba dang shis pa dang mya ngan las

'das pa la rab tu 'jog par byed pa/ sems can sdug bsngal ba thams cad la bde ba'i don gyi phyir phyag rgya'i le'u'i cho ga ngas bshad kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nu nyon cig /dang po gtsug phud lnga pa ni/ /de ni phyag

rgya chen por 'dod/ /gnyis pa gtsug phud gsum pa yin/ /ral pa gcig pa gsum pa ste/ /bzhi pa ut+pa lar gsungs pa/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /lnga pa bkra shis ldan du brjod/ /drug pa rgyal

mtshan zhes su brjod/ /bdun pa gang ba zhes bstan te/ /sngags shes dag la legs mdzes shing / /brgyad pa srog shing zhes brjod pa/ /sngags shes dag la legs mdzes yin/ /dgu pa gdugs zhes bstan pa ste/ /bcu

pa mdung du brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin bcu gcig sangs rgyas kyis/ /kha sbyar zhes ni yang dag bstan/ /bcu gnyis pa ni phub ces gsungs/ /bcu gsum pa ni da pus yin/ /bcu bzhi pa ni ral grir bshad/ /de bzhin

dril bu bcwa lnga pa/ /bcu drug pa ni zhags par bstan/ /bcu bdun pa ni lcags kyur shes/ /bcwa brgyad pa ni bzang po'i gdan/ /bcu dgu pa ni gdan du brjod/ /nyi shur bstan pa rma bya'i gdan/ /nyi shu gcig pa paT+Ti saM/ /rtags gcig

nyi shu gnyis pa ste/ /rtags gnyis nyi shu gsum pa yin/ /de bzhin phreng ba nyi shu bzhi/ /nyi shu lnga pa gzhu yin te/ /nyi shu drug par gsungs pa ni/ /lcags mda' dag tu rnam par brtags/ /nyi shu bdun par gsungs pa ni/ /rtags

kun dag tu rab tu bstan/ /nyi shu brgyad pa gsal shing ste/ /nyi shu dgu pa tho ba yin/ /sum cu pa ni mda' bo che/ /sum cu gcig pa mche bar bstan/ /sum cu gnyis pa de bzhin kha/ /sum cu gsum pa ras kyi
gos/ /sum cu bzhi pa bum pa ste/ /sum cu lnga pa 'khar gsil yin/ /sum cu drug pa bya ma bum/ /sum cu bdun pa gtun shing ste/ /sum cu brgyad pa skyil krung yin/ /sum cu dgu pa pa Ta ha/ /bzhi bcu

par ni rab bstan pa/ /chos kyi dung zhes nye bar bstan/ /bzhi bcu dag ni gcig pa yang / /lcags thag ces ni yongs su bsgrags/ /gnyis par 'dod pa mang por gsungs/ /gsum pa yid la re ba rdzogs/ /bzhi pa skyed byed snang

ba ste/ /shes rab pha rol phyin par 'dod/ /lnga pa ma mo zhes bshad pa/ /rkang gnyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /drug pa rta babs zhes byar gsungs/ /bdun pa rta babs bzang po yin/ /brgyad pa sgra skad dag tu bstan/ /

dgu pa rgyal ba'i sgra yang yin/ /lnga bcu pa ni rnga bo che/ /lnga bcu gcig pa chos kyi rnga/ /lnga bcu gnyis pa ba lang bshad/ /gsum pa lag pa mchog yin te/ /lnga bcu bzhi par shes bya ba/ /phyag rgya de ni 'khrul med

yin/ /lnga bcu lnga pa mjug rings yin/ /lnga bcu drug pa mda' yin te/ /bdun pa dag ni dgra star bstan/ /brgyad pa 'jig rten gyis mchod yin/ /lnga bcu rtsa dgur shes bya ba/ /mdor na mtshon ni rtse gcig yin/ /drug cu par

ni 'gyur ba yang / /mdor na gshol du shes par bya/ /drug cu gcig pa pad ma ste/ /drug cu gnyis pa rdo rjer bshad/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa/ /'jig rten drug cu gsum par gsungs/ /drug cu bzhi par shes

bya ba/ /mdor na pad ma dkar po yin/ /drug cu lnga par shes bya ba/ /phyag rgya mchog sbyin dam pa yin/ /de nas drug cu drug pa ni/ /theg pa'i phyag rgyar sangs rgyas gsungs/ /drug cu bdun par 'jig rten du/ /mkhas pas

mdung du bstan pa yin/ /drug cu brgyad par bya ba ni/ /rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgyar gsungs/ /drug cu rtsa dgur 'gyur ba ni/ /dgra 'joms byed par rab tu bstan/ /bdun cu par ni shes bya ba/ /mdor na klu yi phyag rgya yin/ /bdun cu gcig par
gsungs pa ni/ /gzhal med phyag rgya mchog bzang yin/ /bdun cu gnyis pa mdor bsdu na/ /shing rta zhes ni de la brjod/ /mdor na bdun cu gsum pa ni/ /'jig rten mgon gyi gdan du gsungs/ /de bzhin

bdun cu bzhi dang ni/ /bdun cu lnga ru bstan pa dag /tshes brgyad zla ba pi bang dag /phyag rgya gnyis su bstan pa yin/ /bdun cu rtsa drug 'jig rten du/ /phyag rgya pad ma 'dra ba yin/ /bdun cu bdun pa'i phyag rgya

mchog /ut+pa la ni 'byung ba'i gnas/ /bdun cu brgyad pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /phyag 'tshal ba zhes bstan pa yin/ /bdun cu rtsa dgu mchod yon rgya/ /dgra bcom phyag rgya brgyad cu pa/ /mar me brgyad cu gcig par

shes/ /thal sbyar brgyad cu gnyis par 'dod/ /gsum pa phreng ba zhes bya ba'o/ /bzhi pa gdan zhes gsungs pa yin/ /lnga pa gnas kyi phyag rgyar bstan/ /drug pa rab gnas gsungs pa ste/ /bdun pa dbang gi phyag rgyar brjod/ /

brgyad cu brgyad pa mchog tu 'dod/ /dgu dang dgu bcu'i grangs dag ni/ /phyag rgya gnyis ni dge ba mchog /kha sbyar zung gi phyag rgya ste/ /grangs ni dgu bcu 'byung ba ste/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig ces gsungs pa/ /me tog gi ni phyag rgyar

bstan/ /gnyis pa gtor ma'i phyag rgya ste/ /gsum pa rtag tu spos kyi yin/ /bzhi pa dri yi phyag rgya ste/ /lnga pa mar mer shes par bya/ /drug pa sbyor bar shes par bya/ /bdun pa skyil krung phyed kyi gnas/ /brgyad pa dag ni bong ba ste/ /dgu pa dag ni gshegs su

gsol/ /de bzhin brgya rdzogs phyag rgya ni/ /thams cad pa yi las shes bya/ /brgya las rtsa gcig gsungs pa ni/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ste/ /gtsug tor 'jig rten mgon po ni/ /rtag tu bla ma 'khor los sgyur/ /phyag rgya de ni dang por gsungs/ /

gnyis pa gdugs dkar las byung yin/ /gsum pa rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs su snang ba yin/ /bzhi pa chos kyi mdzod kyi gnas/ /chos kyi phyag rgyar shes par bya/ /lnga pa dge 'dun zhes bya ste/ /de ni phyag rgya chen po'ang yin/ /

drug pa 'byung po zhi byed pa/ /rang rgyal lag pa'i phyag rgya nyid/ /bdun pa byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /sa bcu dag la zhugs pa yi/ /phyag rgya pad ma'i phreng ba ste/ /phyag rgya chen por de shes bya/ /'jig rten pa ni thams cad

kyi/ /phyag rgya sngags rnams mchog sbyin byed/ /mthu chen gtso bo chen po ste/ /gtso bo 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod/ /brgyad pa yang dag rab sbyar ba/ /phyag rgya srid gsum skye gnas yin/ /phyag rgya rnams kyi grangs bstan pa/ /

rgyud 'di las ni rab 'byung ba/ /brgya gcig de bzhin rtsa brgyad du/ /phyag rgya'i grangs su brtags pa yin/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis 'di tshad du/ /sa steng sngon ni bstan pa yin/ /ston dang bstan pa 'jig pa na/ /lus can rnams ni rab

spyod 'gyur/ /dang po re zhig lag pa gnyis/ /thal mo sbyar te rtse mo sprad/ /sor mo phan tshun nang du gshib/ /sor mo phan tshun sbyar nas ni/ /de nas yang dag sbyar nas kyang / /lag gnyis yang dag ldan pa la/ /gtsug pud lngas

ni legs mtshan bya/ /sor mo rnams kyi rtse mo dag /de nas de dag rnam bzlog pa/ /phyag rgya gtsug pud lngar shes bya/ /gtsug pud lnga pa nyid dag ni/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes su bsgrags/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dbu la yod/ /'di ni phyag

rgya mthu bo che/ /rab sbyar las kun byed pa yin/ /'jam dpal gyi ni sngags dag gam/ /snying po nyid ni rab tu sbyar/ /skra can ma yi sngags dag gam/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rtag tu bya/ /cho ga mthong bas sbyar ba'am/ /sngags rnams kun

gyis byas na ni/ /las rnams kun ni don yod par/ /thub pa'i bkas ni bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin lag pa rnam bkod nas/ /de yi lag pa kha sbyar bya/ /de bzhin rtse mo gsum bya ste/ /sor mo rnams ni rab sbyar nas/ /lag gnyis mthe bo

spyod pa dang / /rab tu phyung ste drang por bya/ /gung mo dang ni srin lag dag /phyin ci log tu 'brel pa bya/ /'di ni gtsug pud gsum zhes bya/ /ral pa gsum pa zhes bya'ang yin/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya

che/ /gang dag cho ga mthong ba yi/ /las rnams kun ni byed pa yin/ /'jam dpal gsang sngags gang yin pa/ /de dag kun la sbyar bar bya/ /zlos pa yid la gang 'dod pa/ /don de myur du grub par byed/ /lag pa de bzhin rnam

bkod nas/ /de bzhin gtsug pud gcig par bya/ /sor mo gung mo yang dag sbyar/ /nges par gtsug pud gcig par 'gyur/ /rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /gzhon nu'i sngags ni rab

bkod dang / /gang yang 'jig rten kun gyi yang / /de dang sbyar na 'grub 'gyur te/ /myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'di yis bsgrub bya ni/ /sngags mchog rgyal bas bshad pa yin/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /'di don myur

du bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin lag pa yang dag sbyar/ /sor mo'i rtse mo dgug cing dgod/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse sprad dgug /sor mo gzhan ni rang bzhag la/ /mthe mo gnyis ni rab gshib nas/ /gung mo gnyis ni rab brkyang bya/ /

srin lag gnyis ni rtse sprad bkug /ut+pa la ru bstan pa yin/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni brjod cing bya/ /gtsug pud lnga par bstan pa yi/ /las rnams gang yin de dag nyid/ /de kun ut+pa la yis

ni/ /myur du sgrub par byed pa yin/ /'di ni mchog sbyin phyag rgya ste/ /myur du longs spyod sgrub byed pa'o/ /rtsa ba'i sngags dang ldan byas na/ /myur du nor ni byed par 'gyur/ /lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar byas nas/ /lag pa

gnyis po rab bkan la/ /kho ra yug tu sor mo yis/ /de nyid kha ni yang dag sbyar/ /bkra shis ldan pa'i rnam par 'byung / /mdzes pa'i rnam par dgod par bya/ /gung mo'i sor mo'i dbus su ni/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni

yang dag sbyar/ /mthe bo gnyi ga rnam sbyar ba/ /phyag rgya bkra shis ldan du brjod/ /don kun byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di/ /zhi ba'i las la rab tu sbyar/ /snying po'am yi ge drug ldan pas/ /las rnams kun ni byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin lag

gnyis sbyar nas ni/ /sor mo phan tshun rab sbyar ba/ /'gro ba'i khyad par mkhyen pa yis/ /gang ba bzang zhes gsungs pa yin/ /rtse mo'i phyogs kyi sor mo rnams/ /kun nas yongs su 'gyed byas pa/ /gang ba bzang zhes sangs

rgyas kyis/ /zlos pa rnams la gsungs pa yin/ /de 'di sdug bsngal dag dang ni/ /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rab zhi byed/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskul byas na/ /myur du nor gyis phyug par byed/ /'jig rten mkhyen cing legs spyod pas/ /

phyag rgya gzhan yang gsungs pa ni/ /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /g.yon pa phab cing de la brten/ /lag pa g.yas pas bya ba ni/ /de yi sor mo dgug cing gzhag /mdzub mo gung mo nyid dag ni/ /bsgreng ba rgyal mtshan zhes

brjod de/ /rgyal mtshan phyag rgya zhes grags pa/ /bsgreng bas dgra ni zlog par byed/ /phyag rgya 'di yi bya ba ni/ /rim gyis gtor ma sbyin sreg sogs/ /phyag rgya 'di yis bya ba ni/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rab bskul na/ /'di ni

las kun byed pa yin/ /lag pa de bzhin rnam sbyar ba/ /thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /bgegs rnams ma lus rnam 'jig cing / /sngags shes mnyam par brjod pa ni/ /rim gyis las rnams byed par 'gyur/ /cho ga mthong

ba'i ldan pas ni/ /myur du don ni sgrub par byed/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi snying po ni/ /snying gi gnas las yang dag byung / /'jig rten ma lus bsam pa yi/ /las rnams yang dag ldan pas byed/ /lag pa de bzhin

sbyar byas nas/ /g.yon pa'i steng du g.yas pa bzhag /g.yas kyi mdzub mo blangs nas ni/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng byas pa/ /'di ni srog shing phyag rgya yin/ /dgra rnams kun ni zlog byed cing / /mi bzad shin tu

'jigs rung ba'i/ /bgegs rnams thams cad zhi bar byed/ /sngags zlos pa yis bstan pa ni/ /ma rungs thams cad gsad don phyir/ /rtsa ba'i sngags dang yang dag ldan/ /myur du las ni byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin lag

pa sbyar byas la/ /srog shing 'dra bar btsugs byas nas/ /de steng lag g.yas brkyang byas pa/ /phyag rgya gdugs zhes bya bar brjod/ /phyag rgya 'di yis bya ba ni/ /bdag gi spyi bor bsrung bar bya/ /sngags

rnams kun gyis byed pa ste/ /las ni srung bar byed pa yin/ /dgra rnams kyi ni gdong 'gebs shing / /mi 'dod pa dag rengs par byed/ /mi ma yin dang ma rungs pa/ /ci ltar 'dod par byed pa yin/ /gdugs kyi phyag rgya de mthong bas/ /

bgegs rnams kun ni rnam par 'jig /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /lag pa dag ni mdzes sbyar nas/ /mthe bo mdzub mo rtse sprad ldan/ /gung mo gnyis ni rab brkyang zhing / /srin lag gnyis ni rtse sprad

bkug /gung mo'i tshigs gnyis sbyar bar bya/ /de nyid mdung gi phyag rgyar bstan/ /ma rungs thams cad zlog par byed/ /srin po gdon rnams 'jig byed nas/ /'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yin/ /khro bo'i rgyal po

gshin rje gshed/ /khros pas rab tu bstan pa yin/ /mi bzad sdig pa'i las byed pa'i/ /'jig rten la ni rab myur byed/ /srog la gnod par byed pa'i las/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis spangs pa yi/ /las 'di dag ni

mi bya ste/ /'jig rten dam pas bkag pa yin/ /yang na kun 'gro'i sngags sbyar ba'i/ /mdung gi phyag rgya dam pa yin/ /gang dag 'jig rten sngags rnams dang / /de bzhin rgyal bas rab bshad pa/ /de dag gi ni

sngags rnams sbyar/ /mdung gi phyag rgya legs mnyam bzhag /sngags kyi mchog ni mi bzad mthong / /bden bral thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /sha za skar ma yi dags dang / /srul po dang ni ma mo dang / /byis pa'i gdon
dang mi sdug gzugs/ /byis pa rnams la gnod byed pa/ /gang dag gdug pa'i las ldan pa/ /ma rungs thams cad 'joms par byed/ /de bzhin lag ni sbyar byas nas/ /thal mo'i rnam par byas pa dag /de nyid rnam

par bzlog bya ste/ /sor mo phan tshun 'byar ba ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa zhe sdang bral/ /de nyid kha sbyar zhes ni gsungs/ /yi ge gcig pa'i sngags dang ni/ /phyag rgya 'di yi las kyis bya/ /'di nyid phyag rgyas phyogs

kun bcing / /de ni phyogs bcing zhes bya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bsrung ba che/ /kha sbyar byas nas 'dug pa yin/ /gzhan yang gang dag gnod byed pa'i/ /ma rungs thams cad 'jig par byed/ /lus dang sems can 'khor dang

ni/ /spyod yul dag kyang 'dzin par byed/ /gang du zlos pa rtag gnas pa/ /ma lus tshogs ni srung bar byed/ /de la sdig pa ci yang med/ /phan pa med pa'ang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /bde dang lo legs nad med na/ /pha

rol dmag tshogs 'jigs pa gang / /de nas lag gnyis yang sbyar nas/ /bzlog par yang ni bya ba yin/ /g.yas pa 'og tu byas nas ni/ /g.yon pa'ang steng du bkan par bya/ /lag gnyis phan tshun bsnol ba 'di/ /

rgyal ba mchog gis mchog sbyin gsungs/ /sdig pa yang dag 'byung byed pa'i/ /ma rungs dgra rnams zlog par byed/ /yi ge gcig gnyis gsum dag gi/ /yi ge ldan pa brjod pa dang / /sngags ni 'dod pa dang ldan pas/ /

'di ni myur du las rnams byed/ /dgra las byung ba'i sdig dag la/ /don gyi las rnams sna tshogs byed/ /rtsa ba'i sngags dang ldan pa yis/ /sprul gyi dug ni sel bar byed/ /yang na gzhan gyis sbyar ba yi/ /lus can skyon ni sel bar byed/ /

sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog dag gis/ /'di ni phyag rgya mchog tu gsungs/ /lag pa de bzhin sbyar byas nas/ /sor mo rnams ni sbyar ba las/ /de tshe da pus 'dra bya ba/ /rtsa bar yang ni bcing ba ste/ /mthe bo gnyis

kyi dbus su ni/ /mthe'u chung dag gis legs par dkri/ /sor mo drug gis bya ba ni/ /rtse mo sbyar te legs mdzes bya/ /'di ni da pus phyag rgyar gsungs/ /lha min thams cad 'joms par byed/ /lha ma yin dang gdug

sems ldan/ /mthong bas sems ni zhi 'gyur zhing / /phyag rgya brjod na 'jig par 'gyur/ /da pus phyag rgya legs mchod pa/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni rab sbyar na/ /myur du don rnams byed cing zhi/ /de bzhin ral gri bstan
pa yang / /srin lag mdzub mo bkug pas so/ /de bzhin lag gnyis byas nas ni/ /rab brkyang dang po dgug par bya/ /sor mo dag gis 'khor yug tu/ /kham phor mnyam pa'i dbyibs su bya/ /dril bur sangs rgyas

kyis mkhyen cing / /lus can rnams la yang dag bstan/ /lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ni/ /gnyi ga kha sbyar rab bcings nas/ /phan tshun bsre ba byas nas ni/ /de bzhin gung mo'i sor mo gnyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'dra

bar byas pa yis/ /zhags pa 'dra bar 'byung ba ni/ /de nas mdzub mo gnyis po dag /dbu ma'i tshigs su bcing bya ba/ /'di ni zhags pa zhes bya ste/ /rgya 'di sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o/ /sems can rnams ni gdul don du/ /
mi bzad 'ching ba byed par gsungs/ /gang yang ma rungs gdug pa'i gza'/ /gang yang gnod sbyin srin po rnams/ /'di ni cung zad rab bskul bas/ /'dir ni ma mor bcas pa 'ching / /chings shig chings shig
ces brjod pas/ /brgya byin bcas pa'ang 'dir 'ching na/ /sha za sha ni za ba dang / /mi yi 'jig rten smos ci dgos/ /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /de ni gnyi ga mnyam byas nas/ /de bzhin

lag pa g.yas pa ni/ /g.yon pa'i steng du yongs su gzhag /gung mo dang ni mdzub mo dag /de nyid lcags kyu 'dra bar bya/ /tshigs ni bar ma la brten nas/ /mdzub mo nyid ni lcags kyur bya/ /rtsa ba'i sngags la 'di rab

sbyar/ /lcags kyur 'di ni rab tu bya/ /yid la gang zhig zlos par 'dod/ /myur du las ni rab tu byed/ /myur du lha dbang tshangs pa sogs/ /brgya byin bcas pa'ang 'gugs par byed/ /phyag rgya gtso mchog rab sbyar ba/ /
lcags kyu 'gugs pa dge ba yin/ /lag gnyis de bzhin rab sbyar nas/ /bzlog pa'i rnam pas nang bcings la/ /g.yon pa'i lag pa'i sor mo ni/ /gung mo srin lag dgug par bya/ /g.yas pa'i lag pa'i sor
mo ni/ /gung mo srin lag rnam par dgug /mdzub mo mthe'u chung dag kyang ni/ /gnyi ga sdigs mdzub bya ba ni/ /de nas rnam bzlog bzhag pa la/ /mthe bo gnyis ni dgug cing sbyar/ /de nyid bzang po'i gdan

gsungs pa/ /phyag rgya mchog ni dge ba yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan yin te/ /khro ldan sems can zlog pa yin/ /rgyal ba mchog gi rigs las byung / /sngags rnams kun la rab tu sbyar/ /sangs rgyas byang

chub sems dpa' kun/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'joms byed cing / /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag /thams cad g.yo ba med byed pa'o/ /bzang po'i stan ni de nyid la/ /gung mo la ni yang dag brten/ /steng du rnam par dgod

pa ni/ /gung mo srin lag rab brkyang ba'o/ /de nyid gdan du gsungs pa ni/ /thub pa dgra rgyal seng ges so/ /de bzhin lag gnyis sbyar nas ni/ /sor mo rnams ni bcing bar bya/ /de nas yal ga 'dra bar ni/ /'og tu mthe'u chung rtse mor

sbyar/ /gung mo yang dag dgug bya zhing / /pad ma'i 'dab ltar yangs pa bya/ /mthe bo gnyis ka sbyar bzhag nas/ /rtag tu bsgreng ste bzhag pa yin/ /zhe sdang bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /'di ni rma bya'i gdan du gsungs/ /'di

ni blo ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di yi ni/ /byis pa rtag tu rtse byed pa'i/ /gdan du thub pa mchog gis gsungs/ /mthu chen phyag rgya chen po 'di/ /rang byung rnams kyis sngon bshad pa'o/ /'jam dbyangs

sngags kyis rab bskul na/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed/ /sha za sha ni za ba rnams/ /gdug pa rnams ni 'jig par byed/ /nyi shu de bzhin tshang bar ni/ /de dag phyag rgyar 'dod pa ste/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa rkang gnyis mchog /

'jig rten gtso bos gsungs pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya rnams kyi cho ga rnams/ /lag pa dge zhing dag pa dang / /dri med chu yis bkrus pa dang / /tsan+dan dkar dang ga pur dang / /gur

gum chu dang ldan pa yi/ /dri yi khyad par mang po yis/ /byugs shing me la bskams pa yi/ /lag pa ma nyams gtsang ba dang / /ma smad shu ba med pa yis/ /dang por phyag bya rkang gnyis mchog /de yi phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /

sa la me tog kun skyes dang / /'od dpag med dang rin chen tog /dpag med tshe shes mi g.yo dbang / /'jig rten mgon po nyin byed dang / /bde byed 'jig rten mgon po dang / /spyan bzang chos kyi tog dang ni/ /
'od kyi phreng ba zhes grags pa/ /gtso bo mchog ni dam pa dag /'di dag ga pur sangs rgyas ni/ /rkang gnyis mchog la phyag byas nas/ /gtsang ba'i gnas su gtsang byas nas/ /zlos pa'i dus su phyag rgya

bcing / /slob dpon la ni yang dag dris/ /the tshom don las rnam par grol/ /de 'dra'i spyod pa de ldan na/ /ci ltar bde bar phyag rgya bcing / /rnam sbyangs rnam par dben pa dang / /gnas kyang mngon par bsngags byas pa/ /khros

min zas lhag bcas pa min/ /gzhan dag gis ni sems g.yeng min/ /sol ba thal ba'i nang dag tu/ /nam yang phyag rgya bshad mi bya/ /gzhan gyi bud med la chags dang / /gzhan nor chags la'ang bshad mi bya/ /

langs dang nyal ba dag la ni/ /phyag rgya bde 'byung bshad mi bya/ /lhor bltas 'dug la'ang ma yin te/ /nub tu bltas te 'dug par min/ /steng dang 'og gi phyogs dag tu'ang / /phyag rgya bcing bar mi bya'o/ /byang dang shar du bltas

pa dang / /phyogs mtshams dag ni de dag tu/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po'i sngags dran nas/ /sngags shes pas ni phyag rgya bcing / /phyag rgya ma lus bcing ba la/ /cho ga mchog 'di 'dod pa yin/ /de yi 'og tu brjod bya ba/ /phyag rgya

nyi shu gcig pa yin/ /lag gnyis mnyam par byas nas ni/ /sor mo rnams ni sbyar bar bya/ /de nas sor mo gung mo ni/ /rtse mo sbyar bar bya ba yin/ /mdzub mo dang ni mthe'u chung gi/ /rtse mo tshigs ni bar mar gzhag /phyag rgya shes pas rtag

bya ba/ /mthe bong gnyis ni bkug rten cing / /rtse mo gsum sbyar yang dag ldan/ /paT+Ti saM du mkhas pas shes/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mchog yin te/ /myur du gzhan gyi sngags rnams gcod/ /de nas gzhan gyi phyag rgya gcod/ /ma rungs

sems can la sbyar bya/ /gza' dang ma mo srul po yi/ /'byung po kun ni skrag par byed/ /las rnam sna tshogs byed pa ste/ /zhi ba'ang myur du 'gugs par byed/ /drag po khyab 'jug tshangs pa dag /gang dag rang gis smras pa'i sngags/ /cho ga mthong

ba'i las kyis ni/ /sngags shes pas ni de dag gcod/ /bdag nyid chen po paT+Ti sa'i/ /phyag rgya dang ni ldan pa dang / /rgyal ba'i zhal nas byung ba yi/ /sngags nyid dang yang ldan gnas na/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las byed de/ /de bzhin gcod dang
dral ba'i las/ /sems can gzhan gyis byas pa'i skyon/ /ma lus mtha' dag 'jig par byed/ /lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ni/ /gung mo srin lag bsgreng bya ste/ /lag gnyis yang dag ldan pa ni/ /mtshan dang

'dra bar yang dag 'byung / /sor mo bzhi ni yang dag ldan/ /mtshan gyi phyag rgya zhes 'dod do/ /lha yi bu ni dbang phyug che/ /rang gi rgyas ni phyag rgya btab/ /thub pas sngon ni bkug pa la/ /rgyud 'di las ni gsungs
pa yin/ /cho ga mchog 'dir dam tshig dang / /bdag nyid sngags ni ma lus dag /de bzhin phyag rgya rgya cher bcas/ /bkug nas rab tu bstan pa yin/ /phyag rgya yi ni rab mchog 'di/ /'jig rten dag la rab

tu bstan/ /phyag rgya dag ni gang ji snyed/ /drag pos sa steng rab bstan pa/ /de dag gi ni bdag po mchog /phyag rgya 'di ni rtags gcig yin/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ /
dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bsdus pa ste/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab sgrub pa'o/ /gang dag ji snyed gdug pa pa/ /sa yi steng na rgyu ba yi/ /gdon dang sha rjen sha za dang / /ma mo dang ni lus srul po/ /drag pos

bgegs ni byas pa dag /de dag bzlog pa'i don ched du/ /mtshan mo gtor ma'i las dag la/ /phyag rgya mchog 'di gsungs pa yin/ /sangs rgyas byin rlabs rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /las rnams ma lus byed par 'gyur/ /

de bzhin de ni rnam gnyis byas/ /rtags ni gnyis su yang dag bstan/ /de bzhin sor mo phreng bar byas/ /phreng ba zhes ni yongs su bsgrags/ /de nyid phreng ba yang dag bsdus/ /kha sbyar 'dra bar yang dag 'byung / /mdzub mo

gnyis kyi rtse sprad pa/ /gzhu dang 'dra bar bya ba yin/ /mthe bo gnyis ni chang par gnon/ /de ni gzhu yi phyag rgyar mtshon/ /de bzhin sor mo byas nas ni/ /g.yas pa'i mdzub mo nges par brkyang / /g.yon pa'i mdzub

mo'ang brkyang byas te/ /mthe bo'i tshigs ni chang bas gnan/ /lcags mda'i phyag rgya zhes bstan te/ /mtshan ma mnyam par yang brjod do/ /de bzhin lag gnyis byas nas ni/ /sor mo rnams ni phan tshun bcing / /mdzub

gnyis bslang bar yang dag sbyar/ /mdung dang 'dra bar byas pa yang / /ma rungs thams cad rjes skrag pa/ /'di ni mdung zhes rab tu gsungs/ /de bzhin lag gnyis byas nas ni/ /gnyi ga'ang khu tshur bcing bya zhing / /

mthe bo gnyis ni bsgreng byas pa/ /tho ba'i phyag rgyar bstan pa yin/ /kha sbyar tho ba de nyid las/ /cung zad rab tu bskyod pa ni/ /mda' chen mchog tu gsungs pa ste/ /phyag rgya dgra ni 'jig byed pa'o/ /de nas ud

pa la bcings byas te/ /de bzhin mthe'u chung sor mo gnyis/ /mthe bo'i 'og gi nang dag tu/ /dgod cing mdzub mo bstan par bya/ /'di ni mche ba zhes gsungs te/ /rnam par bye ba zhal zhes brjod/ /sor mo dag ni
kun nas kyang / /de dag mnyam par byas nas su/ /g.yas pa'i lag pa'i dkyil dag tu/ /g.yon pa'i lag bzhag ba dan brjod/ /lag pa dag ni gnyi ga yang / /kha sbyar dag ni mdzes par gzhag /sor

dang sor mo dag kyang ni/ /phan tshun rtse mo dag sbyar bya/ /de nas srin lag rtse gnyis dgug /bum pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag bstan/ /de nyid khu tshur sbyar nas ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni sngon du bsgreng / /rtse mo dgug

pa'i rnam par bya/ /'khar gsil 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin/ /phyag rgya 'di ni yang dag bstan/ /'khar gsil sgra ni sel bar byed/ /'khar gsil de nyid cung zad tsam/ /legs par rab tu btud pa ni/ /mthe bo gnyis la

rnam par sbyar/ /de 'dir bya ma bum du brjod/ /mdzub mo dang ni srin lag gnyis/ /bsgreng bar yang ni bya ba ste/ /de dag gi ni rtse bzhi sprad/ /gtun shing 'dra bar yang dag 'gyur/ /sngags shes yang dag ldan pa yis/ /

gtun shing gi ni phyag rgyar bshad/ /lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ni/ /gung mo srin lag 'og dang ni/ /steng du de dag rnam par dgod/ /g.yas pas g.yon pa bcing bar bya/ /sor mo mdzub mo mthe'u chung dag /

phan tshun du ni yang dag sbyar/ /khor yug skyil krung 'dra ba yi/ /phyag rgyar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /'di ni skyil krung phyag rgya zhes/ /'jig rten kun tu grags pa yin/ /phyag rgya 'di dang ldan pa dang / /
de bzhin sngags dang rab ldan pa/ /rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs pa dang / /rdo rje pad ma'i rigs las byung / /'di dag gi ni sngags ldan 'di/ /zhi ba'i las kun byed pa yin/ /

gtun shing la sogs mdung gi bar/ /gang yang phyag rgya de bzhin gsungs/ /thams cad khro bo'i rgyal po ni/ /gshin rje gshed 'di'i bstan pa yin/ /mtshon cha drag po 'di dag ni/ /thams cad gdul phyir sprul ba

yin/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ /de tshe bsgrub bya sgrub pa yin/ /gdul bya gdug pa thams cad la/ /bum pa la sogs phyag rgya gsungs/ /lag gnyis de bzhin bkod nas ni/ /pa Ta ha yi rnga 'dra bya/ /sor mo

rnams ni mnyam par sbyar/ /thams cad kyis kyang rim par bsnol/ /mthe bong yang ni rim par bya/ /de nas lag pa'i nang du gzhug /gung mo mdzub mo gnyis po ni/ /gyen du bsgreng ba dag tu bya/ /'di ni pa Ta ha zhes bya/

bstan/ /phyag rgya ma rungs zlog byed pa'o/ /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /sor mo rnams ni legs par sbyar/ /gdub kor 'dra bar mdzes pa yi/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni rnam bkug la/ /mthe bo gnyis ni 'og mthar

bya/ /mthe bo gnyis kyang smad par bya/ /gung mo sbyar la rab gzhug gzhag /dung ni mdzes par 'gyur ba yin/ /'di ni chos kyi dung zhes pa'i/ /lag pa'i phyag rgyar rab tu bstan/ /thub mchog gsungs pa'i sngags ldan na/ /

las ni thams cad byed pa yin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las byed pa/ /rtsa ba'i sngags dang rab sbyar na/ /mche ba'i dug can thams cad dang / /sbrul gyi dug rnams thams cad sel/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /phyag rgya

dung ni 'bud bzhin bzlas/ /dug gis brgyal ba'i skye bo ni/ /myur du dug ni med par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya mchog ni rdzu 'phrul che/ /bzhi bcu dag ni yang dag bstan/ /de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya yi/ /mtshan zhing
yang dag bshad bya ba/ /lag gnyis de bzhin rnam bkod pa/ /sor mo'i rtse mo legs par sbyar/ /g.yon min lag pa'i nang du ni/ /'bad pas lag g.yon gzhug par bya/ /thams cad 'og tu byas pa yi/ /

lu gu rgyud du bstan pa yin/ /'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/ /gdug pa ma lus 'ching bar byed/ /thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa yi/ /sngags 'di dag dang ldan byas na/ /gza' dang ma mo sdig ldan rnams/ /'byung po ma lus

'ching bar 'gyur/ /lag gnyis de bzhin kun bsdus nas/ /bkrol zhing rim par yang dag bsgreng / /gung mo'i tshigs su mthe bo ni/ /'di nyid cho gas gzhag par bya/ /mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang / /gung mo'i bar

tshigs yang dag sbyar/ /me la mngon phyogs bstan byas nas/ /me yi sngags dang legs par sbyar/ /me yi las la thams cad du/ /me la spyan ni drang bya ste/ /me yi phyag rgya rab sbyar na/ /myur du me ni spyan drang 'gyur/ /'di nyid

phyag rgya sngags kyis gshegs su gsol/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo nyid la ni/ /mthe bo'i rtse mo rab sbyar bas/ /me yi lha ni gshegs gsol ba'i/ /phyag rgya 'di ni kun gyis bzhed/ /me yi las ni rab sgrub pa'o/ /zlos pa

sngags ni gang 'dod pa'i/ /lha rnams dag ni spyan drang 'gyur/ /phyag rgya kun gyi bzhed pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas byin brlab gsungs pa yin/ /sngags mchog dang ni ldan pa yis/ /las rnams rnam pa sna tshogs byed/ /lag gnyis

de bzhin byas nas ni/ /sor mo tshang bar sbyar nas ni/ /sor mo'i rtse mo'i mthong dbye zhing / /lhod cing zlum par yang dag bya/ /de nas pad ma yongs rdzogs pa/ /kha ni bye bar ma gyur bya/ /'di ni re ba rdzogs byed pa'i/ /phyag rgya
don kun sgrub byed ces/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab mchog ste/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar ba yin/ /sems can yid la 'dod pa

dag /yid la re ba'i phan 'dod gang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po sngags ldan pas/ /myur du de dag sgrub par byed/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab mchog ste/ /yid la re ba rdzogs zhes brjod/ /'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/ /

las kun rab tu sgrub byed pa'o/ /myur du sngags rnams sgrub byed cing / /rgya che nyid kyi rdzas dang bcas/ /thub pa'i zla ba de yis ni/ /zla ba'i 'od la rab tu bstan/ /zla bas pad ma'i rigs dag la/ /des ni phyag rgya
'di la sbyar/ /sngags mkhan ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed/ /lag gnyis de bzhin bsdu byas nas/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/ /gung mo'i sor mo'i rtse mo gnyis/ /

cung zad smad pa rta babs yin/ /de nyid yang dag bsgreng byas na/ /rta babs bzang por gsungs pa yin/ /de nyid phan tshun sbyar byas pa/ /sangs rgyas ru dung sgra ru bstan/ /mthe bo'i gtso bo bsgreng byas pa/ /mkhas

pas rgyal ba'i sgra ru shes/ /lag gnyis de bzhin yang dag sbyar/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo yang dag dgug /sor mo thams cad sbyar byas la/ /cung zad yangs par 'byung ba ni/ /de ni sangs rgyas rnga chen mkhyen/ /

chos kyi rnga ni bsgreng byas pa'o/ /de nas lag gcig thal mo ni/ /g.yas pa g.yon pa'i steng du bsgreng / /'og tu rab tu sbyar ba ni/ /glang po'i rnam par yang dag sbyar/ /g.yas pa'i gung mo'i sor mo ni/ /

glang po'i sna 'drar rab tu bya/ /'khor ba'i pha rol phyin pa yis/ /phyag rgya de ni glang por bstan/ /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bstan/ /las rnams mtha' dag byed pa ste/ /'jig rten

kun gyis mchod pa yin/ /lag g.yas brkyang zhing rab bsgreng ba/ /de ni mi 'jigs sbyin par brtags/ /lag pa g.yon pa brkyang byas pa'i/ /mkhrig ma'i tshigs la rab bzhag pa'o/ /gung mo mdzub mo sbyar byas

la/ /mthe bo gnyis ni bar du gzhug /gung mo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/ /'khrul pa med pa'i rgya de yin/ /de nyid sor mo rnam sbyar zhing / /mthe bo steng du gnas byas te/ /tshigs kyi 'og tu rab bzhag pa/ /mjug rings kyi ni rgya zhes

bstan/ /de nyid mdzub rtse rab bsgreng ba/ /mda' yi phyag rgyar bstan pa yin/ /mdzub rtse gnyis ni yang dag ldan/ /phan tshun rtse mo rnam sprad cing / /de gnyis tshigs su mtheb gnyis sbyar/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni yang dag brkyang / /

de nyid dgra star bstan pa ste/ /phyag rgya don kun sgrub byed pa'o/ /thams cad yang dag bsdu ba yang / /phyag rgya kun gyis mchod pa yin/ /de bzhin du ni rab bsgreng ba/ /mdzub gnyis rtse mo sbyar byas pa/ /de ni mtshon cha rtse gcig

rgya/ /de bzhin 'khor lo mda' chen gshol/ /mdzub mo 'khor lo bzhin bya dang / /phyag rgya dam pa gshol yang bya/ /phyag rgya drug cu 'di dag ni/ /cho ga dang bcas gsungs pa'ang yin/ /'di dag ma lus mtshon cha'i rgya/ /sngags

dang yang dag ldan par gsungs/ /dman pa kun gyis byas pa'i skyon/ /gza' dang grul bum ma mo dang / /srin mo kun gyi gtso bo rnams/ /byis pa'i sems can 'jigs byed pa/ /phyag rgya'i mtshon cha las byung
bas/ /de dag thams cad des 'jig 'gyur/ /phyag rgya drug cu 'di dag gi/ /mtshan nyid nye bar bstan pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga yang dag 'byung / /lag gnyis de

bzhin rnam bkod pa/ /pad ma 'dra bar yang dag bsgreng / /sor mo thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa/ /phyag rgya pad ma zhes bya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mchog ces bya/ /pad ma'i rigs la yang dag sbyar/ /pad ma'i rigs ni ji snyed pa/ /

sngags dang ldan pas dge bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byin rlabs las byung ba/ /myur du las rnams byed par brjod/ /ji snyed pad ma'i rigs gsungs pa/ /sngags rnams ma lus sgrub par byed/ /pad ma rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di/ /

phyag rgya'i pad ma zhes su brjod/ /lag gnyis yang dag sbyar nas ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni yang dag bsgreng / /gung mo'i sor mo sbyar byas nas/ /rdo rje rtse gsum yang dag 'byung / /gung mo'i sor mo'i tshigs dbus

su/ /mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar/ /de nyid rdo rje zhes gsungs te/ /phyag rgya dam pa tha ma yin/ /ji snyed rdo rje'i rigs kyi sngags/ /de dag phyag rgya 'di sgrub 'gyur/ /cho ga ldan par rab zhugs na/ /myur ba nyid du 'grub par

'gyur/ /sgrub pa las dang yang dag ldan/ /bsgrub bya rtag tu sgrub pa na/ /grub mchog tha ma bar ma ni/ /de la rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten sngags rnams ma lus pa'ang / /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /

lag gnyis yang dag sbyar byas nas/ /gung mo gnyis ni yang dag bsgreng / /srin lag mthe bo dag kyang dgug /mthe'u chung gnyis ni sbyar byas la/ /mdzub gnyis rtse mo sprad nas ni/ /mdzub mo'i dbus tshigs gnyis

dgug bya/ /gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar/ /'khor lo 'dra bar yang dag 'byung / /'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo ste/ /'dir ni phyag rgya'i rgyal por bstan/ /de tshe chos rgyal gyis gsungs te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /

thub pa'i zla ba bdun pa yis/ /de tshe zhi ba'i 'khor lor gsungs/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal po rab sbyar nas/ /dus gsum rgyun mi chad bzlas na/ /'jig rten pa yi sngags kun dang / /khyab 'jug dbang ldan gyis bshad pa/ /

zlos pa phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /mthong ba tsam gyis de dag gcod/ /'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/ /chos kyi dbyings las rnam par byung / /sems can rnams ni ci 'dod pa/ /thams cad las ni byed par 'gyur/ /chos

kyi rgyal pos zhi don du/ /phyag rgya 'di ni yang dag bstan/ /cho ga'i rgyal pa'i mchog 'di ni/ /las rnams ma lus rab tu sgrub/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bstan pa la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya 'di'o/ /ma zhi ba

yi phyag rgya kun/ /zhi ba'i las la rab tu sbyar/ /sngags pas rtag tu mgo bor ni/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya brtag par bya/ /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /kha sbyar 'dra bar bya ba yin/ /sor mo lhod cing

yangs par bya/ /lag gnyis sor mo'i rtse dgug pa/ /'di ni pad ma dkar po yi/ /phyag rgya sems can don sgrub shes/ /de las lag pa gcig btang nas/ /khu tshur phye zhing sor mo bsrings/ /lag pa brkyang ba lta bu ni/ /mchog

sbyin gyi ni phyag rgyar brjod/ /lag gnyis kyang ni de bzhin byas/ /kun nas sor mo rnams kyis ni/ /phreng ba bzhin du gshib byas pa/ /rgyal ba'i phyag rgyar 'di brjod do/ /de bzhin lag gnyis sbyar nas ni/ /gung mo mdzub

mo gnyis dag ni/ /khab kyi rnam par bya ba yin/ /de las gzhan pa'i sor mo ni/ /cung zad dgug par bya ba yin/ /de nas mdzub mo gnyis dag ni/ /gnas pa'i rnam par legs dgod bya/ /de yang yang dag sbyar byas

te/ /srin lag gi ni tshigs su brten/ /'jig rten mang po'i 'dren pas ni/ /rus sbal phyag rgyar 'di bstan to/ /de bzhin lag gnyis rnam par dgod/ /sor mo dag ni kun nas kyang / /gnyi ga khu tshur mnyam byas

nas/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni sbyar bya ba/ /mkhas pas phyag rgya de nyid ni/ /rdo rje dbyug par yang dag brjod/ /lag gnyis de bzhin yang dag par/ /kha sbyar 'dra bar byas nas ni/ /phan tshun sbyar ba la brten nas/ /sor mo
thal mor rnam par dgod/ /mthe bong gnyis ni nang gzhug pa/ /dgra 'jig phyag rgyar brjod pa yin/ /de nas lag gnyis mnyam byas te/ /de nas thal mor byas nas ni/ /kun nas gzhol bar rab tu bya/ /

gru yi bzhon par rab tu 'byung / /'jig rten gsum gyi skyob pa yis/ /gru yi phyag rgyar 'di rab bstan/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las/ /'byung po rnams ni yang dag sgrol/ /sor mo de nyid bsgreng nas ni/ /de tshe lag

gnyis sna tshogs bya/ /phyag rgya gzhal med khang zhes bya/ /sems can steng du rjes su 'dzud/ /de bzhin lag gnyis yang dag bsdus/ /shing rta zhes ni de la brjod/ /theg gsum 'gro ba'i gtso bo ste/ /skyob pa rnams kyis shing

rtar gsung / /zlos pa sngags ni 'dod pa la/ /'byung po kun ni 'dren par byed/ /theg pa mchog la brten nas ni/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob par byed/ /de nyid lag gnyis rab bsgred nas/ /gnyi ga yang ni kha sbyar bya/ /lag mthil

gnyis ni mnyam byas brkyang / /lan kan 'dra bar yang dag 'byung / /'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/ /'jig rten mgon gyis legs mchod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas rnams su/ /thub pa'i zla bas yang dag gsungs/ /

gang du 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /ma 'ongs da ltar bzhugs pa dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings la bzhugs/ /gang du gnas mal la bzhugs pa/ /phyag rgya gnas mal zhes bya bar/ /'jig rten 'dren pas de 'dir mkhyen/ /lag

gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /sor mo rnams ni yang dag sbyar/ /kha sbyar du ni rnam par dgod/ /g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gcig gis ni/ /g.yon pa'i rtse mor gtug bya ba/ /de ni zla ba phyed du brjod/ /lag gnyis de bzhin

byas nas ni/ /g.yas pa'i sor mos khu tshur bya/ /lag pa g.yon la yod pa yi/ /sor mo kun ni mnyam bsgreng ste/ /sor mo'i rtse mos khu tshur bcing / /g.yas dang g.yon pa ldan pa yi/ /sor mo rnams ni sbyar byas nas/ /

mthe'u chung gnyis ni brkyang byas pa/ /pi bang phyag rgyar nye bar bstan/ /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /sor mo cung zad kha bye yang / /mthe bo gnyis kyi bar du ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni brten par bya/ /'di ni pad mtsho'i

phyag rgya ste/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis 'gro la gsungs/ /rtag tu mthe bo gnyis brkyang ba/ /ut+pa la yi phyag rgya zhes/ /rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas kyis/ /'jig rten du ni gsungs pa yin/ /de nyid thal

mo sbyar byas pa/ /'gro ba phyag 'tshal 'dra ba ste/ /bla ma phyag 'tshal rgya 'di zhes/ /'jig rten kun tu rnam par grags/ /rgya de nyid ni bsdam byas na/ /lag gnyis zung du yang dag 'byung / /rgya 'di lag pa
gnyis gzung zhes/ /'jig rten gsum du rnam par grags/ /cung zad mthe bo rtsar bzhag ste/ /mtheb rtsar phan tshun legs gnon pa/ /de ni kha sbyar rgya ru 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'khrug pa rnam par 'jig /gang

dag mtshon cha las byung rnams/ /phyag rgya 'di dag gsungs pa yin/ /me tog gdan dang bzhon pa dang / /gzhan yang gdon ni 'jigs byed pa/ /thams cad las kun byed ldan pa/ /skyob pa'i sngags kun thams cad yin/ /

tshes grangs dang ni rgyu skar dang / /smyung ba dag kyang mi bya ste/ /phyag rgya sngags su rab ldan na/ /las rnams myur du grub par byed/ /zlos pa dka' thub ldan pa dang / /sngags zlos pa la mkhas pa dang / /phyag rgyar

sngags su rab bstan na/ /bsgrub bya min pa'ang cung zad med/ /lag pa gnyis po bya ba ni/ /phan tshun thal mo yang dag sbyar/ /mthe'u chung srin lag mthe bo yi/ /tshigs ni bar ma sbyar bar bya/ /gung mo sbyar ba'i tshig

gsum par/ /mdzub mo bkug ste sbyar bar bya/ /rigs gsum gyi ni spyi la yang / /mchod yon gyi ni phyag rgyar bstan/ /sor mo zung ni gsum po dag /de bzhin phan tshun yang dag sbyar/ /mdzub mo'i rtse gnyis yang

dag sprad/ /mthe bo gnyis kyi 'gram du bskum/ /thal mo 'dra bar yang dag ldan/ /me tog phyag rgyar bstan pa yin/ /lag pa'i thal mo bkan byas nas/ /mthe'u chung sbyar byas rgyab tu ni/ /srin lag yang dag

sbyar bar bya/ /de yi rgyab tu gung mo sbyar/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni sbyar bar bya/ /sa la thal sbyar bya ba yin/ /mthe bo gnyis ni 'gram bzhag pa/ /chos kyi phyag rgyar bstan pa yin/ /thal mo gzhan gyi sbyor ba yi/ /
mdzub gnyis cung zad bkug pa ni/ /gtor ma spyi yi phyag rgya ru/ /'jig rten skyob pas de gsungs so/ /ji ltar cho ga bzhin du ni/ /nang du me tog gzhug byas na/ /gtor ma kun gyi las la ni/ /gsang
sngags kun la byin par 'gyur/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i lag /g.yon pa'ang de bzhin bya ba yin/ /mkhrig mar sbyor ba'i bya ba yis/ /g.yas g.yon dag ni bsnol bar bya/ /'di ni sngags rnam+sa ma

lus pa'i/ /dri yi phyag rgyar brjod pa yin/ /lag g.yas khu tshur bcings nas ni/ /mthe bo dang ni gung mo gnyis/ /de nas rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /mar me'i phyag rgyar brjod pa yin/ /srin lag dang ni mthe bo

nyid/ /bgrang phreng dag tu yang dag gnas/ /rtag tu mthe'u chung rnam par brkyang / /de 'og gung mo'ang brkyang bar bya/ /mdzub mo bskums te bzhag pa la/ /bgrang phreng gi ni phyag rgyar brjod/ /de nas thal sbyar nang

du ni/ /sngags rig pas ni phreng ba gzhug /ci 'dod sngags ni bzla byas na/ /myur du grub pa'i mchog rab ster/ /cho ga 'di ni rtag mthong na/ /sngags rnams kun ni spyod par byed/ /me la lag pa g.yas pa ni/ /mi

'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag rgyar bya/ /me la mngon du bltas bzhag nas/ /mdzub mo rtag tu dgug par bya/ /mthe bo lag pa'i dbus su ni/ /bkug nas yang dag rab tu dgod/ /me ni yongs su spyan drang ba'i/ /phyag rgyar 'di ni

bstan pa yin/ /mdzub mo yi ni rtse mo dang / /mthe bo gcig tu sbyar bya ba/ /me dang las rnams kun la ni/ /gshegs su gsol bar rab tu snang / /sngags rnams kun la mkhas pa yis/ /sbyin sreg las la bya ba
yin/ /rgya 'di dag dang ldan pa yis/ /sngags ni me la legs par sbyar/ /phyag 'tshal thal mo byas pa las/ /sor mo kun nas nang du gzhug /de nyid rnam par bzlog byas nas/ /mthe bo gnyis kyang gshib
par bya/ /mdzub mo phyi rol yang dag bkug /gung mo dag la yang dag brten/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mchog tu gsungs/ /mchod pa'i las la sbyar bar bya/ /sngags rnams kun la phyag 'tshal dang / /sngags

kyi mgon po rgyal sras sbyar/ /sngags rnams kun la sbyang ba dang / /gdan dag la yang rab tu sbyar/ /me tog med par gyur na yang / /phyag rgya bcings la mchod par bya/ /cho ga 'di yis mchod na ni/ /sngags rnams
don kun sgrub par byed/ /mchod yon phyag rgya byas pas ni/ /mchod pa bzang po byas par 'gyur/ /gnyis pa sems kyi mchod pa ste/ /me tog ci 'dra yod pas so/ /rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis dam pa yis/ /mchod

pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so/ /me tog med par gyur na yang / /mchod pa rnam pa gnyis su brjod/ /sngags rnams rab tu 'grub bya'i phyir/ /las rnams kun la sbyar bar bya/ /sngags kun byed pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'ang yin/ /gnas dang mal dang bzhon pa dang / /khrus dang btung dang bza' ba dang / /mar me spos dang sngags khrus dang / /dkyil 'khor dag ni byed pa la/ /sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig dang / /

sngags pa rnams kyis byin rlabs byed/ /'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni las kun byed/ /phyag rgya rnams kyi nges byung ba/ /yongs rdzogs brgyar ni gsungs pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /

phyag rgya dag ni brgyad po ste/ /lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ni/ /gnyi ga kun nas mnyam byas la/ /de dag nyid las mdzub mo dang / /gung mo gnyis ni sbyar bar bya/ /mthe bo gnyis kyi sen mo ni/ /gsum pa'i

tshigs char sbyar bar bya/ /cung zad nang du bkug nas ni/ /rab tu sbyar ba dag tu bya/ /bdag nyid chen po 'khor lo can/ /sngags kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya yin/ /'di nyid las ni mdzub mo dgug /gung mo dag ni
mnyam par sbyar/ /srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo ni/ /sbyar ba'i rnam par dgod par bya/ /'di ni gtsug tor phyag rgyar ni/ /rgyal ba'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin/ /lag gnyis de bzhin bkod nas ni/ /gung mo'i

sor mo bcings byas pa/ /mthe'u chung sor dang yang dag ldan/ /gdugs dkar po las rgya 'di byung / /gung mo mnyam par byas nas ni/ /sor mo gnyis ni yang dag sbyar/ /gdub kor zlum po 'dra ba ni/ /phyag rgya chen

por de la brjod/ / de nyid las ni mdzub mo yi/ /tshigs ni skam kha lta bur bya/ /de nas gung mo sbyar te dgod/ /lag pa'i 'og gi char sbyar nas/ /de las gsum pa'i tshigs dag tu/ /mthe bo'i sor mos gnon par

bya/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi/ /'di ni phyag rgya mchog tu gsungs/ /lag gnyis de bzhin bkod nas ni/ /cho ga mthong la yang dag gnas/ /sor mo de nyid kun gyis ni/ /kun nas gang ba'i mdzod ltar gnas/ /

lag pa gnyis ni rnam bskyed nas/ /lag sor brgyad ni rab tu brkyang / /skyes bu brgyad po de nyid shes/ /zung bzhi dag tu gyur pa ni/ /rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis dam pa yis/ /de nyid dge 'dun zhes kyang gsungs/ /de nyid 'phags
pa'i dge 'dun rgyar/ /srid pa'i gnas 'dir gsungs pa yin/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab mchog ste/ /phyag rgya ma lus rab tu sgrub/ /lag gnyis de bzhin kha sbyar te/ /thal mo sbyar ba'i rnam par gnas/ /mdzub

mo gcig ni rab brkyang ba/ /lag pa g.yas pa yang dag brkyang / /de 'di 'byung po zhi byed par/ /de nyid gzigs pa rnams kyis bstan/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mchog ces bya/ /las rnams kun gyi don sgrub byed/ /lag gnyis

de bzhin sbyar nas ni/ /sor rtse rim bzhin mtshan pa yi/ /bsdus nas kha sbyar dag tu bya/ /mthe bo gnyis ni bsgreng nas bskum/ /de 'di pad ma'i phreng ba zhes/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas dag gis gsungs/ /
lag pa dag ni de gnyis kyis/ /sor mo kun nas bkan la brkyang / /sor mo gsum gnyis bsgreng nas ni/ /me tog kha bye'i rnam par bya/ /gnyis pa'i tshigs la bzhag pa ni/ /mthe bo dang ni mdzub mo gnyis/ /
de 'dir srid pa gsum gnas kyi/ /phyag rgyar rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs/ /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /las kun byed kyi phyag rgya brgyad/ /mthu mnyam brtson 'grus chen por ni/ /

rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis yang dag gsungs/ /muSh+Ti gtams phrag bye ba ni/ /stong phrag brgyad cu yang dag 'byung / /thub mchog grangs med 'das pa yis/ /phyag rgya 'di dag rab tu gsungs/ /phyag rgya cho ga yang dag

'byung / /rtsa brgyad brgya ni rab tu gsungs/ /'di dag kun gyi sngags kun dang / /las rnams dag kyang grub pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che kun gyi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bzhed cing gsungs/ /cho ga 'di dag sbyar ba
yis/ /don rnams myur du sgrub par byed/ /shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog /thub pa mchog gis de gsungs nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la de bzhin gsungs/ /'jam dpal

gyi ni cho ga 'di/ /phyag rgya dag ni yang dag byung / /sa steng bstan pa bsrung don du/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab tu gtad/ /dus mtha' nye bar 'od 'gyur zhing / /dus mthar mya ngan 'das pa na/ /nga yi bstan pa bsrung don du/ /

nga yis 'di dag thams cad bshad/ /sngags rnams dag ni rgya cher bcas/ /phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan nyid bshad/ /'jig rten kun la gsang ba dang / /shin tu gsang ba'ang brjod pa yin/ /mdo 'dir cho ga lhag pa ste/ /yon

tan rgya chen gsal bar byas/ /sngags rnams du ma'i tshig dang ni/ /yon tan brjod pa yang dag 'byung / /phyag rgya rnam pa mang por ldan/ /rigs pa'i rgyud ni rab tu bstan/ /mthu dang yon tan grub mtha' dang / /zlos pa'i

rgyu ni yang dag 'byung / /'gro ba'i skye gnas sems can gyi/ /dge ba'i 'bras bu 'byung ba'ang gsungs/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags rnams kyi/ /grub pa'i gtan tshigs rab tu sbyar/ /de skad gsungs nas 'jam
dpal ni/ /gzhon nu nam mkhar gnas pa yis/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /dbugs ring phyung nas snying rjes brlan/ /mchi ma de nas phyis nas kyang / /

sangs rgyas zhabs drung gnas nas kyang / /de la myur du zhus pa ni/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten 'das pa na/ /sngags kyi mdzod 'di sa steng du/ /bdag nyid chen po'i sems can la/ /de tshe ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de skad

gsungs nas sangs rgyas kyis/ /de tshe 'jam pa'i dbyangs la gsungs/ /gzhon nu khyod kyis yongs zhus pa/ /bu khyod 'jam dpal rab tu nyon/ /nga ni 'jig rten mya ngan 'das/ /sa steng stongs par gyur pa dang / /chos kyi

mdzod kyang 'jig pa dang / /nyan thos rnams kyang 'das pa na/ /rkang gnyis dam pa ston pa yi/ /gzugs brnyan mchod rten dag kyang bya/ /spos dang dri dang byug pa yis/ /mchod dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs

gos mchog dang / /gzhan yang nor bu'i gdub kor rgyan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' dang bca'/ /yang dag sbyar ba dbul bar bya/ /rnam pa sna tshogs phun sum tshogs/ /ci 'dod kha zas byas pa la/ /de bzhin sngags ni

bzlas byas dbul/ /sems can dge ba'i skyes gnas 'gyur/ /dam pa'i 'gro ba'i skye gnas su/ /grong mchog dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /mthar ni byang chub gzhol 'gyur zhing / /phyi nas zhi bar de dag 'gro/ /de skad

gsungs nas 'jam dpal ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs la dga'/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /blo ldan de nas cang mi smra/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas 'dus par sangs rgyas kyi/ /

gtsang ba'i gnas kyi steng gnas nas/ /'di dag sangs rgyas snga mas gsungs/ /de tshe chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /yun ring dus su 'das pa yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod

phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phyag rgya'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam las/ nyi shu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal

med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal mchog tu rab tu gsang ba khyod kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'khor dang bcas pa yod de/ las thams cad

la nye bar sbyar ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sbyin par byed pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa/ sngags thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ las thams cad sgrub pa/ mdor na 'jam dpal nyon cig /dang por re zhig thal

mo rab tu brkyang la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis rtse sprad de tshigs bar ma btud nas so so so sor rjes su bcug pa yin te/ /de la 'di ni 'jam dpal khyod kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba las thams cad byed par 'gyur

ba'o/ /lag pa gnyis de bzhin du byas la srin lag gnyis sbyar la de bzhin du gung mo dang mdzub mo yang bya zhing mthe'u chung gnyis kyi ri mo gong ma la mthe bo'i rtse mo bzhag pa ste/ 'jam dpal 'di ni khyod kyi gdong gi

phyag rgya zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o/ /phan tshun du sor mo bsnol ba khu tshur du byas la gung mo'i sor mo gnyis rnam par bkrol la rtse mo sbyar te/ de'i 'gram gnyis su mdzub mo gnyis dkri zhing mthar gzhag par bya'o/ /de la 'di

ni 'jam dpal khyod kyi mche ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba gzhan yin no/ /mche ba'i phyag rgya'i 'gram du mthe bo gnyis bzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di ni mngon sum du 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod nyid yin no/ /gnas

de dang lag pa'i kha sbyar der nye bar bzhugs shing dam tshig gis byin gyis rlob par byed do/ /lag pa'i sor mo phan tshun khu tshur du byas la mdzub mo gnyis bkrol te/ mthe bo gnyis gung mo'i nang du chung bar

byas pa 'di ni 'jam dpal khyod kyi gtsug pud kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ste/ gzhan yin no/ /thal mo'i tshigs rnams brkyang ba byas la srin lag dang / mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo gung mo'i nang du rtse sprad de bzhag pa 'di ni

'jam dpal mngon sum khyod nyid kyi rtsa ba'i sngags su bstan pa yin no/ /'di nyid kyi phyag rgya la mdzub mo gnyis brkyang bar byas pa ste/ de la 'di ni 'jam dpal khyod kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /mthe'u chung dang

srin lag gnyis bsnol ba byas nas lag pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag la gung mo'i phyi rol tu mdzub mo'i rtse mo yongs su bkug la/ mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par bcar ba'o/ /gzhan 'di yang 'jam

dpal khyod kyi zhal gyi phyag rgya yin no/ /las thams cad pa yang yin te 'di nyid kyi rim gyis sor mo re re bkrol ba mthe bo dang bcas pa byas na ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad rab tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du

rna ba dang mgrin pa dang lag ngar dang snying dang lag pa dang lkog ma dang rked pa dang lte ba dang brla dang byin pa dang rkang pa dang mig dang kha dang lce rnams te/ de ltar sor mo bcu rnams mthar gyis brkyang na/ rim bzhin du phyag rgya'i

mtshan nyid du 'gyur te/ mthar gyis kyang las byed do/ /zhal gyi phyag rgyas ni kha 'ching bar byed do/ /mche ba'i phyag rgyas ni gdon ma rungs pa las grol lo/ /lce'i phyag rgyas ni tshig ngan pa zlog par byed do/ /snying gi phyag

rgyas ni mi'i bdag po'i khro ba sel bar byed pa'am/ sems can gzhan lha dang lha ma yin dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang 'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs la brten pa'i khros pa rnams kyi khro ba 'jig par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du mthar

gyis thams cad du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rim pa 'dis phyag rgya grangs med par 'gyur te/ /las grangs med pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad du phyag rgya thams

cad kho na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /dpa' bo chen po de bzhin gshegs pa grangs las 'das pa dag gis phyag rgya 'di dag bcings so/ /phyag rgya chen po dpa' bo chen po sa chen po la gnas pas kyang bcings so/ /

gang du gtams pa phrag bye ba sum bcu rtsa gsum mam brgyad cu'am dgu bcu rtsa lnga'am khri phrag drug cu'i grangs la sogs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang 'das pas phyag rgya bcings so/ /'jig rten bya ba gang gzhan

ni/ /kun kyang phyag rgya rnams su 'dus/ /'di dag gang yang rung ba yi/ /phyag rgyas don kun sgrub byed pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i dus dag tu/ /lag pa gnyis kyis bcing bar bya/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la brtson pas/ /sbyin

sreg bzlas pa dag la'ang bya/ /'dug pa'am 'greng ba dag gis kyang / /zlos pas ci 'dod bar du bzla/ /srung ba chen po'i cho gas kyang / /myur du grub pa thob par 'gyur/ /dus kun phyag rgya kun gyis ni/ /las rnams kun ni

bya ba yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phyag rgya'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam gnyis pa las/ sum bcu pa rdzogs s+ho// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzig+sa nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga la phyag
rgya mchog tu shin tu gsang ba gzhan yang yod de/ phyag rgya dang rgyud thams cad kyi cho ga sngags thams cad kyi mngon par 'dod pa/ sngags thams cad dang lhan cig yang dag par sbyar na/ las thams
cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par sbyor bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lam du gyur pa yin no/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dang gung mo gnyis kyi

rtse mo dag yongs su sbyar ba ni gtsug tor 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin te/ 'dir sngags ni/ oM dz+wA la dz+wA la dIp+tod ga toSh+NI Sha dU ra dU ra hU~M ha~M/ srin lag de nyid bkug pa dang gung mo sbyar ba de
gnyis kyi sor mo'i rtse mo'i sen mo gshibs la/ rna cha gdub kor zlum po ltar bya ba ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya yin te/ 'dir yang sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ ma ma ma ma hU~M ni/

mdzub mo de nyid phan tshun mnyam par sbyar la gung mo gnyis sbyar ba ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ ta thA ga toSh+NI ShA ba lo ki te/ mUr+t+ti te dzo rA shi hU~M dz+wA la dz+wA la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da

ts+tshin+da/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ mdzub mo de nyid yang dag par sbyar ba dkyil 'khor lta bur bya ba ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ dza ya dza yo Sh+NI Sha dz+wA la dz+wA la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha da ma da ma/ hU~M hU~M hU~M ho

ha na hU~M/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi sngags so/ /mdzub mo de gnyis kyi rtse mo btud pa byas pa gung mo sbyar ba la/ mdzub mo'i sen mo gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i char sbyar ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /na mo a pra

ti ha ta ta thA ga toSh+NI ShA ya/ a na ba lo ki te mUr+d+ha na tsakra brti hU~M dz+wA la dz+wA la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na trA sa ya mA ra yo ta sA d+ha ya/ ha na ha na/ AM AM A/ ka ka /dro khi Ni dro khi Ni/ kuN+Da li ni/ a pa rA dzi tA

tra pa ri Ni hU~M phaT/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags so/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo mdud pa byas la/ gung mo sbyar ba byas pa la mdzub mo sen mo'i 'og gi gsum pa'i cha la sbyar ba ni sngags kyi bdag po

'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo yang dag par bkug pa gung mor sbyar ba'i 'og tu yang dag par bcar ba ni sngags kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo yang dag

par bkug la gung mo sbyar ba'i sen mo dang tshigs nang du yang dag par sbyar ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo gnyis yang dag par bkug la gung mo sbyar zhing 'og tu yang

dag par sbyar te/ gdub kor ltar byas pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo yang dag par bkug la gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i nang du yang dag par sbyar ba ni sngags
kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ srid pa'i las thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba tshe dang nad med pa dang dbang phyug dang bsam
pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su dga' bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi yid la mngon
par 'dod pa 'bras bu dang bcas par byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ sngags thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa/ phyag rgya dang sngags thams cad dang ldan pa yin te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa

khyod de nyon cig /dang po re zhig gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid du gyur pa ni/ lag pa gnyis mnyam por bkan cing brkyang bar bya'o/ /mthe bo dang srin lag gnyis lag pa'i dkyil du sen mos bzung zhing mthe bo'i rtse mo sbyar bar bya'o/ /

mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo gtug cing sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo dang rtse mo gnyis sbyar bar bya zhing mdzub mo dang mdzub mo yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /kun tu snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi mtshan

nyid chen po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin te/ 'dir sngags ni/ aM mu ha~M/ mdzub mo de nyid yang dag par bkug ste/ sen mo dang sen mo'i rtse mo'i dkyil 'khor ltar sbyar bas ni/ lta ba ngan pa'i zug rngu'i phyin ci
log sel ba zhes bya ba chos kyi 'khor lo chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ oM badzrA sha ni hU~M phaT/ 'di ni skyil krung gi phyag rgya ste/ sngags dang yang dag par
ldan na las thams cad byed pa/ ji ltar ston ka'i sprin bzhin du bgegs thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/ gang yang bdud bzhis byams pa dang gang yang lha dang lha ma yin gyi bgegs rnams ni skyil

krung gi phyag rgya dam pa mthong ba tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /'og ma gnyis kyang rtse mo mnyam par gshibs na khu tshur gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /sngags kyang 'di dag gang yang rung ba dang phyag rgya lag pa gnyis kyis bcings te sgrub

pa'i dus sam sngon du bsnyen pa'i dus su 'dug pa'am langs te/ lan cig gam ji srid 'dod kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing grub pa yang

mngon du 'gyur ro/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo gnyis sbyar la kun nas zlum por bya zhing gung mo gnyis sbyar te/ gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i 'og tu sbyar ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur

ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dir snying po ni/ oM a pa rA dzi tA d+hi ka /gtsug tor gyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya de nyid la gzhan gang yang rung ba dang lhan cig pa'i spyod pas bkod na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /de las mthe bo'i

rtse mo bteg la srin lag gi rtse mo gtugs nas yang dang yang bteg pa ni bod pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ e h+ye h+yi b+ha ga bAn d+harma rA dza pra tIts+tshe da ar+g+haM/ ga / pu d+hU pa~M ba liM dI pa~M

mAM tsA b+hi rak+Sha/ a pra ti ha ta/ ba la pa rA kra mA ya swA hA/ me tog dkar pos spyan drang bar bya'o/ /rang gi gzugs kyi mchod yon dang zhabs bsil ba dbul bar bya'o/ /gdan dang bzhugs su gsol ba yang bya'o/ /de la 'di

nyid kyi phyag rgya dang sngags kyis phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang steng 'og bcing bar bya'o/ /de nyid kyi srin lag dang mthe bo'i rtse mos gtugs shing smad pa byas la/ tshigs bar ma la mthe bos gtugs shing yang dang

yang bteg par byas nas/ mchod yon phul na rang gis lha gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya g.yon phyogs su bskor na phyogs bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ gats+tsha gats+tsha

b+ha ga bAn d+harma rA dza pra tIts+tshe daM ar+g+haM/ ga pu/ d+hU pa~M mAM tsA b+hi rak+Sha/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya/ phyag rgya dang sngags gshegs su gsol ba ni mchod yon gyis so/ /mdzub mo de nyid gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i 'og tu bzhag

ste/ gung mo yang dag par sbyar la mthe bo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis phan tshun mnan cing khu tshur du bya'o/ 'dir sngags ni/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ drA ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ bi ki ri Ni/ bi ki ri Ni/

d+hu na d+hu na d+hu/ rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po'i gtsug tor gyi sngags bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis zin pa dag dang dbang bskur ba dang bdag bsrung ba dang phyogs bcing ba dang dkyil 'khor bcing

ba la sogs te las thams cad la rab tu sbyar ro/ /mdzub mo de gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis bkug cing yang dang yang brkyang ba ni me lha spyan drang ba'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg gi las bya ste/ 'di nyid kyis slar gshegs su
gsol ba ni bzlog pa'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyang 'bar ba'i phreng bar bsam mo/ /gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya 'di ni las thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti

ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ e h+ye hi te dzo mA li ni ag+na ye swA hA/ mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo gnyis cung zad bkug par bya zhing gung mo sbyar la gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i nang du sbyar bar bya'o/ /gtsug tor gyi stobs shin tu

drag po'i phyag rgya yin no/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ i ma~M ga / d+hU pa~M/ pu ba liM dI pa~M tsa pra tIts+tsha ha ra sarba bud+d+ha a d+hi te/ d+harma rA dza a pra ti ha tA ya swA hA/ dri la sogs pa'i
sngags so/ /srin lag gnyis bzlog ste/ tshigs gsum pa la mthe bo gnyis yang dag par sbyar zhing mdzub mo gnyis kyang sbyar ba ni gzi brjid gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya ste/ log 'dren thams
cad kyis 'joms par mi nus so/ /phyag rgya 'di ni srung ba dang bzlas pa'i dus dang / sgrub pa'i dus dang dkyil 'khor dang las thams cad la yang bya ba yin no/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a

pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ sarba bi g+h+naM bi d+hA na sa na ka rA ya kro d+hA ya swA hA/ srin lag gnyis kyi rtsa bar mthe bong gnyis gtugs te/ de bzhin du gdub kor ltar bya zhing mdzub mo gnyis kyi nang stong pa'i rnam par bya'o/ /

'di ni thams cad du thogs pa med cing gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya yin no/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ sarba tra a pa rA dzi tA ya/ sha ma ya sha ma ya/ shAn+te dAn+te

d+harma rA dza ba shi te/ ma hA bid+yA+e sarbAr+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ mar gyi sbyin sreg la sogs pas zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las bya'o/ /srin lag gnyis kyis gdub kor ltar bya zhing mdzub mo'i rtse mo
gnyis bkug pa ni thogs pa med pa'i bde byed kyi gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ oM shang ka re swA hA/ las thams cad srung bar byed do/ /

mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mos srin lag gnyis kyi gsum pa'i tshigs la mnan la/ de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang rdo rje'i rtse mo dang 'dra bar bya'o/ /'di ni dam tshig thogs pa med pa'i spyi gtsug

gi phyag rgya ste/ dam tshig thams cad kyi thun mong ngo / /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ oM shang ka re sa ma ya~M swA hA/ mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mos srin lag gnyis

kyi bar ma'i tshigs la bcar la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug par bya zhing gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dang tshigs bar ma sbyar ba ni dam tshig thogs pa med pa gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya yin te/ lha dang lha ma yin la

sbyar na dam tshig la 'jog par byed do/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ oM shang ka re ma hA sa ma yaM swA hA/ 'dis dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas nas bzlas na 'khor los sgyur ba
yang dam tshig la gnas par 'gyur zhing 'khor los sgyur ba gzhan yang zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /gnas de nyid du bzlas pa byas na rig pa'i mthu stobs kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
pa thams cad kyi sngags rnams kyis phan tshun gnod pa byed par nus pa ma yin no/ /bzlas pa ni gnas gcig tu rnam pa thams cad du bya'o/ /de la sogs pa gtsug tor gyi rgyal po grangs med pa yod de/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la rgya cher bya'o/ /'jam dpal cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la ni sngags tshad med pa yod de/ phyag rgya yang rnam pa sna tshogs nyid de ngas 'di mdor bsdus nas bshad pa

yin no/ /ngas gal te rgya cher bshad na ni mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis bskal pa stong gi tshad du yang 'dzin pa'am 'chang bar nus pa ma yin no/ /'jam dpal de lta bas na mdor bsdus nas bshad par

bya yis/ mdor na yid la nye bar gzung bar gyis shig /dang po thub pa'i phyag rgya mchog /'dir ni rab tu gsungs pa yin/ /lha yi lha ni de nas kyang / /'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya dang / /byang chub sems dpa' blo

ldan ni/ /spyan ras gzigs ni zla ba dang / /de nas phyag na rdo rje'i rgya/ /gnod sbyin dbang po'i bstan pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya ni/ /dpag med chen po'i gzi brjid ldan/ /pho nya pho nya mo tshogs kun/ /bran pho bran mo de bzhin gzhan/ /de bzhin

gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo/ /klu dang klu mo de bzhin gzhan/ /mngag gzhug mngag gzhug mo dag dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po sha za mo/ /de bzhin gzhan yang srin mo dang / /lha dang lha min bu mo dang / /grub dang rig pa
