ri dag tu/ /de yang nor spyod gnod sbyin grub/ /khyu mchog bu ni rgyas pa ste/ /de yang de tshe sngags bzlas byed/ /de tshe sa steng de mthar gyis/ /dpa' bo chen po'ang rab tu grub/ /'di dag gzhan yang mang po yi/ /rgyal pos

'jig rten rnam grags pas/ /sngags rnams rab tu bsgrubs nas ni/ /rgyal srid byas nas lha yul 'gro/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /rgyal ba'i dbang pos gang gsungs pa/ /de kun dus ni bzang po ste/ /

lo ni stong phrag brgyad cu pa/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi don mkhas pas/ /grub pa dag ni sgrub par 'gyur/ /'di dag gzhan yang rab mang ba'i/ /sa bdag 'jig rten rnam grags pa/ /de nas stong phrag brgyad cu

'i sngags/ /de bzhin yang dag bsgrubs nas ni/ /rgyal srid byas nas mtho ris 'gro/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de tshe bar ma'i dus dag tu/ /lha mo rdzu 'phrul chen mo dang / /lha rnams kyi ni sngags

dang ni/ /pad ma'i rigs kyi sngags dang ni/ /blon po mi yi gtso bo dang / /sa bdag sa kun bdag po'o/ /bA rA Na sI grong khyer na/ /rgyal po tshangs pas byin pa yang / /'jig rten 'jig rten dbang phyug grags/ /phyag na pad ma rab tu grub/ /bdag nyid chen po

brtson 'grus che/ /lhag par snying rje chen po de/ /sems can rnams la sngags tshul gyis/ /chos rnams ston pa byin pa yin/ /rgyal po yang ni tshangs byin gyis/ /mi yi bde ba rjes myong nas/ /de nas de ni sngags grub
ste/ /lus dang bcas pas mtho ris song / /de yi bu yang blo ldan ni/ /bsod nams las ni brtul zhugs brtan/ /brtson 'grus chen po rta mgrin zhes/ /rnam par grags pa de yang grub/ /de yis sngags kyis

mthu yis ni/ /de tshe brgya byin las rgyal gyur/ /de bu dkar po zhes bya ba'i/ /rgyal po thams cad gtong ba 'byung / /de yang nor ni sbyin pa'i sngags/ /dkar mo che zhes bya ba yang / /sngags ni rab tu bsgrubs pas kyang / /lo ni sum

brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /bde ba can tu yang dag 'gro/ /nges par byang chub 'di nges thob/ /de bzhin gzhan yang ngas lung bstan/ /de tshe bar ma'i dus dag tu/ /bar ma'i sngags ni rab tu 'grub/ /

dka' ba tha ma'i dus dag tu/ /nga ni sangs rgyas nyid thob nas/ /rdo rje pad ma'i rigs dag gi/ /sngags kyang rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags dag ni/ /gang zhig sa steng sngon bstan pa/ /sngags

ni longs spyod rgyu nyid du/ /de yang rab tu grub par 'gro/ /'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /phal pa dag gi sngags dag ni/ /mi sdug gzugs can rnyog par ldan/ /bar snang dang ni nam mkhar spyod/ /sa blar gnas

pa'i gnod sbyin mo/ /de bzhin sna tshogs sha za mo/ /mi 'am ci dang mkha' lding dang / /yi dags srin pos bshad pa rnams/ /sha za lto 'phye gnod sbyin dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po klu rnams kyi/ /dus ngan de tshe tha ma la/ /

sngags ni rab tu grub par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs kyi sngags dang ni/ /gzhon nu ma yi gzugs kun yang / /dus ni 'jigs rung de yi tshe/ /de yang grub par rab tu 'gro/ /de bzhin sngags ni rnam pa gsum/ /

sgrub pa'ang rnam pa gsum yin no/ /rnam gsum nyid kyis dus kyi ni/ /rnam gsum grub pa 'dod pa yin/ /rgya che'i gtam dang ldan pa dag /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /gtso bo mya ngan med pa yi/ /de 'og

rgyal po byung ba ni/ /mya ngan bral zhes rnam par grags/ /'jig rten chos kyis spyod par ldan/ /lha mo gos dkar mo yi ni/ /de yi sngags 'di yongs su 'grub/ /mya ngan rnam bral gyis bsgrubs nas/ /lha yi gnas

su rab tu song / /yun ring bde ba mtho ris su/ /rgyal po chen po rjes su myong / /phyir yang mi yul phyin nas ni/ /blo ldan chos kyi ngang tshul ldan/ /rgyal thabs rnam pa sna tshogs ldan/ /'od chen pos ni

rjes su myong / /lo ni bdun cu rtsa drug tu/ /dpal ldan mchod rten mchod pa byed/ /de nas de ni nad btab nas/ /lus zhig nas ni lha ris 'gro/ /de yi 'og tu rgyal po ni/ /dpa' bo'i sde zhes rab tu brjod/ /chos la spyod cing

rnam par grags/ /bstan pa 'di la mnyam par bzhag /lha mo mchod rten dpal chen ma/ /de yi sngags kyang rab tu bsgrubs/ /des kyang ston pa'i khang chen ni/ /de yi tshe na byas par 'gyur/ /sa rnams rgyal mtsho'i mthar thug par/ /ma lus

mchod rten rnams kyis brgyan/ /de la rnam smin las kyis ni/ /lus las skyes pa'i nad kyang 'byung / /zla phyed gcig tu sdug bsngal nas/ /de nas shi 'phos lus zhig 'gyur/ /lo ni bdun cu dag tu yang / /mi

yi nang du rgyal thabs byas/ /shi 'phos de ni mtho ris 'gro/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de yi 'og tu rgyal po ni/ /dga' bo zhes bya 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dpal ldan grong khyer me tog ces/ /sde chen

stobs ni che bar gnas/ /sha za pi lu zhes bya ba'i/ /sngags kyang des ni bsgrubs pa yin/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /longs spyod chen po yod par 'gyur/ /rgya yi gtso bo zhes bya ba/ /'jig rten 'dir ni 'byung bar

'gyur/ /de nor thob pas blon por 'gyur/ /'jig rten rgyal po nyid du'ang 'gyur/ /de yi dus su 'byung ba ni/ /bram ze tshad ma shes pa'o/ /log pa'i nga rgyal dag la zhen/ /ma ga d+hA yi grong khyer gnas/ /log pa'i nga

rgyal gyis dregs rnams/ /'byung ba nyid du the tshom med/ /de dag gis ni rgyal po bskor/ /de dag la ni des nor byin/ /nor ni mang po de dag gis/ /dge ba'i bshes la rab mchod nas/ /de yi nor ni zad par byed/ /ma 'dres de la

goms pa dang / /sbyin la zhum med rgyu yis ni/ /blo ldan de yi lha khang ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi byed du bcug /grong khyer me tog ces bya bar/ /bdag nyid chen po blon po'i gtso/ /bram ze bzang po snying rjer ldan/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar

'gyur/ /rgyal po dang ni rab mdza' ba'i/ /chos kyi bdag nyid 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin ma ni dpa' mo ldan/ /sa steng de yi sngags kyang 'grub/ /des kyang sa steng dag tu ni/ /mchod rten bzang po byed du bcug /

gnod sbyin ma yi mthu yis ni/ /shes rab rab tu che bar 'gyur/ /de yi bag chags las kyis ni/ /sngon gyi bag chags yong bskul nas/ /blo dang ldan pas mthar gyis ni/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i byang chub 'thob/ /

mchog sred ces ni rnam grags pa'i/ /de tshe 'dod chags shas che 'byung / /bud med byas pa'i skyon gyis ni/ /bram ze'i khye'us 'chi ba thob/ /dpal ldan rgyal po dga' bo yang / /snga ma'i las kyi nyes pa yis/ /

me tog ces bya'i grong khyer gyi/ /mi rnams 'chad pas gnod par byed/ /blon po'i tshogs kyang ma dad gyur/ /stobs chen bden par smra ba yang / /sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa yis/ /nad chen dag gis thebs 'gyur

te/ /rims nad chen pos sdug bsngal gdung / /nam phyed tsam na shi bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po de yi tshe tshad ni/ /de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa drug go/ de ni nyan thos byang chub tu/ /rgyal po nges par 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi grogs po gzhan gyur

pa/ /bram ze'i khye'u pa Ni ni/ /nges par nyan thos byang chub tu/ /nga yis lung bstan byas pa yin/ /'jig rten dbang phyug bdag nyid che/ /de yang de yi sngags grub pa'o/ /bram ze shes rab 'dod pas kyang / /khro bo ha la ha la bsgrubs/ /

rgyal po de las gzhan pa yang / /zla ba sbas zhes bya ba 'byung / /gnod sbyin chu dbang grub pa ste/ /rgyal srid gnod pa med par byed/ /longs spyod che zhing bden par smra/ /chos kyi bdag nyid sa yi bdag /mi dge'i bshes gnyen rab brten

nas/ /srog chags mang po gsod par byed/ /las kyi rnam smin de yis ni/ /'brum bu'i nad 'byung rab tu brgyal/ /de ni mtshan phyed sad nas ni/ /rgyal srid la ni bu bzhag pa/ /snying po thig le zhes bya ba/ /blon po la sdang byis pa de/ /de nas

zla ba sbas pa de/ /shi 'phos sa steng dus las 'das/ /mi yi 'gro ba spangs pa yi/ /de tshe yi dags 'jig rten song / /'gro ba las grol sngags goms pas/ /de nas lha yi gnas su song / /dge ba'i sems kyis dmigs nas

ni/ /sngags kyi rgyus ni yang dag bskyed/ /rgyal po des ni mthar gyis kyang / /nyan thos kyi ni byang chub 'gro/ /snying po thig le rgyal po yis/ /byis pa mi gsal blo yis ni/ /bye ma las byas srid gzhan du/ /sngon ni mchod rten dag kyang

byas/ /de yi rnam smin mthu yis ni/ /ma smad lha yi gnas su song / /skye ba stong phrag lnga brgyar ni/ /lha yi nang du bde ba myong / /mtho ris 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/ /mi yi nang du rab skyes pa/ /blo ldan zla ba sbas pa yi/ /rgyal po

dga' ba'i rigs su skyes/ /byis pa nyid nas rgyal por 'gyur/ /yun mi thung bar bde ba myong / /'jigs med bstan dang yang dag rig /spyi brtsan pa dang snyan par smra/ /de nyid rang dbang rgyal srid ni/ /lo ni bdun cur yongs su byas/ /skra can

zhes bya'i sngags dag kyang / /rgyal po de la rab tu grub/ /khyod nyid kyi ni sngags nyid kyang / /de tshe grub par byed par 'gyur/ /khyod nyid kyis bshad sngags dag kyang / /de yi tshe na grub par 'gyur/ /byis pa'i tshul can sna tshogs gzugs/ /

byis pa rnams la mthu dang ldan/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyis lus can la/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /gang zhig khyod kyis bstan pa'i sngags/ /de tshe de yi dus dag tu/ /brjod

pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /blo ldan snying po thig le yi/ /rgyal po de yi blon po ni/ /tsa nag kya zhes rnam bsgrags pa/ /bram ze'i khye'us khro bo 'grub/ /gshin rje gshed ces bya ba ni/ /blo ngan des ni de yang 'grub/ /des ni khro bas

zil non nas/ /srog chags dag gi 'tsho ba bcad/ /de tshe rgyal po gsum gyi bar/ /shin tu mi bzad sdig pa byas/ /de ni dus ring 'tsho ba yi/ /bram ze ngan pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /lus des

lha min brten par byed/ /lha min lus la zhugs nas ni/ /de ni dus ring 'tsho bar byed/ /de nas lus de zhig nas kyang / /mnar med dmyal bar yang dag 'gro/ /de nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de/ /blo ngan des ni rjes su myong / /

dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa/ /mi 'dod de tshe las las byung / /las gcig sdug bsngal des zad nas/ /khro bo'i sngags kyis rab bskul te/ /dmyal ba las ni de 'chi 'phos/ /dud 'gro dag tu nye bar skyes/ /

klu yi skye gnas brten nas ni/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can dag tu 'gyur/ /khro ldan chen po klu yi rgyal/ /gdengs can dug gis dregs byed dang / /mi bzad las ni rab byed pas/ /ma rungs las las de 'chi 'phos/ /

rdzu 'phrul chen po yi dags kyi/ /gshin rje'i rgyal por rab tu 'gyur/ /de ltar sdug bsngal stong phrag ni/ /yang dang yang du rjes su myong / /blo ngan de ni mthar gyis su/ /bram ze'i khye'ur sa steng 'ongs/ /mi yi skye

bar 'ongs nas ni/ /'jigs pa yi ni gzugs can 'gyur/ /khro ba dang ni dbul ba nyid/ /grags pa chung ba nyid du 'gyur/ /gang yang 'jig rten rang sangs rgyas/ /'dod med bse ru lta bur spyod/ /dman pa la ni

rjes brtse ba/ /sa yi steng na rnam par rgyu/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/ /bsod snyoms spyod la rab tu zhugs/ /de tshe gzhan sems rig pa des/ /blo ngan de ni rab tu mthong / /snying rjes yin gyis gzhan min des/ /

de yi thad du byon par 'gyur/ /des ni zan dron gsol ched du/ /bse ru lta bu la ni khyer/ /des ni sngags la rab brnyas nas/ /de tshe rgyu ni yang dag bstan/ /de las gcig gi bdag nyid la/ /bsod snyoms de ni yang

dag bstabs/ /kye 'di rab byung ma lus pa/ /ji ltar bde ba bzhin du gsol/ /de la rjes brtse rang sangs rgyas/ /de tshe rdzu 'phrul bstan par 'gyur/ /de yi mthu yis yid bskyod nas/ /de nas ngo mtshar rab skyes te/ /sangs rgyas

bse ru lta bu la/ /spyi bos kun la rab tu btud/ /ji ltar 'dod par nyes bral rnams/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yi mthus/ /rang rgyal byang chub smon lam btab/ /bdag nyid chen po ci 'dra ba/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po zhi ba'i gzugs/ /sdug

bsngal blo ngan mi 'gyur bar/ /de 'dra bdag ni 'jig rten shog /las kyi lhag ma zad pa dang / /'chi 'phos de tshe mtho ris song / /chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/ /nyan thos de ni byang chub thob/ /de bas sngags kyi sgrub pa

ni/ /mngon spyod dag ni yong mi bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /mngon spyod rab tu bkag pa yin/ /snying rje mchog ldan sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /sngags rnams mthu bstan

don du ni/ /las rnams thams cad bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin nor bu lta bu'i sngags/ /gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /khro dang chags pas zil mnan pa'i/ /byis pa rmongs pa'i sems dag gis/ /de dag sngags ni

mngon spyod la/ /phan tshun rab tu sbyor bar byed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /blo dang ldan pas de bzhin bkag /rnam pa thams cad sngags rnams ni/ /sems can longs spyod 'phel ba dang / /de nas rgyal po dam pa dang / /srung ba che

dang dbang phyir dang / /skye gnas sna tshogs la gnas pa'i/ /sems can rnams ni dgug don du/ /sngags kyang bsgrub par bya ba ste/ /'tsho ba dgag phyir ma yin no/ /dge slong mang du thos pa ni/ /de yi tshe na 'byung 'gyur ba/ /ma khol zhes

kyang bya ba ste/ /nga nyid kyi ni stod byed pa/ /ji bzhin yon tan bzang po ni/ /ji lta bzhin du brjod par 'gyur/ /kun nas sems ni rab dang zhing / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/ /sgrub dka'i sngags ni rab

bsgrub cing / /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi de bzhin no/ /yon tan ldan zhing tshul khrims ldan/ /mang du thos shing chos kyang smra/ /dud 'gror sngon ni gyur pa na/ /nga yi bstod pa yongs su smra/ /nyams dga' grong khyer rgyal po'i khab/ /

'od ma'i tshal gyi sa steng du/ /slob ma'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu/ /ji ltar bde bar bzhugs pa na/ /der ni bya rog cig yod pas/ /nga la sems ni rab dad byas/ /sems ni nga la dad byas pas/ /lus zhig nas ni mtho

ris song / /lha rnams las ni shi 'phos nas/ /mi rnams nang du nye bar skyes/ /mi yi nang du skyes nas kyang / /nga yi bstan la rab tu 'byung / /rab byung bdag nyid chen po de/ /ji bzhin de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ma khol zhes bya'i brtul

zhugs can/ /de ni de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ji bzhin don ni bstod pas mchod/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dpe dag gis/ /'byung po kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /legs par spyod pa rab byed pa'o/ /sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ /bstod

pa brjod pa de gtsor byed/ /dus mtha'i 'jig rten smad pa la/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rnam par smin pa de yis ni/ /lus zhig nas ni bde 'gror 'gro/ /blo ldan de ni mthar gyis kyang / /rnam pa sna tshogs bde myong nas/ /bsam

gyis mi khyab mchog gsungs pa'i/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub thob/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nga 'das nas/ /lo ni bzhi brgya lon pa na/ /dge slong klu zhes de 'bod 'byung / /bstan pa la ni dad cing phan/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa

thob pa/ /lo ni drug brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /rig pa rma bya chen mo ni/ /bdag nyid chen po des kyang grub/ /bstan bcos sna tshogs don dang ni/ /dngos po med pa'i don de rigs/ /gang tshe lus de bor ba na/ /bde ba can du'ang skye bar 'gyur/ /

de nas mthar gyis sangs rgyas nyid/ /nges pa kho nar yang dag 'thob/ /thogs med ces bya'i dge slong ni/ /bstan bcos de ni don la mkhas/ /mdo sde des don drang ba'i don/ /rnam pa mang po'ang rab tu 'byed/ /'jig rten rig pa

ston bdag nyid/ /gzhung byed ngang tshul can du 'gyur/ /de yi rig pa grub pa 'di/ /sA la'i pho nya mo zhes rjod/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /blo ni bzang po skye bar 'gyur/ /bstan pa yun ring gnas pa'i phyir/ /mdo yi de nyid don

sdud byed/ /lo ni brgya dang lnga bcur 'tsho/ /de lus zhig nas lha yul 'gro/ /'khor ba rnams su 'khor ba na/ /yun ring bde ba rjes myong nas/ /bdag nyid chen po mthar gyis de/ /byang chub thob par 'gyur ba yin/ /de ltar rnam pa mang po yi/ /

nga yi bstan la dge slong rnams/ /shes rab ldan nyid chos kyang spyod/ /dus kyi mtha' la de tshe 'byung / /phyi ma de tshe dus dag tu/ /dge slong dgra bcom zhes bya ba/ /de ni sngags don bdag nyid ldan/ /rgyud shes de bzhin mang du thos/ /

gnod sbyin sngags ni rab brjod pas/ /de la bum pa bzang po 'grub/ /sngon ni ngas ni gang bshad pa'i/ /theg pa chen po'i mdo sde yang / /de yi tshe na bum pa las/ /dka' thub chen po 'dren par byed/ /glegs bam de la des

bltas nas/ /de la sngags ni zlos pa na/ /gnod sbyin bsgrub pa'i bum pa la/ /der ni bsrung ba ma byas pa'i/ /bag med dran pa nyams pa yis/ /gtsug spyod kyis ni bum pa phrogs/ /de ni de nas sngags grub pa'i/ /

dge slong sngags ni zlos byed pa'i/ /bum pa dag ni bltas pa na/ /der ni mngon par mthong ma gyur/ /de nas khro bas mig dmar zhing / /rnam g.yo tshig tu smra ba ni/ /tshangs pa dka' ba'i mthar gyur par/ /brgya byin sogs

bcas dbang phyug che/ /sngags kyis ma bkug ma 'ongs na/ /sngags pa bdag min sngags rgyal min/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas sras sngags dang / /rgyal ba mchog gis sngags dag ni/ /tshar gcod don du gang gsungs
pa'am/ /gdul dka' 'dul bar byed pa'ang rung / /gal te kun rnams ma bkug na/ /sa steng ma lus de dag med/ /de nas sngags pa chen po langs/ /brtul zhugs brtan zhing las rnams grub/ /ji ltar sngags ni

byas pa yi/ /sbyor ba mthong bas rgyud dag kyang / /rkun ma dgug pa de don gtsor/ /sbyor ba rab tu byas par gyur/ /skad cig dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /sdom brtson de ni las myur byed/ /yi ge hU~M gi sngags gcig gis/ /tshangs
sogs sa steng 'dren par byed/ /lha rnams ma lus rab bkug pa/ /tshangs sogs brgya byin dang yang bcas/ /ha ha zhes bya'i sgra 'don cing / /nyam thag 'jigs pa'i sgra yang sgrogs/ /

ci bgyi zhes bya'i blo byed cing / /bdag cag 'dir ni nyes med smra/ /myur zhing rab tu rings par yangs/ /blo ldan dge slong 'jigs med pas/ /lha rnams la ni rab smras pa/ /'dir ni bum pa slar byin zhes/ /lha rnams phan tshun

thams cad la/ /dge slong des ni rab tu smras/ /gang gis bum pa bzang po khyer/ /khyod kyis myur du rab tu smros/ /lha rnams kun gyis bltas pa na/ /kun tu yang ni ma mthong gyur/ /bum pa 'di ni su yis khyer/ /lha yi dbang

pos yang dag dgongs/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po/ /dpal ldan lag na rdo rje can/ /de yi bu ni mi bzad yod/ /khro ba che zhing shin tu gdug /bgegs kyi gzugs kyis sngags pa la/ /'gro ba kun la rnam par

rgyu/ /bum pa de ni des khyer mthong / /lha yi bdag pos de yang smras/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi bgegs yod pa/ /sa steng rtse zhing rol par byed/ /'dis ni bdag la ma mchod pas/ /des ni bum pa de 'dir khyer/ /lha yi

bdag pos de smras nas/ /phyir yang lha yi gnas su song / /de tshe rang nyid sngags kyis ni/ /lha rnams ma lus slar gshegs gsol/ /skad cig yud tsam nyid kyis ni/ /shin tu legs par yang dag bkug /de tshe
dbang med bum par bcas/ /bgegs de nyid dang bcas par 'ongs/ /de nas de ni bgegs de yis/ /yi dags rnams la bum pa byin/ /de nas de yi bgegs des ni/ /tshig 'di dag ni rab tu smras/ /yi dags 'jig

rten bum pa khyer/ /nga ni de la dga' ba med/ /sngags pa des ni dka' ba dang / /dka' bas btud de bgegs la smras/ /song shig song shig bgegs chen po/ /phyin cad 'di ltar ma byed cig /de nas des ni yi dags

dag /de yi mod la bkug par gyur/ /ltogs shing ngal ba'i sems dang ni/ /dman zhing de dag khab tsam kha/ /shin tu mi bzad chen po de/ /nyam thag skad kyang rab tu 'don/ /snying rje'i tshig tu smra ba ni/ /bdag nyid chen po

yongs su skyobs/ /khyod kyi bum pa 'dir 'ongs kyis/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin bdag la byos/ /sngags pa snying rje cher ldan pas/ /yang dag 'dar ba rab tu skyes/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /tshig ni 'di
dag rab tu smras/ /khyod kyi 'jig rten sdug bsngal ci/ /yun mi ring par rab tu smon/ /dman pa'i yid kyis de smras pa/ /bkres pas yang dag gdungs par gyur/ /yi dags 'jig rten skom pa yis/ /

bdag nyid chen po yin yang rung / /dge slong snying rje chen pos ni/ /de dag la ni bum pa byin/ /de nas de dag yid dga' nas/ /myur bar rang gi gnas su song / /de dag bsam pa tsam gyis ni/ /bum pa las ni bza' btung

byung / /dge slong dga' bo'i 'og tu ni/ /tsan+dan skyong ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de tshe dus ni tha ma la/ /lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /bdag nyid chen po byang chub ni/ /bgegs med myur du rnyed dka' thob/ /rgyal po btsun pa zhes bya ba/ /nga yi

bstan pa nub byed pa/ /dus kyi tha ma de yi tshe/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shar phyogs nas ni brtsams nas su/ /kha che'i yul gyi bar dag tu/ /rmongs pas lha khang mchod rten rnams/ /de tshe de bzhin 'jig par 'gyur/ /

dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa rnams/ /blo ngan des ni gsod par byed/ /byang gi phyogs su brten nas ni/ /de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mi ma yin pa nyid 'khrugs nas/ /yul 'khor phyugs dang gnyen rnams dang / /ri yi dum

bus bcom par 'gyur/ /blo ngan de ni sa 'og 'gro/ /de ni 'og nas 'og tu 'gro/ /dmyal las dmyal ba rab drag par/ /sdug bsngal sdug bsngal drag par ni/ /mi bzad par ni yang dag ltung / /mnar med zhes ni bya ba

yi/ /sdig pa'i las kyis dmyal ba ni/ /de nas bskal ba cher 'tshed pa/ /bdag nyid ngan pa go mi shan/ /mi dge'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ /sdig pa shin tu mi bzad byas/ /de ni nga yi bstan pa la/ /rnam pa

kun gyis 'bad nas ni/ /sems ni ma lus rab btang nas/ /phun sum tshogs dang de nas spyod/ /nges par sangs rgyas nyid lam ni/ /yan lag brgyad kyi theg pas ni/ /de tshe de ni rab 'gro zhing / /mya ngan nad

med dam pa thob/ /de yi 'og tu sa srung ba/ /sangs rgyas phyogs zhes rnam par grags/ /phyogs che gtong ba che ba dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar the

tshom med/ /thams cad mngon dga'i rgyal po ste/ /ston pa'i bstan pa de gtsor byed/ /kun dga' ra ba mchod rten gnas/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan bla na med/ /mtshe'u rdzing dang khron pa dang / /mtsho rnams dag ni du ma

dag /rgyal po chen pos byas nas ni/ /tshe zad lha yi gnas su song / /des kyang sa steng grub pa ni/ /pad ma 'chang ba brtson 'grus che/ /bdag nyid chen po sems dpa' la/ /sa yi bdag por don du gnyer/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /

lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /de yi las kyi lhag ma yis/ /myur du byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /de yi bu ni rgyal po yang / /sde chen stobs ni che ba yi/ /zab mo'i phyogs zhes rnam par grags/ /grong khyer sa ni lnga len 'byung / /rig pa'i bdag

nyid rgyal po de'ang / /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang dang / /mchod rten rdzing dang khron pa ni/ /'od chen sa yi bdag po de/ /du ma byed par the tshom med/ /blo dang ldan pa 'jam dbyangs kyi/ /sngags kyang

des ni rab bsgrubs pa/ /de dag yi ge drug ces bya/ /don chen longs spyod 'phel byed pa'o/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /de ni longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ /blo dang ldan pa mthar gyis ni/ /myur du byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de

bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan 'di la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bya ba byed/ /byang gi phyogs la brten nas ni/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lha ldan yul zhes bya ba yi/ /gangs can ri yi nang gnas pa'i/ /rgyal po mi yi lha zhes

pa/ /li ts+tsha bI rnams rigs su byung / /de yang sngags kyi don bsgrubs te/ /longs spyod che dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rig pa longs spyod ldan zhes bya/ /mi yi bdag pos de yang grub/ /lo ni brgyad cur rgyal srid byas/ /des ni rkun

ma rnam par spangs/ /rgyal po de ni srog spangs nas/ /der yang sngags ni myur 'grub ste/ /zhi dang rgyas pa bsil byed pa'o/ /'jig rten sgrol ma zhes grags dang / /lha mo gos dkar ma dang ni/ /dkar mo chen mo

gzhan phan brtson/ /rtag tu yid ni mi skyo ba'o/ /de la sogs pa gsungs pa yi/ /de bzhin rgyal po mang po ni/ /rnam pa du ma mang po dag /kha dog sna tshogs sna tshogs gzugs/ /kha ba can gnas kla klo'i rgyal/ /de yang

ston pa mchod byed pa'o/ /khyu mchog khyu mchog bzang po dang / /sa 'od de bzhin sa 'od bzang / /de bzhin pha rol gnon nyid dang / /rkang pa'i 'gros zhes bstan pa yin/ /sa srung dang ni be'u dang / /'od ldan nyid ni phyi ma yin/ /

tha mar char rgyal ngang tshul te/ /kla klo rnam pa sna tshogs yin/ /de 'og lugs ni rnam zhig cing / /phyi rol skye dgus nye bar spyod/ /de tshe bal yul bdag po ni/ /mtshon gyis 'thab pas rnam par 'jig /kla klo'i rkun po bsten pa

yi/ /der ni rgyal po rnam par 'jig /sa bdag du ma gsungs pa rnams/ /sna tshogs lha dang bram ze dag /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgya yul kun la brten pa yi/ /rgyal po dbyig gi snying zhes bya/ /sde chen stobs

kyang che ba dang / /blon po rgya che nyid dang ni/ /skye bo rtsa lag rab tu mang / /kla klos btud dang rnam par rgyal/ /ston pa'i bstan pa de gtsor byed/ /gzhon nu bdag nyid chen po nyid/ /de yi sngags ni rab bsgrubs pa/ /mthu ni chen po

dang ldan pa'i/ /rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge brgyad/ /dpa' bo che zhes rnam par grags/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas chen yin/ /de yi byis pa'i blo yis ni/ /rgyal srid phyir ni rab smon byas/ /gang gis dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /

sangs rgyas nyid du nges 'gyur ba/ /mi bdag rgyal thabs nyid kyi phyir/ /de ni skal ba mi nyung 'gyur/ /mchog gi sbyin pa bla na med/ /bsam pa tsam gyis thob pa nyid/ /tshangs sogs lha rnams thams cad la/ /ma lus lung ni

rtsol byed na/ /lha ngan phal pa dag dang ni/ /mi yi 'jig rten smos ci dgos/ /lo ni brgya dang lnga bcur 'tsho/ /grags chen lha yi gnas su 'gro/ /chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/ /byang chub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /gzhon nus

yongs su bshad pa yi/ /rig pa 'di ni de yul du/ /de ni myur du 'grub 'gyur gyis/ /rig pa gzhan ni nam yang min/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo che/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'od chen po/ /mngon sum de yi yul dag

na/ /byis pa'i gzugs kyis bzhugs pa yin/ /grub pa'i zhing mchog dam pa la/ /mi ni yongs su sgrub par 'gyur/ /rgyal po tu ruSh+ka zhes bya/ /byang phyogs la ni yang dag brten/ /sde chen brtson 'grus che ba ste/ /de yi gnas su 'byung

bar 'gyur/ /shing shun gyon yul ma gtogs pa/ /kha che'i mthar thug ka shir bcas/ /de ni dpag tshad bdun brgya dang / /'bum phrag gnyis kyi sa bdag tu/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /de tshe the tshom med par 'gyur/ /de yang sngags

ni grub pas na/ /lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /blo ldan mi yi spyan gyur pas/ /skra can ma yi rig pa bsgrubs/ /bdag nyid dge bar bya ba'i phyir/ /lha khang dag ni mang po byas/ /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig gi/ /mchod rten mchog ni

de bzhin byas/ /theg pa chen po mchog chos dang / /de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ /'jig rten shes rab pha rol phyin/ /de yi yul du rab gnas byas/ /rgyal po de ni lus zhig nas/ /mtho ris 'jig rten

'gro bar 'gyur/ /sa bdag de ni mthar gyis su/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med 'thob/ /de 'og sa bdag rgyal po ni/ /chen po tu ruSh+ka zhes bya/ /blo ldan mang pos bkur zhes bya/ /rtag tu dge zhing mchod la dga'/ /lha mo sgrol ma rdzu 'phrul

che/ /de yi sngags kyang rab tu bsgrubs/ /des kyang sngags ni rab bsgrubs pa/ /sa steng rgyal po'i ched du'o/ /phyogs che dpung ni chen po dang / /rgyal po grags pa chen po ste/ /gnyen dang rigs dang rgyal pos kyang / /de ni bkur ba nyid du 'gyur/ /

rtsa brgyad stong gi gtsug lag khang / /de yi dus su yod par 'gyur/ /de yi sngags kyi mthus yis ni/ /lo ni nyis brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /gang tshe de lus zhig pa na/ /dga' ldan du ni skye bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu

'phrul che/ /lha yi bus kyang bkur bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/ /byang chub yan lag mngon rdzogs nas/ /'bad pas de ni mthar gyis kyang / /mnyam med byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /dus kun de yi

yul du ni/ /gsung rab mang po gnas 'gyur ba/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba dag gis gsungs/ /da ltar ngas kyang gsungs pa yin/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po klu dang ni/ /'dod chags bral bas rnam par gnas/ /de bzhin 'jig

rten skyong ba dang / /gnod sbyin bstan pa srung byed dang / /sa steng dam chos srung byed pa/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar rnam pa mang po bstan/ /sa bdag 'jig rten rnam grags pa/ /bstan dang ston par 'gyur ba yin/ /

nub phyogs yul ni mtha' yas pa/ /'phags rgyal zhes bya'i pha rol tu/ /la da'i yul gyi skye bo ni/ /ngang tshul zhes bya'i rgyal po yod/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/ /grong khyer phyin nas yang dag

zhugs/ /chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba ste/ /mchod rten sna tshogs gtsug lag khang / /de bzhin srog chags dge bar ni/ /sa bdag chos la mnyes gshin pas/ /rig pa'i bdag nyid byed par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i gzugs

brnyan yid 'ong la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod pa byed/ /'jig rten mgon po grags chen gyi/ /mchod rten mchog la'ang mchod pa byed/ /des na de ni sngags kyang grub/ /rgyal po las skyes kho na ni/ /de yi yul du yang dag

grags/ /dge slong bsod snyoms byed pa ni/ /tshul khrims ldan zhing blo dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/ /bdag nyid chen po dus su rgyu/ /de ni bsod snyoms rab zhugs rgyu/ /rgyal po'i khab bzang rab mthong ba/ /

rgya che skye bos gang ba la/ /bslang ba'i don du der yang zhugs/ /bkres pa dang yang yang dag ldan/ /ngal zhing ltogs pa'i yid gyur kyang / /de tshe bsod snyoms rnyed ma gyur/ /rgyal po'i skyes bus de myur bzung / /khyim de las ni phyung

bar 'gyur/ /de nas de ni yid byung nas/ /rgyal po'i mi la rab khros te/ /grong khyer de las nges byung nas/ /mod la de yi rang gnas phyin/ /ltogs shing skom pa nyid gyur pas/ /sdug bsngal yid mi bde bar gyur/ /de nas de ni zas chad

nas/ /mtshan phyed du ni langs gyur nas/ /sdom brtson de ni sems chud pas/ /de tshe srog ni gtang bar rtsom/ /de tshe smon lam byed pa ni/ /la da'i yul gyi bdag por shog /de nas dge slong dus las 'das/ /spu gri zhes

bya'i rgyal rigs su/ /bdag nyid chen po de skyes gyur/ /ston pa'i bstan pa mchod par byed/ /lo ni sum cu dag tu yang / /rgyal srid gnod pa med par byas/ /brkam chags rang mi'i sbyor ba yis/ /ma zhu'i nad kyis

btab par gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po lus zhig nas/ /dus byas lha yi gnas song ba/ /byams pa gang du bzhugs pa yi/ /dga' ldan lha yi gnas mchog tu/ /bdag nyid chen pos chos 'chad par/ /de nyid du ni skye bar 'gyur/ /

'od chen byams pa chen po la/ /bsnyen bkur byed cing chos kyang nyan/ /bdag nyid chen po de mthar gyis/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i byang chub thob/ /tshul khrims zhes bya'i rgyal po'i 'og /g.yo ba zhes bya 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lo ni lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang / /

de bzhin zla ba lnga ru 'tsho/ /de srid rgyal srid des byas nas/ /mtshon chas 'tsho bas rab bsad pa/ /bud med byas pa'i skyon nyid kyis/ /de ni mtshon chas bsad par 'gyur/ /de yi nu bo brtan zhes bya/ /brtan pa chos ni brtan

par 'gyur/ /sngon ni bkren pa zham ring gyur/ /yul ni la da'i bdag por gyur/ /lhag ma rgyal po thams cad dang / /skye dgu kun kyang zham ring pa'o/ /tshul khrims zhes bya rab 'das nas/ /de ni de dag kun gyi sngar/ /sa bdag thams cad 'byung 'gyur

ba/ /dpa' bo rgya mtsho'i pha rol 'gro/ /rgyal po dbang po zla mdzes dang / /de bzhin du ni gzhu dang tog /me tog gzhu dang rgyal po'i bu/ /res ldan grong las byung ba yin/ /dang po'i dang po snga ma dag /ba la'i grong du 'byung ba

yin/ /'od ces bya ba stod rnams dang / /de bzhin khyab 'jug ces bya ba/ /rgyal po mtha' yas gsungs pa ni/ /ya nga ba yi rigs su 'byung / /de dag phyi ma'i rgyal po ni/ /khyab 'jug ces ni bya ba 'byung / /grong dang skye bo gnyen dang bcas/ /

drang srong dmod pas gnod gyur pas/ /blo ldan rgyal po med par 'gyur/ /grong khyer chu yis rab tu gang / /de tshe de yi res ldan grong / /rgya mtsho chen pos rab tu gang / /byang gi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /rtsom pa sna tshogs ri zhol brtan/ /sna tshogs rigs la

gnas pa yi/ /rgyal po rnams ni mtha' yas gsungs/ /nyi shu gcig dang sum cu yi/ /mi yi rgyal por shes par bya/ /bcwa brgyad sa yi bdag po zhes/ /bar ma'i sa kun bdag po yin/ /mtha' yas klu yi sde la sogs/ /de las tha

ma rnam par zhig /de nas khyab 'jug 'phrog byed dang / /mdung zhes bya ba 'phrog byed gzhan/ /dbang ldan dang ni phreng kun dang / /bza' dang brtul zhugs bzang po gzhan/ /dus kun chos lugs rnam par nyams/ /rgyal po de dag dus las 'das/ /

des ni bram ze rigs byung ba/ /de tshe longs spyod che nor dang / /bar mthar yi ge dang po b+ha/ /de tshe blon po gnyi ga gtso/ /gnyi ga nor ldan dpal ldan grags/ /bstan pa la ni phan par dga'/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags rgyal po/ /blon pos de tshe

sngags kyang bzlas/ /de nas bzung nas sa yi bdag /gnyi ga mi yi dbang phyug gyur/ /bdun dang brgyad dang de bzhin gsum/ /de tshe dpal mgrin gnas na 'dug /ston pa nyi ma zhes bya ba'i/ /gnas na dbang phyug rab tu gnas/ /

thams cad gnas su sa yi bdag /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /yi ge ha zhes rab gsungs pa/ /sa rnams kun la mi yi bdag /de yi yul du sngags 'di dag /de tshe grub par 'gro ba yin/ /zhi dang rgyas pa'i rig pa rnams/ /

gang zhig chos rgyal gyis gsungs pa/ /longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs tshogs/ /de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs ldan/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi gzungs dang ni/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po gnod sbyin mo/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /der ni grub par

'gyur ba yin/ /lho yi phyogs la yang dag bstan/ /rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi sa dag la/ /rgyal po dkar dang zla mdzes dang / /sa la yi ni bzhon pa dang / /dbang chen dang ni bde byed dang / /sa bdag de bzhin yid du 'ong / /longs

spyod skra bzang skra zhes su/ /lho yi phyogs su rnam par grags/ /bkra shis dang ni rnyed sla dang / /ba lang rnyed dang khyu nyid dang / /gru bzang de bzhin gru dag dang / /dbang chen dang ni zla ba nyid/ /ba lang srung dbang zla ba'i sde/ /'dod lha de bzhin ma ga d+hA/

/grong byed bde byed nyid dang ni/ /stag dang seng ge gza' lhag dang / /sangs rgyas dag pa bum pa dang / /bum pa ma lus nyid du brjod/ /mnyam dang legs par 'jam pa dang / /skra bzang skra ni ldan pa dang / /lho yi phyogs su sa yi bdag /

mtha' yas mang por bstan pa yin/ /'das dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang / /da ltar dag tu rtogs par gyis/ /rnam pa sna tshogs nad btab nas/ /'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs 'chi/ /mtshon gyis 'debs dang mu ge yis/ /'chi zhing kha cig phyogs

gzhan 'gro/ /de ltar 'di dag rgyal po rnams/ /kan tsi pu rar gnas par bstan/ /de bzhin stong phrag rnam grags pa/ /de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de dus de tshe phyogs dag tu/ /sngags rnams grub par 'dod na ni/ /khro bo rdo rje'i rigs bstan

pa'i/ /sngags 'di dag ni bsgrub par bya/ /mngon par spyod pa'i las dag dang / /de bzhin dbang gi don yang 'grub/ /gzhon nu byis pa'i gzugs can ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni bdag nyid che/ /de tshe dus mthar phyin pa na/ /de tshe yul

der 'grub par 'gyur/ /ri bo 'bigs byed la brten nas/ /rgya mtsho ba tshwa can 'gram du/ /gdong drug ces ni yang dag bsgrags/ /sems can rnams la mchog sbyin byed/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo dang ldan/ /byang chub sems

dpas bka' stsal pa/ / sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/ /lho yi phyogs su gnas par gyis/ /gdong drug gang gi sngags dag ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rab bstan pa/ /de tshe de phyogs de dus su/ /grub par 'gyur bar the

tshom med/ /de tshe dpal gyi ri bo'i phyogs/ /'bigs byed nang dang ri zhol dang / /gling nyid rnam pa thams cad dang / /ka ling ka zhes rab bsgrags dang / /yon tan gsum dang kla klo dang / /kho ra 'khor yug ko sa la/ /rgya mtsho'i nang dang 'gram dag tu/ /rgyal po dag ni mtha'

yas yod/ /cha shas kA ma rU zhes pa/ /kha ba can gyi nang na gnas/ /o Da yul gyi mtshams kun na/ /rgyal po rnams ni mang po gsungs/ /sna tshogs kla klo'i rgyal po ni/ /ston pa mchod byed de gtso byed/ /dbang po zla ba dga' ba yi/ /rgyal po kla klo'i

gnas na gnas/ /da las rgyal po gnyis dag ni/ /bstan pa la ni lo brgyad dang / /ston pa'i sku gzugs mchod byed pa'o/ /de las skyes pa thams cad ni/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la rab dad par/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shar gyi phyogs

la brten pa yi/ /rgyal po'i mchog ni mang po gsungs/ /gang zhig 'das dang ma 'ongs dang / /da ltar byung ba thams cad du'o/ /dang po'i rgyal po mchog bshad bya/ /go DA'i rgyud du sa steng skyes/ /grong khyer 'phel byed nyams dga' bar/ /grags ldan de ni rab tu skye/ /

de ming 'jig rten zhes bya ba/ /rgyal po go DA 'phel byed byung / /nga ni 'jig rten skyes med 'dir/ /de ni chos la sems pa byung / /sa bdag mang po rnams mnan nas/ /zho shas 'tsho ba dag tu byas/ /bar ma'i dus su 'di dag mnyam/ /bar ma

bar ma'i chos dang ldan/ /rtsod pa'i dus kyi tha ma la/ /mi yi dbang po de nyid nyon/ /rgyal po rgya mtsho zhes bya dang / /rnam par gnon pa nyid dang ni/ /rgyal mchog gtso bo dbang chen dang / /de 'og yi ge sa zhes bya/ /lha yi rgyal po zhes bya ste/ /tha ma'i dus

la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i gtso bo sna tshogs zhes/ /blo ldan chos ni 'phel byed pa'o/ /de yi nu bo byis zhes bya/ /bstan pa 'di la phan zhing dga'/ /shar phyogs rgya mtsho'i mthar thug par/ /mchod rten gyis brgyan mdzes pa ni/ /

de tshe sa rnams ma lus par/ /byed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /lha khang kun dga' ra ba rdzing / /skyed mos tshal dang bkad sa ni/ /de tshe dpal ldan byed 'gyur zhing / /gzings dang zam pa byed pa po/ /de tshe ston pa'i gzugs brnyan mchod/ /de

la zhugs pa'ang mchod par byed/ /rgyal srid sa yi bdag po byed/ /gnod pa med cing 'gran zla med/ /lo ni sum brgya dag tu'ang 'tsho/ /zhag ni sum cur rab byung nas/ /pha rol rgol bas pham byas te/ /de nas rgyal pos rang srog bcad/ /

de 'og de nas lus zhig nas/ /dmyal ba dag tu rab skyes te/ /zhag gsum dang ni gcig dag tu/ /dmyal ba dag gi 'gro bar gnas/ /de nas dmyal ba'i lus bor nas/ /rtag tu rgyal po lha gnas 'gro/ /lha rnams legs spyad

'jig rten du/ /gtsang ma'i gnas zhes rab tu dran/ /der ni lha rgyal zhes byar 'gyur/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid byang chub gzhol/ /brgya phrag dang ni stong phrag tu/ /lha yi bde ba rjes su myong / /phyir yang mi lus thob nas ni/ /srid pa gzhan

la sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /skye ba gzhan du sems can la/ /de nyid kyis ni las kyang byas/ /grong khyer 'phags rgyal zhes bya ba/ /de tshe ma la bar skye'o/ /de ni tshong dpon mchog gyur pa/ /ma la bar skyes nor chen ldan/ /'jig rten stong zhing gnas

med pa/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba med dus su/ /rang sangs rgyas ni 'jig rten du/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par rgyu/ /sems can rnams la phan don du/ /sa yi steng du rnam spyod de/ /grong khyer 'phags rgyal phyin nas ni/ /bsod snyoms spyod la rab tu

zhugs/ /bdag nyid chen po tshogs spyod pas/ /de tshe lam chen grong bar ru/ /de tshe tshong pa de nyid kyis/ /thub pa mngon du mthong bar gyur/ /'bras chan la ni mgron bos nas/ /de tshe rang gi khyim du khyer/ /de nas thub mchog

myur khyer nas/ /stan dag la ni bzhugs su gsol/ /zas kyi dus ni nyer gnas pas/ /bcom ldan de ni dgongs su gsol/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag kyang / /de tshe cang mi smra bar gyur/ /de tshe tshong pa de la ni/ /lhung bzed dag

ni zed par gyur/ /tshong pa zur gyis go ba dang / /de tshe blo dang ldan gyur pas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba yis/ /lhung bzed rnams ni yongs su bkang / /de nas des ni rang lag gis/ /de dag la ni 'bad pas

byin/ /thogs nas de dag thams cad ni/ /mar me'i phreng ba bzhin du mthong / /nam mkha' la ni lus brten nas/ /de dag de yi mod la song / /de nas ba spu langs nas ni/ /de tshe skyo ba mang po gyur/ /yid ni rdzu 'phrul la dad nas/ /

sa de la ni rab tu 'gyel/ /smon lam de tshe byed pa yang / /ji ltar tshig tu smra ba ni/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yis ni/ /de ring bdag gis gang thob pa/ /des ni thub pa rab mchog ni/ /'jig rten blo yi mchog 'gyur shog /de tshe sa steng

'khor los sgyur/ /skye ba stong phrag bcu ru 'gyur/ /de nas de yi lus spangs nas/ /bye ba drug cur lha gnas 'gro/ /der ni yun ring bde myong nas/ /lha gnas skye ba yongs bor te/ /de tshe mi yi skye ba ni/ /gzhan gyi

dbang gis 'dir yang phyin/ /de ni rgyal po'i rigs skyes pa/ /thams cad du ni 'dir yang 'gyur/ /rgyal po byis pa zhes bya de/ /shar gyi phyogs su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /skye ba stong phrag brgyad du ni/ /bde ba sgrib med thob

'gyur ba/ /dpal ldan rgyal pos thob pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid mthar thob 'gyur/ /de ltar rnam mang sems can dang / /de bzhin phun tshogs rgya che ba/ /de tshe mchod dang skul byed pa/ /ston pa la ni su mi byed/ /rig pa dge

ba byed pa yi/ /byang chub lam la nges par sbyor/ /de las gzhan pa'i rgyal po ni/ /go DA nus pa'i ngang tshul can/ /gzhon nu zhes bya'i rgyal por gsungs/ /de yang shin tu chos dang ldan/ /de nas gzhan pa
dpal ldan bcas/ /yi ge u zhes rnam par grags/ /de las gzhan ni rnam 'byed cing / /de bzhin phan tshun 'jigs par byed/ /de dag go DA drag sems kyis/ /'di dag 'byed pa chen por

byed/ /de nas lha zhes bya ba yi/ /rgyal po lam ni byed par shes/ /dgra rnams kun gyis yongs khyab nas/ /de ni dgra yis bsnun nas shi/ /de'i 'og zla ba zhes ni bya/ /des ni rgyal po nyid kyang byas/ /sngon gyi las kyis
bskul nas ni/ /de nas mtshon gyis rmas nas shi/ /de yi bu ni bcu gnyis grangs/ /lo brgyad bcas pa dag tu 'tsho/ /de yang mtshon gyis rab btab nas/ /de tshe byis pa nyid du shi/ /de dag gcig la

gcig sems shing / /drag po phan pa med la dga'/ /rgyal mchog yi ge ta zhes bya/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /go DA'i 'jig rten rnams kyi gtso/ /chen po'i nad kyis yang dag btab/ /nad de nyid kyis
nyam thag nas/ /dus byas nas ni 'og tu song / /de 'og yi ge da zhes bya/ /nyin zhag cung zad rgyal po byed/ /go DA'i yul du byung gyur pa/ /gang gA'i 'gram du yang dag gnas/ /de 'og yi ge b+ha

zhes bya/ /zhag gsum du ni rgyal po byas/ /de nas sa srung rgyal po ni/ /thams cad du ni de tshe 'byung / /rgyal po de ni snyan par smra/ /byas pa gzo zhing stobs kyang che/ /bud med dbang 'gyur bkren zhing glen/ /
dgra las rgyal zhing mi phyed 'gyur/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ /de tshe gtong ba chen por 'gyur/ /mchod rten nyams dga' gtsug lag khang / /kun dga' ra ba rnam mang po/ /rdzing yang
chu ni phun sum tshogs/ /bsod nams gang ni legs mdzes pa/ /de dag mang po ston byed cing / /grags dang snyan pa'i don la brtson/ /lha yi stegs ni nyams dga' dang / /phug dang gnas khang dag kyang

byas/ /ya mtshan can gyis yang dag gnon/ /sna tshogs mu stegs gnas kyis ni/ /rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi mthar thug par/ /phyogs de thams cad rnam par gnon/ /brtse ldan longs spyod ldan dpag med/ /rgyal po de ni

chos la dga'/ /shar gyi phyogs su rgyas par ni/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu cho gar yang dag ldan/ /ka ba nye bar gnas gyur tshe/ /gang gA'i 'gram la yang dag brten/ /de tshe rgyal thabs byas

pa ni/ /lo ni sum cu dag dang bdun/ /lo ni brgyad cu dag ni 'chi/ /de nas de yi lus zhig nas/ /lha rnams dag tu nye bar skye/ /de nas dpal ldan klu yi rgyal/ /chos kyi bdag nyid chos la dga'/ /mchod rten gang

zhig 'di byas dang / /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid du 'ong / /de tshe sa steng dge 'dun ched/ /logs su gtsug lag khang dag byas/ /rnam par smin pa de yis ni/ /srid pa tha ma la brten nas/ /nges par sangs

rgyas nyid lam dang / /mi g.yo go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /de yi 'og tu go DAr ni/ /de dag gtsor ni mu stegs gnon/ /shar gyi phyogs su 'byung ba ni/ /grong khyer du ni mu stegs gnas/ /rgyal po'i ming ni bcom ldan zhes/ /go DA'i

nang na mthu dang ldan/ /brtul zhugs can ni mthur ldan pa/ /sbyin gnas zhes pas dbang yang bskur/ /der ni rgyal srid byas nas su/ /nub kyi phyogs su yang dag song / /ci 'dod sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i/ /grong
khyer nyams dgar rab tu zhugs/ /ma zhu pas ni rab btab nas/ /phyir yang rab tu log par 'gyur/ /shar phyogs rgya mtsho'i mthar thug bar/ /rkun ma rnams kyis yang dag khyab/ /mtshon gyi gnod pas
rab bshig nas/ /shi nas yi dags 'gro bar song / /sa bdag rgyal po mi mang ba/ /des ni lo gsum bar du byas/ /de nas de ni rkun pos bsad/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba'i yi dags song / /de nyid du ni lo gsum

bar/ /yi dags rgyal thabs yongs su byas/ /yi dags 'jig rten mi bzad pa/ /de nas de ni lus kyang btang / /skye ba de las rnam grol nas/ /rtag tu mtho ris 'jig rten song / /de yi 'og tu rgyal po ni/ /rgya mtsho zhes ni bya bar grags/ /blo ngan lo ni

gsum gyi bar/ /blo gros ngan pas rgyal srid thob/ /de yi nu bor rnam grags pa/ /thal ba zhes bya'i rgyal po 'byung / /srog gcod pa dang yang dag ldan/ /bab col chen po rab tu byed/ /'bad pas rang gi lus la
yang / /brtse med bag ni med pa'o/ /byis par gyur pas 'di nyid sems/ /pha rol don ni de mi sems/ /mi dge'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ /sdig pa'i las ni mang po byas/ /g.yo ldan de bzhin bkren pa yi/ /

bram zes rgyal srid dag kyang gnon/ /mi dang mi ma yin dag gi/ /longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs phun sum tshogs/ /rgyal po des kyang rab tu thob/ /de ni mthar gyis song ba dang / /rgyal po nub kyi

phyogs dag tu/ /kha che'i sgo yi mthar thug bar/ /byang gi phyogs la brten nas ni/ /der yang g.yul las rnam rgyal nas/ /rgyal thabs de tshe byas pa ni/ /bcu gnyis lo dang zla ba lngar/ /sa la rgyal srid de tshe

byas/ /de nas de ni nad kyis btab/ /yang dang yang du brgyal bar gyur/ /sdug bsngal chen pos zil mnan nas/ /lus ni zhig nas shi 'phos 'gyur/ /rgyal srid phyir ni rab chags nas/ /de dag phan tshun zhe sdang

zhing / /mtshon chen tshogs kyis 'phen pa ni/ /de dag phan tshun byas par 'gyur/ /yi ge sa ming byis pa khye'u/ /de tshe rgyal srid dbang yang bskur/ /mtshan ma tsam zhig de byas nas/ /phyir yang de ni 'byung bar

'gyur/ /bram ze'i gtso bo gnyis kyis ni/ /de dag phan tshun phye nas ni/ /ma ga d+hA yi yul phyin zhing / /u dum bA ra'i grong zhes par/ /bram ze'i gtso bo byis pa gnyis/ /sa steng rang gis dbang yang bskur/ /

de nas mthar gyis de song nas/ /shar phyogs su ni yang dag brten/ /go DA'i yul gyi mir yang phyin/ /de tshe 'gran zla med par gyur/ /bdag nyid ngan pa'i rtsod rgyal gyis/ /byis pa'i gtso bo de gnyis pos/ /
mi dge'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ /srog chags mang po rab tu bsad/ /gang zhig sngon gyi rgyal pos bkur/ /dpa' bas nga rgyal byed pa gang / /go DAr skye bo gnas pa dag /thams cad dag ni gsod

par rtsom/ /de nas rgyal po zla ba zhes/ /dpa' bo gcig pu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gang gA'i 'gram gyi mthar thug dang / /bA rA Na sI de las gzhan/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan nyams dga' ba/ /blo ngan gyis ni 'jig par

'gyur/ /chos kyi stegs ni mi nyung ba/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis sngon bstan pa/ /blo ngan dag gis bsreg 'gyur zhing / /mu stegs rnams ni gsod par dga'/ /de nas de ni khro dang chags/ /mi sdom log pa'i nga rgyal can/ /mchod rten kun dga' ra ba gnas/ /

sa steng gcer bu'i gnas dag kyang / /de nas thams cad 'jig byed cing / /'tsho ba 'gog pa'ang byed par 'dod/ /yul gyi dbus su rgyal po gzhan/ /de yi dus su 'byung 'gyur ba/ /yi ge ra ming rigs bdag nyid/ /rje rigs kyis 'tsho de las

gzhan/ /ston pa'i bstan pa 'di la dad/ /zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal mchog des/ /gcer bu'i rigs gyur rgyal po ni/ /da yang rab tu bsad par gyur/ /yi ge ha ming de'i nu bo/ /dpa' bo gcig pu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dpung ni chen por yang dag

ldan/ /dpa' zhing zil gnon rnam par gnon/ /rgyal po yi ge ha bya bas/ /zla bar rnam grags gnas las bton/ /de nas rgyal po rje'u rigs spyod/ /sde chen stobs ni che ba dang / /de tshe shar gyi phyogs dag ni/ /bsod nams che ba'i

grong mchog song / /rgyal rigs chos la gnas nas ni/ /chos kyi don shes brtser ldan pas/ /de ni nga rgyal khro tshul gyis/ /srog chags mang po gsod byed cing / /sems can gnod pa byed pa dang / /chad pa byed la rab dga' zhing / /

las ngan rjes su spyod byed pa'i/ /zla ba zhes bya pham par byas/ /zla ba zhes bya de phyung nas/ /rang gi gnas na rab tu 'dug /yi ge ha ming slar log nas/ /kla klo'i rgyal pos rab tu mchod/ /yi ge ha bya dge dang ldan/ /dge ba'i

don gyi las kyis ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'gros dag gis/ /rang gi yul ni nyid du phyin/ /de nyid kyis ni las byas pas/ /rgyal srid dga' dang ldan pa thob/ /yang na rgyal srid spyod gnas pas/ /longs spyod rab tu

thob ldan pa/ /snga mar rang sangs rgyas la ni/ /bza' dang gos ni byin pa dang / /de tshe lham ni byin pa dang / /gos kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs kyang byin/ /de yi las kyi mthu yis ni/ /lha mi'i rgyal srid chen po thob/ /lha dang mi yi phun sum tshogs/ /longs spyod phun

sum tshogs ldan spyod/ /zla ba zhes bya'i bram ze'i rigs/ /longs spyod cher ldan gang phyir de/ /bram ze dag la longs spyod byin/ /de tshe rgyal thabs byed pa ni/ /lo ni bcu dang bdun dag dang / /de bzhin gzhan ni zla ba gcig /nyin zhag bdun dang

brgyad dag tu/ /kha yi nad kyis yang dag btab/ /srin bu rnams kyis zos nas ni/ /dus byas nas ni 'og tu 'gro/ /mi ma yin pas zil mnan nas/ /de tshe grong de bshig par 'gyur/ /mi ma yin pas nyen pa yi/ /rims kyis nyam

thag nad kyis brgyal/ /sngags kyi sbyor bas 'chi ba ste/ /de tshe rgyal po dus las 'das/ /mnar med pa zhes bya ba yi/ /dmyal bar sdig pa'i las byed rnams/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rjes spyod pa/ /de ni de ru skye bar

'gyur/ /dmyal bar de tshe bskal chen du/ /ma rungs sems ldan 'tshed par 'gyur/ /de nas so thams kyi hud zer/ /yang sos dang ni thig nag dang / /mi bzad ral gri'i nags tshal yang / /yang dang yang du myong bar 'gyur/ /yi

dgas 'jig rten dud 'gro nyid/ /de bzhin gshin rje'i 'jig rten du'ang / /de ltar skye ba stong rnams su/ /'khor bar yang ni 'khor 'gyur yang / /des ni bde ba mi thob cing / /rtag tu sdug bsngal bsten par 'gyur/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bstan pa la/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /sems ni kun gyis dad byas te/ /nad med phun sum tshogs par song / /sangs rgyas phan 'dogs byed pa yis/ /'bras bu mtha' yas

'byung 'gyur bas/ /sangs rgyas la ni dang bar bya/ /chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin no/ /rgyal pos dkon mchog gsum mchod na/ /'jig rten gyi ni mchog tu 'gyur/ /rgyal thabs chen po'i grags pa thob/ /nor gyi dbang

phyug longs spyod che/ /rgyal pos phun tshogs rgya che ba'i/ /bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'thob/ /'jig rten mchog ni mchod byas na/ /'jig rten dbang phyug nyid du 'gro/ /de nas brgya byin 'thab bral nyid/ /tshangs pa nyid du'ang yang

dang yang / /nyan thos rang rgyal nyid dang ni/ /sa steng sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ /theg pa gsum gyi mchog thob cing / /theg pa la ni chags med 'gyur/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bsam

mi khyab/ /de dag 'bras bus bsam mi khyab/ /rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ /de nas gzhan yang rgyal po ni/ /zla ba sa steng med pa na/ /phan tshun 'khrug pa'i ngang tshul du/ /go DA'i rgyud ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phan tshun ltos pa med

par ni/ /de tshe mtshon ni 'debs par 'gyur/ /zhag ni bdun po gcig dang ni/ /de bzhin gzhan ni zla ba gcig /de tshe tshogs kyi rgyal srid rgyud/ /de tshe sa steng byed par 'gyur/ /gang gA'i 'gram gyi grong der ni/ /gtsug lag khang gi

gnas kyang byas/ /de nas zla ba zhes bya ba'i/ /bram ze'i khye'u de yi bu/ /zla ba brgyad dang zhag lnga dang / /phyed dang gnyis zhag 'das nas 'chi/ /de'i mthar rgyal po 'dug pa ni/ /klu yi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ /go DA'i yul

gyi rgyal po 'byung / /dang por dza ma'i rigs bram ze/ /kun nas rje'u rigs kyis bskor ba'i/ /klu zhes bya ba de yang 'byung / /de yang mu ges gnod pa dang / /de bzhin pha rol dmag tshogs gnod/ /de dag rgyal srid thob pa

na/ /chom rkun chen pos kun tu khyab/ /des kyang de yi lugs nyams te/ /der ni lo ni lnga dang gcig /rgyal srid kun nas 'khrugs bzhin spyod/ /srog gcod mang po byas nas ni/ /de tshe srog la gnod par byed/ /snga ma'i

las kyi nyes pa yis/ /rje'u rigs spyod pa de dag byed/ /phan tshun 'khrugs pa'i ngang tshul du/ /de tshe de ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dag de tshe nus ldan tshul/ /rgyal rigs spyod la gnas pa yi/ /go DA'i rgyud kyi mi yi

bdag /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /kha cig de tshe mtshon gyis 'chi/ /nad rnams kyis kyang yang dag 'debs/ /de nas dus byas rgyal po rnams/ /dmyal ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bud med gtso bo'i

byis pa ni/ /de yang phyis ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /de dag de bzhin zla phyed nas/ /mtshon gyis bsnun nas de nyid bsad/ /mu ge chen po yang dag 'byung / /pha rol dmag tshogs dag gis dkrugs/ /yid ni skrag par gyur pa
yis/ /shar phyogs yul mi nyams par gyur/ /de yi yul du mi bdag ni/ /the tshom med par 'byung 'gyur ba/ /bcom brlag skyes pa'i rgyal po mchog /yangs pa can gyi tshong pa sngon/ /de yang lus la mchod

pa yi/ /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal por 'gyur/ /de'i yang nu bo yi ge b+ha/ /shar gyi phyogs la yang dag gnas/ /de bu yi ge pra zhes bya/ /shar phyogs nyid du yang dag skyes/ /rgyal rigs mchog tu skyes par bstan/ /legs par spyod

pas byis par bcings/ /lo ni bcu dang bdun dag tu/ /'ching ba dag la yang dag bzhag /glang rdzi zhes bya'i rgyal pos bcings/ /bcom ldan zhes bya des ni bkrol/ /yi ge ha zhes rgyal chen ni/ /nub kyi phyogs na yang dag

'ongs/ /shar gyi phyogs ni mtha' med par/ /gang gA'i 'gram du gnas par gyur/ /dmangs rigs gzi brjid che ba dang / /sde chen stobs ni che ba dang / /de ni de yul 'gram gnas nas/ /kun tu yang ni rab tu gnas/ /

go DA'i skye bo zhes grags grong / /mu stegs zhes kyang rnam par grags/ /rgyal pos de ni rnam mnan nas/ /stobs chen de ni 'dug par gyur/ /der ni rgyal rigs byis pa de/ /tshong pa dang ni lhan cig 'ongs/ /

der ni nam phyed zhugs nas ni/ /nam gyi mthar ni de yang mchod/ /dmangs rigs rgyal po zhes bya bas/ /slar nyid du ni ldog par byed/ /gang gA'i 'gram gyi mthar thug par/ /grong khyer dga' ba zhes bya bar/ /de tshe

rgyal srid ma ga d+hAr/ /byis pa de ni bzhag par gyur/ /bA rA Na sI'i pha rol tu/ /kA shi yul gyi mir yang phyin/ /stobs chen sa yi bdag po ni/ /dmangs rigs der ni zhugs par gyur/ /sdug bsngal nyam thag nad chen pos/ /de tshe bu

ni dbang yang bskur/ /byis pa khye'u phug ces pa/ /de tshe rgyal thabs dbang yang bskur/ /chen po'i nad kyis zil mnan nas/ /de tshe sa yang 'khor bar mthong / /de nas 'bad pas shugs nar phyung / /lus zhig nas ni dud 'gror song / /

de tshe zla ba bdun dang brgyad/ /dud 'gro dag tu gnas par gyur/ /de yi skye ba las grol nas/ /lha rnams kyi ni nang du skyes/ /de tshe skye ba nyi shur ni/ /lha yi phun sum tshogs pa thob/ /chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/ /rang rgyal byang chub

thob par byed/ /sngon gyi skye ba'i dus dag tu/ /'di nyid las ni nye bar bsags/ /bdag nyid chen po rang rgyal la/ /gos kyis kun nas bkab pa dang / /glang po rta dang shing rta'i rgyur/ /lham ni rab tu phul bar gyur/ /de las blo ldan

sems dang bas/ /de tshe de la bza' ba byin/ /rnam par smin pa de yis ni/ /lha yi rgyal po brgya byin du/ /skye ba bye ba phrag dgur ni/ /lha yi 'jig rten dag tu gyur/ /sa steng 'ong nas rgyal po ni/ /de nas skye ba 'di la gyur/ /gzhan

gyis rjes bsgrubs rgyal thabs ni/ /rjes su spyod par 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi bu yang rgyal po ni/ /bA rA Na sIr rab tu gnas/ /chags 'og rgyal phran gyis bcom pa'i/ /rgyal thabs rnam 'jig 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi

rgyal srid dgra dang ni/ /bram zes phal chen gnod par 'gyur/ /bag med 'dod pa spyod pa dang / /rgyal po de ni gdon gyis 'dzin/ /phyi ma yi ni dus dag tu/ /de nas mtshon gyi brgyab nas 'chi/ /ma ga d+hA rgyal de dag ni/ /phan tshun

du ni gnod byed pas/ /zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal po 'das/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi kun nas kyang / /gang gA'i 'gram gyi mthar thug par/ /bA rA Na sI de las gzhan/ /yi ge pra zhes rgyal rigs ni/ /de yi tshe na rgyal po 'byung / /gang zhig

dmangs rigs gyur pa ni/ /yi ge ha yis yongs su mchod/ /grong khyer dga' ba zhes bya bar/ /gang gA'i 'gram la yang dag rten/ /sngon gyi las kyis yongs bskul nas/ /rgyal rigs rgyal por 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nyid las

byas byed bcug dang / /rjes su yang ni yi rang byas/ /de tshe dus ni 'das pa na/ /gser thub ces bya'i ston pa 'byung / /bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du/ /nor chen ldan pa'i tshong dpon yod/ /tshong dpon bu ni byis pa de/ /byis pa dag gis yang

dag bskor/ /sa rdul dag la rtse ba'i phyir/ /lam chen dag tu zhugs par gyur/ /rang khyim mchod rten mchog mthong la/ /pha dang ma ni mchod byed pa/ /de nyid yid la bzung byas nas/ /sa rdul gyi ni mchod rten byas/ /de tshe me tog

sman mas ni/ /mchod pa yang ni byed par gyur/ /sangs rgyas dad pa'i dran pa yis/ /sangs rgyas de la'ang bstod pa byas/ /byis pa rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/ /der ni byis pa rtse bar gyur/ /ston pa gser thub rgyal ba yi/ /

nyan thos mchog de gcig pu zhig /skyon bral bdag nyid grol ba dang / /khams gsum las ni rnam grol blo/ /de tshe dang por skyon bral ba/ /bsod snyoms la ni rgyu bar gyur/ /bA rA Na sI legs mdzes pa'i/ /de tshe grong

khyer rab tu zhugs/ /gang du sa steng byis pa yod/ /de tshe chags bral phyogs der phyin/ /der ni byis pa de kun gyis/ /kun nas yongs su bskor bar gyur/ /'dir gshegs dge slong 'dir spyon cig /ston pa'i mchod

rten phyag byos mdzod/ /bdag cag gis ni 'bad byas na/ /bzang po 'di la mi gzigs sam/ /de nas tshong dpon bu khye'us/ /rtsa yi thag pa blangs nas ni/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i 'dod chags bral/ /rtse ba'i tshul

gyis de bcings khrid/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po chags bral bas/ /der gnas rnams la yang dag dgongs/ /sa steng dag tu gzigs pa na/ /de dag gis ni mchod rten byas/ /byis pa'i spyi bor lag byugs nas/ /blo ldan

de la 'di skad smras/ /gang du khyod kyi mchod rten byas/ /thong shig khye'u bdag cag 'deng / /gang du sa steng mchod rten ni/ /der yang thams cad 'ong gyur nas/ /de tshe byis pa dang lhan cig /bdag nyid chen po des phyag byas/ /bsod

snyoms don du ci 'dod par/ /dpa' bo de ni phyir yang chas/ /de nas tshong dpon byis pa yis/ /chos gos mtha' nas bzung nas ni/ /dge slong de ni bzung khyer ba/ /bshos gsol bya ba'i ched du'o/ /de nas tshong

dpon gtso bo des/ /byis pa khye'u de mthong nas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po chags bral ba'i/ /chos gos mtha' la 'dzin byed la/ /'jigs shing ba spu ldang ba dang / /nga yi khyim du mchog kyang gshegs/ /myur du rkang

gnyis la btud de/ /byis pa yis ni 'dzin pa btang / /bu de yis kyang bzung byas la/ /'bad pa yis ni bzod gsol byas/ /skye bo'i mchog gyur phan 'dod pa/ /de yi lhung bzed blangs nas ni/ /sA lu'i tshod ma bza' ba

yis/ /lhung bzed dag ni bkang byas nas/ /bu la bos nas smras pa ni/ /yang dag long la 'di la byin/ /de nas byis pa shes ldan pas/ /'bad pas lag gnyis bkrus nas ni/ /lhung bzed gang ba blangs nas su/ /'dod chags

bral ba la ni phul/ /phul nas myur ba nyid du ni/ /rkang pa gnyis la phyag kyang byas/ /'dod chags bral bas blangs nas ni/ /gtsug lag khang song zas la spyad/ /bde bar rig pa'i sems kyis ni/ /de tshe 'dod chags
bral bar gyur/ /de las byis pa gzhan zhig ni/ /phrag dog sems su gyur nas ni/ /mu stegs rnams la rab dad nas/ /bstan pa la ni de mi mchod/ /khro ba'i sems ni kho na yis/ /'dod chags bral la nyin zhag

gzhan/ /bza' ba bca' ba rnam mang po/ /khyer nas de la rab tu byin/ /khyod la byin pa'i bsod snyoms kyis/ /dge ba cung zad gang yod pa/ /tshong dpon bu ni de bas kyang / /sa steng bdag ni dam par shog /de nas mu

stegs de kun dang / /de tshe bram ze'i chung ma rnams/ /de nas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ /tha dad par ni 'thab mo'ang byas/ /byis pa khyed cag yong mi shes/ /ci phyir mgo reg gam du 'gro/ /'di dag bdag la'ang gnas med na/ /

gzhan dag gang du mya ngan zlo/ /byis pa de yi sems can la/ /de lta bu yi zhe sdang skyes/ /ston pas nye bar bsngags pa yi/ /chos kyi zam pa grags pa dang / /sa steng lha khang mchod rten mchog /mu stegs rnams kyis de dag bshig /tshong dpon mchog

gi bu de la/ /kun nas 'khrug pa'i sems kyang byas/ /mgo reg 'di la byin pa yi/ /sbyin pa'i 'gro ba gang du 'gro/ /ngan 'gro'i 'gro bas zin sems la/ /rnam par gnod pa bdag gis bya/ /gnyis pa byis pa gang yin de/ /

zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal po yin/ /rnam smin de yis mi 'dod pa/ /yun ring sdug bsngal rjes su myong / /tshong dpon mchog gi bu de ni/ /lus zhig nas ni bde 'gror song / /de dang der ni lha gnas su/ /yun ring bde ba rjes su myong / /

de tshe de tshe de dang der/ /shi 'phos lha yi 'jig rten gnas/ /de tshe tha ma'i skye ba la/ /thams cad du ni 'ching ba gcod/ /tha ma'i skye ba thob pa na/ /mir gyur sa yi bdag por 'gyur/ /las kyis de tshe tshe 'phos na'ang / /de tshe de tshe de dang der/ /

'jig rten dag tu skyes gyur pa/ /sa steng mi yi bdag por byed/ /gang zhig me tog dman ma ni/ /byis pa g.yo ba des phul ba/ /des na longs spyod nyon mongs can/ /de 'di'i 'bras bu nyon mongs ldan/ /sdug bsngal longs spyod

thob pa yang / /rgyal po de yi bstan pa nyams/ /mi brtan byis pa'i rang bzhin dang / /ji lta de ltar g.yo sems kyis/ /sa steng ston pa'i mchod rten la/ /mchod pa chen po yongs su byas/ /rnam par smin pa'i las de yis/ /

byis pa rgyal po'i dbang phyug byed/ /med par rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ /yod pa rab tu 'jig par 'gro/ /byang dang nub kyi bar dag tu/ /de ni rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ /blo gros gang de bcings pa dang / /byis pas yang ni rab dang

ba/ /byis pas bcings dang grol ba yi/ /rnam smin las ni de yis su/ /skye ba dag ni lnga brgyar yang / /byis pa bcings dang bkrol bar 'gyur/ /tha ma'i skye ba de yi tshe/ /thams cad du ni 'ching ba bcad/ /lo ni lnga bcu lnga dag gam/ /bdun cu rtsa bdun dag

tu 'gyur/ /shar phyogs rgya mtsho'i mthar thug par/ /sa steng de ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /'bigs byed ri yi nang gnas pa/ /mtha' 'khob kla klo'i rkun ma rnams/ /de dag kun la dbang sgyur ba'i/ /yi ge ba ming rgyal por 'gyur/ /

gangs can ri yi nang gnas pa/ /byang gi phyogs la brten pa yi/ /de tshe rgyal rigs rgyal po de/ /yul mi kun la spyod par 'gyur/ /mi shes byis par gyur pa yi/ /mchod rten sa rdul gyis byas pas/ /'gran zla med cing

gnod med par/ /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal por 'gyur/ /shar phyogs rgya mtshor brten nas ni/ /de 'di 'brog gi mthar thug par/ /blo ldan lo hi ta las gzhan/ /byang du de bzhin kha ba can/ /nub tu kA shi'i nyams dga'i grong / /rtse mo zhes

bya'i grong de bzhin/ /'di yi nang du rgyal po ni/ /ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed pa/ /de ni seng ge lnga zhes bya/ /pham nas rgyal pos gzhan yang pham/ /seng ge las skyes thams cad de'ang / /de tshe rtsa nas rnam par bshig /gangs can nang dang

shar phyogs dang / /rgya mtsho bcu yi 'gram gnas nas/ /de tshe rgyal rigs brgyad po de/ /yul mi dag ni kun la spyod/ /lha sogs seng ge rgyal po ni/ /g.yon can gzhan la brten pa dang / /'bigs byed nang na gnas pa la/ /des kyang

rang gi rgyal po byas/ /bgrod dka' zhes bya'i yul dbus su/ /dug chen rgyal bas rnam rgyal byas/ /byang shar kun la gnas pa yi/ /seng ge zhes bya de bzhin gzhan/ /zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal po 'das/ /de tshe go DA'i skye bo'ang

'jig /de tshe rgyal rigs sa yi bdag /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /rgyal po mngon 'phel skye zhes bya/ /de yi longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de tshe rgan por gyur pa na/ /de yang g.yo ba med par song / /lo ni brgyad cur 'tsho ba ste/ /de bzhin

gzhan ni bdun dang bdun/ /de nas 'khogs pas zil mnan nas/ /dus byas lha yi gnas su song / /yun ring lha yi bde ba ni/ /de tshe rgyal pos rjes su myong / /sngon ni kun nas nyon mongs pas/ /las kyi yang ni shi 'phos te/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po

klu yi rgyal/ /blo ldan dud 'gro'i nang du gnas/ /tshong pa sngags ni grub pa ste/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i blo byed cing / /de tshe rig pa'i rgyal po dang / /de tshe bde 'gro dag tu gyur/ /de yi tshe na 'khor los sgyur/ /sna tshogs tog ces rgyal por 'gyur/ /

de bzhin du ni blo ldan de/ /de tshe rig 'dzin chos kyang 'chad/ /lo ni bye ba brgyad cu dang / /de tshe dgu dang bdun du 'gyur/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba yis/ /'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi 'khor du bu mo ni/ /bye ba drug cu skye bar 'gyur/ /

de nas de ni lus zhig nas/ /lha mo sgrol ma mnyes byas te/ /lha rnams bdag por song nas ni/ /der ni chos kyang ston par byed/ /rgyal po de ni mthar gyis su/ /myur du byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de yang lo ni gsum dag tu/ /rgyal po'i dbang phyug

byas nas ni/ /yi ge pa yi rgyal po 'das/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /phan tshun rgyud ni byas nas su/ /rtsod pa chen po la yang gnas/ /de yi nu bo yig pa zhes/ /brtul zhugs can du rnam par gnas/ /lo ni gsum dang gcig dag tu/ /rgyal srid

yongs su 'phel bar byas/ /de ma thag tu 'khru bas btab/ /'di dag gnyi ga 'chi bar gyur/ /'jig rten dus 'das shi nas ni/ /gnod sbyin dag gi nang du skyes/ /de gnyis mthar gyis chos ldan pas/ /rang rgyal byang chub thob par

'gyur/ /de'i yang nu bo yig pa zhes/ /rgyal rigs kyi ni chos la dga'/ /de yang rgyal po lo gsum du/ /mi yi bdag po byed par 'gyur/ /de'i yang nu bo rgyal po ni/ /yi ge dza zhes rnam par bsgrags/ /de yang yul ni 'di dag tu/ /sa kun

gyi ni bdag por 'gyur/ /rta dang shing rta glang po dmag /kun nas gru dang theg pa yis/ /g.yul du nye bar gnas nas ni/ /dgra yi tshogs ni kun las rgyal/ /des ni yul 'di ma lus dang / /sa rnams thams cad nyid la ni/ /ston pa'i gzugs

brnyan lha khang dang / /de bzhin rgyal ba'i mchod rten dang / /sa rnams dag ni thams cad la/ /thams cad mdzes par byas par gyur/ /de tshe sngon gyi rgyal po de'i/ /bram ze de bzhin shAg rigs skye/ /nga rgyal shes rab ldan zhing rno/ /byang chub mthar byed nga rgyal blo/ /de tshe

dus kyi tha ma la/ /de nyid 'di yi grogs nyid 'gyur/ /rgyal po chos la dga' ba yi/ /rgyal rigs kyi ni mchog tu gsungs/ /lo ni nyi shu bdun dang brgyad/ /de ni de tshe 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /bud med byas pa'i skyon nyid kyis/ /dus byas nas ni lha

gnas 'gro/ /blo ldan de ni mthar gyis kyang / /bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas grags pa dpal zhes bya/ /de bzhin sa yi bdag po ni/ /u DI ya na rgyal po che/ /chos la dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /u DI yan gyi grong

mchog la/ /grong khyer yi ge pa zhes bya/ /der ni rgyal po byed pa ste/ /kun nas dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /der ni de tshe brgyad dag gi/ /gtsug lag khang yang byed par 'gyur/ /bram ze'i gtso bo de bzhin ldan/ /shAkya'i skyes zhes yang dag brten/ /de yi

grogs la brten nas ni/ /'khor yug tu ni rgyal srid byas/ /lo ni brgyad cu gcig bcas par/ /mi yi bdag po der 'tshor 'gyur/ /las byed skyon gyis chos bdag nyid/ /dus byas nas ni lha gnas 'gro/ /lha rnams kyi ni rgyal thabs kyang / /

de bzhin mthar gyis byed par 'gyur/ /de nas lus de zhig nas kyang / /mtho ris las kyang mtho ris 'gro/ /de yi byang chub rgyu dag ni/ /dge ba'i chos ni yongs rdzogs byas/ /de yi bran nyid rgyal po ste/ /rgyal srid gnod med

byed par 'gyur/ /yi ge'i dang po ya zhes bya/ /sa yi bdag po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lo ni bdun dang gcig dag tu/ /de yi dus su rgyal srid byed/ /de gcig bud med rnams kyis ni/ /brdegs nas kyang ni shi bar 'gyur/ /yi ge pa

rgyud yang byung ba/ /rgyal rigs rgyal por 'gyur ba yin/ /des ni bran tshogs rnams bsad nas/ /rang dbang du ni yongs su gyur/ /mi dge'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ /rnam mang srog ni gcod pa yin/ /dpa' zhing 'byor

la rmongs par ni/ /'jig rten kun la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /g.yo zhing myur du byed pa na/ /chang dang g.yo sgyu can la dga'/ /chang gis bag med rnam rmongs nas/ /des na de ni sa la nyal/ /dgra rnams kyis ni brtson byas nas/ /mtshon

chas bsnun nas de gsod 'gyur/ /de nas de ni lus zhig nas/ /dus byas nas ni 'og tu 'gro/ /de yi spun zla gnyis pa ni/ /ming ni yi ge ra zhes shes/ /nyin zhag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad du/ /de tshe sa la rgyal srid byas/ /

bram ze rnams la nor byin nas/ /the tshom med par dus kyang byas/ /de nas gzhan yang sa bdag ni/ /de tshe rgyal po bzang po byung / /de yang dmangs rigs skye nas ni/ /yan lag ma tshang ngan pa nyid/ /chos min phal cher

tshul khrims 'chal/ /'thab pa la yang rtag tu dad/ /bram ze'i tshogs dang rgyal phran dang / /sdom brtson de bzhin rab byung ba/ /kun la yang ni gnod byed cing / /rtag tu tshar gcod dag la'ang dga'/ /drag pos 'dul bar byed

pa dang / /de bzhin rkun ma rnams kyang gsod/ /ma rungs thams cad gnod byed cing / /ya mtshan can gyi brtul zhugs sten/ /rnam par grol la'ang sbyin mi byed/ /de tshe rgyal srid byed par 'gyur/ /lo ni bcu dang bdun gyi bar/ /der ni
sa bdag 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /mdze yi nad kyis sdug bsngal nas/ /de nas dus byas dud 'gror 'gro/ /dud 'gro dag las klu rgyal du/ /gdengs ka che ldan mgyogs par 'gro/ /mchog tu 'jigs rungs lus ldan
zhing / /de tshe sgra ni drag par sgrogs/ /de la lor ni mi 'dod pa/ /yun ring sdug bsngal rjes su myong / /sa srung 'jig rten 'phel byed pa/ /'jig rten kun gyis shes pa ste/ /lus can shar phyogs gnas

pa yin/ /rgyal po yi ge pa zhes pa'i/ /rgyud rnams rgyud du skyes pa gzhan/ /rgyal rigs dpa' bo rnam par gnon/ /de bzhin rgya mtsho gsum gyi bdag /bde chen stobs ni che ba dag /shar gyi phyogs su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /

ston pa'i mchod rten bzang po dang / /gtsug lag khang dang 'dug gnas khyim/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skyed mos tshal/ /rdzing dang khron pa bkad sas bskor/ /de bzhin rtag tu bsod nams khang / /sa ni mdzes par byed

par 'gyur/ /de nas thub mchog dam pa dang / /theg pa bla na med la brten/ /shAkya'i rab byung de nyid ni/ /rtag tu de ni rab gnas byed/ /mi khom rnams ni spong byed cing / /dal ba nyid kyang legs par thob/ /yi ge ka zhes rnam par

bsgrags/ /'jig med dran dang ldan pa nyid/ /lo ni nyi shu gcig bar du/ /sa skyong rgyal srid byas par 'gyur/ /de nas gsud nad kyis btab ste/ /dus byas nas ni lha gnas 'gro/ /blo ldan de ni mthar gyis su/ /myur du byang chub

gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de yi lhag ma'i rgyud las kyang / /gzhan la rab gnas 'tsho byed pa/ /de yi 'og tu sa skyong ba/ /sa srung 'tsho bas gnas pa yin/ /bram ze bkren pa'i skye bo ni/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar
'gyur/ /de yi dus su chos min ldan/ /ston pa'i bstan pa nges par nyams/ /sngags kyi bstan pas sems can rnams/ /dge ba'i don du nges par sbyor/ /gang zhig gzhon nus bstan pa yi/ /sngags ni longs spyod

'phel byed pa/ /rgyal po'i dbang phyug don du ni/ /de tshe de'i yul phyogs su yang / /grub pa mchog ni bsgrub bya min/ /chos kyi 'khor lo nyams dga' dang / /de bzhin 'od ma'i tshal chen dang / /gang du bcom ldan

de zhi bar/ /phung po med par rab zhugs pa/ /sngags gnyis 'di dag bsgrub bya ba/ /lha mo sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rtag tu rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang ni/ /snying po med pa'i 'bab chu mchog /gang gA'i 'gram ni thams cad du/ /pad ma

'byung ba bsgrub par bya/ /sa bcu thob pa'i bdag po ni/ /gang yang byang chub sems de yang / /sems can rnams ni 'dul byed pa/ zla ba zhes ni rnam par bsgrags/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo rdzu 'phrul che/ /de ni sgrol ma zhes kyang bstan/ /bud

med gzugs 'chang lha mo ni/ /'gro ba kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sems can rnams la phan don du/ /mi mjed 'jig rten khams gnas nas/ /bud med ming gis 'jug par byed/ /sa bcu la ni

rab gnas thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul byed pa/ /lha mo sgrol ma zhes su bstan/ /'di ni 'bad med grub pa ste/ /srung dang skyob dang sbed par byed/ /longs spyod dbang phyug 'phel byed pas/ /

'di ni lha mo bsgrub par bya/ /byang chub tshogs kyi ched du ni/ /skyed pa nyid nas brtsam par bya/ /snying rjes brlan pas lus can la/ /de tshe lha mo rjes 'brang ba/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyis sems can la/ /byang chub tshogs ni bya

phyir ro/ /re ba thams cad dga' rgyas phyir/ /shar gyi phyogs su gnas pa yin/ /bdag nyid rnam pa stong dang ni/ /rnam pa mang por byas nas kyang / /rgya mtsho bzhi yi mthar thug par/ /sa rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /

de nas shar gyi phyogs su 'am/ /yang na bA rA Na sIr 'grub/ /lha mo de yi zhing du ni/ /shar gyi phyogs su rab tu bstan/ /'od chen po ni dzam b+ha la/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po yang dag 'grub/ /de tshe longs spyod ma lus 'dod/ /de tshe

dus kyi tha ma la/ /lha mo sgrol ma gnod sbyin rgyal/ /de nor rgyas pa 'dod pas sgrub/ /de tshe khro bo'i sngags dag ni/ /lho phyogs dag tu bsgrub par bya/ /kla klo rkun ma'i gling dang ni/ /de bzhin rgya mtsho'i nang du ni/ /stobs chen sgrol ma gnod sbyin rgyal/ /de

bzhin du yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /ha ri kel ka da raM tsa/ /kA ma rU pa gA dA hA ya hi/ pho nya mo tshogs rnam mang dang / /gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen mo 'grub/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis gang gsung sngags/ /longs spyod kyi ni rgyur

'gyur ba/ /de bzhin yul der grub pa ste/ /gzhan yul de bzhin ma yin no/ /shar phyogs dang ni phyogs mtshams su/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sngags kyi rgyur/ /de yi dus su bstan pa ni/ /lus can rnams kyis bsgrub par bya/ /dbus

kyi yul du de bzhin sngags/ /de bzhin sa srung mang po ni/ /rgya che thams cad nyam chung ba'i/ /blo chung rnams kyis rtogs par byed/ /rgyal po'i gtso bo mdor bsdus nas/ /ming ni 'di dag nges par brjod/ /dang po'i yi ge sha dang na/ /dang po'i yi ge par

yang bstan/ /dang po'i yi ge ba dang e/ /dang po'i yi ge ar yang bstan/ /dang po'i yi ge har bstan te/ /dang po'i yi ge par yang bsgrags/ /dang po'i yi ge dza dang ba/ /dang yig d+ha ni zla ba'i rigs/ /yi ge ha nyid rnam bsgrags dang / /

de bzhin yang ni dang po'i a/ /dang po'i yi ge sa la yang / /bud med rigs min 'jig rten sdang / /dang po'i yi ge a dang ma/ /'jig rten rnams la mthu dang ldan/ /rim gyis rim gyis rigs dag ni/ /bram ze rje'u rigs dag tu 'jug /

phal cher chos min las byed cing / /rnam sdang bud med la brkam chags/ /sa srung skyon ni rab mang bar/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /yul gyi dbus su mi yi bdag /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /dus kyi tha mar 'di dag tshe/ /lo ni brgya dang

nyi shu nyid/ /de yi tshe na mi rnams kyi/ /tshe ni ring bar rab tu bstan/ /de dag bar ma bzang po las/ /khyad par ring dang thung ba yin/ /rgyal po rnams ni tshe thung bar/ /de tshe dus su bstan pa ni/ /gang gA'i 'gram gyi ngogs dang ni/ /gangs can gyi ni ri zhol

dang / /de tshe kA ma rU yul du/ /de 'dra'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dang po bar ma tha ma yi/ /rigs kyi lhag ma brjod bya ste/ /dang po'i gtso bo chen po ni/ /rna can rgyal por rab tu bsgrags/ /tha ma ang ga'i bdag po dang / /der ni 'byor bzad

'byor pa dang / /legs byin srid pa byin pa ni/ /kA ma rU pa'i yul du byung / /tha mar legs 'byor gzhon nu dang / /yi ge ba dang tha gnyis ni/ /yangs pa can du yang dag byung / /gang du thub pa de skyes pa/ /ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog tu/ /tha mar

zas gtsang shAg rigs kyi/ /nyi ma bu ram rigs skyes pa/ /tha mar zas gtsang rnam bsgrags pa/ /shAkya shAkya'i rnam 'phel byed/ /sems can brtson 'grus chung bar ni/ /'jig rten skyes mchog bstan pa yin/ /gang zhig

rgyal bas gsung sngags dang / /de bzhin bran po'i tshogs kun dang / /pho nya'i tshogs kun du ma dang / /rdo rje pad ma'i rigs dag kyang / /rgyud rnams kun gyi don rig pas/ /bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /'jig rten kun gyi sngags dag

ni/ /yul gyi dbus der grub par 'gyur/ /dbus yul gnas par khyad par du/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa bsgrub par bya/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rtags dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgyud dag dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor bar ldan/ /lus can rnam pa

sna tshogs 'grub/ /dbus kyi yul du de bzhin sngags/ /longs spyod 'phel ba bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin lus can bsrung don dang / /skyob dang dbang dang dgug pa 'grub/ /dbus kyi yul du mi yi bdag /'das dang ma 'ongs rab tu gsungs/ /

rnam pa sna tshogs rtags dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs tshe dang rigs/ /rgyal po thams cad gsungs pa ni/ /mchog dang tha ma bar ma yin/ /de bzhin rnam gsum grub pa ste/ /dus kyang gsum du sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin sngags kyang rnam gsum du/ /de bzhin thub pa mchog

gis gsungs/ /rgyal po mtha' yas gsungs pa ni/ /dbus kyi yul dang nub phyogs dang / /byang phyogs dang ni shar phyogs dang / /de bzhin phyogs mtshams thams cad dang / /rnam pa bzhi ru mtshon pa yi/ /gling dag de bzhin kun tu yang / /sa bdag mtha'

yas rab gsungs pa/ /mtha' yas sngags ni sgrub pa dang / /mtha' yas yul la gnas pa dag /mtha' yas sngags ni yongs su 'grub/ /thub pa'i bstan pa nub pa na/ /tshar gcad rjes su gzung bar byed/ /dus su rgyal po dag la sngags/ /

'jam dpal gyis ni gsungs pa yin/ /rdzu 'phrul rtse dang rnam 'phrul dang / /'dir ni dus kyi spyod pa'ang bstan/ /sngags kyi bdag nyid sems can gyi/ /'gro ba skye gnas rgyal po'i ming / /sngags ni sgrub par 'dod rnams la/ /yul dang dus ni

yang dag bstan/ /bstan pa nub pa'i 'og tu ni/ /zhar la rgyal po rnams kyis bstan/ /yon tan bdag nyid che sngags rnams/ /tha mar 'bras bu rtogs par byas/ /rgyal po gzhan ni theg pa dang / /sngon ni 'gal ba med par

bstan/ /dus kyi tha ma de dus su/ /rab tu gnas par the tshom med/ /de dag phyogs la gnas par ni/ /rgyal po thams cad gsungs pa yin/ /de bzhin shAkya'i gsung rab la/ /nges par rab byung gnas nas ni/ /'jig rten mig gcig gyur pa yi/ /

thub pa mchog ni med pa na/ /rtag tu sngags smra la dad pas/ /bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur/ /de dag gzhon nu bshad par bya/ /rtse gcig yid kyis mnyan par gyis/ /ston pa'i gsung rab sa steng du/ /dus mthar

'jig rten nyams pa na/ /sdom brtson rgyal po'i tshul gyis ni/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /dper na ma khol zhes bya dang / /me tog ces byar rnam par grags/ /yi ge ma zhes gzhon nu zhes/ /dang por tha mar chos la dga'/ /

klus bos zhes bya rnam par grags/ /rin chen 'byung zhes bya ming dang / /yi ge ga zhes gzhon nu zhes/ /yi ge ba zhes chos sems byed/ /yi ge a ming bdag nyid che/ /ston pa'i bstan pa gces 'dzin byed/ /blo ldan yon tan

kun gyis bkur/ /dang po'i yi ge la zhes bstan/ /rgyal po sangs rgyas pa yi phyogs/ /ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed/ /sdom brtson yi ge a zhes bsgrags/ /bram ze las ni rab tu byung / /grong khyer gnas bcas
gnas pa ste/ /de bzhin tshe ni brgyad cur 'tsho/ /dang yig yi ge a dge slong / /lho yi phyogs su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /blo ldan tshe ni drug cur 'tsho/ /ka shi zhes bya'i grong du gnas/ /yi ge d+ha zhes
sdom brtson nyid/ /lho yi phyogs su rnam par bsgrags/ /pha rol rgol ba bzlog nas kyang / /de bzhin sdom brtson sngags kyang grub/ /gzhan yang rab byung dam pa ni/ /sing ga la yi grong na gnas/ /
'phags pa min la 'phags pa'i ming / /sing ga la yi gling na gnas/ /pha rol rgol ba bzlog nas ni/ /mu stegs rnams kyi sngags sun phyung / /de dus 'jigs su rung ba yi/ /dus kyi mtha' las
'byung bar 'gyur/ /yi ge da dang la dang por/ /sdom brtson gang zhig rab gsungs dang / /yi ge ra dang ba dang por/ /dge slong gang zhig rab byung gsungs/ /ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed pa/ /'byung bar
'gyur bar the tshom med/ /rgyal po nag po zhes bya bar/ /yi ge sa zhes sdom brtson 'byung / /mchod rten kun dga' ra ba gnas/ /rdzing dang khron pa'ang thams cad du/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan de

bzhin rtags/ /gzings dang zam pa nyid rnams ni/ /byed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /mtshon gyis lus zhig mtho ris 'gro/ /de nas yi ge sa dang ka /dang po dag tu brjod pa dang / /de bzhin yi ge ra dang g+ha/ /
dang po dag tu rab brjod dang / /dang por yi ge ba dang ni/ /legs byin legs de sde zhes bstan/ /sbyin byed sbyin par byed pa nyid/ /gzhan gyi grub mtha' sun byed pa/ /tshong pa sngon dang sman pa
sngon/ /gnyi ga sbyin byed sna tshogs byed/ /yi ge ba zhes sdom brtson bsgrags/ /de las gzhan pa dang yi ger/ /dang por yi ge ba grags dang / /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan don yang byed/ /
blo ldan dang por yi ge ma/ /de bzhin sdom brtson dad pa 'byung / /rnam pa du ma sdom brtson gsungs/ /de tshe mtha' yas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sdom brtson thams cad bsgrags pa yang / /ston pa'i bstan
pa gsal byed pa'o/ /bstan pa de tshe sa steng du/ /rnam par nyams shing snang med la/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid du 'ong / /byed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /thams cad byang chub lung bstan
te/ /nga yi byang chub mchog thob 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'jig rten sbyin gnas 'gyur/ /srid pa gsum gyi mthar yang byed/ /sngags dang rgyud la mngon brtson pas/ /grags pa 'dzin par shes par bya/ /
bram ze chos kyi ngang tshul can/ /de ni rab tu brjod par bya/ /sngags dang rgyud la mngon brtson pas/ /rgyal po'i lugs la nye bar gnas/ /de tshe mi bzad dus dag tu/ /'jig rten kun la 'byung bar
'gyur/ /yi ge ba zhes bram ze mchog /phyug cing rig byed pha rol phyin/ /de 'dir sa rnams ma lus par/ /rtsod pa'i phyir ni rab tu rgyu/ /mtsho gsum sa yi mthar thug par/ /pha rol mu stegs

rtsod la dga'/ /gang phyir dang po gtso bo'i tshig /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /gzhon nus yongs su gsungs gyur pa/ /yi ge drug pa'i sngags kyang zlos/ /cho ga rab 'byam 'di dag las/ /des ni de phan de

la bsten/ /rgyal dang legs par rgyal ba dang / /grags ldan dge ba de las gzhan/ /rigs ldan chos dang ldan pa dang / /brtson ldan legs pa khyab 'jug dang / /sbrang rtsi sbrang rtsi bzang po dang / /de bzhin grub dang dregs bral dang / /

ra g+ha ba dang dmangs rigs dang / /de bzhin ka shir skyes pa gzhan/ /gzhon nu 'di yi bzlas pa la/ /thams cad kun yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dag kun kyang bzang po ste/ /blo ldan mang du thos pa yin/ /de kun sngags ni mngon du gyur/ /

rgyal po'i 'tsho bas yang dag gnas/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /bram ze dang po'i yi ge bi/ /grong khyer me tog ces bya bar/ /de ni khro bo grub par gyur/ /dbul bas yongs su zil mnan pas/ /rgyal po rnams ni

tshar bcad byas/ /khro rgyal gshin rje gshed de yi/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dir gsungs pa/ /sems can ma rungs rnams dang ni/ /gdul dka' 'dul bar byed pa dang / /phan pa min las bzlog don dang / /phan pa nye bar

'phel phyir dang / /sems can rnams ni rjes gzung dang / /sems can srog 'chad dgag phyir ro/ /bram ze'i khye'u rmongs pa de/ /dbul ba khro ba chags pa yis/ /rgyal po'i srog la gnod pa'i phyir/ /khro bo'i sngags ni zlos par byed/ /

de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /bram ze yi ge dang po a/ /chos don dge ba ldan bdag nyid/ /bden par smra zhing dbang po thul/ /mnga' bdag mang pos bkur ces pa/ /de tshe sngags ni zlos par 'gyur/ /sngags

ni bsgrub par gyur pa la/ /dbang 'gyur yin gyis gzhan ma yin/ /'byung po dbang du gyur pa na/ /de tshe nor dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /bram ze chos don sems byed pa/ /de nas mthar ni dang yig sha /ma la'i

yul du de ni 'byung / /sa steng sngags ni zlos par grags/ /bstan pa mchog la'ang rab tu dad/ /rig pa rjes bzung ma rungs dang / /tshangs pa'i srin po srin po dang / /'byung po shin tu ma rungs bcas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sha za dang / /

bstan dang 'gro ba sna tshogs ni/ /de dag ma lus de dbang 'gyur/ /de bzhin bram ze'i mtshan ldan pa/ /thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /lho yi phyogs su bram ze ni/ /yi ge dang por ba bstan pa/ /ston pa'i

bstan la de gtsor byed/ /mchod rten kun dga' ra ba gnas/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid 'ong gis/ /sa ni rgya mtsho gnyis mthar thug /thams cad kyi ni rgyan du byas/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /bram ze gtso bo nor chen ldan/ /

dang po'i yi ge na zhes pa/ /lho yi phyogs su yang dag bstan/ /bdag nyid chen po sngags zlos ldan/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /dbus kyi yul du bstan pa ni/ /bram ze gang ba bzang zhes pa/ /'dul ba dang ni

tshul bzang nyid/ /gang ba bcom brlag dag tu gnas/ /dang yig b+ha ni nor gyi spyan/ /rgyal po rnams ni sngags mchod byed/ /bram ze 'di dag bstan pa ni/ /ston pa'i bstan pa mchod byed pa'o/ /thog ma bar mthar gtso bo ste/ /rnam pa

sna tshogs gnas dang rigs/ /sna tshogs phyogs kyi bram ze rnams/ /bram ze gzhan gyis mchod par byed/ /mu stegs sna tshogs rigs dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs spyod yul spyod/ /gnas ni kun tu gsungs pa ste/ /bram ze'i

khye'u mang thos yin/ /rang byung sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal/ /sems can kun gyi don sgrub pa/ /sems can rnams ni ma lus dang / /lha gnas kyis kyang mchod pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po yang / /'jig rten kun la grags pa

ste/ /'phags skyes po dang mig mi bzang / /yul 'khor srung dang gnod sbyin rgyal/ /brgya byin de nas lha rnams kyi/ /nges pa'i tshig ni rab tu bsgrags/ /'thab bral lha yi bu dang ni/ /'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang

byed dang / /rgyal po dga' ldan gsungs pa dang / /'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mchog /gcig gi ming ni brgya byin sogs/ /de bzhin 'dod khams dbang phyug yin/ /de yang rtag tu gcig gnas te/ /rdzu 'phrul
