chen po gcig gi gzugs/ /de yang mtha' yas dag tu bstan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs 'chang lha/ /de las gong du thams cad mnyam/ /de yang thams cad rdzu 'phrul che/ /lha yi gtso bo ming gcig ste/ /'du shes med pa'i

mthar yang bstan/ /de dag gtso bo med pa ste/ /mnyam pa'i tshul du yang dag gnas/ /'og tu mnar med mthar thug par/ /der ni rgyal po yod ma yin/ /'jam dpal de bas na/ de ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus su rigs

kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du chud par byas te/ 'dri bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba'am glegs bam du byas te 'chang bar

'gyur/ /gus par byas te yid la byed par 'gyur/ /gos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dril bu dang / rol mo dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / dri dang / dri zhim po dag gis mchod par byed

par 'gyur/ /ri mor byed par 'gyur/ yang dag par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur/ /yid rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis chos byed par 'gyur ba de la ni/ /phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu 'gyur te/ /bcu gang zhe na/ der 'di la pha rol

gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ /char 'bab pa mi mkhas pa dang gza' dang 'ching ba chen po'i 'tshe ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ /mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la mi'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar

mi 'gyur/ /phyir rgol ba thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la nad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la dus ma yin pa'i char gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /char ches pa'i 'jigs

pa'am/ der 'di la rlung chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sha za thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du g.yon can rkun po'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la 'chi

ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i rgyal pos khyer ba'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la gzhan gyi sngags kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi

'gyur ro/ /sbyar ba'i dug thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la nad kyi 'jigs pa dang / rims dang / tshad par 'khru ba dang / ma zhu ba dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gi nad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu shes par bya'o/ /gang du de bzhin gshegs

pa rnams kyi cho ga chen po rab 'byam chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du byas te/ bzhag la 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'dzin pa dang kha ton du byed na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu bzung zhing chos kyi mdzod mngon du 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig gi

spyod pa la rjes su ma zhugs pa dang dam tshig mi shes pa gzhan dag la ni rnam pa thams cad du bstan par mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir 'di ni gsang ba yin pa'i phyir te/ 'dis ni thams cad mtshon pa yin na sems can rnams kyi dran pa med par ma byed cig /'on kyang

khyod kyis shes par 'gyur mchod pa byed par 'gyur yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur zhing bsod nams chen po yang rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can skal ba med pa rnams la bstan par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na dbul ba dang / nad dang /

mdze dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nad nyid byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na gzhan dag la yang bstan par mi bya'o/ /dam tshig dang gsang ba pa dang gsang ba'i sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i

bstan pa la legs par bslab pa rnams dang legs par rnam par bzhag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / chos kyi don la mkhas pa rnams dang bsam gtan la rab tu zhugs pa dang chos la gnas pa dang bden par smra ba dang sems can gyi spyod pa la rab tu

gnas shing snying rje'i spyod pa dang rab tu ldan pa rnams te/ sems can 'di dag la bstan par bya'i gzhan dag la ni ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar

nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhes bya/ /'di bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung shig / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi man ngag legs par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang

zung shig /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rgyud thams cad kyi mdzod ces bya bar yang zung shig /theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa nges par bstan pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /byang chub

sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung shig /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhes bya bar yang zung shig /chos thams cad kyi don rdzogs pa nges par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /'jig rten

ma lus thams cad la/ /chos dang chos min rnam spyod cing / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /gang khyod kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /de bzhin chos kyi dam pa mchog /gsang ba gzhan ni ma mthong ngo / /sngags rgyud

don dang mdo rnams dang / /'gro ba yul ni skyon med dang / /byang chub chos la rab gzhol ba/ /dpa' bo gzhan ni ma mthong ngo / /gang 'di bla ma gsang ba dang / /drang don mdo yis yongs su brgyan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs

mdo don dang / /sngags dang rgyud kyi rjes 'jug pa/ /cho ga rab 'byam 'di las gzhan/ /ma byung gang yang yod ma yin/ /rgyal srid chen po longs spyod che/ /lha gnas dag tu'ang phun sum tshogs/ /de bzhin lha
dang mi rnams kyi/ /grags pa rgyas pa'ang thob par 'gyur/ /mi khom brgyad ni spong byed cing / /dal ba dag ni thob par byed/ /theg pa rnam gsum bdag po dang / /de nges sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /
mdo 'di 'dzin pa'i bsod nams dang / /de bzhin du ni phan yon 'di/ /'di yi lus la mtshon mi 'byung / /dug dang mes kyang ma yin no/ /ro langs dang ni gdon dang ni/ /de bzhin srul po ma mo dang / /
srin po sha zas 'tshe byed pa'ang / /gang zhig mdo 'di 'don la min/ /'chang ba dang ni klog pa dang / /yang dang yang du mchod byed dang / /'jigs pa med pas mchod byed dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs
mchod byed de/ /phan yon 'di ni rab bstan pa/ /'jig rten 'dir ni thob 'gyur ba/ /nad pa rnams ni nad las grol/ /sdug bsngal can ni bde bar 'gyur/ /dbul pos nor ni rnyed 'gyur te/ /bcings pa
rnams ni 'ching las grol/ /'gro ba lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ltung ba rnams/ /bde ba zhi ba mya ngan 'das/ /mi g.yo go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/ /rang rgyal sangs rgyas
nyid dang ni/ /nyan thos mthar ni phyin par 'gyur/ /mdo sde 'di ni bklag pa yis/ /sangs rgyas sku mdog thob par 'gyur/ /gang gA'i bye ma mnyam pa yis/ /rgyal ba mchog ni mtha' yas pa/ /
mchod pas thob pa'i bsod nams dang / /mdo 'di bton pa'i bsod nams mnyam/ /'jig rten ji snyed gang su dag /zhing ni bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /de srid phra rab rdul snyed kyi/ /
sangs rgyas rnams la rtag mchod pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' btung dang / /na ba rnams kyi gso sman dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gnas mal rnams/ /rtag tu thams cad rab sbyin dang / /rnam pa
sna tshogs gos dang ni/ /phye ma dag ni kun gyis kyang / /bsod nams skye bos thob gang yin/ /'di dag 'chang dang klog pas so/ /gang zhig rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /'jig rten nyan thos rdzu 'phrul
che/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /sa bcu la gnas de las gzhan/ /de rnams tshad ni de mnyam la/ /de dag mchod pa'ang de bzhin te/ /gang gi lag par glegs bam chud/ /mi yis de mnyam
bsod nams thob/ /'jig rten ji snyed bstan pa yang / /'jig rten khams na gnas pa yi/ /grangs med sems can ma lus pa/ /thams cad nad ni med byas te/ /skye bo gang zhig yang dang yang / /bkur stir
byas nas de mchod pa/ /chos mchog 'di la mchod na ni/ /blo ldan de yis bsod nams 'thob/ /bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par/ /rgyal ba mchog gis rtag par yang / /'jig rten mgon
chos mdzad mchog 'di/ /mchod par yang ni mi nus so/ /chos mchog 'di ni sa steng du/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra/ /'jam pa'i cho ga 'dir gsungs pa/ /bklags pa dang ni 'chang ba yis/ /

des ni 'dod 'jo'i ba 'drar 'gyur/ /longs spyod che nor phun sum tshogs/ /yid ni skyo ba med byas nas/ /sa steng 'di ni rab tu sgrub/ /sngags dang rgyud don drang ba'i don/ /don yod tshig ni rab bshad pa/ /bya ba dus la brten nas

ni/ /sa steng rig pa 'dzin bsgrub na/ /rin chen phun tshogs rab gang ba/ /de yi phyogs kun dag tu gsungs/ /'bras bcas 'gro ba'i bdag nyid che/ /spyod pa bzang bar brjod pa yin/ /gang zhig cho ga mchog 'di las/ /
rgyal po sngags gcig 'chang byed pa/ /rgyal srid phun sum tshogs don bcas/ /tshe ring phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /rnam pa sna tshogs longs spyod tshogs/ /rgyal mchog dam pas 'thob par 'gyur/ /

'gro dang gnas pa'i dug dag dang / /gzhan gyis byas pa'i rig pa dang / /ro langs sngags kyis sgrub pa dang / /mtshon gyis kyang ni gnod mi 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi gnod byed gtsor byed pas/ /sa steng 'jig rten gnod mi byed/ /chom

rkun nad ni gzhan dag dang / /me yi 'jigs pa de la med/ /rgyal po skye bo dag kyang rung / /su zhig de la mchod mi byed/ /gang zhig mdo sde dkon mchog 'di/ /'chang dang klog pa'ang de bzhin no/ /rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas/ /dbang bskur

yul du nyer gnas tshe/ /mdo sde mgo la nges bcings nas/ /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal na/ /de la rkun pos mi gnod cing / /mtshon gyis de la phog mi 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs su yang dag byung / /rma bya'i

gdan la legs bkod pa/ /glang po'i mtshog ma'i steng bzhag nas/ /g.yul du yang dag zhugs byas na/ /skye bo rnams sdang de dag kun/ /mthong ba tsam gyis ldog par byed/ /byis pa'i gzugs can bzang po ni/ /gzhon nu'i
rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan/ /gser dang dngul dang ra gan gyis/ /rgyal mtshan yu ba bsgreng ba la/ /rgyal mtshan ba dan btags nas ni/ /legs dgod legs par mnyam par bzhag /g.yul du dgras ni legs gang

ba/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs byed pa/ /thams cad g.yul du 'dus pa la/ /de yi tshe na 'jug par bya/ /rgyal mtshan sgreng la gnas pa yi/ /gzhon nu las ni sna tshogs pa/ /rnam pa du ma'i gzugs dang ldan/ /bdag nyid chen

po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /sa bcu'i bdag po'i bdag po ni/ /mthong ba tsam gyis 'jigs par byed/ /rgyal rigs rgyal po chen po ni/ /'jig rten sa srung sa gnas pa/ /dad ldan yid gnyis the tshom ni/ /rnam bral chos la

mnyes gshin pa/ /bde bar gshegs la dad bskyed nas/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i yid kyis ni/ /'dir bshad 'di dag bya ba ni/ /grub par 'dod pas rab tu bya/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba'i sngags dang ni/ /rgyud dang ldan pa sa steng du/ /chos

dbyings tshogs pa'i rgyal ba yis/ /gsung rab 'di dag nges par bstan/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam gnas pa'i/ /rgyal mchog snga ma grangs med pas/ /sa yi steng gi mi rnams la'ang / /chos kyi mdzod ni gsungs pa yin/ /lha dang

lha min sngon g.yul 'thab/ /pha rol 'jigs pa byung ba na/ /gang tshe brgya byin sngon gyur pa/ /dpung ni pham byas zhe sdang bas/ /de tshe gcig tu song nas ni/ /sa steng rnam par du bar gyur/ /rgyal mchog 'od srung de la

ni/ /thub pa mchog la de tshe zhus/ /ji ltar bya zhes tshig tu ni/ /bde sogs bdag pos rnam par smras/ /mi bzad lha min gyis pham nas/ /bdag kyang 'dir ni yang dag lhags/ /de skad bcom ldan gsol nas ni/ /lha yi dbang po brgya byin

gyis/ /de tshe thub mchog zhabs gnyis la/ /spyi bo'i gtsug gis rab btud nas/ /mig stong kau shi ka ni/ /de yi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur/ /de skad gsol nas thub mchog ni/ /bram zer gyur pa 'od srung gis/ /de tshe gsung du bka' stsal pa/ /

ka la ping ka'i sgra skad du/ /rgyal ba mchog gis sngon gsungs pa/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag byung / /bdag nyid chen po 'jam dpal ni/ /rnyed dka' sku ni 'bum gyur pa/ /yang dag mtha' la gnas nas ni/ /zab mo'i don

gyi don ston byed/ /spros med rnam pa med pa dang / /gnas med pa las gzugs byas nas/ /shin tu don ldan chos kyang ston/ /lha yi dbang phyug de ni dran/ /de nas de ni de dran pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' dran tsam gyis/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs

gzugs can ni/ /der ni de yi mod la lhags/ /der ni bcom ldan 'das dang ni/ /bcom ldan lha yi dbang phyug bcas/ /lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' des/ /de tshe rgyal ba mchog la btud/ /rgyal ba mchog kun phyag 'tshal nas/ /'od

chen 'od srung la yang btud/ /de tshe thub pas rjes gnang nas/ /sngags kyi tshig ni 'di smras so/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaH/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa ne b+h+yaH/ ha na ha na/ sarba b+ha yot+sA da ya trA sa ya/ mo Ta ya/ tshin+da/

b+hin+da/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ri dang rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu

g.yos te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi zhing mtha' yas pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs kyi mthar thug pa thams cad dang bcas pa yang rab tu 'gul bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang

sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'jigs pa dang bral nas ba spu langs te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob nas/ mig gnyis phye ste/ stan las langs nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas lan gsum bskor ba byas shing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon du bltas nas sngags kyi tshig de dag bzung ste/ yid la byas nas phyir yang

shing rta la zhon te/ lha ma yin gang yin pa de logs su phyin par gyur to/ /de nas lha ma yin thams cad rgya mtsho chen po'i mtha'i 'gram du gang rang gi grong khyer gang yin pa der mngon du phyogs shing song bar gyur te/ sems

zhum zhing nyams la dpung gi 'jigs pas sems dkrugs shing gdong gi mdog nyams shing nga rgyal dang dregs pa la sogs pa dang bral bar gyur la/ /mtshon cha dang bral zhing ri 'bigs byed 'bar ba bzhin du lha'i dbang phyug de mthong

nas byer bar gyur to/ /de nas lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha ma yin las bdag cag nges par rgyal

bas rang gi gnas su 'gro bar bya'o/ /rang rang gi gnas ci lta ba bzhin du song nas khyod cag rtse ba dang dga' ba yongs su spyod par gyis shig /de nas lha de dag thams cad yid shin tu dga' nas phyir yang rang gi gnas su
log par gyur to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ gang bdag gis gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyi gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa de byas la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la'ang

btags na/ des na gang gi lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /zhes bstan to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis chen po la 'os pa'i nor bu rin po che nang 'od dang ldan zhing gsal ba'i phreng ba blangs nas/

gzhon nu'i cha byad kyi gzugs brnyan byas te/ steng gi khang bzang du grong khyer chen po blta na sdug pa'i dbus na/ lha rnams kyi 'dun sa chos bzang kyi rtse mor rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba legs par bkod pa byas nas

bzhag par gyur to/ /de nas lha ma yin de dag rab tshim byed dang / thags bzangs ris la sogs pa de dag lha rnams kyi steng du mi 'gro zhing / lha de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur la/ rdzu 'phrul las rnam

par 'phrul pa'am/ g.yul mngon du phyogs par 'gro bar mi nus so/ /de ltar lo bye ba khri phrag du ma mi ma yin pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar yang lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du phan
yon dpag tu med pa bstan pa dang / tshe dang / nad med pa 'phel bar/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang sngon du gsungs pa yin no/ /de bzhin du phan
yon gyi yon tan mchog 'di dag rgya che ba dang / mtha' yas shing mu med pa sngon gsungs pa yin no/ /gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs sam/ rnam par rtog par byed na/ bsod nams ma yin pa

dpag tu med pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / dmyal bar yang skye bar 'gyur la/ dud 'gro dang / yi dags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi skye ba ngan par yang 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sman dang / sngags rnams med

do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /de rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / rnam par 'phrul ba yang med do/ /cho ga rgya che ba yang med do/ /'phags pa ma yin pas bshad do/ /zhes byas nas spong

ba'am/ /yang na 'gro zhing 'di nyan par mi nus so/ /zhes gnas de las gzhan du 'gro na/ de dag la bsod nams ma yin pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste blo chung ba gang gis chos 'di ni thub pa mchog dang /

thub pa'i sras blo dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /zhes rab tu spong bar byed do/ /mi de dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur zhing / /de nyams nas ni dud 'gror 'gro/ /thig nag dang ni yang sos dang / /spu gri so dang me ma mur/ /ro myags
chu bo rab med skye/ /de nas phyir yang spu gri sor/ /lo ma ral gri lta bu'i nags/ /yang na kyi hud zer de bzhin/ /'jig rten grags pa so thams thams/ /sdig pa'i las kyi dmyal ba ru/ /gang gis
chos ni sun byed pa/ /de ni skye ba de dag 'gro/ /'jig rten smad par rab bstan pa/ /mi bzad mnar med pa zhes bya/ /ma dad sems kyis chos spangs pa/ /sdig pa'i las can gnas yin te/ /gang zhig
chos ni 'di 'jigs pa/ /de la skye bo de 'tshed 'gyur/ /kun gyi mthar thug mnar med pa/ /de nyams de bzhin dmyal chen skye/ /dmyal ba'i sa mtha' mtha' yas par/ /rtag tu blo med de ni 'gro/ /mdo sde
de ni rgya cher bcas/ /chos kyi nor kun rab spangs nas/ /de ni 'jig rten ngan par 'gro/ /dbang med rtag par dbang du 'gro/ /gang zhig mdo sde'i cho ga 'di/ /sngags dang rgyud kyis legs par brgyan/ /

grub pa sna tshogs brgya rnams 'thob/ /yang dag mtha' ni sgrib pa med/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi sku nyid yin/ /dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /cho ga cho ga rgya chen bcas/ /le'u rab 'byam 'dis 'dren byed/ /

'jam pa'i dbyangs ni legs dgod pa/ /phun tshogs dpal dang blo gros mchod/ /rtsa ba'i cho ga mi nyung ba/ /rgya che mang por bstan pa yin/ /rtag dang chad dang thog mtha' ni/ /gnyi ga'i mtha' don rnam par spangs/ /
rim bcas rim ni nges par bstan/ /sngags kyi lus ni btus pa yin/ /me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang / /stong pa'i de nyid legs gsungs pa/ /spangs pa rtag tu 'gro ba ni/ /'og nas 'og tu de tshe
'gro/ /bskal pa rnam mang gsum gyi grangs/ /de tshe bsod nams yongs bsags nas/ /de tshe byang chub thob nas ni/ /bdag dang rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi don gsungs pa/ /'gro ba
yul ni sdig med la'o/ /rtsa ba'i cho ga dag byed dang / /sdig pa med cing bkra shis pa'i/ /le'u rab 'byam rab gsungs pa/ /nges pa'i mdo sde bzang po yin/ /sa bdag yon tan bdag nyid che/ /yul dang dus

kyi sbyor ba dang / /rgyal sras mi ru skyes pa yis/ /sa steng dam pa'i chos bstan ces/ /'jig rten gtso bo thub pa ni/ /rgyal ba bdun pas bstan pa yin/ /cho ga rgya cher gsungs pa ni/ /blo dang dpal ni mngon par 'phel/ /

rtsa ba rab 'byam le'u zhes/ /sngags dang rgyud dang ldan pa de/ /gang zhig mdo mchog gtso bo 'di/ /rgyal bas mchod pa'i chos kyi mdzod/ /sa steng mis ni spong byed pa/ /de ni mnar med dmyal bar 'gro/ /bskal pa

chen por de 'tshed ces/ /rnam pa du mar dbye bar bstan/ /nam zhig gang du 'byung ba ni/ /mi yi lus su skyes na yang / /dbul zhing nad mang glen pa dang / /kla klo dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten smad par 'gro ba ste/ /de ni

mdze can nad par 'gyur/ /lkugs shing 'on pa yan lag nyams/ /blo nyams long ba nyid dang ni/ /rtsub cing rtag tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /sa steng yi dags lta bur snang / /gos ngan sems ni zhan pa dang / /sen mo dang

ni lus kyang ngan/ /srin bu rnams kyis zos pa dang / /shu ba g.yan par yang dag ldan/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab spangs na/ /gang dang gang gis 'gro bar 'gro/ /de dang der ni skye ba na/ /blo ngan rmongs par skye bar 'gyur/ /de
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ mig
phye zhing mi 'dzums par thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshogs du ma chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das
shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngo mtshar te/ mchog tu legs par gsungs pa lags na/ de la bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems

can mi rigs pa'i chags pas zil gyis non pa slu bar byed pa nga rgyal can ma dad pa gya gyu can dmu rgod tshul khrims 'chal pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag sngags rnams kyi rtog pa'i bdag nyid chen po rgyas pa

grub pa dang / dus dang / yul dang / nges par sdom pa dang / sngags dang / spyod pa dang / /sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa nges par sdom pa dang / cho ga rab 'byam dag la ma dad par 'gyur/ yid la mi byed par 'gyur te/

sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no/ /zhes byas nas spong bar 'gyur te/ de dag nyon mongs pa'i sems su gyur nas dus byed par 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal drag cing tsha ba'i tshor ba myong zhing de dag dmyal ba chen por
skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ba'i sems can de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam

dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la spyi bor byugs nas bka' stsal pa/ /'jam dpal khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir rab tu zhugs pa khyod yang legs so legs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod de bzhin

gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa de khyod yang legs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i phyir legs par shin tu rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa

dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / lha dang / mi rnams dang / 'jig rten la rab tu brtse ba'i phyir ngas khyod la bshad do/ /spyod pa thams cad la zhugs pa dang / byang chub kyi lam dang / thams cad shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la

'jug pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sku la gnas par 'dod pa rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po mchog tu gsang ba/ gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang 'di dran par bya'o/ /de gang zhe

na/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wa ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar had b+h+yaH/ samya k+sa~M bu b+h+yaH/ ku mA ra rU pi Ne/ bi shwa sa~M b+ha ba/ A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ la hu la hu/ b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M/ dzi na dzi ka many+dzu shri ye/ su shri ye/ tA ra ya / sarba duHkhe b+h+yaH/ phaT phaT/ sha ma ya sha ma ya/

a mrI tod+b+ha ba/ pA paM me nA sha ya swA hA/ 'jam dpal 'di ni khyod kyi snying po dam pa yin te/ zhi ba thams cad byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu grol bar byed pa/ tshe dang / nad med

pa dang / dbang phyug dang / skal ba bzang po mchog dang / ngag gi dbang phyug skyed par byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad gzengs stod par byed pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'di gsungs ma thag tu sa chen po ri

dang rgya mtsho dang bcas pa/ sems can dang snod nye ba'i mthar thug pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad de yi dags kyi 'gro ba dang / dud 'gro dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / dmyal ba'i sems can thams

cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu sbyangs shing / bde ba rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur la/ 'jam dpal rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yang yid la byed cing / de'i tshe dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems kyang med par 'gyur na/ bdud sdig to

can gyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar yang sems bskyed par bya ste/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas dang / chos ni bsam gyis mi
khyab ste/ bsam pa'am/ gzhal ba'am/ spang bar ni bdag gis ci zhig nus te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i
cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phan yon dang nyes dmigs kyi nus pa rab 'byam bstan pa'i le'u sum cu rtsa drug pa rdzogs s+ho// //
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i steng na

gnas pa'i lha'i bu'i tshogs rnams dang / sems can bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
grub pa dang / rig 'dzin dang / drang srong mchog dam pa du ma dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / byams pa dang / mthu chen thob dang / mthu chen gnas dang /
phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra bar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams thugs rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa
'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// //dpal lha btsan po lha btsun pa byang chub 'od kyi bkas/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge bsnyen chen po ku mA
ra ka la sha dang / sgra sgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /bkra shis par gyur cig /
zhus te dag go/ //
